anya-e0810n0:797_0: Tikaṃ kheḷe. Lā ādāne, alo, itthiyamā, lala icchāyaṃ vā, itthiyamā. Khela gatiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:797_1: a. Khala calane, sañcaye vā, ṇo, ḷattaṃ, khaṃ vā ākāsaṃ ilatīti kheḷo. Ila gatiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:797_2: kammani ṇo, ila gatimhi vā, a, isse.
anya-e0810n0:798_0: Dvayaṃ pitte. Mā parimāṇe, dhu. Mada ummāde vā, ṇu, dassa dho. Māyūti pāṭhe maya
anya-e0810n0:798_1: gatiyaṃ, ṇu. Mādhumāyusaddā dve purise pulliṅge. Apidadhātīti pittaṃ. Apipubbo dhā
anya-e0810n0:798_2: pidhāne, to, alopo, bhujādi, pittaṃ, napuṃsake.
anya-e0810n0:799_0: Dvayaṃ semhe. Silisa silesane, curādi, silisyate atreti semho, mana, lisassa ho,
anya-e0810n0:799_1: vaṇṇavipariyayo. Itaratra umo, silesumo. Kaphopyatra, kena toyena phāti vuddhi yassa kapho, nerutto.
anya-e0810n0:800_0: 282-283. Vilīno vibhūto sneho vasātyuccate, vasa nivāse, ā. Dvayaṃ avilīnasnehe.
anya-e0810n0:800_1: Mida snehane, ṇo. Vapa bījasantāne, a, vapā. “Vapā vivaramedesū”ti nānatthasaṅgahe,
anya-e0810n0:800_2: amarakose pana medādīnamekatthatā dīpitā, vuttañhi tattha “medo tu vapā vasā”ti amara 16.64.
anya-e0810n0:801_1: ṇo. “Nepacche gehamatte ca, veso vesyāgahepi vessagahepi (ka.) ce”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā
anya-e0810n0:801_2: 16.99 rabhaso. Vasa kantiyaṃ, visi byāpane vā, ṇo. Nissesato pathanaṃ pakhyānaṃ nepacchaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:802_0: Chakkaṃ hārādyābharaṇe. Maḍi bhūsāyaṃ, karaṇe yu. Sādha saṃsiddhiyaṃ, yu, sāṭha saṅkhāragatīsu
anya-e0810n0:802_1: vā, pasāṭhanaṃ, muddhajadutiyotra. Bhūsa alaṅkāre, karaṇeyeva yu. Ābhariyyate tanti
anya-e0810n0:802_2: ābharaṇaṃ, bhara bharaṇe, kammani yu. Alaṃ vibhūsanaṃ kariyyateneneti alaṅkāro, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:802_3: Piḷandha bhūsane, karaṇe yu. Parikkhāropyatra parikaropyatra (ka.).
anya-e0810n0:803: Dvayaṃ makuṭe. Kira vikiraṇe, īṭo. Maki maṇḍane, uṭo. Mukuṭotipi pāṭho, ete dve anitthī.
anya-e0810n0:804: Dvayaṃ makuṭaggaṭṭhe nāyakamaṇimhi. Makuṭacūḷāyaṃ cumbitā maṇi cūḷāmaṇi. Makuṭasirasi cumbitā maṇi siromaṇi.
anya-e0810n0:805_0: 284. Dvayaṃ uṇhīsapaṭṭe. Siraso veṭhanaṃ siroveṭhanaṃ. Upubbo naha bandhane, īso,
anya-e0810n0:805_1: vaṇṇavikāro. Yaṃ bahukālaṃ debyāmanussesvapi bhavati, tatra kaṇṇābharaṇe kuṇḍalādidvayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:805_2: Kuḍi dāhe, alo. Veṭha veṭhane, kaṇṇassa veṭhanaṃ kaṇṇaveṭhanaṃ, muddhajadutiyoyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:806_0: Tikaṃ tāḷakākhye kaṇṇābharaṇe. Kaṇṇānaṃ bhūsanaṃ kaṇṇikā, kaṇṇā bhūsane bahulalakkhaṇe
anya-e0810n0:806_1: ṇiko. Kaṇṇacchadanaṃ pūrati yena so kaṇṇapūro. Kaṇṇassa vibhūsanaṃ kaṇṇavibhūsanaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:807: 285. Dvayaṃ gīvābharaṇe. Kaṇṭhassa bhūsā kaṇṭhabhūsā, thī. Gīvāyaṃ bhavaṃ gīveyyaṃ, bhavatthe eyyo, gīvāya ābharaṇaṃ vā gīveyyaṃ, gīvato ābharaṇe eyyo.
anya-e0810n0:808: Dvayaṃ muttāvaliyaṃ. Harīyate mano yena hāro. Muttānaṃ āvali panti muttāvali. Hārāsaddopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:809_0: Catukkaṃ pakoṭṭhābharaṇe. Pakoṭṭho nāma kapparassādhobhāgo. Nī naye, uro, iyādeso.
anya-e0810n0:809_1: Vala saṃvaraṇe, ayo, anitthī, niyuropi. Kaṭa vasāvaraṇagatīsu, ṇvu. Pari samantato
anya-e0810n0:809_2: harati cittaṃ yanti parihārakaṃ, ṇvu. Avāpakopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:810_0: 286-287. Dvayaṃ muttādighaṭitavalayavikatyābharaṇe. Kā sadde, kaṇapaccayo, kaṇa sadde
anya-e0810n0:810_1: vā, dvittaṃ, kaṅkaṇaṃ, kaki gatyatthe vā, yu, kaki lolye vā, kaṅkati yenāti kaṅkaṇaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:810_2: karaṇe yu. Karassa bhūsā karabhūsā, thī.
anya-e0810n0:811: Dvayaṃ khuddaghaṇṭikāyaṃ. Kiṃ kucchitaṃ kaṇatīti kiṅkaṇī, nadādi. Kiṅkiṇītipi pāṭhantaraṃ, tadā yadādi. Khuddā eva ghaṇṭā khuddaghaṇṭikā, sakatthe ko, ghaṭa calane.
anya-e0810n0:812_0: Dvayaṃ aṅgulyābharaṇe. Aṅguliyaṃ bhavaṃ aṅgulīyakaṃ, īyo, sakatthe ko, aṅgulīnamābharaṇaṃ
anya-e0810n0:812_2: aṅgulimuddā”ti coccate. Muda tose, ṇvu, ā, muddikā, phalavisesepyayaṃ. Aṅguliyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:813_0: Dvayaṃ itthikaṭyābharaṇe. Rasa sadde, kattari yu, ā, rasanā. Sāyeva inīmhi rasanī.
anya-e0810n0:813_1: “Sāre dhanimhi rasanaṃ, jivhāyaṃ rasanā na so”ti ruddo. Mehanassa khassa mālā mekhalāti
anya-e0810n0:813_2: nirutti, mehanindriyassa mālātyattho. Kāñcī sattakī, sārasanaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:815: Rasanā soḷasā ñeyyā, kalāpā pañcavīsati kalāpo pañcavīsako (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 16.108).
anya-e0810n0:816: Tikaṃ sovaṇṇe pagaṇḍabhūsane. Pagaṇḍo nāma kapparassoparibhāgo. Ke sadde, uro, yāgamo. Aṅga gamane. Do. Bāhumūlassa, bāhumūle vā bhavaṃ vibhūsanaṃ bāhumūlavibhūsanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:817_0: 288. Catukkaṃ itthicaraṇavibhūsane. Aṅgadākāraṃ pādabhūsanaṃ pādaṅgadaṃ. Maji saddattho,
anya-e0810n0:817_1: īro, pāde kaṭakaṃ pādakaṭakaṃ. Ūnaṃ pādaṃ pūretīti nūpuro, vaṇṇavipariyayo. Pādakaṭako
anya-e0810n0:817_2: ca nūpuro ceti kaṭakasaddassa pulliṅgepi pavattanato dvandasamāso. Tulākoṭi, haṃsakopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:817_3: Tula gatikoṭilye. Kuṭilakoṭittā tulākoṭi, pume. Haṃsagatittā haṃsako.
anya-e0810n0:818_0: 289. Mukhaphullādayo alaṅkārappabhedā siyuṃ. Mukhaphullaṃ nāma suvaṇṇamayo mukhālaṅkāro,
anya-e0810n0:818_1: mukhe phullatīti mukhaphullaṃ, phulla vikasane, dantādīsu suvaṇṇamayālaṅkāropi mukhaphullameva.
anya-e0810n0:818_2: Uṇṇataṃ suvaṇṇādiracitaṃ nalāṭābharaṇaṃ, upubbo namu namane. Ettha ca mukhaphulluṇṇatānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:818_3: visesaṃ vipariyayenāpīti vadanti. Gāvīnaṃ thanākārattā gatthanaṃ, ossattaṃ, tameva
anya-e0810n0:818_4: uttamattā uggatthanaṃ, catuyaṭṭhiko hārabhedo. Gamu gamane, ṇvu, dvittaṃ, assittañca,
anya-e0810n0:818_5: giṅgamakaṃ, bāttiṃsayaṭṭhiko hārabhedova. Ādinā addhahāro, māṇavako, ekāvalī, nakkhattamālādayo
anya-e0810n0:819_0: 290. Pajjaṃ vatthamatte. Cila vassane, cilyate acchādīyateti, ṇo, thiyaṃ celī. Chada
anya-e0810n0:819_1: saṃvaraṇe, āpubbo karaṇe, yu. Vasa acchādane, vasyate acchādīyateti vatthaṃ, tho.
anya-e0810n0:819_2: Ṇamhi vāso. Yumhi vasanaṃ. Ama gamane, karaṇe yu, aṃsukaṃ, raṃsipariyāyopyayaṃ. Amba
anya-e0810n0:819_3: sadde, kattari aro. Paṭa gamane, karaṇe a, sobhanacelepyayaṃ. Du gamane, karaṇe so,
anya-e0810n0:819_4: dvittaṃ, durūpaṃ asati khepatīti vā dussaṃ, durūpaṃ asati dīpetīti vā dussaṃ, dupubbo
anya-e0810n0:819_5: asa dittiyaṃ. Cala vasane, assottaṃ, ḷattañca. Saṭa rujāvisaraṇagatyāvasānesu, ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:820_0: 291. Pajjaṃ vatthabhede. Tatrādidvayaṃ dukūlakhye vatthe. Khu sadde, mo, khumasaddā
anya-e0810n0:820_1: vikāre ṇo, khumāya vikāro khomaṃ, khumā nāma atasī, tabbakkalasambhavaṃ vatthaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:820_2: vāccaliṅgoyaṃ. Kūla āvaraṇe, dukkhena kulyateti dukūlaṃ, dumehi jātaṃ kūlanti vā
anya-e0810n0:820_3: dukūlaṃ. Keci pana “dukūlampi ekaṃ vatthantaraṃ, na khomanāma”nti vadanti. Taṃ “khoma’maṭṭe
anya-e0810n0:820_4: dukūle ca, atasīvasanepi ca”, “khoma’maṭṭe dukūlecā”ti nānatthasaṅgahatikaṇḍasesesu
anya-e0810n0:820_5: nānatthasaṅgaha 3.3.295 vuttattā na gahetabbaṃ. Koso nāma kimigabbho, tato jātattā
anya-e0810n0:820_6: koseyyaṃ, eyyo, “koseyyaṃ kimikosottha”nti amara 16.111 hi vuttaṃ. Koseyyameva dhotaṃ
anya-e0810n0:820_7: paṭṭuṇṇaṃ nāma, vuttañca “paṭṭuṇṇaṃ dhotakoseyya”nti amara 16.113. Pattuṇṇantipi
anya-e0810n0:820_8: pāṭhantaraṃ. Paṭṭuṇṇaraṭṭhe jātattā paṭṭuṇṇantipi vadanti. Kamu kantiyaṃ, kamanīyattā
anya-e0810n0:820_9: kambalo, raṅkunāmakassa hariṇavisesassa lomenasañjātavatthaṃ rāṅkavaṃ vigaromajaṃ
anya-e0810n0:820_10: (amara 16.111), alo, vāgamo ca majjhe. Vāsaddo kambalasaddassa napuṃsakattaṃ samuccinoti.
anya-e0810n0:820_11: Rallakopi amara 16.116 kambalapariyāyo. Saṇa sadde, kattari a, saṇo nāma thirattaco
anya-e0810n0:820_12: eko rukkhayoni, yassa tacena kevaṭṭādayo jālādīni karonti, saṇassa vikāro sāṇaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:820_13: vatthaṃ. Migalomāni koṭṭetvā sukhumāni katvā katamambaraṃ koṭumbaraṃ, kuṭa chedane,
anya-e0810n0:820_14: usso, assu, koṭumbaraṭṭhejātattā vā koṭumbaraṃ. Bhaṅgaṃ nāma khomādīni sabbāni ekajjhāni
anya-e0810n0:820_15: vomissetvā katavatthaṃ, bhanja avamaddane, atha vā bhaṅgaṃ nāma sāṇaphalaṃ, tabbikārattā
anya-e0810n0:820_16: vatthaṃ bhaṅgaṃ, vuttañca nānatthasaṅgahe “bhaṅgā sāṇākhyasassepī”ti. Sassasaddena
anya-e0810n0:820_17: cettha phalaṃ vuttaṃ, “rukkhādīnaṃ phalaṃ sassa”nti amara 14.15 vacanato. Bhaṅgampi
anya-e0810n0:820_18: vākamayamevāti keci. Vatthantaraṃ vatthaviseso. Ādinā kappāsādayopi gahitā.
anya-e0810n0:821_0: 292-293. Catukkaṃ paridhānabhūte adhovatthe. Adhobhāge vasīyateti nivāsanaṃ, nisaddo
anya-e0810n0:821_1: adhobhāgassa jotako. Vasa acchādane, kammani yu. Bāhulyena antare majjhe bhavaṃ antarīyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:821_2: īyo. Samānaliṅgattā dvando. Antare bhavaṃ antaraṃ, ṇo. Antare majjhe bhavo vāso antaravāsako,
anya-e0810n0:822_0: Pañcakaṃ uparidhāne. Vara acchādane, papubbo, kammani ṇo, ubhayatrāpi vuddhi, pāvāro.
anya-e0810n0:822_1: Uttarasmiṃ dehabhāge āsajjateti uttarāsaṅgo, ā pubbo sañja saṅge. Upari saṃvīyate
anya-e0810n0:822_2: pidhīyate bāhulyenāti, yu. Upasaṃpubbo vī tantasantāne. Uttarasmiṃ dehabhāge bhavaṃ
anya-e0810n0:822_3: vijjamānaṃ uttaraṃ, uttarīyañca, ṇo, īyo ca. Saṃbyānaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:823_0: Navaṃ vatthaṃ ahatanti mataṃ kathitaṃ, na haññati yaṃ pāsāṇādīhīti ahataṃ. Tantato
anya-e0810n0:823_1: aciramāharitaṃ vatthaṃ. Anāhataṃ, nippavāṇi, tantakaṃpyatra. Vuttañca “anāhataṃ nippavāṇi,
anya-e0810n0:824_0: Dvayaṃ cirakālattā niddase jiṇṇavatthe. Natthi anto dasā yassa nantakaṃ, sakatthe
anya-e0810n0:824_1: ko. Kucchito paṭo kappaṭo, kappa vitakke vā, aṭo. Dvayaṃ athiravatthe, jiṇṇavasanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:824_2: athiraṃ vatthaṃ. “Paṭa”iti carati phoṭatīti paṭaccaraṃ, paṭaccarameva paḷaccaraṃ, ḷattaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:825_0: 294. Dvayaṃ koṭikādisannāhe, coḷe ca. Kaca bandhane, uko, niggahītāgamo ca. Vāṇaṃ
anya-e0810n0:825_1: saraṃ vārayatīti vāravāṇo, kammani ṇo, abhidhānato vārassa pubbanipāto, anitthiyamete.
anya-e0810n0:825_2: Vatthassa avayave dasāsaddo itthī. “Dasā vatyamavatthāyaṃ, vatthaṃse bahumhi dvisū”ti
anya-e0810n0:825_3: cintāmaṇiṭīkā 16.114 rabhaso. Dā chedane, kammani so, rasso.
anya-e0810n0:826: Uttamaṅgamhi sīse yo kañcuko suvaṇṇādimayo, so “nāḷipatto”ti kathito. Nāḷipatto taṃsaṇṭhāno suvaṇṇādipaṭo nāḷipatto. Sīsakaṃ, siriyaṃ, sirohantipi tassa nāmāni.
anya-e0810n0:827: 295. Tikaṃ dīghatte. Āpubbo yamu uparame, ṇo. Ā bhuso yāti gacchatīti vā āyāmo, yā gatipāpuṇesu, mo. Dīghassa bhāvo dīghatā. Ruha janane, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:828: Dvayaṃ vitthāre. Vatthavisaye “osāro”ti rūḷhe. Samantato nayhatīti pariṇāho, naha bandhane, ṇo. Vitthārena saraṇaṃ visāro, so eva visālatā.
anya-e0810n0:829_0: 296. Catukkaṃ cīvare. Arahataṃ dhajo arahaddhajo, rūḷhiyā tadaññacīvaresu. Kasāyena,
anya-e0810n0:829_1: kasāvena ca rattaṃ kāsāyaṃ, kāsāvañca, samānaliṅgattā dvando. Ci caye, īvaro. Vatthakhandhehi cīyateti cīvaraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:830_0: Maṇḍalādayo tadaṅgāni samūhabhūtassa cīvarassa avayavāni. Maḍi bhūsāyaṃ, alo, maṇḍalaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:830_1: Cīvarapariyantoyaṃ mahāpathaviyā cakkavāḷapabbato viya cīvarassa samantato tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0810n0:830_2: Vivaṭṭo nāma cīvaramajjhagatamaggo, so hi visuṃ visuṃ vaṭṭatīti vivaṭṭoti vuccati,
anya-e0810n0:830_3: vaṭṭa āvaṭṭane. Kusi nāma maggānaṃ majjhagatavatthakhaṇḍaṃ, kusa chedane, kammani
anya-e0810n0:831_0: 297. Phalādīnaṃ yāni cattāri santi, etā vatthassa yoniyo kāraṇāni tato taduppattito.
anya-e0810n0:831_1: Kappāsikaṃ vatthaṃ phālaṃ nāma phalavikārattā, vikāre ṇo, tīsu. Yathā – phālo paṭo,
anya-e0810n0:831_2: phālā celī, phālaṃ vatthaṃ. Khomādayo pana paṭā tacabbhavā tacato sañjātā.
anya-e0810n0:832_0: 298. Koseyyaṃ vatthaṃ kimijaṃ nāma. Migalomamayantu kambalaṃ. Dvayaṃ byavadhāyakapaṭe,
anya-e0810n0:832_1: kaṇḍapaṭepīti keci. Samānatthā ete dve tulyatthātyattho. Ju gatiyaṃ, bhūvādi, ju
anya-e0810n0:832_2: bandhane vā, yu, anakādeso, sā itthī. Tiro karīyati pidhīyati yāya, sā tirokaraṇī,
anya-e0810n0:832_3: yu. Patisīrāpyatra. Patipubbo si bandhane, ro.
anya-e0810n0:833_0: 299. Dvayaṃ uparibandhapaṭe, athasaddotra liṅgādijotako. Uddhaṃ locate bandhīyateti
anya-e0810n0:833_1: ullocaṃ, luca dassane. Candātape vitanyateti vitānaṃ, tanu vitthāre, ṇo, curādi.
anya-e0810n0:834_0: Dvayaṃ sināne. Naha soce, karaṇe yu, sinā soce, karaṇe yu, “sināne”ti sattamyantaṃ
anya-e0810n0:834_1: padaṃ. Dvayaṃ kulyādinā kuṭyādinā (ka.), kujjanādinā (nissaya), kuṅkumahaliddādinā
anya-e0810n0:834_3: vatu vattane, bhūvādi. Majja suddhiyaṃ, yu. Samanti dvayamidaṃ samānatthaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:835_0: 300. Tikaṃ nalāṭakate cittake. Tilakākati tilako. Cittakākati cittakaṃ. Cakārena
anya-e0810n0:835_1: tamālapattākati tamālapattaṃ. Sāmaññena visesakaṃ, ubho visesakatilakā anitthī, sesadvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:836_0: Tikaṃ candane, cadi hilādane, hilādanaṃ sukhāpanaṃ, yu. Gandhānaṃ sāro uttamo gandhasāro,
anya-e0810n0:836_1: gandhayutto sāro thiraṃso vā gandhasāro. Malayadīpagirimhi jāyatīti malayajo. Bhaddasirīpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:837_0: 301. Tikaṃ pītacandane. “Gosīsa”iti pabbate malaye dese jātaṃ gosīsaṃ, go viya jalaṃ
anya-e0810n0:837_1: viya sītanti vā gosītaṃ, tadeva tassa sakāraṃ katvā gosīsaṃ. Tilapaṇṇappamāṇapaṇṇayuttatāya
anya-e0810n0:837_2: telapaṇṇikaṃ. Manaṃ haratīti hari, tameva candananti haricandanaṃ. Pītasāru, susītaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:837_3: Gosīsādayo tayo pume, napuṃsake ca vattanti.
anya-e0810n0:838_0: Catukkaṃ rattacandane. Tilapaṇṇappamāṇapaṇṇayuttatāya tilapaṇṇī. Purimena bhedakaraṇatthaṃ
anya-e0810n0:838_1: na vuddhi. Pattamaṅgamasseti pattaṅgaṃ, khuddapaṇṇatāya appadhānapattamiccattho.
anya-e0810n0:838_2: “Aṅgaṃ gattanti kopāya-patīkesvappadhānake”ti hi nānatthasaṅgahe. Rañja rāge, hetukattari
anya-e0810n0:838_3: yu. Rattavaṇṇatāya rattañca taṃ candanañceti rattacandanaṃ, amarakose pana “gosīsādīni
anya-e0810n0:838_4: rattacandanantāni visese vattantī”ti amara 16.131 vuttāni. Tatra gosīsassa yathāvuttoyevattho.
anya-e0810n0:838_5: Dhavalaṃ, susītalaṃ, candanaṃ, telapaṇṇikaṃ malayapabbatadesajameva. Hari maṇḍūko,
anya-e0810n0:838_6: tadākāre pabbate jātaṃ candanaṃ haricandanaṃ. Pakkambaphalagandhi pītavaṇṇaṃ. Tilapaṇṇīpattaṅgāni
anya-e0810n0:839_0: Dvayaṃ rattacandane. Atha vā tilapaṇyādīni cattāri lohitacandanasadisassa rattasārassa
anya-e0810n0:839_1: ekassa candanavisesassa nāmāni. Kucandanaṃpyatra. “Pattaṅgaṃ rañjanaṃ rattaṃ, patraṅgañca
anya-e0810n0:840_0: 302. Dvayaṃ vaṇijādīnaṃ “kāḷeyā”iti rūḷhepītakaṭṭhe. Kāḷavaṇṇaṃ anusarati sīlenāti
anya-e0810n0:840_1: kāḷānusārī, kāḷavaṇṇajanakotyattho. Kāḷaṃ janetīti kāḷiyaṃ, “kāḷīyakantu kāḷeyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:841: Tikaṃ agarusāmaññe. Lū chedane, ho. Lahunāmattā agaru. Rassa latte agalu, dvayaṃ pume. Vaṃsikaṃ, rājārahaṃ, kimijaṃ, joṅgakaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:842: Asmiṃ agarumhi kāḷe sati “kāḷāgarū”tyuccate. Mallikāpupphagandhi agaru pana maṅgalyoccate.
anya-e0810n0:843: Dvayaṃ sallakīdave. Turukkho vutto. Piḍi saṅghāte, ṇvu. Sihalo, yāvaṇopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:844: 303. Dvayaṃ miganābhiyaṃ. Kattha silāghāyaṃ, ūro, nadādi, sakatthe ko. Migassa mado migamado, migo marati yenāti vā migamaro, so eva migamado.
anya-e0810n0:845_0: Dvayaṃ kuṭṭhe. Kuṭa chedane, ṭho, to vā, “kuṭādīhi ṭho”ti ṭho, kuṭṭhaṃ, rogabhedepi.
anya-e0810n0:845_1: Attano chāyūpagate aje pāletīti ajapālakaṃ, ṇvu. Pāribhābyaṃ, pākalaṃ phālakī (ka.),
anya-e0810n0:846: Dvayaṃ piḍaṅge. Rogaṃ lunanto aṅgati gacchatīti lavaṅgo. Devānaṃ kusumaṃ pupphaṃ devakusumaṃ. Sirisaññaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:847: Dvayaṃ kuṅkume. Kasmīraraṭṭhe jātaṃ kasmīrajaṃ. Aggisikhaṃ, varaṃ, vallīkaṃ, pītanaṃ, rattasaṅkocaṃ, pisunaṃ, dhīraṃ lohitacandanaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:848_0: 304. Dvayaṃ dhunake. Yakkhehi kato dhūpo yakkhadhūpo, yakkho devo. Sajjarukkhassa
anya-e0810n0:848_1: sileso sajjulaso. Assu, silopo, essattañca, sajjassa raso davo sajjulaso, assu, lattañca.
anya-e0810n0:849_0: Tikaṃ takkole. Takka vitakke, olo. Kula saṅkhyāne, ṇvu. Kosayuttaṃ phalametassāti
anya-e0810n0:849_1: kosaphalaṃ. Dvayaṃ jātiphale. Kosasahitaṃ jātiphalametassāti jātikosaṃ. Jātiphalametassa,
anya-e0810n0:850: 305. Pajjaddhaṃ kappūre, ghano hutvā saratīti ghanasāro. Abbhamiva sitaṃ sitabbho, abhidhānato pubbanipāto, kappa sāmatthiye, ūro. Candasañño, himavāluko, himāvhayopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:851: Pajjaddhaṃ lākhāyaṃ, ā bhuso rattaṃ karotīti alattako, lattaṃ, kvi. Yu missane, ṇvu. Lākha sosane, a, lā ādāne vā, kho. Jana janane, tu, nalopo. Dumāmayopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:852_0: 306. Dvayaṃ saraladdave. Siriyā lakkhiyā āvāso sirivāso. Saralanāmakassa rukkhassa
anya-e0810n0:852_1: davo raso saraladdavo. Pāyaso, vakadhūpo, siriveṭṭhopyatra. “Sirivāse paramanne ca,
anya-e0810n0:852_2: pāyaso sammato pume”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 16.129 ruddo. Dvayaṃ añjane. Añju byattimakkhanagatikantīsu,
anya-e0810n0:852_3: yu. Kajja byasane. Kajjati roganti kajjalaṃ, alo.
anya-e0810n0:853_0: Dvayaṃ gandhagāhāpanacuṇṇe, vasa hiṃsattho, vasati duggandhanti vāso, ṇo, vāsa upasevāyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:853_1: vā, vasa nivāse vā. So eva cuṇṇaṃ. Yuja yoge, kammani ṇo, vāso eva yogo vāsayogo.
anya-e0810n0:853_2: Dvayaṃ vilepanamatte. Vaṇṇa vaṇṇakriyāvitthāraguṇavacanesu, curādi. Vaṇṇayatīti vaṇṇakaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:853_3: Ṇvu. Lipa upadehe. Vilepīyateti vilepanaṃ, kammani yu.
anya-e0810n0:854: 307. Yo gandhamālyadhūpādīhi vatthatambulādīnaṃ saṅkhāro, taṃ “vāsana”mityuccate, vāsa upasevāyaṃ, vāsīyate saṅkharīyateti vāsanaṃ, yu.
anya-e0810n0:855_0: Tikaṃ pupphadāme. Mā māne, lo, mala dhāraṇe vā, a. Mālova mālyaṃ. Dama gatiyaṃ, pupphāni
anya-e0810n0:855_1: damantyatreti pupphadāmaṃ, pupphānaṃ rāsikaraṇaṭṭhānamiccattho. Dā lavane vā, mo.
anya-e0810n0:855_2: Amarakose pana “mālāmālyāni muddhani pavattāya mālāya nāmānī”ti amara 16.135 vadati.
anya-e0810n0:855_3: Mālamālyasaddā pupphepi, “mālā mālyaṃ pasune”ti hi nānatthasaṅgahe. Dvayaṃ gandhaggāhite
anya-e0810n0:855_4: vatthādo. Bhū sattāyaṃ, kammani to, vuddhādi. Vāsāpeti gandhaṃ gāhāpeti yanti vāsitaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:855_5: vasa nivāse, kamme to, tīsu, yathā – bhāvito paṭo, bhāvitā celī, bhāvitaṃ vatthaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:856_0: 308. Pañcakaṃ muddhamālāyaṃ. Tasi alaṅkāre, bhūvādi. Uddhaṃ tasīyateti uttaṃso. Sikhāyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:856_1: jāto sekharo, ro. Muddhaṃ avati rakkhatīti aveḷā, ava rakkhaṇe, elo, ḷattaṃ. “Āveḷā”tipi
anya-e0810n0:856_2: pāṭho, dīghattaṃ. Sekharo ca āveḷā cāti dvando. Muddhani alaṅkataṃ mālyaṃ muddhamālyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:856_3: tasmiṃ. Avapubbo tasi alaṅkāre, uddhaṃ tasīyateti avataṃso, so eva vaṭaṃsako, sakatthe
anya-e0810n0:856_4: ko, tassa ṭo, anekatthattā upasagganipātānaṃ uddhaṃbhāvajotako cettha avasaddoti tathottaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:857: Tikaṃ seyyāyaṃ. Sayantyassaṃ seyyā, yo. Sayantyatreti sayanaṃ, senañca. Ubhayatrapi adhikaraṇe yu, isse, e aya, itaratra ettaṃ, “vā paro asarūpā”ti alopo ca, sayanīpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:858_0: Dvayaṃ mañce. Paripubbo aki lakkhaṇe, ṇo, ilopo, rassa lattaṃ. Maci dhāraṇocchāyapūjanesu,
anya-e0810n0:858_1: bhūvādi a, sakatthe ko. Khaṭāpyatra, khaṭyate ākaṅkhate sayanatthikehīti khaṭā, khaṭa ākaṅkhāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:859_0: 309. Dvayaṃ mañcādhāre. Mañcassa ādhāro mañcādhāro. Paṭipajjati pavattati seyyā yena,
anya-e0810n0:859_1: so paṭipādo. Mañcaṅge mañcāvayave aṭanisaddo itthiyaṃ, aṭa gamanattho, ani, yu vā, nadādi, rasso.
anya-e0810n0:860_0: 310. Kuḷīrapādādayo ime cattāro mañcantarā mañcabhedā siyuṃ. Tattha kuḷīro kakkaṭako
anya-e0810n0:860_1: tassa saṇṭhānapādattā kuḷīrapādo. Aṭaniyaṃ āhacco, āhacca vā pādo tiṭṭhati yassāti
anya-e0810n0:860_2: āhaccapādo, pubbapakkhe “riccā”ti yogavibhāgena riccapaccayanto āhaccasaddo, parapakkhe
anya-e0810n0:860_3: tu tvāpaccayanto, yassa aṭanichidde pādo pavisitvā tiṭṭhati, so āhaccapādo. Masa
anya-e0810n0:860_4: āmasane, āro, sakatthe ko. Yassa pādacchidde aṭani pavisitvā tiṭṭhati, so masārako.
anya-e0810n0:860_5: Bundena pādena saha ekābaddhā aṭani yassa so bundikābaddho, ekārassittaṃ. Ettha ca
anya-e0810n0:860_6: majjhe dvinnaṃ mañcānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vipariyayenāpi vadanti.
anya-e0810n0:861: 311. Dvayaṃ sīsādhāre. Visesena sīsaṃ vahatīti bibbohanaṃ, yu, battaṃ, assottañca. Upadhīyate sīsāsanaṃ karīyateti upadhānaṃ, yu, dhā dhāraṇe.
anya-e0810n0:862_0: Tikaṃ sāmaññapīṭhe. Pīṭha hiṃsāsaṃkilesesu, bhūvādi, ṇvu, ā. Yadādinā ke paccaye
anya-e0810n0:862_1: itthikatākāre pare pubbo akāro ikāramāpajjate, “ke”ti kiṃ? Cetanā. “Paccaye”ti kiṃ?
anya-e0810n0:862_2: Bakā. “Itthī”ti kiṃ? Pācakā. “Kata”iti kiṃ? Vuttakammā, kammapaccayoyaṃ, tapaccaye
anya-e0810n0:862_3: pīṭhaṃ moggallāna 4.142 suttampi passitabbaṃ. Āsate asminti āsanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:863_0: Dvayaṃ uttamārahapīṭhe. Kuca saṃpaccanakoṭilyapatithambhavilekhanesu, cho. Bhaddaṃ
anya-e0810n0:863_1: kalyāṇaṃ pīṭhaṃ bhaddapīṭhaṃ. Gajadantādimayakesamajjaniyampi dvayamidamāhu. Tadā
anya-e0810n0:863_2: pasādhanī, kaṅkatikāpyatra. Pīṭhantare dīghapīṭhe āsandī matā. Sada visaraṇagatyāvasānesu,
anya-e0810n0:864_0: 312. Āyāmavitthāravasena mahanto āsanappabhedo “kojavo”ti mato, kuju theyyakaraṇe,
anya-e0810n0:864_1: ṇo, kuyaṃ pathaviyaṃ javatīti vā kojavo, ju gatiyaṃ. Dīghena lomena yutto āsanappabhedo
anya-e0810n0:864_2: “gonako”ti mato, gu sadde, yu, sakatthe ko, ussottaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:865: Dvayaṃ attharaṇe. Migalomapuṇṇatāya jātaṃ uṇṇāmayaṃ. Thara santharaṇe, pādipubbova, na kadācipi pādirahito, ā bhuso tharīyateti attharaṇaṃ, yu.
anya-e0810n0:866: Dvayaṃ saṃsibbanacittake. Cittarūpamassatthīti cittakaṃ. Bāhulyena na ikārāgamo. Vānena saṃsibbanena sañjātaṃ cittarūpamassāti vānacittakaṃ, sakatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:867_0: 313. Dvayaṃ nirantarapupphapaṭe. Ghanaṃ sandhibhūtaṃ puppharūpametthāti ghanapupphaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:867_1: Paṭalametissātthīti paṭalikā, iko. Dvayaṃ bahumudulome setavatthe. Si sevāyaṃ, sivatthikehi
anya-e0810n0:867_2: sevīyateti seto, to. Paṭa gamane, ṇvu, paṭikā, addhendupāsāṇepi.
anya-e0810n0:868_0: Dvīsupi pariyantesu yassā dasā santi, sā uddalomī, uditaṃ dvīsu lomaṃ dasā yassā
anya-e0810n0:868_1: sā uddalomī, issattaṃ, dvittañca. Ekasmiṃ pariyanteyeva dasā yassā ekantalomī, ekasmiṃ
anya-e0810n0:868_2: ante pariyante lomaṃ dasā yassātthīti ekantalomī, uddalomī ca ekantalomī ceti uddalomiekantalomino,
anya-e0810n0:868_3: “padānaṃ sandhi vatticchāto, na samāsantaragesū”ti vuttepi gāthābhāvato chandohānibhayā
anya-e0810n0:868_4: visandhi. Yattha pana gāthāyampi agāthāyampi (?) visandhi “dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāya’ntiādimāhā”tyādīsu,
anya-e0810n0:868_5: tattha kathanti? “Na samāsantaraṅgesū”ti imassāniccattā tatthāpi na doso, “nena niddiṭṭhamanicca”nti
anya-e0810n0:869_0: 314. Tadeva yathāvuttadvayameva soḷasannaṃ itthīnaṃ naccayoggaṃ naccassa yogyaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
anya-e0810n0:869_2: Karonti ettha naccanti kuttakaṃ, kara karaṇe, to, assu, bhujādi, sakatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:870_0: Sīhādirūpehi vicittarūpaṃ vatthaṃ, āsanaṃ vā vikatikā nāma bhave, ekasseva hi kattuno
anya-e0810n0:870_2: hoti, yathā – manussā yakkhabhattaṃ ahesuṃ, sattappakaraṇāni abhidhammo nāma bhavanti,
anya-e0810n0:870_3: devadatto rajjaṃ pāpuṇātīti. Yatra hi pakatiyā vā vikatiyā vāti dvinnampi vuttatā
anya-e0810n0:870_4: siyā, tatra vācako pakatiyāyeva saṅkhyaṃ gaṇhāti, netarassa tannissitabhāvenāppadhānato
anya-e0810n0:870_5: kaccāyanasāre 6-7 gāthāsu passitabbaṃ. Yadā pana pakatiyā sambandhādibhāvaṃ vattumicchati,
anya-e0810n0:870_6: tadā attanā vattabbassa aññatthassābhāvā vikatipyuccate vācakena, yathā – devadattassa
anya-e0810n0:870_7: rajjaṃ pāpuṇāti, idha pana liṅgabhedeneva vuttaṃ “cittaṃ vikatikā bhave”ti. Vikarīyateti vikati.
anya-e0810n0:871_2: kaṭṭissaṃ nāma, virūpekasesavasena kosiyañca kaṭṭissañca kaṭṭissāni, tehi pakataṃ
anya-e0810n0:871_3: attharaṇaṃ kaṭṭissaṃ. Kosiyasuttena pakatantu attharaṇaṃ koseyyaṃ nāma. Ratanapatisibbitanti
anya-e0810n0:871_4: idaṃ dvinnampi visesanaṃ, attharaṇañca iti kamā kamato “bhave”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:871_6: – suttaṃ kammanti. Ettha ca cakāro pādantattā garūsu gaṇhitabbo, teneva hi sattapaññāsamattā
anya-e0810n0:871_7: paripuṇṇā honti, ariyāya hi paṭhamapāde dvādasamattā, tathā tatiye, dutiye aṭṭhārasa,
anya-e0810n0:872: 316. Tikaṃ dīpe. Dīpa dittiyaṃ, divādi. Dippatīti dīpo, ṇo. “Padīpo”ti aññapadanivattanatthaṃ upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Juti dittiyaṃ, bhūvādi, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:873: Dvayaṃ ādāse. “Pume tū”ti tvantaṃ liṅgapadaṃ. Ādissate asminti ādāso, ṇo, āpubbo disa pekkhane, issā. Dippati etthāti dappaṇo, yu, issattaṃ. Makuropyatra.
anya-e0810n0:874_0: Dvayaṃ cammamayakīḷāguḷake. Vāsabhavanehi yuvatīhi saha kīḷāsambhavā ñeyyā, tappakkamenassābhidhānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:874_1: Guḍi vedhane, ṇuko, usse, gudda kīḷāyameva vā, tadā dassa ṇḍo. Kadi avhāne rodane
anya-e0810n0:874_2: ca, ṇuko, kudda kīḷāyameva vā, ussattaṃ, pubbadassa no.
anya-e0810n0:875_0: Dvayaṃ bījanīmatte. Vaṭi vibhājane, tālavaṇṭehi katattā tālavaṇṭaṃ. Vaṇṭaṃ nāma bījanādikaraṇatthaṃ
anya-e0810n0:875_1: visuṃ bhājito tālapattāvayavo, tālavaṇṭasaddassa yathāvuttavacanatthayogepi sati
anya-e0810n0:875_2: saññāsaddattā bījanīsāmaññe pavatti veditabbā. Yadā pana tālavaṇṭehi katabījanimeva
anya-e0810n0:875_3: vattumicchati, tadā ekena tālasaddena visesetvā “tālatālavaṇṭa”nti vattabbaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0810n0:875_4: – tilassa telaṃ, sugatassa sugatacīvaranti. Bijanti vāyunā yojayanti yāya, sā bījanī,
anya-e0810n0:875_5: yu, nadādi, yuja yoge, yassa vo, ussī, vaja gatiyaṃ vā assī. Byajanaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:876_0: 317. Dvayaṃ caṅkoṭake. Kuṭa chedane, sakatthe ko. Karaḍi bhājanatthe, ko. Dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:876_1: kappūrādisampuṭe sarūpakādisampuṭe (ka.). Samuggacchatīti samuggo, kvi. Puṭa saṃsilesane, bhūvādi, a.
anya-e0810n0:877_0: Pajjaddhaṃ methune. Gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammo ācāro gāmadhammo, gāmasaddena cettha gāmavāsino
anya-e0810n0:877_1: vuttā, yathā “gāmo āgato”ti. Asataṃ asappurisānaṃ dhammo, saddhammapaṭipakkhattā
anya-e0810n0:877_2: vā asaddhammo. Byaya khaye, byayati balametenāti byavāyo, majjhe vāgamo, atha vā
anya-e0810n0:877_3: vigato ayo vuḍḍhi tasmāti avāyo, atisayo avāyo byavāyo. Mithunānaṃ itthipurisānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:877_4: samānacchandānaṃ ācāro methunaṃ, tadaññesu upacāro, ramu ramane, bhāve, karaṇe vāti.
anya-e0810n0:878: 318. Catukkaṃ vivāhe. Vaha pāpuṇe, ṇo. Upapubbo yamu uparame, a. Aññamaññassa pāṇino gahaṇaṃ pāṇiggaho. Nī naye, a. Ubbāho, pāṇipīḷanaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:879_0: Dhammakāmatthā tayo vaggā vuccante. Āgamaniddiṭṭho samācāro dhammo. Visayavisayisannipātajaṃ
anya-e0810n0:879_1: sukhaṃ kāmo. Sabbopakaraṇaṃ attho. Samokkhakā mokkhasahitā dhammakāmatthā catubbaggo
anya-e0810n0:879_2: vuccante. Tivaggena visaṃyutto mokkho nibbānaṃ. Tulyabalehi pana dhammādīhi catūhi
anya-e0810n0:880: 319-320. Dvayaṃ khujje. Kucchitaṃ vajjatīti khujjo, kassa kho, valopo, ṇo. Gaḍi nindāyaṃ, ulo.
anya-e0810n0:881_0: Tikaṃ rassasarīre puggale. Rasa sadde, so. Byāmappamāṇaṃ na lātīti vāmano, nerutto.
anya-e0810n0:881_1: Rasso ca vāmano ceti dvando. Lakuḍi vāmanatthe, a, sakatthe ko, laku viya ghaṭikā
anya-e0810n0:882_0: Pañcakaṃ paṅguḷajane. Parena aṅgatīti paṅguḷo, ulo. Pīṭhena sappati sīlenāti pīṭhasappī,
anya-e0810n0:882_1: sappa gamane, upaccaye paṅgu, dvīsu. Chinno gamanādiiriyāpatho yassāti so chinniriyāpatho.
anya-e0810n0:882_2: Vigatā akkhasadisā jaṅghā yassāti pakkho, yathā hi rathassa akkhe bhinne gamanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:882_3: na sijjhati, tatheva tassāpi akkhajaṅghāya bhinnāyāti opammasaṃsandanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:883: Dvayaṃ khañje. Khaji gativekalye, bhūvādi, khañjatīti, a. Khoḍi gatipaṭighāte, ko.
anya-e0810n0:884: Dvayaṃ avākye. Vattumasakkuṇeyyattā migasadisoti mūgo, issū. Suññaṃ vaco yassāti so suññavaco.
anya-e0810n0:885_0: Hatthādivaṅko puriso “kuṇī”tyuccate. Kuṇanaṃ kuṇo hatthādivekalyaṃ, tametassatthīti
anya-e0810n0:885_1: kuṇī, atha vā kuṇa saṅkocane, ī, kucchitaṃ nayatīti vā kuṇī, ṇattaṃ, “hatthena kuṇī,
anya-e0810n0:885_2: pādena kuṇī”iccādipayogā. Dvayaṃ apāṅgadassane jane. Vala saṃvaraṇe, iro. Kucchitaṃ
anya-e0810n0:886: 321. Dvayaṃ nikkesasīse. Nikkesaṃ sīsametassa, khala khalane, sañcaye ca, āṭo, nikkesattā khaṃ tucchaṃ sīsaṃ lātīti khallāṭo, ṭo.
anya-e0810n0:887: Tikaṃ khuramuṇḍasīse. Muṇḍa khaṇḍane, bhūvādi, a. Bhaṇḍa paribhāsane, u, sakatthe ko, muṇḍako, muṇḍikopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:888_0: Akkhīnaṃ majjhe ekenākkhinā suñño kāṇo nāma, kaṇa saddagatinimīlanesu, ṇo, kaṇati
anya-e0810n0:888_1: nimīlatīti kāṇo, taṃ panassa nimīlanaṃ ekenevakkhinā. Aṭṭhakathādīsu pana “kāṇoti
anya-e0810n0:888_2: ekacchikāṇo, ubhayacchikāṇo vā”ti saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.132 vuttaṃ. Dvayena akkhidvayena
anya-e0810n0:888_3: suñño andho nāma, andha dassanūpasaṃhāre, a.
anya-e0810n0:889: 322. Dvayaṃ naṭṭhasotappasāde. Bandha bandhane, iro. Nalopo. Suti kaṇṇo hīno vikalo yassāti sutihīno. Eḷopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:890_0: Tikaṃ gilānasāmaññe. Gila hāsakkhaye, yu, byādhirogosañjāto yassa byādhito. Ata sātaccagamane,
anya-e0810n0:890_1: adhikaraṇe, kattari vā uro, āturo, dīghādi. Āmayāvī, vikato, apaṭu, abbhamito, abbhāntopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:891_0: Ummādo vātādipakopo rogaviseso, tabbati ummatto, mada ummāde, uggatehi vātādidosehi
anya-e0810n0:891_1: madayatīti ummādo, ṇo. Khujjādayo ummattantā vāccaliṅge yuttatāya vāccaliṅgikā, yathā
anya-e0810n0:891_2: – khujjo puriso, khujjā itthī, khujjaṃ napuṃsakaṃ. Ummatto puriso, ummattā itthī,
anya-e0810n0:892_0: 323. Navakaṃ rogamatte. Taki kicchajīvane, bhūvādi, ā bhuso taṅkatīti ātaṅko, a.
anya-e0810n0:892_1: Ama roge, yo, maya gatimhi vā, atha vā ama roge, curādi, āmayati rujjatīti āmayo,
anya-e0810n0:892_2: a, kāritalopābhāvo. Vidha vijjhane, vijjhatīti byādhi, i, akāravaṇṇāgamo, bādha vibādhāyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:892_3: vā, tadā yāgamo, vividhā vā ādhayo manopīḷā yasmiṃsa byādhi, “pume ādhi mānasī byathā”ti
anya-e0810n0:892_4: amara 8.28 hi amarakose vuttaṃ. Rogegado, kuverāyudhe gadā, gado bhātharikaṇhassa,
anya-e0810n0:892_5: “āmaye cāyudhe gadā”ti hi nānatthasaṅgahe. Ruja roge, kattari ṇo, rujā itthī. Gilānassa
anya-e0810n0:892_6: bhāvo gelaññaṃ. Kala gatisaṅkhyānesu, na kalati yena taṃ akalaṃ, tameva akallaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:892_7: lo. Bādha vibādhāyaṃ, bhūvādi, a. Upatāpopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:893: Dvayaṃ khayaroge, rasādisattadhātuyo sosayatīti soso, susa sosane, divādi, ṇo. Khi khaye, khayatīti, a. Yakkhā, rājayakkhāpyatra. Yakkha pūjāyaṃ, curādi.
anya-e0810n0:894_0: 324. Dvayaṃ nāsaroge. Apihitā nāsā anenāti pīnāso, pīnasopi. Upasaggato nāsāya bahubbīhimhi
anya-e0810n0:894_1: nasādesaṃ kubbanti pāṇini 5.4.119, apissākāralopo vaṇṇanāso, rassassa dīghatā. “Soso
anya-e0810n0:894_2: yakkhā rājayakkhā, patīssāyo tu pīnaso, āpīnaso patissāyo”ti rabhaso. Patissayopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:905: Iha tvabhedenottaṃ. Patipubbo sidhātu rujatyattho. Nāsikāya jāto rogo nāsikārogo.
anya-e0810n0:906_0: Ghāne pavatto assavo siṅghānikā nāma, siṅgha āghāne, bhūvādi, siṅghatīti siṅghānaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:906_1: yu, tattha jātā siṅghānikā. Ā punappunaṃ savati sandatīti assavo, sū abhisave. Dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:906_2: vaṇamatte. Ara gamane, u, aru, napuṃsakeyeva. Vaṇa gattavicuṇṇane, curādi, a, vaṇo,
anya-e0810n0:906_3: anitthī. Dvayaṃ phoṭe. Phuṭa saṃsilesane, bhūvādi, phoṭo, ṇo. Pīḷa vibādhāyaṃ, curādi,
anya-e0810n0:906_4: ṇvu, “itthiyamato āpaccayo”ti ā, pīḷako, pīḷakā, pīḷakaṃ, tīsvapi, tathā phoṭo.
anya-e0810n0:907: 325. Dvayaṃ pakkavaṇādīsu sañjātaduggandhavisese. Pubba pūraṇe, bhūvādi, a. Pūya visaraṇe, duggandhe ca, bhūvādi.
anya-e0810n0:908_0: Dvayaṃ lohitanissaraṇaroge. Rattassa lohitassa saṇṭhānamatikkamitvā saraṇaṃ gamanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:908_1: rattātisāro. Pakkhandati nissaratīti pakkhandikā. Kamu padavikkhepe. “Itthiyamatiyavo
anya-e0810n0:908_2: vā”titi. “Pakkamādīhinto ce”ti ettha cakārena tissanti, dhātvantalopo ca, sakatthe
anya-e0810n0:908_3: ko. Dvitte. Yadādinā parakakārassa kho, pakkhandikā.
anya-e0810n0:909_0: Dvayaṃ apamāre. Saraṇaṃ sāro, apagato sāro yena apamāro, sassa mo. Itaratra makārāgamo.
anya-e0810n0:909_1: Dvayaṃ pādabhede. Pādassa phoṭo bhedanaṃ daraṇaṃ pādaphoṭo, phuṭa bhede. Virūpo pādo
anya-e0810n0:909_2: etāya hetubhūtāyāti vipādikā. Samāsante ko, pubbākārassittaṃ, vidārīyamānattā vipajjamāno
anya-e0810n0:910_0: 326. Dvayaṃ vuḍḍhippattaṇḍakosaroge. Vuḍḍhippatto rogo vuḍḍhirogo. Vātapūritaṃ aṇḍaṃ
anya-e0810n0:910_1: koso vātaṇḍaṃ. Dvayaṃ thūlapādaroge. Ghanābhāvato sithilaṃ padaṃ sīpadaṃ, vaṇṇanāso,
anya-e0810n0:910_2: dīghādi. Bhāro pādo yassa, tassa bhāvo bhārapādatā.
anya-e0810n0:911_0: Pañcakaṃ kaṇḍuyaṃ. Kaṇḍa bhedane, u, dīghe kaṇḍū, vadhūsaddova. Timhi kaṇḍūti, assū,
anya-e0810n0:911_1: curādittā yamhi kaṇḍūyā, yalopābhāvo. Khajja theyyakaraṇabyathanesu, bhūvādi, u.
anya-e0810n0:911_2: Yumhi kaṇḍūvanaṃ, assū. Uvādeso, dīgho ca.
anya-e0810n0:912_0: 327. Tikaṃ kacchuyaṃ. Yā “khasurogo”ti vuccati. Pātyattānanti pāmaṃ, mana, pāmāpyatthi,
anya-e0810n0:912_1: pulliṅgo, rājādi, visesena tacchati kāsanti vitacchikā, taccha tanukaraṇe, ṇvu, “vivacchikā”
anya-e0810n0:912_2: viccaccikā (amara 16.53) tipi pāṭho. Vaccha paribhāsanatajjanesu, bhūvādi. Kaca bandhane,
anya-e0810n0:912_3: u, cassa chattaṃ, dvittādi. Tilakāḷakantaṃ dvayaṃ dvayaṃ samatthaṃ. Tatra dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:912_4: sothe. Su gativuḍḍhīsu, bhūvādi, tho. Thupaccaye sayathu, ussattaṃ, yāgamo ca. Sophopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:912_5: Sokaṃ phāyati bahulaṃ karotīti sopho, phāya vuḍḍhiyaṃ, phāyassa pho, nerutto.
anya-e0810n0:913_0: Dvayaṃ arisaroge. Amaṅgalatāya du ninditaṃ nāmamassa dunnāmaṃ, sakatthe, kucchāyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:913_1: vā ko, dīghakosikāyaṃ dunnāmā, itthī. Ari viya sasati hiṃ satīti arisaṃ, sasa hiṃsāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:913_2: kvi, ara gamane vā, iso. Dvayaṃ vamanaroge. Chadda vamane, curādi, ṇvu. Vamu uggiraṇe,
anya-e0810n0:913_3: thu. Vamidhupyatra. Chaddikā, vami itthiyaṃ, vamathu pume.
anya-e0810n0:914_0: 328-329. Dvayaṃ paritāpe. Du paritāpe, tanādi, thu. Paritapanaṃ santāpanaṃ paritāpo.
anya-e0810n0:914_1: Dvayaṃ tilakāḷake. Tilasaṇṭhānaṃ viya jāyatīti tilako. Tilaṃ viya kāḷo hutvā jāyatīti tilakāḷako.
anya-e0810n0:915_0: Mahāvireko “visūcikā”tyuccate. Nissesato sucati gacchatīti sūcikā. Suci, suca gatiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:915_1: bhūvādi. Suca soceyye vā, nissesato socetīti visūcikā, visesena sūci viya vijjhatīti
anya-e0810n0:915_2: vā visūcikā. Bahumosaraṇattā mahanto vireko mahāvireko, rica viyojanasampucchanesu, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:916_0: Bhagandalādayo satta āmayantarā rogabhedā bhavanti. Tatra gudasamīpajo vaṇaviseso
anya-e0810n0:916_1: bhagandalā, itthī. Bhagaṃ yoni, taṃ dārayatīti rūḷhīto apaccayanto nipātito. Dara
anya-e0810n0:916_2: vidāraṇe, bhūvādi, latte bhagandalā. Bhagandaropyatra. Meho muttameho, so ca bahumuttatāya
anya-e0810n0:916_3: madhumeho, rattameho, sukkamehotyanekavidho. Miha secane, bhūvādi, mihati muttanti
anya-e0810n0:916_4: meho, ṇo. Jara roge. Bhūvādi, jaratīti, a. Jaro pasiddho. Kāsa saddakucchāyaṃ, dittiyañca,
anya-e0810n0:916_5: bhūvādi, kāsatīti kāso, ṇo, kucchitaṃ asatīti vā kāso, kuāpubbo. Sasa pāṇane, sasanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:916_6: sāso, bhusaṃ sasanametassatthīti vā sāso, kuṭa chedane, ṭho, kuṭṭhaṃ. Sāmaññena tacovikāre.
anya-e0810n0:916_7: Sukke tu sittaṃ. Sūla rujāyaṃ, bhūvādi, sūlaṃ. Viddadhi, asmarī, muttakicchādayopyanekā rogabhedā.
anya-e0810n0:917_0: Pajjaddhaṃ vejje. Āyubbedasaṅkhātaṃ vijjaṃ jānātīti vejjo, “ṇa rāgā tassedamaññatthesu
anya-e0810n0:917_1: cā”ti ṇo, vida ñāṇe vā, vindatīti vejjo, ṇyo, dyassa jo. Bhisajjati cikicchatīti
anya-e0810n0:917_2: bhisakko, a, jassa ko. Rogaṃ harati sīlenāti rogahārī, ṇī. Harasaddoyaṃ kevalopi
anya-e0810n0:917_3: ānayanāpanayanesu vattati “manoharo, dukkhaharo”iccādīsu, idha apanayane. Kita rogāpanayane,
anya-e0810n0:917_4: bhūvādi. Tikicchatīti tikicchako, chapaccayo, ṇvu, dvittādi. Agadakaropyatra, agadaṃ
anya-e0810n0:917_5: arogaṃ pāṇīnaṃ karotīti agadakaro, kammādimhi ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:918_0: 330. Dvayaṃ sallanīharaṇe vejje. Kāye paviṭṭhasarādisallassa nīharaṇo vejjo sallavejjo.
anya-e0810n0:918_1: Yathāvuttaṃ sallaṃ nīharaṇavasena kantati chindatīti sallakatto, kati chedane, to.
anya-e0810n0:918_2: Dvayaṃ paṭikāre. Tikicchanaṃ tikicchā, bhāve a. Patipubbo karoti tikicchāyaṃ, karato ririyā.
anya-e0810n0:919_0: Catukkaṃ osadhe. Bhisajānamidaṃ bhesajjaṃ, ṇya. Na vijjate gado yasminti agado. Bhisajānamidaṃ
anya-e0810n0:919_1: bhesajaṃ, ṇo. Usa dāhe. Rogamosāpetīti osadhaṃ, dho, atha vā osadhī nāma asaṃyogadabbaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:919_2: tehi saṃyojitaṃ osadhaṃ. Jāyupyatra. Ji jaye, ṇu.
anya-e0810n0:920_0: 331. Tikaṃ ārogye. Anatthakārakattā kucchitākārena sarīre sentīti kusā, rogā, te
anya-e0810n0:920_1: lunāti chindatīti kusalaṃ. Āmayassābhāvo anāmayaṃ, abyayībhāvo. Arogassa bhāvo ārogyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:920_2: Kusalānāmayārogyanti samāhāradvando. Dvayaṃ anāmayajane. Kala gatisaṅkhyānesu. Kalati
anya-e0810n0:920_3: yathāsukhaṃ sabbiriyāpathesūti kallo, lo. “Kālaṃ khamatīti kalyaṃ, arogatā, tassaṃ
anya-e0810n0:920_4: niyutto kalyo”ti aṅguttaranikāyaṭīkāyaṃ. Natthi āmayo yasmiṃ nirāmayo. Vuttopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:920_5: Vutti jīvitavutti pasatthā assatthīti vutto. Rogato niggatajane pana ullāgho, lāgha
anya-e0810n0:920_6: sāmatthiye, usaddoyaṃ rogavimutyattho. Narādittā, narappadhānattā ca naravaggo.
anya-e0810n0:923_0: 332. Santatipariyantaṃ vaṃse. Kula santānabandhūsu, bhūvādi, ṇo, kulaṃ, vana sambhattiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:923_1: so. Saṃtanu vitthāre, ṇo. Abhimukhaṃ janetīti abhijano, ṇo. Go vuccati abhidhānaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:923_2: buddhi ca, te tāyatīti gottaṃ. Gotrampi. Gavaṃ saddaṃ tāyatīti vā gottaṃ, tā pālane.
anya-e0810n0:923_3: Anupubbo i gatiyaṃ, karaṇe a. Tanotismāti, santati, nalopo, itthiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:926: Khattiyādayo khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddā cattāro vaṇṇā kulāni bhavanti, ete hi aññamaññamasaṅkarato vaṇṇetabbato ṭhapetabbato vaṇṇāti vuccante. Vaṇṇa ṭhapane.
anya-e0810n0:927_0: 333-334. Chakkaṃ kulīne. Kulassāpaccaṃ kulino, ino apacce. Sobhano jano sajjano.
anya-e0810n0:927_1: Saparatthaṃ sādhetīti sādhu, sādha saṃsiddhimhi, u. Sabhāyaṃ sādhu sabhyo. Sādhvatthe
anya-e0810n0:927_2: yo. Aya gatiyaṃ. Ayitabbo upagantabboti ayyo, kammani yo. Mahākulassāpaccaṃ mahākulo, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:928_0: Bhūbhujantaṃ rājasāmaññe. Atitejavantatāya visesena rājate dibbateti rājā, rāja dittiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:928_1: Bhuyā bhūmiyā pati bhūpati, bhuṃ pāletīti vā bhūpati, pā rakkhaṇe,ti, rasso. Pathaviyā
anya-e0810n0:928_2: issaro patthivo, ṇo, dvittaṃ, ittañca. Jagatiṃ bhūmiṃ pāletīti jagatipālo, kammani
anya-e0810n0:928_3: ṇo. Disānaṃ pati disampati, disā, disaṭṭhe vā pāletīti disampati, rassattaṃ, niggahītāgamo
anya-e0810n0:928_4: ca. Bhuṃ bhūmiṃ bhuñjatīti bhūbhujo, bhuja pālanajjhoharaṇesu, idha pālane, rudhādi.
anya-e0810n0:928_5: Mahikhitopyatra. Khi nivāsagatīsu, mahiṃ akhi gatavā mahīkhito.
anya-e0810n0:929_0: 335. Pajjaddhaṃ muddhābhisitte jātikhattiye, “rājajacce ca khattiye”ti vacanato.
anya-e0810n0:929_1: Rañño khattiyassāpaccaṃ rājañño, ñño apacce. “Khattiyo tu virā khattaṃ, rājaññadvijaliṅgano”ti
anya-e0810n0:929_2: rabhasa, ratanakosesu pariyāyā. Khattassāpaccaṃ khattiyo, apacce iyapaccayo dissate,
anya-e0810n0:929_3: khettānaṃ adhipatibhūtattā vā khattiyotiādikappikarājā vuccati, tappabhavattā pana
anya-e0810n0:929_4: muddhābhisittesvapi taṃsamaññā, essattaṃ. Khattassāpaccaṃ khattaṃ, ṇo. Rajjāropanasamaye
anya-e0810n0:929_5: dakkhiṇāvaṭṭasaṅkhodakena gaṅgānītena muddhani khattiyakaññādīhi abhisittattā muddhābhisitto,
anya-e0810n0:929_6: paṭhamakhattiyo. Tappabhavatāya pana anabhisittā ca muddhābhisittākhyā, yathā – brahmabāhujassa
anya-e0810n0:929_7: vaṃse jātassāpi brahmabāhujo. Brahmabāhuto jātattā bāhujoti hi nikāyantarikānaṃ laddhi.
anya-e0810n0:929_8: Yasmiṃ pana rājini asesā sāmantā paṇamanti, so adhissarākhyo amara 18.2. Saṃ satto
anya-e0810n0:929_9: laggo anto yassā sā samantā, savisayānantarā bhūmi, samantāya ime sāmantā, anantararājāno.
anya-e0810n0:930_0: Dvayaṃ cakkavattini. Sabbabhūmiyā issaro sabbabhummo, ṇyo. Puññopanītena cakkaratanena
anya-e0810n0:930_1: vattate asādhudamanikādirājavattaṃ anutiṭṭhatīti cakkavattī, ṇī, cakkaratanaṃ vatteti
anya-e0810n0:930_2: ākāse attano purato gamayatīti vā cakkavattī, puññacakkaṃ, catucakkaṃ vā sattesu
anya-e0810n0:930_3: vatteti, te vā asmiṃ vattetīti cakkavattī, cakkaratanuppādanatthaṃ dvādasavassacaritaṃ
anya-e0810n0:930_4: dasarājadhammaṃ vattametassatthīti vā cakkavattī. Tattha antojanasmiṃ balakāye dhammikārakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā
anya-e0810n0:930_5: saṃvidhānaṃ, khattiyesu, anuyuttesu, brāhmaṇagahapatikesu, negamajānapadesu, samaṇabrāhmaṇesu,
anya-e0810n0:930_6: migapakkhīsu, adhammakārapaṭikkhepo, adhanānaṃ dhanuppādanaṃ, samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0810n0:930_7: pañhapucchananti idaṃ dasavidhaṃ cakkavattivattaṃ, idameva ca gahapatike, pakkhijāte
anya-e0810n0:930_8: ca visuṃ katvā gahaṇavasena dvādasavidhampi dīpesu. Catūsvapi dīpesu āṇādhammacakkāni
anya-e0810n0:930_9: sattesu pavattetīti vā cakkavattī. Añño asabbabhummo anavakāso sāmanto bhūpo maṇḍalissaro
anya-e0810n0:930_10: nāma. Sayamāṇāpavattiṭṭhānavasena paricchinnasseva maṇḍalassa issaro, na sabbamaṇḍalassāti
anya-e0810n0:930_11: maṇḍalissarotipi. Ettha ca “sabbabhummo, cakkavattī”ti dvīhi nāmehi catudīpissaro
anya-e0810n0:930_12: rājā dīpito, idhānāgatepi saṅgahetvā kathitena adhissarapadena ekadīpissaro rājā,
anya-e0810n0:930_13: maṇḍalissarapadena padesissaro rājā dīpito. Atha vā maṇḍalissarapadena ekadīpissaro
anya-e0810n0:930_14: rājā, sesehi rājarājaññādīhi bāhujapariyantehi padesissaro dīpito.
anya-e0810n0:931_0: 336. Dvayaṃ rājabhede. Sukhumatāya līnā apākaṭā chaviyo yesaṃ te licchavino. Licchavī
anya-e0810n0:931_1: ca vajjī cāti dvando. Dvayaṃ sammāsambuddhakule rājini. Purimatarasambhūte sakyakule
anya-e0810n0:931_2: sañjātattā sakyo, ṇo. Sakkopi. Sakye bhavo sākiyo, iyo, yalopo, dīgho ca.
anya-e0810n0:932_0: Pañcakaṃ buddhaputtassāyasmato rāhulassa mātari. Bhadda kalyāṇe, sokhye ca. Kulācārarūpādivasena
anya-e0810n0:932_1: kalyāṇattā bhaddā. Kaccassāpaccaṃ kaccānā, apaccasaddoyaṃ niccaṃ napuṃsake putte,
anya-e0810n0:932_2: puttiyañca bhavatīti. “Rāhu viya candaṃ mama nikkhamanaṃ lātukāmo cāyaṃ me puttoti
anya-e0810n0:932_3: rāhuloti nāmena bhavitabba”nti manasi katvā “rāhu jāto, bandhanaṃ jāta”nti pitarā
anya-e0810n0:932_4: vutto sikkhākāmo āyasmā rāhuloyevettha rāhulo, tassa mātā rāhulamātā, bimbaṃ vuccati
anya-e0810n0:932_5: sarīraṃ, atisayavaṇṇasarīrayuttatāya bimbā, vamidhātumhā vā bo, vassa battaṃ. Yaso
anya-e0810n0:932_6: vuccati parivāro, kitti ca, te dhāretīti yasodharā, manādittā asso.
anya-e0810n0:933_0: 337-339. Yesaṃ khattiyānaṃ dhanaṃ sataṃ hoti, kīdisaṃ taṃ dhanaṃ? Nidhānagaṃ pathavādīsu
anya-e0810n0:933_1: nidhānavasena gataṃ pavattaṃ, tesaṃ dhanānaṃ sataṃ kahāpaṇānaṃ, kittakappamāṇānaṃ?
anya-e0810n0:933_2: Koṭīnaṃ sataṃ. Kena paricchedena? Heṭṭhimantena heṭṭhimakoṭṭhāsena, heṭṭhimaparicchedena
anya-e0810n0:933_3: vā koṭīnaṃ sataṃ hoti. Divasavaḷañjo divase divase vaḷañjitabbo pana kahāpaṇo vīsatambaṇamattaṃ
anya-e0810n0:933_4: hoti, te khattiyā “khattiyamahāsālā”tyuccante. Mahanto dhanasāro yesante mahāsālā,
anya-e0810n0:934: Yesaṃ dvijānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ nidhānagāni nidhānavasena pavattāni asītikoṭidhanāni honti, divasavaḷañjo pana kahāpaṇo dasambaṇamattaṃ hoti, te dvijā “dvijamahāsālā”tyuccante.
anya-e0810n0:935: Nidhānage, vaḷañje ca dhane tadupaḍḍhe tesaṃ dvijamahāsālānaṃ dhanassa upaḍḍhabhāge sati gahapatimahāsālā nāma siyuṃ, ubhayatrāpi heṭṭhimanteneva dhanaparicchedo.
anya-e0810n0:936: 340. Yo na hīno, na cukkaṭṭho, majjhimādhikārabyavaṭṭhito rājaputtasenāpatimahākaṇittharādi, so mahāmatto. Mahatī mattā paricchedo yassa mahāmatto, rūpabhedena paṭṭhānaṃ klīvaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:938: Napuṃsakaṃ padhānaṃ taṃ, ekatte tu’ttame sadā”ti.
anya-e0810n0:939: Rabhaso ca. “Mahāmatto, paṭṭhāno cā”ti tu puṃsakaṇḍe vopālito. Pakaṭṭhe tiṭṭhatīti paṭṭhānaṃ, yu abhidhānappadīpikā ṭīkā 983, 1123 gāthāsupi passitabbaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:940_0: Pañcakaṃ mantinimhi. Matippadhāno sacivo sahāyo. Itikattabbatāvadhāraṇaṃ manto, taṃyogā
anya-e0810n0:940_1: mantinī. Assatthyatthe inī, atha vā mantena nayatīti mantinī, atha vā mantayogā manti,
anya-e0810n0:940_2: netīti nī, manti ca nī cāti mantinī. “Matisacivamantinī”tipi pāṭho, tadā dvinnaṃ
anya-e0810n0:940_3: tiṇṇaṃ vā dvando. Raññā saha jīvatīti sajīvo. Sacate samaveto bhavatīti sacivo. Saca
anya-e0810n0:940_4: samavāye, vo, ikārāgamo ca. Sabbakiccesu raññā mantena amā saha bhavatīti amacco,
anya-e0810n0:940_5: amāsaddoyaṃ nipāto sahatthe ccapaccayo. Sajīvamatte cāmaccasaddo vattati. Dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:940_6: senāpatimhi. Senaṃ nayatīti senānī. Camūnaṃ senānaṃ pati camūpati.
anya-e0810n0:941_0: 341. Nyāsādīnaṃ iṇādānadāyavibhāgādīnaṃ vivādānaṃ vohārānaṃ upadaṭṭhari upadassite
anya-e0810n0:941_1: akkhadasso, akkhe vohāre passatīti akkhadasso, ṇo, dhammādhikaraṇiyo. Pucchāvivāko, pañhavivākopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:942_0: Pajjaḍḍhaṃ paṭihāre. Dvāre niyutto dovāriko, ṇiko, okārāgamo. Paṭiharati viññāyati
anya-e0810n0:942_1: tenāti paṭihāro, ṇo. Dvāre tiṭṭhatīti dvāraṭṭho, sakatthe ko. Dvārapālako. Dvāraṭṭhito, dassakopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:943: 342. Rājūnaṃ aṅgarakkhagaṇo anīkaṭṭhoti mato. “Rakkhivaggo tu yo raññaṃ, so’nīkaṭṭho’bhidhīyate”ti amaramālāyañca, anīkena samūhena tiṭṭhatīti anīkaṭṭho, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:944_0: Dvayaṃ mahallake. Kañcukaṃ coḷaṃ, taṃyogā kañcukī. Sokaṃ vindatīti sovidallo. Vida
anya-e0810n0:944_1: lobhe, lo, kalopo. Thāpati, sovidopyatra. Dvayaṃ sevake. Pabhuno pacchā jīvatīti
anya-e0810n0:944_2: anujīvī, ṇī. Seva sevane, bhū, ṇvu. Atthīpyatra. Attha yācanāyaṃ. Atthanamattho,
anya-e0810n0:945_0: 343. Dvayaṃ adhikamatte. Gāmesu adhikattā adhikā ikkhā anubhavanametassa ajjhakkho,
anya-e0810n0:945_1: issattaṃ. Adhikaṃ karotīti adhikato. Idaṃ dvayaṃ thāyukagopānaṃ dvinnampi nāmaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:945_2: Tatra ekagāme adhikato thāyuko, bahūsu gāmesvadhikato gopo. Vuttañcāmarakose “thāyukodhikato
anya-e0810n0:945_3: gāme, gopo gāmesu bhūrisū”ti. amara 18.7 Ruddenāpi vuttaṃ “gāmesvadhikate gopo, goṭṭhajjhakkhepi
anya-e0810n0:946_0: Dvayaṃ suvaṇṇarajatajjhakkhānaṃ dvinnampi nāmaṃ. Hiraññaṃ vuccati akatasuvaṇṇādi,
anya-e0810n0:946_1: tatra niyutto heraññiko. Kana dittigatikantīsu, nipubbo, kho, nikkho, suvaṇṇādivikāro,
anya-e0810n0:946_2: tatra niyogo nikkhiko. Visesato pana suvaṇṇajjhakkhe bhoriko. Bhūrisaddo suvaṇṇe,
anya-e0810n0:946_3: taṃyogā bhoriko. Rūpyājjhakkhenikkhiko, tasmā’ya’mubhayatrāpi heraññikoti sāmaññasmiṃyeva. Vuttañca –
anya-e0810n0:949_0: Sassa attano vijigīsabhūtassa desānantaro samantato maṇḍalībhūto rājā satturuccate
anya-e0810n0:949_1: ekatthābhinivesitattā. Tato paraṃ vijigīsabhūmyekantariko mitto ekatthakārittanopakārattā.
anya-e0810n0:949_2: Arivijigīsamittānaṃ pana maṇḍalānaṃ bahibhūto dūramaṇḍalaṭṭho vijigīsabhūmiyā accantabyavahito
anya-e0810n0:949_3: balādhikopi yo nāpakarotyupakāroti vā, sa udāsīno dūramaṇḍalattenopakārattā. Dūramaṇḍale
anya-e0810n0:949_4: āsatīti udāsīno, upubbo āsa upasevane, yu, assi, dāgamo ca. Sattumabhiyuñjamānassa
anya-e0810n0:949_5: vijigīsassa sattuhitāya yo paṇhiṃ gaṇhati piṭṭhito vattati, so paṇhiggāho. “Paṇhi
anya-e0810n0:949_6: pacchā padaṃ vijigīsassā”ti ratanakose. “Paṇhipāde byūhapiṭṭhe”ti tikaṇḍasesa 3.3.134
anya-e0810n0:949_7: tikaṇḍaseso. “Paṇhi pacchimabhāge ca, pādamūlomadiṭṭhisu. Senāpiṭṭhe kumbhiyañce”ti tu nānatthasaṅgahe.
anya-e0810n0:950_0: 344-345. Diṭṭhantaṃ ripumhi. Mittapaṭipakkhattā amitto, rapatyavaṇṇaṃ rajateti ripu,
anya-e0810n0:950_1: u, ittaṃ, rapa, lapa, japa, jappa vacane vā. Veraṃ virodho yassatthīti verī, ī, dukkhahetuttā
anya-e0810n0:950_2: sapatti iva sapatto, ivatthe akārapaccayo. Ara gamane,ti, bhūvādittā āgamo. Sada
anya-e0810n0:950_3: sādane, tu, bhūvādi, sattu, yavādicuṇṇepi. Ara gamane, veramaratīti ari, rassanto
anya-e0810n0:950_4: i. Sapattādīnaṃ catunnaṃ dvando, “byañjano ca visaṃyogo”ti sutte caggahaṇena ekatakārassa
anya-e0810n0:950_5: lopo ca. Patiyamatthanaṃ paccattho, taṃyogā paccatthiko, patiyaṃ viparītagamanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:950_6: Pantha gatiyaṃ, curādi. Paripantho parissavaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃyogā paripanthī. Paṭiviruddho
anya-e0810n0:950_7: pakkho sahāyo paṭipakkho, tathā vipakkho. Na hito ahito. Hiṃsāyaṃ ramatīti paratīti
anya-e0810n0:950_8: (?) paro, kvi. Paṭipakkhabhāvena amati gacchatīti paccāmitto, ama gamane, to, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:950_9: Natthi etasmā īti upaddavoti anīto, mitto, tappaṭipakkho paccanīto, so eva paccanīko,
anya-e0810n0:950_10: tassa ko, yathā niyako. Virodhossatthīti virodhī, ī. Disa, dusa appītiyaṃ, divādi.
anya-e0810n0:950_11: Vidussanasīlatāya viddesī, dvittaṃ, issettaṃ. Dussatīti diso, a. Tapaccaye diṭṭho,
anya-e0810n0:950_12: dhātvantena saha ṭṭhādeso. Dvesaṇo, duhadayo, dassu, sāttavo, abhighātīpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:951: Dvayaṃ anukūlane. Anurodhanaṃ anurodho, ṇo. Rudha āvaraṇe. Anurūpaṃ pavattanaṃ anuvattanaṃ, vatu vattane, bhū, yu.
anya-e0810n0:952_0: 346. Pañcakaṃ mittasāmaññe. Mida snehe, bhūvādi, to, vayasā tulyo vayaso, mūlavayosaddehi
anya-e0810n0:952_1: saññāyaṃ sapaccayo yapaccayo (?) pāṇini 4.4.91 suttaṃ passitabbaṃ, sabbakāriyesu
anya-e0810n0:952_2: saha vayatīti vā vayaso, vaya gamane, sahassa so vaṇṇavipariyayo. Saha ayati kiccesūti
anya-e0810n0:952_3: sahāyo, aya gamane, sahassa sābhāvo, yathā sahadhammiko. Saha vā hāni, ayo vā vuḍḍhi
anya-e0810n0:952_4: yassa sahāyo, tipadabahubbīhi, yathā parakkamādhigatasampadā. Atha vā hāni ca āyo
anya-e0810n0:952_5: ca hāyā, nilopo, te yassa atthi, so sahāyo, “sapakkhako, salomako”tyādīsu viya sasaddassa
anya-e0810n0:952_6: vijjamānatthattā. Sundaraṃ hadayametassāti suhadayo, alopo, dyassa jo, sova suhajjo.
anya-e0810n0:952_7: Saha parisahane. Parisahanaṃ adussanaṃ, kho, halopo, sakhā, rājādi, samāno khyāto
anya-e0810n0:952_8: patīto vā sakhā, yalopo, samānassa ca sabhāvo. Siniddho, sniddho, savayopyatra. Sakhyasattapadinā
anya-e0810n0:952_9: pana mettiyaṃ vattanti. Sakhimhi bhavaṃ sakhyaṃ. Sattahi padehi avagamyateti sattapadinaṃ
anya-e0810n0:953_0: Dvayaṃ abhejjamitte. Sabbakālaṃ bhajatīti sambhatto, bhaja sevāyaṃ, bhūvādi. Daḷho
anya-e0810n0:953_1: thiro mitto daḷhamitto. Dvayaṃ diṭṭhamattamitte. Kiñci kālaṃ passitabboti sandiṭṭho.
anya-e0810n0:953_2: Saṃsaddoyamappattho. Disa pekkhane, dassanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ mattā pamāṇametassa diṭṭhamattako, sakatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:954_0: 347. Dvayaṃ carapurise tāpasādirūpena caramatte. Carati jānāti paracakkanti caro,
anya-e0810n0:954_1: a, cāropi, ṇo. Guḷhapuriso guttapuriso. Yathārahavaṇṇo, paṇidhi, appasapo, phassopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:954_3: Vaṇṇo pakāro, yathārahavaṇṇo yathārahappakāro. Yena paracakkaṃ sakkā ñātuṃ tappakāravā
anya-e0810n0:954_4: iccattho. Paṇidhiyyate ñeyyamasmiṃ paṇidhi, i. Apakaṭṭhaṃ sappati caratīti apasappo,
anya-e0810n0:955: Tikaṃ pathike. Pathe gacchatīti pathāvī, vī, dīgho. Iko, pathiko. Addhani magge gacchati sīlenāti addhagū. Addhagopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:956: Dvayaṃ dūte. Du paritāpe, to. Sandesaṃ vācikaṃ haratyaneneti haratīti (?).
anya-e0810n0:957_0: Dvayaṃ jotisike. Gaṇayatīti gaṇako, ṇvu. Muhuttaṃ kālavisesaṃ jānātīti muhuttiko,
anya-e0810n0:957_1: vāggahaṇena na vuddhi. Saṃvaccharo, jotisiko, devaññū, mohutto, ñāṇiko, kātantikopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:958_0: 348. Dvayaṃ lekhake. Likha lekhane, bhū, ṇvu. Lipena masyopadesena bhavatīti lipi,
anya-e0810n0:958_1: i, vaṇṇasaṇṭhāno, taṃ karotīti lipikāro. Akkharacaṇo, akkharacuñcupyatra. Cana dāne, bhū. Cañcu gatiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:960: Masijalantu melā ca, pattañjanaṃ masi dvisu.
anya-e0810n0:965_0: Dvayaṃ vaṇṇe. Vaṇṇīyati pakāsīyati attho yena, so vaṇṇo, vaṇṇa pakāsane. Na kharati
anya-e0810n0:965_1: na khīyatīti akkharo, khara vināse, khi khaye vā, tadā aro. Likhanaṃ, lipi, likhi
anya-e0810n0:966: Bhedādayo ime caturo upāyā sattuvijayakāraṇāni. Sattuvijayamupagacchanti etehīti upāyā. Parasmā visilesanaṃ bhedo.
anya-e0810n0:968: Santajjanañca bhedoyaṃ, viññūhi tividho mato kāmandakīyanītisāra 17.8.
anya-e0810n0:969_0: Tatrāyaṃ tavānuggatena pavuddho pāsādataravo viya attānañcocchindissatīti saṅkāyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:969_2: Aññassa ca pariyapaccāmittānuggahaṇassa maraṇamevanto bhavissatītyevaṃpakāramabhibhayanaṃ santajjanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:971: Iti daṇḍavidhaññūhi, daṇḍopi tividho mato kāmandakīyanītisāra 17.9.
anya-e0810n0:976: Iti sāmavidhaññūhi, sāmaṃ pañcavidhaṃ mataṃ kāmandakīyanītisāra 17.4-5.
anya-e0810n0:977: “Asmiṃ evaṃ kate idaṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatī”ti āsādassanaṃ āyatisampakāsanaṃ. Appaṇamityaṅgassa dānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:978_0: Dānañca pañcadhā sārassāsārassa ca dabbassa gahitassa samappaṇaṃ, tathāgahitassānumodanaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:978_1: tathā apubbadānaṃ, tathā “amussa dabbaṃ gaṇhāhi, tatheva bhavissatī”ti parasesu sayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:982: Deyyassa paṭimokkho ca, dānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ mata”nti kāmandakīyanītisāra 17.6-7.
anya-e0810n0:983: Ete cattāro upāyā māyādīsvevantogadhā, tathā hi māyopekkhā ca daṇḍantogadhā. Indajālañca bhede antogadhaṃ. Keci panāhu
anya-e0810n0:984: “Sāmaṃ dānañca bhedo ca, daṇḍo ceti catukkakaṃ;
anya-e0810n0:986: 349. Nāmamattena vuttānaṃ bhedādīnamidāni pariyāyānyāha. Tatra dvayaṃ bhede. Japa mānase ca japo cintanavācāsu (dhātvatthasaṅgaha, 135 gāthā), bhū, ṇo. Bhidi dvidhākaraṇe, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:987: Tikaṃ daṇḍe. Daṇḍa nipātane, curādi. Saho vuccati balaṃ, tabbhavaṃ sāhasaṃ. Damanaṃ damo, dīghapaṭisedho.
anya-e0810n0:988_0: 350. Sāmaṃ suddavagge, dānañca brāhmaṇavagge kathessati. Sāmyādayo sattarevācariyamate.
anya-e0810n0:988_1: Paramparopakārittā rajjassaṅgāni. Pakaṭṭhamupakubbanti rajjanti pakatiyoti coccante.
anya-e0810n0:993: Etā pañca tathā mittaṃ, sattamo pathavīpati;
anya-e0810n0:995_0: Tatra poraseṇīnaṃ padhānabhāvepi sati raṭṭhaggahaṇena, balaggahaṇena vā gahaṇasiddhanti
anya-e0810n0:995_1: neha visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, amarakose pana dvīhi gahaṇe siddhepi padhānattākhyāpanatthaṃ
anya-e0810n0:997: Rajjaṅgāni pakatayo, porānaṃ seṇiyopi ce”ti amara 18.17.
anya-e0810n0:998_0: Esañca sāmyamaccaraṭṭhaduggakosabalasakhīnaṃ pubbatarassa garuttaṃ viññeyyaṃ, iha
anya-e0810n0:998_1: tu nāmaliṅgānusāsane abhidhānasatthe anupayogato yathākkamaṃ garuttaṃ na vattumicchatīti
anya-e0810n0:999_0: Suvaṇṇādimayabhaṇḍāgāraṃ koso, pabbatodakarukkhādīhi duggamaṃ puraṃ duggaṃ, vijitaṃ
anya-e0810n0:999_1: janapadavatī bhūmi, balaṃ cakkaṃ, tañca molabhataseṇisahāyāmittāṭavikabhedena chabbidhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:999_2: Tatra kamāgataṃ molaṃ, vetanasambandhaṃ bhataṃ, poraṃ balaṃ seṇī, sahāyabhūtaṃ sahāyo,
anya-e0810n0:999_3: amittabhūtaṃ amittaṃ, aṭavikaṃ aṭavisahāyo mittaṃ. Tadapi sahajjaṃ, pākataṃ, kittimañceti
anya-e0810n0:999_4: tividhaṃ. “Liṅge sabhāve pakati, porāmaccādiyonisu. Tiliṅgaṃ guṇasāmyepī”ti byākhyāsudhā 1.4.29 ruddo.
anya-e0810n0:1000_0: 351. Pabhāvādīnaṃ vasā sattiyo nāma tisso bhavanti. Saka sattiyaṃ,ti. Tatra yaṃ sandhādīnaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1000_1: bhedādīnañca yāthāvato avaṭṭhāpanaṃ, taṃ ñāṇabalaṃ mantasatti, sakasampattuppattiyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1000_2: kosadaṇḍā pabhūsatti, tesaṃyeva pabhuttasampādane sāmatthiyato. Vuttañca “kosadaṇḍabalaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1000_3: pabhūsatti”riti cintāmaṇiṭīkāyampi. Balavatī ussāhaceṭṭhā ussāhasatti. Vuttañca “vikkamabalamussāhasatti”riti
anya-e0810n0:1001_0: Pabhāvādīnaṃ sakāraṇaṃ sarūpaṃ dassetumāha “pabhāvo”ccādi. Damanaṃ daṇḍo, tadatthiyā
anya-e0810n0:1001_1: balampi daṇḍo. Tato jātaṃ yaṃ tejo, taṃ pabhāvo. Tato jāto yo tejo, so “pabhāvo”tipi
anya-e0810n0:1001_2: pulliṅgena yojanīyaṃ. Pabhavanti tejassino aneneti pabhāvo, ṇo. Pakaṭṭho vā bhāvo
anya-e0810n0:1001_3: pabhāvo. Koso dhanaṃ, tato jāto yo tejo, so pabhāvo nāma. Tathā kosajo tejo dhanena
anya-e0810n0:1001_4: sattūnamupakaraṇaṃ. Patapanti tejassino bhavantyaneneti patāpo, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1002: 352. Dvayaṃ mante. Mantā vuccati paññā, sā etasmiṃ vijjati tāya nipphādetabbattāti manto, atha vā manta guttabhāsane, bhāve ṇo. Itaratra bhāve yu.
anya-e0810n0:1003_0: So manto dvigocaro dvinnaṃ janānaṃ visayabhūto catukkaṇṇo nāma. Cattāro kaṇṇā ettha
anya-e0810n0:1003_1: catukkaṇṇo. So manto tigocaro tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ visayabhūto chakkaṇṇo nāma. Manto nāma
anya-e0810n0:1003_2: catukkaṇṇo vā chakkaṇṇo vā kattabbo, na tato paranti dvinnamevettha gahaṇaṃ. Amarakose
anya-e0810n0:1003_3: pana chakkaṇṇopi paṭikkhitto. Vuttañhi tattha “achakkaṇṇo, yo tatiyādyagocaro”ti amara 18.22.
anya-e0810n0:1004: Sabbapārisadattā sabbapāṭhipadattā (ka.) byākaraṇassa sotūnaṃ samayantaresvapi paṭubhāvajananatthaṃ idhānāgatāpi chagguṇādayo ānetvā kathetabbā. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0810n0:1007_0: Yathā chagguṇā sandhi viggahayānāsanadvedhāsayā amara 18.18-9. Tatra sandhi upahāralakkhaṇo
anya-e0810n0:1007_1: tividho kosadaṇḍabhūmippadānahetuko. Apahāralakkhaṇo viggaho, sopi tividho pakāsayuddhaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1008_1: vijigīsassa yātrā yānaṃ kāmandakīyanītisāre 11 sagge passitabbaṃ, tañca viggayhayānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1008_2: sandhāyayānaṃ sambhūyayānaṃ pasaṅgayānaṃ upekkhiyayānamiti pañcavidhaṃ. Patiggāhīnaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1008_3: niggayha, sandhāya, upekkhiya vā yaṃ yānaṃ, taṃ viggayhayānādi. Yadā na sakkoti,
anya-e0810n0:1008_4: tadā sāmantehi sahekībhūya yānaṃ sambhūyayānaṃ. Aññatra gantabbe aññasmiṃ pasaṅgato
anya-e0810n0:1009_0: “Na maṃ paro hantuṃ samattho, nāhampi para”miti kālādike parikkhitvā vijigīsassa
anya-e0810n0:1009_1: duggādīni vaḍḍhayato ṭhiti āsanaṃ, tadapi viggayhāsanasandhāyāsanādibhedena pañcavidhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1009_2: Balīnaṃ sattūnaṃ majjhe kākakkhivā’lakkhitasso’bhayatra vacanenattano samappaṇaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1009_3: dvedhaṃ. Aññatarena vā balavatarena sandhi, aññatarena abalena viggaho dvedhaṃ. Sattuno
anya-e0810n0:1009_4: vā pakatīhi sandhāya yo tena viggaho, sattuneva vā yo sandhiviggahasamudāyahetuko
anya-e0810n0:1009_6: sopi dvedhaṃ. Parasantānamapyobhayavedanānaṃ ubhayato vutti dvedhamuccate.
anya-e0810n0:1010_0: “Ucchijjamāno ripunā nirupāya patikriyo. Sattihīno samāsiyate”ti byākhyāsudhā 1.8.18
anya-e0810n0:1010_1: hīnenāññassa balavatarassa dhammavijayino samāsayanaṃ balavatā arinā ucchijjamānassa
anya-e0810n0:1010_2: hīnasattino yaṃ balavadhammavijayisamāsayanaṃ (byākhyāsudhā 1.8.18), tasseva vā balino
anya-e0810n0:1010_3: sattuno kosādippadānena āsayanaṃ āsayo vuccate. Ete chagguṇā.
anya-e0810n0:1011: Yasmiñca guṇe ṭhito vijigīso sakkotyattano aṭṭhavaggiyakammāni pavattayituṃ, parassa cetānyupahantuṃ, guṇamādhiṭṭheyya, sā vuḍḍhi.
anya-e0810n0:1012: Kasi vaṇijjaṃ patho duggaṃ, setu kuñjarabandhanaṃ;
anya-e0810n0:1015_0: Yasmiṃ vā guṇe ṭhito sakammānaṃ vuḍḍhi, khayaṃ vā nābhipassati, taṃ ṭhānaṃ, yasmiṃ
anya-e0810n0:1015_1: vā guṇe ṭhito sakammānamupaghātaṃ passati, tasmiṃ na tiṭṭheyya, so khayo, ayaṃ nītivedīnaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1016: Dvayaṃ guyhe. Rahasi bhavaṃ rahassaṃ, so, rahe vā bhavaṃ rahassaṃ. Guha saṃvaraṇe, kammani yo. Idaṃ dvayaṃ tīsu. Rahasso manto, rahassā vācā, rahassaṃ mantanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1017_0: 353. Pañcakaṃ vijane. Viji puthabhāve, bhū, to ca. Vici vivecane, puthubhāve ca vā.
anya-e0810n0:1017_1: “Vivittaṃ tīsu vijane, asaṃpakkapavittesū”ti ruddo. Vigato jano asmāti vijano. Chādetīti
anya-e0810n0:1017_2: channo. Chada saṃvaraṇe. Vittamarahatīti raho, raha cāge, ramante asminti vā raho,
anya-e0810n0:1017_3: vaṇṇavikāro. “Raho nidhuvane cāpi, raho guyhe napuṃsaka”nti byākhyāsudhā 2.8.22 rabhaso.
anya-e0810n0:1017_4: Dutiyo rahosaddo abyayaṃ. Nissalākā, upāsupyatra. Nissalākā thī, upāsu abyayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1018: Dvayaṃ vissāse. Sasa pālane, ṇo. Sambha vissāse. “Vissambho kelikalahe, vissāse’paṇayepi ce”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkāyampi ruddo.
anya-e0810n0:1019_0: Dvayaṃ nyāye. Yuja samādhimhi, samādhi abhyupagamo, to. Upagantabbattā upāyikaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1019_1: Upāyā sakatthe iko, opāyikaṃ, opayikampi pāṇini 5.4.34 (gaṇa), labbhaṃ, bhajamānaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1020_0: 354. Silokaṃ ovāde. Avapubbo vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, bhāve ṇo. Sāsa anusiṭṭhimhi,ti,
anya-e0810n0:1020_1: āssi, anusiṭṭhi. Anusāsate anusāsanaṃ. Pumavajje itthiyaṃ, napuṃsake ca. Ettha ca
anya-e0810n0:1020_2: ekassevatthassa bhinnaliṅgehi tīhi nāmehi kathanaṃ na kevalaṃ vāccaliṅgoyeva saddo,
anya-e0810n0:1021: Dvayaṃ āṇāyaṃ. Āṇa pesane, bhāve a, āṇā, itthī. Avavādo, niddeso, siṭṭhipyatra. Dvayaṃ bandhane. Dā dāne, bhāve yu, dā avakhaṇḍane vā, viyogadānato uddānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1022_0: 355-356. Dvayaṃ aparādhe. Apagacchantyanenāti āgu, ṇu, palopo, rassassa dīghatā,
anya-e0810n0:1022_1: napuṃsake āgu. Apagato rādho yena aparādho, rādha saṃsiddhimhi. Dvayaṃ rājagayhe.
anya-e0810n0:1022_2: Kira vikiraṇe, kattari a, attaṃ. Bala pāṇane, i. Karasāhacariyato bali pulliṅge.
anya-e0810n0:1022_3: Bhāgadheyyopyatra. Bhāgāsakatthe dheyyo pāṇini 5.4.36 (vā.), bhāgattena tiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0810n0:1023: Dvayaṃ tuṭṭhidāye. Manorathapuṇṇattā pattabbo bhāgo puṇṇapatto. Tussanaṃ tuṭṭho, sossatthīti tuṭṭhī, tena dātabbo dāyo tuṭṭhidāyo, ākārantānamāyo.
anya-e0810n0:1028_0: Upagantvādātabbāti upadā, a, itthī, taṃ tamatthaṃ patthentehi ābharīyate ānīyateti
anya-e0810n0:1028_1: pābhataṃ, patthanatthajotakoyaṃ pasaddo. Upeyyateti upāyanaṃ, ito yu, upagacchati
anya-e0810n0:1028_2: yenāti vā upāyanaṃ. Kuca saṅkocane, ṇo, vigato koco yena ukkoco. Paṇṇena satthapaṇṇena
anya-e0810n0:1028_3: saddhiṃ ākarīyate ānīyateti paṇṇākāro, aññatra upacārā. Pahiṇantyaneneti paheṇakaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1028_4: hi gatiyaṃ, yu, sakatthe ko. Padesanaṃ, upaggayhaṃ, upahāropyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1029_0: Gumbādideyyo gumbaghaṭādiko gumbaghaṭādito (?) deyyosuṅkaṃ, anitthī, gumbo nāma jalathalamaggādīsu
anya-e0810n0:1029_1: laddhabbabhāgo, tathā ghaṭṭopi, samānatthā hete. Ādinā pābhatampi saṅgaṇhāti. Suṅka
anya-e0810n0:1029_2: gamane, suṅkati yena, taṃ suṅkaṃ. Gamu gamane, bo, assu, gumbo. Dvayaṃ gāmajanapadādito
anya-e0810n0:1029_3: laddhabbabhāge. Aya gamane, ṇo, āyo. Apaccaye ayo. Dhanānaṃ sampattakāle āgamo dhanāgamo.
anya-e0810n0:1030_0: 357. Dvayaṃ chattasāmaññe. Ātapato sūriyālokato tāyatīti ātapattaṃ, to. Chādayatīti
anya-e0810n0:1030_1: chattaṃ, chada apavāraṇe, to, traṇapaccaye chatraṃ, hemaṃ suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ raññaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1030_2: rājūnaṃ āsanaṃ sīhāsanākhyaṃ. Sīhākatippadhānattā sīhākatippadhānaṃ āsananti viggaho.
anya-e0810n0:1031_0: Dvayaṃ cāmare. Vālena katā bījanī vālabījanī. Camaro migo tassedaṃ cāmarī. “Cāmarā
anya-e0810n0:1031_1: cāmaraṃ romaṃ, gucchakañcāvacūlaka”nti tikaṇḍasesa 2.8.406 tikaṇḍaseso. Pakiṇṇakaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1032_0: 358. Khaggādayo ime pañca rājūnaṃ kakudhabhaṇḍāni bhavanti. Kuka ādāne, dho, vaṇṇavipariyayo.
anya-e0810n0:1032_1: Rañño gamanakāle sadā ādātabbato kakudhāni ca tāni rājadhanattā bhaṇḍāni ceti kakudhabhaṇḍāni.
anya-e0810n0:1033_0: 359. Dvayaṃ puṇṇaghaṭe. Jalapuṇṇattā bhaddo kalyāṇo kumbho bhaddakumbho. Dvayaṃ hemabhājane.
anya-e0810n0:1033_1: Bhara bharaṇe, bharaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ posanañca, dhāraṇatthassa bharatissa bhiṅgādeso,
anya-e0810n0:1033_2: bharati dadhāti udakanti bhiṅgāro, āro. Karako, kuṇḍikāpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1034_0: Hatthī ca asso ca ratho ca patti ca, tesaṃ samūho hatthissarathapatti caturaṅginī
anya-e0810n0:1034_1: senātyuccate, senaṅgattā samāhāradvandoyaṃ. Cattāri aṅgāni yassaṃ saṃvijjanti, sā
anya-e0810n0:1035_0: 360. Dantyantaṃ hatthini. Kuñjo hanu, danto ca, taṃyogā kuñjaro, atisaye ro, kuṃ
anya-e0810n0:1035_1: pathaviṃ jarāpetīti vā kuñjaro, aluttasamāso, kuñje vā girikūṭe ramati, koñcanādaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1035_2: nadanto vā carati, kuṃ vā pathaviṃ tadāghātena jarayatīti kuñjaro. Vārayati parabalaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1035_3: vāraṇo, nandādīhi yu. Hatthayogā hatthī. Mataṅgassa isino apaccaṃ mātaṅgo, mahantaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1035_4: aṅgaṃ sarīrametassāti vā mātaṅgo, ha nalopo, assākāro ca. Dve radā dantā yassa dvirado,
anya-e0810n0:1035_5: “rada vilekhane dante”ti hi nānatthasaṅgahe. Gaja sadde, gajatīti, a. Nago pabbato,
anya-e0810n0:1035_6: so viya dissatīti nāgo, ṇo. Karena, mukhena cāti dvīhi pivatīti dvipo. I gamane,
anya-e0810n0:1035_7: bho. Dantayogā dantī. Saṭṭhihāyano, dantāvalo, anekapo, mataṅgajo, karī, thambheramo,
anya-e0810n0:1035_8: padmī, mahāmigo, pīlu, sindhuro, dīghamāruto, rājīvo, jalakakkho, nilluro, karaṭī,
anya-e0810n0:1035_9: varaṅgo, suppakaṇṇo iccādīnipi hatthino nāmāni. Saṭṭhivassikattā, jātiyā saṭṭhivassakāle
anya-e0810n0:1036: Vanakarīnaṃ yo yūthajeṭṭho, so sayūthānaṃ jeṭṭhattā yūthajeṭṭho. Sayūthe pāti rakkhatīti yūthapoti coccate.
anya-e0810n0:1037_0: 361. Kāḷāvakādīni etāni hatthirājānaṃ kulāni. Kalambate saddāyateti kāḷāvako, ṇvu,
anya-e0810n0:1037_1: malopo. Gaṅgāyaṃ jāto gaṅgeyyo, ṭhānavasena sā saññā. Paṇḍaravaṇṇatāya paṇḍaro. Vaṇṇavasena
anya-e0810n0:1037_2: tambavaṇṇatāya tambo. Piṅgalavaṇṇatāya piṅgalo. Gandhayuttatāya gandho. Maṅga gamanattho,
anya-e0810n0:1037_3: sobhanagamanayuttatāya maṅgalo, atisāyane, pasaṃsāyaṃ vā lo. Hemavaṇṇatāya hemo.
anya-e0810n0:1037_4: Uposathakule jātattā uposatho, upagantvā arayo usatīti vā uposatho, tho, usa dāhe,
anya-e0810n0:1037_5: upapubbo vasa nivāse vā, vasso, uposatho, tithīviseso ca. Chabbaṇṇadantatāya chaddanto.
anya-e0810n0:1037_6: Etesañca kāḷāvako dasannaṃ purisānaṃ balaṃ dhāreti, gaṅgeyyo dasannaṃ kāḷāvakānaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1037_7: evaṃ yāvachaddantā netabbo, sammāsambuddho pana dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ balaṃ dhāreti,
anya-e0810n0:1037_8: teneva bhagavā kāḷāvakahatthigaṇanāya koṭisahassabalaṃ dhāreti, purisagaṇanāya dasannaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1038_0: 362. Pādo karipote. Pañcavassāni yāva kalabho, kala saṅkhyāne, abho, kalabho, ḷatte
anya-e0810n0:1038_1: kaḷabho, mātāpitūhi bharitabbattā bhiṅko, bharatissa bhiṅko. Karisāvakopyatra. Pādo
anya-e0810n0:1038_2: mattamātaṅge. Dānaṃ pabhinno yassa pabhinno. Majjatīti matto, mada ummāde. Gaje jāyatīti
anya-e0810n0:1038_3: gajjo, ṇyo, mado. So sañjāto yassa gajjito.
anya-e0810n0:1039_0: Dvayaṃ hatthisamūhe. Hatthīnaṃ samūho hatthighaṭā. Gajānaṃ samūho gajatā, gāmajanabandhusahāyādīhi
anya-e0810n0:1039_1: tā. Pādo hatthiniyaṃ. Hatthayogā hatthinī, ī, inī. Kaṇa sadde, iru, sakatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:1039_2: Kareṇukātipi, tadā karayogā kareṇukā, iṇu. Kariṇī, dhenukā, vasā, kareṇupyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1040_0: 363. Hatthisiropiṇḍā hatthino sirasi dve piṇḍā kumbhākhyā. Ke sirasi bhavatīti kumbho,
anya-e0810n0:1040_1: assu, niggahītāgamo ca. Dvinnaṃ pana kumbhānaṃ majjhimaṃ vidu nāma amara 18.37. Aṅkusasaṅghātaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1040_2: vindatyasminti vidu, pume, u. Dvayaṃ kaṇṇamūle. Cūḷa nimajjane, ṇvu, cūḷikā, cuda
anya-e0810n0:1040_3: sañcodane vā, codenti ettha aṅkusādīhi adantanti cūḷikā, dassa ḷo, ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:1041: Āsate asminti āsanaṃ, khandhadeso. Khandho eva deso khandhadeso, tasmiṃ. Dvayaṃ pucchamūle. Pucchassa mūlaṃ heṭṭhimabhāgo.
anya-e0810n0:1042_0: 364. Tikaṃ gajabandhanathambhe. Ālantyasmiṃ, anena vā bandhanti ālānaṃ, yu. Āpubbo
anya-e0810n0:1042_1: bandhanattho lādhātu. Āhananti bandhantyasmiṃ, anena vā āḷhako, hanadhātu, nassa
anya-e0810n0:1042_2: ḷo, vaṇṇavipariyayo ca, ṇvu. Thambha paṭibandhane. Bandhopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1043_0: Tikaṃ saṅkhale. Anitthī tūti tvantaṃ liṅgapadaṃ. Gala secane. Nigaḷati bandhati yenāti
anya-e0810n0:1043_1: nigaḷo, a, kattusādhanaṃ vā. Adi bandhane, andatīti anduko. Ṇvu, assu. Bhusaṃ khalatyanena
anya-e0810n0:1043_2: saṅkhalaṃ, kaṭi vatthabandhanepi, “thīkaṭīvatthabandhepi, nigaḷe saṅkhalaṃ tisū”ti
anya-e0810n0:1044_0: Dvayaṃ gajagaṇḍe. Gaṇḍa vadanekadese, adhātūnampi dhātūsu pāṭho, dhātu hi kriyattho.
anya-e0810n0:1044_1: Gaṇḍo kapolasāmaññepi. Kaṭa vassāvaraṇesu, a. Dvayaṃ karimadajale. Dīyateti dānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1045: 365. Dvayaṃ hatthikare. Soṇa vaṇṇagatīsu, ḍo, soḍa gabbe vā, niggahītāgamo, ṇo ca. Dvīsu dvepi.
anya-e0810n0:1046: Dvayaṃ soṇḍagge. Karassa soṇḍassa aggaṃ. Pusa posane. Kharo, sassa ko, ussottaṃ, pusa vuḍḍhimhi vā, bhū, pusa snehasecanapūraṇesu vā, kiyādi, pusa dhāraṇe vā, curādi.
anya-e0810n0:1047_0: Hatthissa kāyamajjhamhi bandhanarajju kacchā nāma. Kaca bandhane, cho. Dūsā, varatrāpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1047_1: Kutho nāma hatthipiṭṭhattharitacitrakambalaṃ, so ādi yesante kuthādayo. Kuthādayo
anya-e0810n0:1047_2: eva kappano nāma bhavanti. Kappa sāmatthiye, sajjanāyañca, karaṇe yu. Kappanāpi.
anya-e0810n0:1047_3: Kaca sajjanāyaṃ, tho, kutho, tīsu. “Napuṃsakamattharaṇaṃ, thī paveṇī kuthaṃ tisū”ti
anya-e0810n0:1047_4: cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.42 hi vopālito. Paveṇī, attharaṇaṃ, vaṇṇo, paritthomoti ete kuthapariyāyā.
anya-e0810n0:1048_0: 366. Dvayaṃ rājārahe hatthini. Rājānamupagantvā vahitumarahatīti opavayho, arahatthe
anya-e0810n0:1048_1: ṇyo. Rājānaṃ vahituṃ arahatīti rājavayho, ṇyo. Dvayaṃ kappitahatthini. Sajjā sajjanā
anya-e0810n0:1048_2: sañjātā yasmiṃ sajjito. Kappā kappanā sañjātā yasmiṃ kappito. Etasmāyeva pāṭhā sajjakappā
anya-e0810n0:1049_0: Hatthino pāde vijjhanakaṇṭako “tomaro”tyuccate. Tujjateneneti tomaro, tuda byathane,
anya-e0810n0:1049_1: aro, dassa mo, ottaṃ. Veṇukaṃpyatra kotraṃ veṇukamālānaṃ (amara 18.41), kvaci veḷukantipi pāṭho.
anya-e0810n0:1050_1: to. Hatthino matthakamhi vijjhanakaṇṭako “aṅkuso”tyuccate. Aṅkate aneneti aṅkuso,
anya-e0810n0:1051_0: Pajjaddhaṃ hatthārohe. Maḍi bhūsāyaṃ, hatthiṃ maṇḍayati rakkhatīti hatthimaṇḍo, sova
anya-e0810n0:1051_1: hatthimeṇḍo, mi hiṃsāyaṃ vā, ḍo, niggahītāgamo. Hatthiṃ pāti rakkhatīti hatthipo,
anya-e0810n0:1051_2: kammani ṇo. Hatthiṃ gopayati rakkhatīti hatthigopako. Gupa rakkhaṇe, sakatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:1052_1: gāmo, bhāve ṇo. Hatthādīnaṃ gamanakriyā gāmo, taṃ neti sikkhāpetīti gāmaṇīyo, aññakriyāsikkhāpanetūpacārā,
anya-e0810n0:1052_2: gāmaṃ vā hatthādisamūhaṃ netīti gāmaṇīyo, gamanaṃ vā sikkhāpetīti gāmaṇīyo, sabbatra nassa ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1053_0: Pādadvayaṃ asse. Haya gatiyaṃ, a. Turaṃ sīghaṃ gacchatīti turaṅgo, kvi, bindālopo,
anya-e0810n0:1053_1: lope sati turago. Vāha payatane, a. Asa bhakkhane, a. Sindhūnamadūrabhavo janapadopi
anya-e0810n0:1053_2: sindhavo, tatra bhavo sindhavo, saṃyogantattā na vuddhi. Ghoṭako, pīti, turaṅgamo,
anya-e0810n0:1053_3: vājī, gandhabbo, sattiriccādīnipi asse. Ghuṭa parivattane, ṇvu. Pā pāne,ti. “Pāne
anya-e0810n0:1053_4: thī pīti asse so”ti ruddo. Vājayogā vājī, ī. “Esañca pubbaṃ pakkho āsi, sa tu devetyatyatthitena
anya-e0810n0:1053_5: sālībhūtamuninā sakkaṃ payojetvā vajirachedito”ti nikāyantariyā. Sapa samavāye,ti,
anya-e0810n0:1054_0: 369. Tassa assassa bhedo viseso assataro, assaṃ taratīti assataro, tara atikkamane,
anya-e0810n0:1054_1: tarapaccayenāpi siddhaṃ. Padhānassabhūmibhavo sujātiko avikārī kulīnako asso ājānīyo
anya-e0810n0:1054_2: nāma, ā bhuso kāraṇākāraṇaṃ jānātīti ājānīyo, anīyo, ṇyapaccayena vā siddhaṃ, tadā
anya-e0810n0:1054_3: “kiyādito nā”ti nāgamo, īkārāgamo ca cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.44 gāthāyampi passitabbaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1054_4: Kule sambhūto kulīnako, īno, sakatthe ko. Saṅgāme garusatthappahārena nihato santo
anya-e0810n0:1054_5: piyo sāmikaṃ na jahati sukhaṃ vahanasīlo yo asso, so vinītasaddenoccate. Visesena
anya-e0810n0:1055: Dvayaṃ assapote. Kasa gamane, oro, assi, kiñci saratīti vā kisoro, bindulopo, asso ca, hayo eva bālattā hayapotako, appatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:1056_0: 370. Dvayaṃ athāmasse. Ghuṭa parivattane, ṇvu, ghoṭako, assasāmaññepyayaṃ, kharaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1056_1: gacchatīti khaluṅgo, so eva khaḷuṅko, gakārassa kakāraṃ katvā, rassa lo, ḷattamuttañca,
anya-e0810n0:1056_2: khaḷukotipi. Javena sabbesamadhiko asso javano, yu.
anya-e0810n0:1057_0: Dvayaṃ kavītikhyāte mukhabandhane. Mukhamātiṭṭhatīti mukhāṭhānaṃ. Khe mukhavivare
anya-e0810n0:1057_1: līno khalīno. “Kavikā tu khalīnoti khalīne thī (?), kaviyaṃ kathanaṃtyapī”ti rabhaso.
anya-e0810n0:1057_2: Kavi, kavikāpyatra. Ku sadde. I, ī ca, sakatthe ko. Vāsaddena napuṃsakattaṃ samuccinoti.
anya-e0810n0:1058: Assābhitāḷinī vettavikatādi kasā nāma. Kasa gamane, a, karaṇasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1059_0: 371. Assassa nāsāgatarajjumhi kusā, kusa silesane. Dvayaṃ assāyaṃ. Vala saṃvaraṇe,
anya-e0810n0:1059_1: vo, ḷattaṃ, ā, vaḷavā. Asatīti assā, “itthiyamatiyavo vā”ti a, ā ca, assā. Vāmīpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1059_2: Dvayaṃ khure. Khura chedane. Saṃ sukhaṃ pharatyanena saphaṃ, nerutto. “Saphaṃ klīve
anya-e0810n0:1060_0: Dvayaṃ pucchamatte. Puccha pamāde. Na gacchatīti naṅguṭṭho, aṅga gamane, ṭho, assu,
anya-e0810n0:1060_1: dvepi anitthiyaṃ. Lūmaṃpyatra. Dvayaṃ kesavati naṅguṭṭhamatte, na tu hatthino eva.
anya-e0810n0:1060_2: Vālasamūhayogā vālahattho, yathā kesahattho caye, tathātrāpi. Vālo dhiyyate asminti vāladhi, i.
anya-e0810n0:1061: Etthānāgatāpi assassa dhārākhyā dhāvākhyā (ka.) pañca gatiyo kathetabbā. Yathā –
anya-e0810n0:1063: Gatiyome pañca dhārā dhāvā (ka.), assānaṃ viññunā matā amara 18.48-9.
anya-e0810n0:1064_0: Tattha vitthambhā samāvagati akkanditaṃ, kandi gatisosanesu, to. Tato adhikā caturāgati
anya-e0810n0:1064_1: dhoritakaṃ, dhora gaticāturiye, to, sakatthe ko. Maṇḍalikāyānena gamanaṃ recitaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1064_2: rica viyojanasambajjhanesu, sambajjhanaṃ missanaṃ. Vegena parikkhitto paricaraṇaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1064_3: vaggitaṃ, vagga gamanattho. Turaṃ samena gamanaṃ plutaṃ, plu gatiyaṃ. Ta’dutta’massasatthe
anya-e0810n0:1065: 372. Dvayaṃ yuddhatthe cakkayuttayāne. Sanda gamane, sandate gamyateneneti sandano, yu. Ramateneneti ratho, tho, malopo. Sataṅgopyatra. Satamaṅgānyassa.
anya-e0810n0:1066_0: Yaṃ na raṇāya yuddhatthaṃ cakkayuttaṃ yānaṃ, api tu kīḷābhamanādyatthaṃ, so pussaratho.
anya-e0810n0:1066_1: Vuttañca amarakose “ayaṃ pussaratho cakka-yānaṃ na samarāya ya”nti amara 18.51. Pusa
anya-e0810n0:1066_2: pāsane, so, pusanāmakena phalavisesena yutto ratho pussaratho, pussanakkhattena kato,
anya-e0810n0:1067_0: Byagghassa cammāvuto parikkhitto ratho veyyaggho nāma, byagghassa vikāro cammaṃ veyyagghaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1067_1: ṇo, tena parivuto ratho veyyaggho, ṇo, ubhayatrāpi vuḍḍhāgamo. “Paccattaṃ paccatthaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1067_2: (ka.) ayanti gacchantīti paccayā”ti vacanatthato paccattameva paccatthameva (?) paccayā
anya-e0810n0:1067_3: bhavanti, yathā kāritantasmāpi payojakavasena anekakāritapaccayā. Dīpino cammāvuto
anya-e0810n0:1067_4: ratho dīpo nāma, dīpino vikāro cammaṃ dīpaṃ, ṇo, tena parivuto ratho dīpo, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1068_0: 373. Dvayaṃ purisayuttayāne. Si sevāyaṃ. Sukhatthikehi sevīyateti sivikā, ṇvu, vāgamo,
anya-e0810n0:1068_1: ittaṃ, kitapaccayā hi yebhuyyena kammādīsupi vattanti, kiccapaccayā ca kattaripi,
anya-e0810n0:1068_2: yathā “vinayo, nissayo, tapanīyā dhammā”tyādīsu, mahāpadesena vā kitakiccapaccayānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1068_3: kattukammādīsvapi pavatti veditabbā, sivaṃ karotīti vā sivikā, iko. Yāpyehi adhamehi
anya-e0810n0:1068_4: yāyate niyyateti yāpyayānaṃ. “Yāpya pānīyake nindye”ti hi nānatthasaṅgahe.
anya-e0810n0:1069_0: Dvayaṃ sakaṭe. Anitthī tūti tvantaṃ liṅgapadaṃ. Saka sattiyaṃ, aṭo. Ana pāṇane, karaṇasādhanaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1069_1: natthi nāsā yassāti vā anaṃ, sālopo, rasso ca. Klīve’naṃ, sakaṭo, nitthītyamarakoso amara 18.52.
anya-e0810n0:1070_0: Dvayaṃ cakke. Karoti gamanamaneneti cakkaṃ, dvittaṃ, cakkādi. Rathassa aṅgaṃ rathaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1070_1: Tassa cakkassa anto avasānaṃ nemi, sā nāriyaṃ itthiyaṃ. Nayati cakkaṃ nemi. Yā bhūmiṃ
anya-e0810n0:1070_2: phusati, nī naye, mi, īpaccaye nemī ca. Padhipyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1071_0: 374. Tammajjhe tassa rathassa, cakkassa vā majjhe cakkākāro piṇḍikā, yassaṃ sabbāni
anya-e0810n0:1071_1: kaṭṭhāni āsajjante. Piṇḍikāsāhacariyā nābhi itthī, īpaccaye nābhī ca. Sabbāni kaṭṭhāni
anya-e0810n0:1071_2: piṇḍetīti piṇḍikā, piṇḍa saṅghāte, a, sakatthe ko. Piṇḍīpi, nābhi viyāti nābhi.
anya-e0810n0:1072: Rathassa yugakaṭṭhaṃ yatra āsajjate, sa yugandharo. Kuṃ pathaviṃ vuṇoti acchādayatīti kubbaro, vu saṃvaraṇe, ro, ussattaṃ. Yugaṃ dhāretīti yugandharo, saññāyaṃ a, abhidhānā rasso.
anya-e0810n0:1073: Akkho sakaṭaṃ, tadavayavo vā, tathā cāhājayācariyo –
anya-e0810n0:1076_0: Tassaggagate kīle āṇī, itthī. Aṇipi, “sīmāssikkhaggakīlesu, aṇī āṇī ime dvisū”ti
anya-e0810n0:1076_1: cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.56 hi ruddo dvidhā paṭhati. “Aṇī āṇī ca akkhaggakīle sīmāssisu matā”ti
anya-e0810n0:1076_2: ca nānatthasaṅgahopi. Assi koṇo. Aṇa sadde, ṇi. Pubbapakkhe na vuḍḍhi, ana pāṇane
anya-e0810n0:1076_3: vā, ṇattaṃ. Kaṇḍakādisatthehi parirakkhaṇatthaṃ kato rathāvaraṇo varutho, yo “rathaguttī”ti
anya-e0810n0:1076_4: khyāto. Vara varaṇe, varaṇametthāvaraṇaṃ, yathā rathaṃ thiratthaṃ taṭṭhañca gopatīti
anya-e0810n0:1076_5: rathagutti, itthī, “gutti kārāgāre vuttā, bhūgate rakkhaṇe yame”ti nānatthasaṅgahe.
anya-e0810n0:1077_0: 375. Rathādīnaṃ purobhāgasaṅkhāte mukhe dhuro. Dhara dhāraṇe, assu, yānamukhaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1077_1: Akkhopakkharādayo rathassa aṅgā nāma. Aka gamane, kho, akkho, dvinnaṃ rathacakkānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1077_2: antaragato kaṭṭhaviseso. Upari karīyateti upakkharo, akkhassopari kaṭṭhaviseso. Amarakose
anya-e0810n0:1078_0: Sabbasmiṃ hatthādike vāhane yānādittayaṃ, sabbatra karaṇasādhanaṃ. Yojanīyaṃ yujjatenenāti
anya-e0810n0:1078_1: yoggaṃ, ṇyo. Pattaṃ dhoraṇañcātra. Pata gatiyaṃ. Dhora gaticāturiye, etthāpi karaṇasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1079_0: 376. Catukkaṃ sārathimhi. Rathena carati sīlenāti rathacārī. Savati perayatīti sūto,
anya-e0810n0:1079_1: sū peraṇe, to. Aja gamane. Pājetīti pājitā, ritu, dīghādi. Sara gatiyaṃ, thi, rathena
anya-e0810n0:1079_2: saha gacchatīti vā sārathi, iṇa, aññatropacārā. Niyantā, yantā, khattā, sabyaṭṭho,
anya-e0810n0:1080: “Niyantā pājitā yantā, sūto khattā ca sārathi;
anya-e0810n0:1081: Sabyaṭṭho dakkhiṇattho ca, saññā rathakuṭumbino”ti amara 18.56-60. –
anya-e0810n0:1082: Vuttaṃ. Atthato sārathino rathakuṭumbī ca nāmaṃ. Rathanāyake tu “rathāroho ca rathiko rathī”ti pacchā vakkhati. Khudi saṃpesane, tu, dassa to, ussattañca, khattā.
anya-e0810n0:1083_0: Tikaṃ rathe pājitatarā aññe yodhā, atra ye “rathanāyakā”tipyuccante. Rathamārohatīti
anya-e0810n0:1083_1: rathiko, rathī ca. Rathena yujjatīti vā rathiko, rathī ca. Rathino, sandanārohopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1083_2: Dvayaṃ yodhe. Yudha sampahāre, ṇo. Bhaṭati yujjatīti bhaṭo, a. Kvaci yoddhopi.
anya-e0810n0:1084_0: 377-379. Catukkaṃ padātike. Padehi atati ajatīti padāti, ata sātaccagamane, i. Pada
anya-e0810n0:1084_1: gamane. Padatīti patti, i, dvittaṃ. Padena adatīti vā patti, alopo, dassa to, ime
anya-e0810n0:1084_2: dve, vakkhamānā dve ca pume. Padehi gacchatīti padago, padiko. Pādātiko, padājayopyatra
anya-e0810n0:1084_3: pādehi ajati ī, rasso ca padājiṃ (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.66).
anya-e0810n0:1085_0: Chakkaṃ kavace. Naha bandhane, karaṇe ṇo. Kaṅka gatyattho, aṭo. Varīyate tanti vammaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1085_1: vara varaṇe, vara icchāyaṃ vā, mo, rassa mo. Kaca bandhane, a, vakāravaṇṇāgamo. Uro
anya-e0810n0:1085_2: chādayantyanenāti uracchado. Vāsaddo dvinnaṃ punnapuṃsakattaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Jala dittiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1085_3: ṇvu. Tanuttaṃ, daṃsanaṃ, jagaropyatra. “Jagaro kaṅkaṭo yogo, sannāho ca uracchado”ti
anya-e0810n0:1086: Tikaṃ katasannāhe. Cammena sammā naddhavāti sannaddho, dho. Sajju gatiyaṃ, a. Vammena naddhavā vammiko. Daṃsito, uracchadiko, byūḷhakaṅkaṭo, jagarikopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1087_0: Dvayaṃ paridahite vatthādo. Āpatipubbo mucadhātu paridahane, ubhayattha to, bhūjādi.
anya-e0810n0:1087_1: Pakkhe “susapacasakato kkhakkā ce”ti sutte cakārena tapaccayassa kko, dhātvantalopo
anya-e0810n0:1088_0: Catukkaṃ abhicārapadātimhi. Pure caraṇasīlo, sattamiyā alopo ubhayatrāpi. Pubbe ṇī.
anya-e0810n0:1088_1: Parapakkhe a, pubbaṃ, pubbe vā gacchatīti pubbaṅgamo, dutiyāyālopo. Purogo, aggesaro,
anya-e0810n0:1089: Dvayaṃ asīghagāmini. Mandaṃ gacchati sīlenāti mandagāmī, ṇī. Mantha viloḷane, anekatthattā saṃkilese ca. Saṃkilissateti mantharo, aro.
anya-e0810n0:1090: Tikaṃ vegini. Turameti gacchatīti turito, i gatiyaṃ, to. Turassi, pajavī, javopyatra. Dvayaṃ jetuyoggatāmatte. Ji jaye, tabbo, jetabbaṃ, ṇyapaccaye jeyyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1091_0: 380. Tikaṃ sūre. Sura vīra vikkanteti curādidhātu. Surayati, vīrayatīti sūro, vīro
anya-e0810n0:1091_1: ca, a, dīghādi, kanta chedane. Vikkanto. Dvayaṃ sahāyamatte. Saha eti gacchatīti
anya-e0810n0:1091_2: sahāyo, sabbatra kattari ca a. Anusaddo pacchāttho. Samāti ete dve tulyatthā. Anuplapo,
anya-e0810n0:1092_0: Pātheyyaṃ nāma rājādīnaṃ yātrāsveva bahulaṃ pavattatīti idha taṃ vuttaṃ, pathe hitaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1092_1: pātheyyaṃ, eyyo. Samba maṇḍale, alo, sameti addhānaparissamametenāti vā sambalaṃ, alo, bāgamo ca.
anya-e0810n0:1093_0: 381. Catukkaṃ senāyaṃ. Vāhayogā vāhinī. Dhajayogā dhajinī. Si bandhane, no, senā.
anya-e0810n0:1093_1: Camu adane, ū. Camati bhīrunti camū. Putanā, anīkinī, varūthinīpyatra. Ettha ca putanā
anya-e0810n0:1093_2: anīkinī vāhinī camū senābhedepi. “Putanā’nīkinī camū, senā senāntarepi ce”ti ruddo,
anya-e0810n0:1093_3: “senāpabhede senāyaṃ, savantyamapi vāhinī”ti rabhaso ca. Cakkāditikaṃ sāmaññena senāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1093_4: senaṅge ca. Cāṇakye tu senāvisese anīko vutto “tīṇi tikānyanīka”nti.
anya-e0810n0:1096: Iti kappā tu pañcassā, vidheyyā kuñjarassa tu;
anya-e0810n0:1097: Pādaṅgo pājitāvanto, purisā dasa pañca ca;
anya-e0810n0:1100: Karīyate viggaho yeneti cakkaṃ. Bala saṃvaraṇe, a. Aṇa sadde, iko. Vākāro napuṃsakattaṃ samuccinoti.
anya-e0810n0:1101_0: Caturaṅgabalāya susannaddhāya senāya yuddhatthaṃ desavidese vinyāso vibhajitvā nyasanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1101_1: ṭhapanaṃ byūho kathyate. Vibhajitvā ūhanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ byūho. Tabbhedā daṇḍabhogamaṇḍalāsaṃhatā
anya-e0810n0:1101_2: cattāro pakatibyūhā. Tatra anīkānaṃ tiriyato vutti daṇḍo. Samatthānamanīkānamanvāvutti
anya-e0810n0:1101_3: aññoññato vutti bhogo. Maṇḍalaracanāya sarantānamanīkānaṃ sabbato vutti sappasarīramiva
anya-e0810n0:1101_4: maṇḍalo. Ṭhitānamitaretarāsaṃ hatānaṃ visiliṭṭhatarānaṃ anīkānaṃ puthuvutti asaṃhato.
anya-e0810n0:1104_0: Byūhasamaveto eva byūhassekadeso pacchābhāgo byūhapaṇhi, byūhassa pacchā, byūhantarameva
anya-e0810n0:1104_1: vā. Yatra ṭhito rājā sasenaṃ paṭiggaṇhati, taṃ senāya pacchā dhanusatadvayantarena
anya-e0810n0:1105_0: 382-383. Eko hatthī dvādasapurisasahito “eko hatthī”tyuccate, etena lakkhaṇena adhamantato
anya-e0810n0:1105_1: heṭṭhimaparicchedena tayo hatthino hatthānīkaṃ nāma, tathā eko turaṅgo tipurisasahito,
anya-e0810n0:1105_2: eko ca ratho catupurisasahito eko hayo, eko rathoti etena lakkhaṇena adhamantato
