anya-e0810n0:1105_3: tayo hayā ca tayo rathā ca hayānīkaṃ, rathānīkaṃ nāma, tenāha “tayo tayo gajādayo”ti.
anya-e0810n0:1105_4: Sasatthā khaggādisatthahatthā catujjanā cattāro purisā pattānīkaṃ nāma vuttā. Heṭṭhimantatoyevetthāpi
anya-e0810n0:1109: Anīkinī ca tāsantu, dasa akkhobhinī mata”nti amara 18.80-1.
anya-e0810n0:1110_0: Tassattho – tīhi assehi gajenekena rathena ca padātībhi ca pañcahi patti nāma senantaraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1110_1: Patyaṅgehi sabbehi gajādīhi yathāpubbaṃ guṇehi yathottaraṃ kamena senāmukhādikā saññā
anya-e0810n0:1110_2: bhavati. Yathottaranti vacanena yathāpubbamityatthamāha, tenedaṃ vuttaṃ “bhavati
anya-e0810n0:1110_3: tayo pattino senāmukhaṃ. Tīhi senāmukhehi gumbo. Gumbattayena gaṇo. Gaṇattayaṃ vāhinī.
anya-e0810n0:1110_4: Vāhinittayaṃ putanā. Putanattayaṃ camū. Camuttayaṃ anīkinī. Tāsaṃ anīkinīnaṃ dasa akkhobhinī”ti.
anya-e0810n0:1111: Tatra rathānaṃ saṅkhyā sattatisahitehi aṭṭhasatehādhikānyekavīsatisahassāni, evameva gajānampi saṅkhyā, tathā ca –
anya-e0810n0:1113: Saṅkhyā tā turaṅgānañhi, vinā rathe turaṅgame.
anya-e0810n0:1115: Satāni tīṇi ca’ññāni, paññāsañca padātayoti byākhyāsudhā 2.8.80.
anya-e0810n0:1116_1: yanti”ccādi. Yantiyā yānaṃ kubbantiyā senāya kattubhūtāya dhūlīkatesu santesu. Kesu?
anya-e0810n0:1116_2: Saṭṭhivaṃsakalāpesu. Kittakappamāṇesu? Paccekaṃ saṭṭhidaṇḍavantesu, esā akkhobhinī
anya-e0810n0:1116_3: nāma senā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena. Kenaci khobhetumasakkuṇeyyatāya akkhobhinī, yu, nadādi. Khubha calane.
anya-e0810n0:1117_0: 385. Catukkaṃ sampattiyaṃ. Dhanukkaṃso sampatti. Pada gamane, bhāveti. Yupakkhe “itthiyamatiyavo
anya-e0810n0:1117_1: vā”ti a. Lakkha dassanaṅkesu, ī, lakkhī, sirī ca pubbe devatāvasena vuttā, idha dhanukkaṃsavasena.
anya-e0810n0:1118: Dvayaṃ sampattiviparītāyaṃ. Virūpaṃ pajjatīti vipatti, padimhā kattariti. Virūpaṃ pajjanaṃ vā vipatti, bhāveti. Āpadāsahacaraṇato vipatti thiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1119_0: Catukkaṃ satthamatte. Ādāya yujjhante yanti āvudhaṃ, yassa vo. Āyudhaṃ vā. Hara haraṇe.
anya-e0810n0:1119_1: Harati jīvitanti heti,ti, asse, ralopo, hanativasena vā siddhaṃ. Sasa hiṃsāyaṃ, tho.
anya-e0810n0:1120: 386-387. Saṅkhepenāyudhaṃ dassetumāha. Muttāmuttañca amuttañca pāṇito muttañca yantamuttañceti sakalaṃ taṃ āyudhaṃ catubbidhaṃ bahūnampi tabbhedānativattanato.
anya-e0810n0:1121: Catunnaṃ sarūpamāha “muttāmuttañcā”di. Yaṭṭhi nāma satthaviseso, na kattaradaṇḍo.
anya-e0810n0:1123: Tadādi āyudhaṃ muttañca taṃ amuttañceti muttāmuttaṃ, kammadhārayo, yathā katākataṃ. Churikā asiputti, tadādikaṃ amuttaṃ. Yanta saṅkocane, yantaṃ, dhanvādi.
anya-e0810n0:1124_0: 388-389. Pañcakaṃ dhanumhi. Usuṃ asati khipatīti, kammani ṇo, ussi. Dhana dhaññe,
anya-e0810n0:1124_1: u, hana hiṃsāyaṃ vā, u, hassa dho, dhanu. “Dhanu vaṃsavisuddhopi, nigguṇo kiṃ karissatī”ti
anya-e0810n0:1124_2: hitopadesa kathāmukha 23 pume payogo. “Sarā vāpo dhanu itthī, tuṇatā tiṇatāpice”ti
anya-e0810n0:1124_3: tikaṇḍasesa 2.8.51 tikaṇḍaseso. Kiṃ nāmena daṇḍayatīti kodaṇḍaṃ, daṇḍa nipātane,
anya-e0810n0:1124_4: kiṃ nāmena damyatīti vā kodaṇḍaṃ, damudhātumhā ḍo, kiṃ nāmena dunotīti vā kodaṇḍaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1124_5: du paritāpe, ḍo nipātito, kuṭilattā vā kucchito daṇḍo yassatthīti kodaṇḍaṃ. Capa
anya-e0810n0:1124_6: santāpe, a, capo, vaṃsabhedo, tabbikāro cāpo, ṇo. Saramasati khipatīti sarāsanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1125_0: Tikaṃ guṇe. Gacchati saro yenāti guṇo, massa ṇo, assu, gu sadde vā, gavati etenāti
anya-e0810n0:1125_1: guṇo, yu, ṇattaṃ. Jara vayohānimhi, a, jiyādeso. Pakkhe ikāralopo, jayā. “Jiyā cāthā”tipi
anya-e0810n0:1125_2: pāṭho, tadā dvayaṃ guṇe. Mubbī, siñjinīpyatra. Mubbavikāro mubbī. Siñja abyattasadde, inī.
anya-e0810n0:1126_0: Tipādo kaṇḍe. Sara hiṃsāyaṃ. Sarantyanenāti, pume, saññāyaṃ ṇo. Pattaṃ vājo, taṃyogā
anya-e0810n0:1126_1: pattī, ī. Sā tanukaraṇāvasānesu, divādi, ṇvu, yassālopo. Vaṇyate saddāyateneneti
anya-e0810n0:1126_2: vāṇo, ṇo, vaṇa sadde. Kaṇyateneneti kaṇḍaṃ, kaṇa sadde, ḍo, kaṇḍa bhede vā. Isa gamane,
anya-e0810n0:1126_3: u, issu, usa dāhe vā. Khura chedane, apo, atha vā khe arati gacchatīti khuro, assu,
anya-e0810n0:1126_4: taṃ pātīti khurappo. Tija nisāne, yu. Asa khipane, kamme yu. Visikho, ajimhago, khago,
anya-e0810n0:1126_5: āsugo, kalambo, maggaṇo, ropopyatra. Visanto khaṇatīti visikho. Kala made, ambo.
anya-e0810n0:1126_6: Magga anvesane, yu. Rupa vimohane, divādi, a, ropo. “Thūlakheḍo vipāṭo ca, citrapuṅkho
anya-e0810n0:1127_0: Pañcakaṃ kalāpe. Tūṇa pūraṇe, curādi, nadādi. “Tūṇo nisaṅgo tūṇiro, upāsaṅgo ca vāṇadhi”riti
anya-e0810n0:1127_2: idha pana “tuṇī, tūṇo”ti dvīsu, sarasamūhānaṃ ṭhānattā kalāpo. Irapaccaye tūṇiro.
anya-e0810n0:1127_3: Vāṇā sarā dhiyantetreti vāṇadhi. “Tūṇo pasaṅga tūṇira-nisaṅgā vāṇadhi dvisū”tyamarasīhe.
anya-e0810n0:1128_0: 390. Dvayaṃ vāje, yaṃ “kaṇḍapatta”mityuccate. Pata gamane, karaṇe kho, tassa ko,
anya-e0810n0:1128_1: pakkhena katattā vā pakkho. Vajatyanenāti vājo, ṇo. Visamapivitthāti visappīto saro
anya-e0810n0:1128_2: diddho nāma. Disa appītiyaṃ, to. Littopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1129_0: Tikaṃ vijjhitabbe. Vijjhanatthaṃ lakkhyateti lakkhaṃ. Vijjhitabbanti vejjhaṃ, ṇyo,
anya-e0810n0:1129_1: jhassa jjho, isse. Saro vayati gacchati yasmiṃ sarabyaṃ, vassākāralopo. Niccaṃ sarānamabhyāsanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1130_0: 391. Pañcakaṃ khagge. Maṇḍalaṃ aggaṃ yassa. Niggato tiṃsato’ṅgulito nettiṃso. Asa
anya-e0810n0:1130_1: khepane, asate khippateti asi, i. Khagga khaṇḍabhede. Sāyako sarepi. Candahāso, riṭṭhi,
anya-e0810n0:1130_2: kakkhalako, karavālopyatra. Tassa khaggassa pidhāne kosi, itthī. Kusa silesane, i,
anya-e0810n0:1130_3: kosi, rassanto. Khaggachurikādīnaṃ muṭṭhiyaṃ tharusaddo. Thara satthagatiyaṃ, u.
anya-e0810n0:1131: 392. Tikaṃ khaggādīnaṃ satthānaṃ vāraṇaphalake. Kheṭa bhakkhane, ṇvu. Phala visāraṇe, ṇvu. Phalatīti phalakaṃ, anitthī. Cara gatibhakkhanesu, mo, camu adane vā, a. Phalampi.
anya-e0810n0:1132: Vaṇṭānihārassākhaggākati hatthakuṇḍādi illī, ilīpi, ila gatiyaṃ, nadādi. Karaṃ pālayatīti karapālikā, ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:1133: Dvayaṃ asiputtiyaṃ. Chura chedane, ṇvu. Sasu hiṃsāyaṃ,ti, nadādi. Asino puttī, asidhenukāpi.
anya-e0810n0:1134: Dvayaṃ vaḍḍhakīnaṃ muggarehi samānākārāyudhabhede. Laga saṅge, alo, assu, ḷattañca. Muraṃ giratīti muggaro, rassa go, gira niggiraṇe, muccatīti vā muggaro, aro. Dughaṇo, ghanopi.
anya-e0810n0:1135: 393. Dvayaṃ salle. Sala āsugatiyaṃ, a, sara hiṃsāyaṃ vā, lo, rassa lo. Saṅka saṅkāyaṃ, u. Sūlampi. Sūla rujāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1136: Dvayaṃ vāsiyaṃ. Vasa chedanasnehāvahāraṇesu, ṇī. Taccha tanukaraṇe, yu, nadādi.
anya-e0810n0:1137_0: Dvayaṃ pharasumhi. Chedakattā kucchitā dhārā yassāti kudhārī. Kudhāropi. Paraṃ sasati
anya-e0810n0:1137_1: hiṃsatīti pharasu. U, passa pho, salopo ca. Parasupi, so parasusaddo napuṃsako. Parasudhopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1138: Dvayaṃ pāsāṇavidāraṇe. Ṭaṅka bandhane. Dara vidāraṇe. Pāsāṇaṃ dārayatīti pāsāṇadāraṇo, yu. Pāsāṇadārakopi.
anya-e0810n0:1139_0: 394. Dvayaṃ hatthappamāṇe kaṇaye kaṇḍe (cintāmaṇiṭīkā). Cakkapūraṇādivāyuvasena khippate.
anya-e0810n0:1139_1: Kaṇa sadde, ayo. Bhindanasīlatāya bhindī, vāti gacchati tenāti vālo, alo, bhindī
anya-e0810n0:1139_2: ca so vālo cāti bhindivālo, ḷatte bhindivāḷo, rasso.
anya-e0810n0:1140: Cakkādayo satthabhedā. Tatra cakkākāro āyudhaviseso cakkaṃ. Kanta chedane, assu, kunto dīghadaṇḍo. Gadā, satti ca pasiddhā.
anya-e0810n0:1141: Tikaṃ koṇabhāge. Kuṇa saddopakaraṇesu, kuṇa saṅkocane vā, ṇo. Si sevāyaṃ, a, rasso, asso. Kuṭa koṭille, iṇa.
anya-e0810n0:1142_0: 395. Dvipādaṃ vijigīsassa yātrāyaṃ, sabbatra bhāvasādhanaṃ. Yā pāpuṇe, nikkhamitvā
anya-e0810n0:1142_1: yāyate niyyānaṃ, yu. “Chadādīhi tatraṇa”ti traṇa. Yātrā, ā. Nadādino ākatigaṇattā
anya-e0810n0:1142_2: īpaccayābhāvo. Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ, papubbo yāne, yu, patiṭṭhīyate paṭṭhānaṃ, purecārimhi paṭṭho.
anya-e0810n0:1143_0: Pañcakaṃ dhūlīmatte. Tathā ca “paṃsu khodo mato reṇu, cuṇṇo dhūli’tthiyaṃ bhave”tyamaramālā.
anya-e0810n0:1143_1: Cuṇṇa pisane, cuṇṇa sañcuṇṇane vā. Paṃsa nāsane, u. Ranja rāge, rajo, manogaṇopi
anya-e0810n0:1143_2: napuṃsake, taṃsahacaraṇato paṃsupi. “Klivaṃ’parādhe reṇumhī”ti rabhaso. Atha vā cuṇṇarajosahacaraṇato
anya-e0810n0:1143_3: paṃsu napuṃsake. Dhū vidhunane, dhū kampane vā, li, nadādi. Ri gatiyaṃ, ṇu, isse.
anya-e0810n0:1144_0: 396. Vaṃsakkamavedīvaṃsathutiṃ yo kubbati, so māgadho. Tasmiṃ madhuko vutto. So ca
anya-e0810n0:1144_1: khattiyāvessasambhavo bhavati, vaṃsamaggaṃ thavatīti māgadho, thassa dho. Maggaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1145: Vīriyādithutiṃ sīlena yo paṭhati, so vandī, tassīlādīsu ṇī.
anya-e0810n0:1146: Yo nisāvasānaṃ vibhāvento bodhayati, so vetāḷiko, vibhāvento tāḷasaddena bodhayatīti vetāḷiko, ṇiko.
anya-e0810n0:1147: Cakkena caranto bahūhi pīḷetvā yo paṭhati, so cakkiko, ubhayatra caratyatthe iko. Ghaṇṭa bhāsattho, curādi.
anya-e0810n0:1148_0: 397. Pañcakaṃ dhaje. Kita nivāse, rogāpanayane ca, u, kitati apaneti etenāti ketu.
anya-e0810n0:1148_1: Dhaja gamane, a. Uppatatīti paṭākā, āko, paṭa gatiyaṃ vā, paṭākā. Kena vātena dalīyate
anya-e0810n0:1148_2: vidārīyateti kadalī, nadādi, chinnabhinnattā kucchitaṃ dalaṃ pattametissātthīti vā
anya-e0810n0:1148_3: kadalī, paṭākā sahacaraṇato itthiyaṃ. Kadalī mocepi. Yumhi ketanaṃ. Ettha ca dhajasahacaraṇato
anya-e0810n0:1148_4: ketu punnapuṃsake. “Paṭākā vejayantī ca, ketanaṃ dhaja’manitthī”tya amara 18.99 marakose.
anya-e0810n0:1149_0: Aññamaññasseti ekamapekkhitvā aparassāparaṃ apekkhitvā aññassa. Yo ahaṃkāro abhimāno,
anya-e0810n0:1149_1: so “ahaṃ aha”miti karotīti ahamahamikā bhave. “Ahaṃ aggo bhavāmi, ahaṃ aggo bhavāmī”ti
anya-e0810n0:1149_2: aññamaññamatikkamma yodhānaṃ samagge dhāvanaṃ, tatra tu ahaṃpubbikā. Ahaṃsaddo vibhattipatirūpako
anya-e0810n0:1149_3: nipāto, sakatthe kapaccaye kate vicchāyaṃ gamyamānattā dvittābhāvo.
anya-e0810n0:1150: 398. Catukkaṃ bale. Bala pāṇane, karaṇe a. Dhā gatinivattiyaṃ, karaṇe mo, dhassa tho. Sahatenenāti sahaṃ, sahopi. Saka sattiyaṃ,ti. Draviṇaṃ, taro, parakkamo, pāṇopi.
anya-e0810n0:1152_0: Jaye jite sati, kāraṇabhūte vā kataṃ pānaṃ jayapānaṃ. Amarakose pana “vīrapānaṃ tu
anya-e0810n0:1152_1: yaṃ pānaṃ, jāte bhāvini vā raṇe”ti amara 18.103 vuttaṃ. Tassattho – bhavissatiraṇe
anya-e0810n0:1152_2: jīvitasaṃsayā saṃhāsuppādanatthaṃ, devatāyācanapubbakaṃ sajātiyehi saha sambhūya
anya-e0810n0:1152_3: yodhānaṃ yaṃ pānaṃ jāte ca raṇe vijayassa sandassanatthaṃ, taṃ vīrapānamuccate.
anya-e0810n0:1153_0: 399-400. Sāḍḍhapajjaṃ yuddhe. Saṅgāma yuddhe, curādi, a. Hara haraṇe, pasayhakaraṇe
anya-e0810n0:1153_1: ca. Ara gamane, a. Samaraṃ. Raṇa sadde, dvepyanitthiyaṃ. Aja gamane, ṇi, āji, rassanto.
anya-e0810n0:1153_2: Āhuyyante asmiṃyodhā, hu sadde, a. Yudha sampahāre, to. Ādāya yujjhantetra āyodhanaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1153_3: yu. Yuja yoge, saṃyugaṃ, saṃyuttampi. Bhaṇḍa paribhāsane, yu. Viggayhanti yujjhantyasmiṃ
anya-e0810n0:1153_4: viggaho. Kalahantyasmiṃ kalaho. Medha medhāhiṃsāsaṅgamesu, ṇvu. Jaññaṃ, pavidāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1153_5: akkandanaṃ, saṅkhyaṃ, samīkaṃ, samparāyakaṃ, anīkaṃ, abhisampāto, kalisaṃ, phoṭo,
anya-e0810n0:1153_6: atyāmaddoiccādayopi yuddhe. Keci pana “bhaṇḍanādipañcakaṃ kalahe, na yuddhe”ti vadanti,
anya-e0810n0:1153_7: taṃ “bhaṇḍanaṃ kavace yuddhe, khalikārepi vattate”ti nānatthasaṅgahe vuttattā na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1154: Dvayaṃ mucchāyaṃ. Muccha mohasamussayesu. Muha vecitte. Tikaṃ balakkāre. Pasahanaṃ pasayho, saha sattiyaṃ, ṇyo. Balino, balena vā karaṇaṃ balakkāro. Haṭha balakkāre, ṇo. Pasaṅgopi.
anya-e0810n0:1155_0: 401. Subhāsubhānaṃ phalānaṃ sūcikā pakāsakā yā bhūtassa vatthuno vikati aññathā uppatti,
anya-e0810n0:1155_1: sā uppāto. Subhāsubhaphalaṃ pakāsento patati gacchatīti uppāto. Uppādopi. Tasaddo’yaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1155_2: pubbapadassa, aparapadassa vā liṅgamādatte. “Avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo,
anya-e0810n0:1155_3: viggaho ca taṃ vākyañceti viggahavākya”ntyādīsu, idha pana pubbapadassa liṅgamādatte.
anya-e0810n0:1156_0: Catukkaṃ uppātassa pariyāye. I gamane,ti, dīghādi. Sabbakālaṃ na jāyatīti ajaññaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1156_1: ṇyo, phalaṃ na janetīti vā ajaññaṃ, tañhi dhūmo viya aggissa kammaphalassa pakāsanamattameva
anya-e0810n0:1156_2: karoti, na taṃ janetīti ajaññaṃ nāma. Upagantvā sajjati pakāsetīti upasaggo, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1156_3: Upagantvā dunotīti upaddavo, du paritāpe, a. Ettha ca ītyādayo janakepi vattanti,
anya-e0810n0:1157_0: 402. Mallayuddhamhi bāhuyuddhamhi nibbuddhaṃ. Adhobhāgaṃ bandhanaṃ vā katvā yujjhantyatra
anya-e0810n0:1157_1: nibbuddhaṃ, yassa bo, aññamaññassa vedhaṃ nibbedhentyatreti vā nibbuddhaṃ. Vedha
anya-e0810n0:1157_2: vedhane, to, essu, aññatropacārā. Dvayaṃ jayakriyāyaṃ. Ji jaye, “bhāve cā”ti ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1157_3: Raṇe yuddhe yo bhaṅgo, so parājayo. Parāpubbo ji yuddhabhaṅge. Dvayaṃ palāyanamatte,
anya-e0810n0:1157_4: na tu saṅgāmatoyeva palāyane. Parivajjetvā ayanaṃ gamanaṃ palāyanaṃ. Apavajjetvā
anya-e0810n0:1157_5: gamanaṃ apakkamo. Padāvo, dāvo, sandāvo, viddavo, davo, apayānaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1158_0: 403. Pajjaṃ māraṇe. Mara pāṇacāge, sabbattha bhāvasādhanaṃ. Mārīyate māraṇaṃ, yu.
anya-e0810n0:1158_1: Hana hiṃsāyaṃ, ṇamhi “hanassa ghāto”ti ghātādeso. Nasa adassane. Sūda dhāraṇe. Hiṃsa
anya-e0810n0:1158_2: hiṃsāyaṃ. Sara hiṃsāyaṃ, itthiyamāpaccayo, hiṃsā. Ṇamhi hanassa vadhādeso. Sasa hiṃsāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1158_3: Yumhi hanassa ghāto, ghātanaṃ, nibbarahanaṃ, nikāraṇaṃ, pavāsanaṃ, saññāpanaṃ, pamathanaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1158_4: kathanaṃ, ujjāsanaṃ, ārambho, piñjopyatra. Varaha bādhānyaparibhāsanahiṃsādānesu.
anya-e0810n0:1158_5: Kara hiṃsāyaṃ. Vasa nivāse, papubbo hiṃsattho. Ñā māraṇatosananisāmanesu, pāgamo,
anya-e0810n0:1158_6: saññāpanaṃ. Matha viloḷane. Katha hiṃsattho. Jasu hiṃsāyaṃ, jasi tāḷane vā, curādi.
anya-e0810n0:1158_7: Āpubbo rabhi māraṇe. Piñja hiṃsābaladānaniketanesu. Ete yathākkamamidhānāgatānaṃ dhātavo.
anya-e0810n0:1159_0: 404. Pajjaṃ maraṇe. Kālo atītādi, tassa kiriyā, “kālo ghasati bhūtānī”ti jā. 1.2.190
anya-e0810n0:1159_1: hi vuttaṃ. Maratito cu, maccu, vajādinā vā tyu. Tato maccusadiso dvīsu. Atikkamitvā
anya-e0810n0:1159_2: ayanaṃ accayo. Dhana dhaññe. Kālassa kiriyattā kālo, attabhāvassa antaṃ karotīti
anya-e0810n0:1159_3: vā kālo, ṇo. Amati gacchatīti anto. Cu cavane.
anya-e0810n0:1160_0: 405. Tikaṃ mate. Paraṃ lokaṃ eti gacchatīti peto, pareto ca, to, pubbe ralopo. Maratīti
anya-e0810n0:1160_1: mato. Parāsu, pattapañcattopyatra. Dvayaṃ matadahanakaṭṭharāsimhi, yā “phullī”ti
anya-e0810n0:1160_2: vuccati. Cīyate yatthāti citako, cito ca, to. Pubbatra sakatthe ko. Citā, cityā, citipyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1161_0: Dvayaṃ susāne, āgantvā dahanti atra āḷahanaṃ. Daha bhasmīkaraṇe, yu, dassa ḷo. Āḷāhanampi.
anya-e0810n0:1161_1: Chavassa sayanaṭṭhānaṃ susānaṃ, chavassa su, sayanassa ca sāno, atha vā senti atrāti
anya-e0810n0:1161_2: sānaṃ, yu, chavassa sānaṃ susānaṃ. Chavassa su. Pituvanampi. Dvayaṃ matasarīre, kuṇapa
anya-e0810n0:1161_3: pūtigandhatthe. Kucchitaṃ netīti vā kuṇapo, apo, ṇattaṃ. Chava gatiyaṃ, a.
anya-e0810n0:1162_0: 406. Asīsakattā sirosuñño naccanādikriyāsahitattā sahakriyo deho kāyo kabandho “yuddhe
anya-e0810n0:1162_1: yodhesu sūresu sahassaṃ katta (khaṇḍa) muddhasu tadāvesā kabandho tu eko’muddhā kriyāndhito”ti
anya-e0810n0:1162_2: kabandhalakkhaṇaṃ, yuddhe sahassapūraṇo kabandho. “Naccatī”ti vuttattā naccanādikriyārahite
anya-e0810n0:1162_3: tūpacāro. Avijjamānena kena sirasā andho kabandho, vakāramajjho. Avijjamānassāpi
anya-e0810n0:1162_4: hi kāraṇabhāvo loke diṭṭho, yathā vassena kato subhikkho, dubbhikkho ca, yathā loke,
anya-e0810n0:1163_0: Āmakehi kucchitehi apūtigatamatasarīrehi sampuṇṇe āmake susānasmiṃ sivathikā vuttā,
anya-e0810n0:1163_1: atthappadhānaniddesena cettha saddo niddiṭṭho, yathā “sato sampajāno”ti puggalappadhānaniddesena
anya-e0810n0:1163_2: dhammoti. Chavā dhiyyantetra sivathikā, ṇvu, chassa so, thattaṃ, ittañca. Chavathikāpi.
anya-e0810n0:1164_0: 407. Dvayaṃ ākaḍḍhitamanussagavādo. Muñcanasaññāya vandatīti vandī. Vanda abhivādanathutīsu,
anya-e0810n0:1164_1: ī, rassopi, vandi. Sattūnaṃ karena hatthena maritabbattā karamaro. Paggaho, upaggahopi.
anya-e0810n0:1164_2: Dvayaṃ jīvite, ana pāṇane, pāṇanti anenāti pāṇo, ṇo. Bhavati yenāti asu. Asa bhuvi,
anya-e0810n0:1165: Bandhanāgāraṃ bandhanagehaṃ kārā nāma. Karonti hiṃsanti atra kārā, a. Kara hiṃsāyaṃ. Bandhanālayopi. Kara hiṃsāyaṃ, yata niyyātane. Kāraṇā, yatanā ca. Tibbavedanāpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1167_0: 408. Dvipādaṃ brāhmaṇe, brahmuno bandhu, brahmā bandhu yassa vā brahmabandhu. Kulācārabrāhmaṇabhāvavasena
anya-e0810n0:1167_1: dvikkhattuṃ jātattā dvijo, ekaje tūpacārā. Vapismā po, assi. Brahmuno apaccaṃ brahmā,
anya-e0810n0:1167_2: brāhmaṇo ca, nāgamo, ṇattaṃ, dīghādi. Sutāyutakathanatthaṃ “bhobho”ti vacanaṃ vadati sīlena, ṇī.
anya-e0810n0:1168_0: Dvayaṃ chandojjhetari. Brahmasuttaṃ adhīte sottiyo, “nena niddiṭṭhamanicca”nti kātanta
anya-e0810n0:1168_1: 1.2.18 naghaṭitaṃ aniccaṃ (paribhāsendusekhara 97) vuttattā vuddhi, yadādinā vā chandasaddassa
anya-e0810n0:1168_2: sottiyādeso pāṇini 5.2.84. Chandaṃ adhīte chandaso, so pulliṅgo.
anya-e0810n0:1169: Dvayaṃ sisse. Sotuṃ icchantīti sissā, su savane, so, ussi. Ācariyassa ante samīpe vasanasīlo, saññāsaddattā sattamiyā alopo.
anya-e0810n0:1170_0: 409. Brahmacārīādayo ete caturo janā assamā nāma bhavanti, assamasaddoyaṃ punnapuṃsake.
anya-e0810n0:1170_1: Tatra muñjamekhalādiyutto vedajjhāyako brahmacariyāyaṃ ṭhito brahmacārī. Vedajjhayanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1170_2: brahmacariyaṃ caratīti, ṇī. Dhammatthakāmesu ṭhito pañcamahāyaññakārī gahaṭṭho, gahā
anya-e0810n0:1170_3: dārā tatra tiṭṭhantīti gahaṭṭho. Gahaṭṭho paro tatiyassapi vānapattho. Vanapatthe
anya-e0810n0:1170_4: vanekadese, dūravane vā bhavo vānapattho, assa bhūmiseyyājaṭājinadhāraṇavanavāsonyahārabhojitādi
anya-e0810n0:1170_5: dhammo. Vānapatthassameva tatiyamāyuso bhāgaṃ khepayitvā gahitakāsāvadaṇḍo bhikkho
anya-e0810n0:1170_6: sabbabhūtesu samo jhānāyatanavaro bhikkhu. Samu tapasi, khede ca, āsammanti atrāti,
anya-e0810n0:1170_7: akattari kārake saññāyaṃ ṇo. “Assamo brahmacariyādi- catukkepi maṭhepi ce”ti nānatthasaṅgahe.
anya-e0810n0:1171_0: 410. Sīlādayo tayo sikkhādhamme saha ekato carantā mithu aññamaññaṃ sabrahmacārino
anya-e0810n0:1171_1: nāma, brahmacārīhi saha carantīti sabrahmacārino. “Mithū”ti iminā sabrahmacārīsaddassa
anya-e0810n0:1172_0: Dvayaṃ upasampadādāyake. Manasā upecca sissānaṃ vajjāvajjaṃ jhāyatīti upajjhāyo,
anya-e0810n0:1172_1: upajjhā ca. Jhe cintāyaṃ, ṇo, pubbatra e aya, pakkhe rājādipakkhepena upajjhā, parasamaye
anya-e0810n0:1172_2: pana vedādipāṭhayitā “upajjhāyo, upajjhā”ti coccate, upecca adhīyate asmāti katvā.
anya-e0810n0:1173: Dvayaṃ nissayadāyake. Sissānaṃ hitaṃ ācaratīti ācariyo, ṇyo. Nissayaṃ dadātīti, kammādimhi ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:1174_0: 411. Sāsane ācariyaṃ dassetvā parasamayepi dassetumāha “upanīye”ccādi. Atha vā yo
anya-e0810n0:1174_1: dvijo brāhmaṇo yaṃkiñci brāhmaṇaṃ upanīya attano santikaṃ ānetvā kappādichaḷaṅgikattā
anya-e0810n0:1174_2: sāṅgaṃ saguyhattā rahassañca vedaṃ kammabhūtaṃ pubbaṃ paṭhamameva kenaci asikkhāpiteyeva
anya-e0810n0:1174_3: ajjhāpaye sikkhāpeyya, so brāhmaṇesu “ācariyo”ti vuccati, ādito cāreti sikkhāpetīti
anya-e0810n0:1174_4: ācariyoti katvā, ṇyo. Yathāvuttā aññe upajjhāyā.
anya-e0810n0:1175_0: 412. Pajjaddhaṃ upadesaparamparāyaṃ. Pare ca pare ca paramparā, pubbācariyā. Tato
anya-e0810n0:1175_1: ābhataṃ pārampariyaṃ. Itihasaddo nipātasamudāyo. “Itiha pubbācariyehi vuttamida”nti
anya-e0810n0:1175_2: kathetabbaṃ vacanaṃ etihyaṃ, ṇyo. Ṇamhi etihaṃ. Ācariyaṃ upagantvā dissati uccārīyatīti
anya-e0810n0:1176_0: Tikaṃ yaññe. Yaja devapūjāsaṅgahakaraṇadānadhammesu, yajanaṃ yāgo, ṇo. Saggatthikehi
anya-e0810n0:1176_1: karīyateti katu, tu. Jassa ññatte yañño. Yāgatthaṃ mantādinā parikkhatā parisaṅkhatā
anya-e0810n0:1176_2: bhū bhūmi vedi nāma, īpaccaye vedī ca. Vindati assaṃ lābhasakkāranti vedi, vida lābhe, iṇa.
anya-e0810n0:1177_0: 413. Assamedhādayo pañca “mahāyāgā”tyuccante. Porāṇakarājakāle kira sassamedhaṃ purisamedhaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1177_1: sammāpāsaṃ vācāpeyyanti cattāri saṅgahavatthūni ahesuṃ, yehi rājāno lokaṃ saṅgaṇhiṃsu,
anya-e0810n0:1177_2: tattha nipphannasassato dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ sassamedhaṃ nāma, sassasampādane medhāvitā
anya-e0810n0:1177_4: nāma, purisassa saṅgaṇhane medhāvitā purisamedhaṃ nāmātyattho. Daliddamanussānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1177_5: hatthato lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1177_6: sammāpāsaṃ nāma. Tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitā viya ṭhapeti, tasmā “sammāpāsa”nti
anya-e0810n0:1177_7: vuccati. “Tāta mātulā”tyādinā pana saṇhavācāya bhaṇanaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ nāma, peyye vajjapiyavacanatātyattho.
anya-e0810n0:1177_8: Evaṃ catūhi vatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva hoti phītañca pahūtannapānaṃ khemaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1177_9: nirabbudaṃ. Manussā mudā pamodamānā ure putte naccentā apārutagharadvārā viharanti,
anya-e0810n0:1177_10: idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato niraggaḷanti vuccati, ayaṃ porāṇikapaveṇī, aparabhāge
anya-e0810n0:1177_11: pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ
anya-e0810n0:1177_12: parivattentā uddhaṃ mūlaṃ katvā “assamedha”ntiādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu, vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1179: Te tattha mante ganthetvā, okkākaṃ tadupāgamu”nti su. ni. 301, 304.
anya-e0810n0:1180_0: Idāni tehi parivattetvā ṭhapitamatthaṃ dassento “assamedho”ccādimāha. Tattha assaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1180_1: ettha medhanti vadhantīti assamedho. Purisaṃ ettha medhanti vadhantīti purisamedho.
anya-e0810n0:1180_2: Sammā yugacchidde pakkhipitabbadaṇḍakaṃ pāsenti khipenti ettha sammāpāso. Mantapadābhisaṅkhatānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1180_3: sappimadhūnaṃ “vāja”nti samaññā, tamettha pivayantīti vājapeyyo. Sabbassa attano
anya-e0810n0:1180_4: sāpateyyassa anigūhitvā niravasesato dinnattā natthi ettha aggaḷāti niraggaḷo, ayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1181_0: 414. Tikaṃ yājake. Yajanasīlo idi, yassi, jassa do. Yajatīti ijo, a. Atha vā itthiyā
anya-e0810n0:1181_1: utumhi jāte jāyatīti itthītujo. “Nārītvijo”tipi pāṭho. “Utujo yājako tathā”tipi pāṭho,
anya-e0810n0:1181_2: sundaro. Parasamayaṃ amanasi katvā pana ācariyena itidvijasaddo iditvijasaddo ca
anya-e0810n0:1181_3: samānatthāti maññamānena “idi tvijo”ti vuttaṃ siyā, ṇvumhi yājako amara 17.17 gāthā passitabbā.
anya-e0810n0:1182_0: Dvayaṃ yāgasabhāyaṃ, aññasabhāyañcārambhake. Sabhāyaṃ sādhu sabhyo, yo. Samājaṃ janasaṅghātaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1182_1: samāvasanti āgantvā ekadesī bhavantīti samājā, tehi samaṃ ekībhavatīti sāmājiko,
anya-e0810n0:1183_0: Pañcakaṃ sabhāsāmaññe. Pari samantato sentyassaṃ parisā, si sevāyaṃ. Saha bhāsantyassaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1183_1: sabhā, halopo, sabbhi bhātīti vā sabhā. Samajjanti saṃgacchanti milantyassaṃ samajjā,
anya-e0810n0:1183_2: aja gamane. Samayanti milantyassaṃ samiti, i gatimhi, itthiyanti. Milanamekībhāvo.
anya-e0810n0:1183_3: Samantato sīdantyasmiṃ saṃsado, itthinapuṃsakesu. Goṭṭhī, aṭṭhānīpyatra. Gāvovācā
anya-e0810n0:1183_4: tiṭṭhanti bhavantyassaṃ goṭṭhī. Āgantvā tiṭṭhantyassaṃ aṭṭhānī, yu, nadādi, rassādi.
anya-e0810n0:1184_0: 415-416. Bhikkhuādikā imā catasso parisā nāma. Bhikkhanasīlatādīhi bhikkhu. “Uddissa
anya-e0810n0:1184_1: ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā”ti jā. 1.7.59 hi vuttaṃ. Bhikkha yācane, rū.
anya-e0810n0:1184_2: Yomhi bhikkhū. Inīpaccaye bhikkhunī, yossa lopo. Ratanattayamupagantvā āsayantīti
anya-e0810n0:1184_3: upāsakā, ṇvu, āsa upavesane. Itte upāsikāyo. Ettha ca pabbajjāsāmaññato, liṅgasāmaññato
anya-e0810n0:1184_4: ca sāmaṇerā bhikkhūsu, sāmaṇeriyādayo, ca bhikkhunīsu saṅgahitā, tato, avasesā pana
anya-e0810n0:1184_5: sabbepi devamanussādayo itthipurisavasena dve koṭṭhāse katvā liṅgasabhāgavasena dvīsu
anya-e0810n0:1184_6: saṅgahitā, brahmāno pana liṅgābhāvepi purisasaṇṭhānattā purisesu saṅgahitā, tathā
anya-e0810n0:1184_7: paṇḍakāpi, ubhatobyañjanesu pana purisaubhatobyañjanaṃ purisesu, itthiubhatobyañjanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1185_0: Evaṃ catūhi koṭṭhāsehi parisaṃ dassetvā aṭṭhahipi dassetumāha “athave”ccādi. Tassattho
anya-e0810n0:1185_1: – parisā nāma aṭṭha siyuṃ, kesaṃ vasenā’ṭṭha siyuṃ? Tāvatiṃsānaṃ dvijānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1185_2: khattānaṃ khattiyānaṃ mārassa gahapatissa samaṇānaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ brahmūnañca
anya-e0810n0:1185_3: vasenāti imā cā’ṭṭhaparisā pākaṭavasena, seṭṭhavasena ca vuttāti na ettha pubbe viya
anya-e0810n0:1185_4: sabbā saṅgahitā, tāvatiṃsādikā hi pākaṭavasena vuttā, samaṇā pana pākaṭavasena, seṭṭhavasena ca vuttā.
anya-e0810n0:1186_0: 417. Gāyatti nāma yassa catūsu pādesu paṭipādaṃ chaḷakkharāni santi, sā pamukhamādi
anya-e0810n0:1186_1: yassa utthādīnaṃ pāyenānupayogattā gāyattipamukhaṃ chandaṃ nāma. Gāyateti gāyatti,
anya-e0810n0:1186_2: ge sadde, tti, e aya. Vajjaṃ chādayatīti chandaṃ, chada saṃvaraṇe, vuttañhi pajjaviveke
anya-e0810n0:1189_0: Yaṃ pana catuvīsakkharavantaṃ, vedānaṃ ādibhūtañca gāyatti viya chandānaṃ nāpi catuppadaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1189_1: atha kho tipadameva siyā, sā sāvitti nāma, sāvittisaddo gāyattipariyāyopyatthi, “sāvitti
anya-e0810n0:1189_2: chandaso mukhaṃ” ma. ni. 2.400; su. ni. 573, “gāyatti tu ca sāvittī”ti ca vuttattā.
anya-e0810n0:1189_3: Idha pana bhedena vuttaṃ, yathā “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi,
anya-e0810n0:1189_4: saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti. Savitussa isino ayaṃ vācā sāvitti, iṇa.
anya-e0810n0:1190_0: 418. Habyaṃ devatātthamannaṃ, tassa pāke tadādhāre thālyādimhi caru, tattha ṭhitattā
anya-e0810n0:1190_1: upacārena habyampi caru, caratismā u, caru pume. “Habyapāke caru pumā”ti amara 17.22
anya-e0810n0:1190_2: hyamarakose. Homadabbiyaṃ homakammani habyannādīnamuddharaṇatthaṃ katāyaṃ kaṭacchuyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1190_3: sujā, itthī, habyannādīnaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ jāyatīti sujā.
anya-e0810n0:1191_0: Dvayaṃ khīranne, devannattā paramaṃ annaṃ. Pātabbassa, asitabbassa cāti dvinnampi
anya-e0810n0:1191_1: bhāvānaṃ sambhavato pāyāso, ākārantānamāyo. Pāyasopyatra. Dvayaṃ devanne. Hu dāne,
anya-e0810n0:1192_0: 419. Thūṇāyaṃ yaññathambhe yūpo. Beluvo vā khādiro vā. Ālambapasubandhaneyaṭṭhi,
anya-e0810n0:1192_1: samattayaññe vā yaṃ yaṭṭhimāropayati, sa yūpo yūpa… yaññīyapasubandhanakaṭṭhabhede…
anya-e0810n0:1192_2: yāgasamatticihnatthe thambhe ca (vācappati), yu missane, po, dīghādi. Thu abhitthave,
anya-e0810n0:1192_3: ṇo, dīghādi. Yaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ kaṭṭhantarenā’gginipphādanatthaṃ ghaṃsate, tasmiṃ nimmanthyadārumhi
anya-e0810n0:1192_4: araṇī, ara gamane, aṇi, īmhi araṇī.
anya-e0810n0:1193_0: Gāhapaccādayo tayo aggayo. Gahapatinā saṃyutto gāhapacco, aggi, ṇyo. Taṃyoniyaṃrevāhavanīyo
anya-e0810n0:1193_1: hutabbaggiāhavanamarahatīti āhavanīyo. Dakkhiṇaggi pana taṃyoni aññayonipi. Dakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1193_2: deyyadhammaṃ agganti vissajjantyasminti dakkhiṇaggi, agga dāne, dānaṃ aggīyati dīyatyasminti
anya-e0810n0:1193_3: dānaggaṃ, “parivesanaṭṭhāna”nti a. ni. ṭī. 3.9.20 hi aṅguttaranikāyaṭīkā. Ettha ca
anya-e0810n0:1193_4: gāhapaccaggādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vippaṭipajjantānaṃ vināsahetubhāvato aggitādaṭṭhabbā. Sattakanipātaaṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana –
anya-e0810n0:1194_0: Āhunaṃ vuccati sakkāro, āhunaṃ arahantīti āhuneyyā, mātāpitaro, mātāpitaro hi puttānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1194_1: bahūpakāratāya āhunaṃ arahanti, tesu vippaṭipajjamānā puttā nirayādīsu pavattanti,
anya-e0810n0:1194_2: tasmā kiñcāpi mātāpitaro nānudahanti, anudahamānassa pana paccayo hotīti anudahanaṭṭheneva
anya-e0810n0:1194_4: taṃ aticaranto mātugāmo nirayādīsu nibbattati, tasmā sopi purimanayeneva anudahanaṭṭhena
anya-e0810n0:1194_6: bhikkhusaṅgho dakkhiṇeyyo, so gihīnaṃ tīsu saraṇesu, pañcasu sīlesu, dasasu sīlesu,
anya-e0810n0:1194_8: bahūpakāro, tasmiṃ micchāpaṭipanno gihī bhikkhusaṅghaṃ akkositvā nirayādīsu nibbattati,
anya-e0810n0:1195: “Dakkhiṇeyyaggī”ti vutto. Kaṭṭhato nibbatto pākatikova aggi kaṭṭhaggi nāmāti a. ni. aṭṭha. 3.7.46 vutto.
anya-e0810n0:1196_0: 420. Siloko dāne. Hā cāge, ṇo, dvittacattagattāni, caja hānimhi vā. Saja visagge,
anya-e0810n0:1196_1: visaggo dānaṃ, upubbo saja visajje, ṇo, pubbe vāgamo, vosaggo. Disa atisajjane, atisajjanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1196_2: dānaṃ, pabodhanañca, iha dānaṃ padesanaṃ. Saṇa dāne, yu. Tara plavanataraṇesu, maccherasotātikkamanamettha
anya-e0810n0:1196_3: taraṇaṃ. Hā cāge, curādi, to, yālopo, bhūvādimhi pana “ākārantānamāyo”ti āyo, vihāyitaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1196_4: Vajja vajjane, sabbatra bhāvasādhanaṃ. Upasaggavisesenete dānatthābhidhāyino. Phassanaṃ, patipādanaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1197_0: 421. Seṭṭhadhanassa, puttānaṃ, dārānaṃ, rajjassa, aṅgānañca vasena pañcamahāpariccāgo
anya-e0810n0:1197_1: vutto. Tatra seṭṭhadhanaṃ setahatthādiratanaṃ. Puttā orasā, atha vā puttadhītaro.
anya-e0810n0:1197_2: Dāro patibbatā piyabhariyā. Rajjaṃ pakatirajjaṃ, taduṭṭhito vā āyo. Aṅgaṃ cakkhādi.
anya-e0810n0:1197_3: Mahantehi uttamapuriseheva kato, mahantānaṃ vā pariccāgo mahāpariccāgo, mahatthaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1197_4: vā buddhabhāvatthaṃ kato pariccāgo mahāpariccāgo, kāpurisehi dukkarattā mahanto vā
anya-e0810n0:1198_0: 422. Dānapāramīādikānaṃ tissannaṃ pāramīnaṃ vasena asādhāraṇadānavatthuṃ dassetvā
anya-e0810n0:1198_1: sādhāraṇadānavatthuṃ dassetumāha “annaṃ pāna”miccādi. Tatra annaṃ pānavajjitaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1198_2: kiñci khādanīyādikaṃ. Pānaṃ pātabbaṃ udakādi. Yānaṃ hatthyādi antamaso upāhanaṃ upādāya
anya-e0810n0:1198_3: gamanasādhanaṃ. Mālā mālyaṃ, pupphañca. Vilepanaṃ chavirāgakaraṇaṃ, vibhūto sugandho
anya-e0810n0:1198_4: vā. Gandho tadaññagandho. Seyyā mañcādi, seyyāggahaṇena cettha āsanampi gahitaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1198_5: Padīpeyyaṃ padīpassa hitaṃ yaṃ kiñci telādi, ime dasa dānavatthū nāma siyuṃ. Dīyante
anya-e0810n0:1198_6: yāyāti dānaṃ. Tassa vatthu kāraṇaṃ, taduppattiyā uppajjanatoti dānavatthu, dātabbaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1198_7: vā dānaṃ, annādi, tadeva vatthu. Etāni pana dasa dānavatthūni suttantanayena kathitāni.
anya-e0810n0:1198_8: Vinayābhidhammanayavasenāpi pana kathetabbāni, rūpādichaḷārammaṇadānavasena hi abhidhamme
anya-e0810n0:1198_9: cha dānavatthūni āgatāni, vinaye cīvarapiṇḍapātabhesajjasenāsanavasena cattāri āgatāni.
anya-e0810n0:1198_10: Tatthevamācariyā vadanti “suttantanayadānato vinayadānameva mahapphalaṃ, kasmā? Annādidānamattavaseneva
anya-e0810n0:1198_11: yassa kassaci dussīlādikassa dātabbanti anujānitvā piṇḍapātādikappiyavohāravasena
anya-e0810n0:1198_12: sīlavantādikasseva ca dātabbanti anuññātattā. Sāmaññadānato hi visesadānameva mahapphalaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1198_13: tatopi abhidhammanayadānameva mahapphalaṃ, kasmā? Rūpādīsu paramatthavaseneva abhinivisitvā
anya-e0810n0:1198_14: dānavasena tatopi atisayadānattā”ti. Mayaṃ pana suttantanayadānaṃ vā hotu vinayābhidhammanayadānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1198_15: vā, yaṃ khettāditividhasampadāyuttaṃ, tameva mahapphalaṃ karotīti vadāma.
anya-e0810n0:1199_0: 423. Tadahe matadivase matatthaṃ yaṃ piṇḍapātajalāñjalyādidānaṃ, etaṃ dānaṃ dehā
anya-e0810n0:1199_1: uddhe bhavaṃ uddhadehikaṃ nāma. Pitaraṃ uddissa jalāñjalisuvaṇṇādidānaṃ nivāpo, vapa
anya-e0810n0:1199_2: bījasantāne, ṇo. Kālapattādiniyamena rājamattaṇḍavisottarādisatthato vihitaṃ, taṃva
anya-e0810n0:1199_3: tameva pitudānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇabhojanādi saddhaṃ nāma, saddhā assa dānassatthīti,
anya-e0810n0:1200_0: 424. Catukkaṃ gehāgate. Ata sātaccagamane, ithi, atithi, “atithi dvīsū”ti tikaṇḍasese
anya-e0810n0:1200_1: tikaṇḍasesa 2.7.9. Itthiyaṃ atithī ca. Āgacchatīti āgantu, tu. Āhunaṃ vuccati gehāgatānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1200_2: dātabbabhattādi, taṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ arahatīti pāhuno. Visa pavesane, āvesanaṃ āveso,
anya-e0810n0:1200_3: tamarahatīti āvesiko. Atyāgatopyatra. Gantumicchatīti gamiko, iko. Dvayaṃ pūjitapupphadabbakkhatādimhi.
anya-e0810n0:1200_4: Aggha pūjāyaṃ, a. Ṇyamhi agghiyaṃ, agghayampi. Agghato vā tadatthiye iyo.
anya-e0810n0:1201: 425. Pādatthe pādaddhe (ka.) udakādimhi pajjaṃ. Padassa hitaṃ pajjaṃ. Āgantvādayo pajjapariyantā satta saddā tīsu liṅgesu.
anya-e0810n0:1202_0: Chakkaṃ pūjāyaṃ. Ci caye,ti. Acca pūjāyaṃ, yu. Pūja pūjāyaṃ, itthiyamati a. Hara
anya-e0810n0:1202_1: haraṇe, upapubbo hara pūjāyaṃ, ṇo, upahāro, pume. Bala pāṇanapūjāsaṃvaraṇesu, i,
anya-e0810n0:1202_2: bali dvīsu. Māna pūjāyaṃ, yu. Namassāpyatra, namassa pūjāyaṃ, itthiyaṃ a.
anya-e0810n0:1203_0: 426. Catukkaṃ vandanāyaṃ. Namassa vandane, pubbeva, namu namane vā, ssapaccayo. Namo
anya-e0810n0:1203_1: karaṇaṃ namakkāro, ṇo. Namoto chaṭṭhīlopo, “lopañca tatrākāro”ti okāralope akārāgamo,
anya-e0810n0:1203_2: atha vā namanaṃ namo, tassa karaṇaṃ namakkāro, rahosaddo viya hi namosaddotra dvidhā
anya-e0810n0:1203_3: vattati. Eko akāranto saliṅgo, eko aliṅgo okārantoti. Vanda abhivādanathutīsu, yu,
anya-e0810n0:1204_0: Tikaṃ patthanāmatte. Attha yācanāyaṃ, yu, patthanā. Atthanāpi. Ṭhā gatinivattimhi.
anya-e0810n0:1204_1: Panidvayapubbo patthanāyaṃ, yu, ṇattaṃ, dhattaṃ. Imhi paṇidhi. Ayaṃ purise pulliṅge. Yācanāpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1205_0: 427. Sakkārapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā garuādīnaṃ ārādhanīyānaṃ kvaci atthe niyojanaṃ patthanāviseso
anya-e0810n0:1205_1: ajjhesanā, isa gavesane, isa gatihiṃsāvadānesuvā, yu, ajjhesanā, yathā “desetu bhagavā
anya-e0810n0:1206: 428. Catukkaṃ anussaraṇe. Esa gavesane, yāgame pariyesanā. Timhi pariyeṭṭhi. Gavesa maggane.
anya-e0810n0:1207_0: Tikaṃ ārādhanīyassa cittānukūle. Āsa upavesane, yu, upāsanaṃ. Su savane. Sotumicchā
anya-e0810n0:1207_2: sā itthī. Caratito bhāve ṇyo, pāricariyā.
anya-e0810n0:1208_0: 429. Tikaṃ tuṇhībhāve. Munino kammaṃ monaṃ, ṇo. Tuha adane, ṇhapaccayo, halopo ca,
anya-e0810n0:1208_1: tuṇho monametassatthīti tuṇhī, tassa bhāvo tuṇhībhāvo, atuṇhassa vā tuṇhībhavanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1208_2: tuṇhībhāvo, atha vā tohatīti tuṇhī, tuha adane, adanaṃ hiṃsā, ṇīpaccayo, vaṇṇavipariyayo,
anya-e0810n0:1209_0: Pañcakaṃ anukkame. Patirūpena patanaṃ paṭipāṭi, pata gamane, ubhayatrāpi tassa ṭo,
anya-e0810n0:1209_1: i. Sā itthī. Anurūpo kamo, kamo eva vā anukkamo. Pari anatikkamena ayanaṃ pavattanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1209_2: pariyāyo. Pubbassānurūpā anupubbī, nadādi. Ayaṃ apume. Anupubbampi. Kamu icchākantīsu, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1210_0: 430. Tikaṃ sīle. Tapa santāpe. Kilese tāpetīti tapo, a. Yamu uparame, uparamo viramaṇaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1210_1: bhāve ṇo. Si bandhane, sinoti cittametenāti sīlaṃ, lo, sīla samādhāne vā, samādhānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1210_2: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvo. Sīla samādhimhi vā, samādhiratra kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1210_3: abhyupagamo, aññatra sīle tupacārā, atha vā attānaṃ, parañca nirayādīsu tāpetīti
anya-e0810n0:1210_4: tapo. Kusaladhammato saṃyamanaṃ viramaṇaṃ saṃyamo, samādhānañcātrākusaladhammavasenevāti
anya-e0810n0:1211_0: Satthavihito niyamo vataṃ. “Mantanāyaṃ paṭiññāyaṃ, niyamo nicchaye vate”ti rabhaso.
anya-e0810n0:1211_1: Tañca vataṃ upavāsādilakkhaṇaṃ puññamuccate. “Sīlaṃ cārittaṃ vārittamupavāsādipuññaka”ntyamaramālā.
anya-e0810n0:1211_2: Ādinā akkhāralavaṇāsanādi akhādanābhojanādi (ka.). Ettha ca tapādayo mukhyavasena
anya-e0810n0:1211_3: kusalasīle vattanti, rūḷhīvasena akusalasīlepi. Niyamādayo mukhyavasena akusalasīle
anya-e0810n0:1211_4: vattanti, rūḷhīvasena kusalasīleti ayaṃ sīlabbatānaṃ viseso. Yamu uparame. Vatu vattane,
anya-e0810n0:1211_5: vattanañcātra caraṇaṃ, samādhānaṃ vā. Vā pulliṅgepi.
anya-e0810n0:1212_0: Dvayaṃ mariyādātikkame. Kamu padavikkhepe, virūpo atikka mo vītikkamo. Mariyādātikkamo
anya-e0810n0:1212_1: ācāro ajjhācāro. Kāyavivekādayo tayo ettha viveko. Vica vivecane, puthabhāve ca,
anya-e0810n0:1212_2: bhāve ṇo, dvittādi. Puthu visuṃbhūto gaṇādīhi attā sarīraṃ mano sabhāvo ca etesanti
anya-e0810n0:1212_3: puthugattā, tesaṃ bhāvo puthugattatā puthagattatā (ka.) kāyavivekādayo, majjhe gāgamo.
anya-e0810n0:1212_4: “Evaṃsarūpoyaṃ puriso, evaṃsarūpā vā amhepi nesaṃ pakati”riti pakatipurisānaṃ vibhāgena
anya-e0810n0:1212_5: ñāṇaviveko. Attā buddhi, so puthubhāvena yassa, tabbhāvo puthugattatātyaññe. Aññato
anya-e0810n0:1213_1: abhisamācāre uttamasamācāre bhavaṃ ābhisamācārikanti katvā, tadaññaṃ khuddānukhuddakato
anya-e0810n0:1213_2: aññaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlādikaṃ sīlaṃ brahmacariyassāriyamaggassa ādimhi tadatthāya
anya-e0810n0:1214_0: 432. Pāpehi akusaladhammehi upāvatto upāvuto (ka.) anāvuto vigato sabbannapānabhogādīhi
anya-e0810n0:1214_1: vivajjitova hutvā guṇehi sīlādīhi saddhiṃ yo vāso vasanaṃ thambhanamatthi, so “upavāso”ti
anya-e0810n0:1214_2: vijānitabbo. Vasu thambhe, divādi, upavasanaṃ upavāso, ṇo, vigato, upeto ca vāsoti vā upavāso.
anya-e0810n0:1215_0: 433. Pajjaddhaṃ bhikkhumhi. Tapo kammamassatthīti tapassī, tapādito sī, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1215_1: Bhayadassanasīlo bhikkhu, rū, rasso. Sametīti samaṇo, yu. Pabbajā sañjātā yassāti
anya-e0810n0:1215_2: pabbajito, sañjātatthe ito, seṭṭhattaṃ vajatīti vā pabbajito, vaja gamane, to. Tapokammaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1216_0: Dvayaṃ monabbate. Vācato yamatīti vācaṃyamo, niggahītāgamo, rasso ca. Monamassatthīti
anya-e0810n0:1216_1: muni, rasso, ossu. Dvayaṃ ābhusopavāsanabrahmacariyādiyutte. Tapoyogā tāpaso, saṇa.
anya-e0810n0:1216_2: Isa gavesane, i, isi, isa gatiyaṃ vā, ñāṇassa, saṃsārassa vā pāraṃ gamanato isi,
anya-e0810n0:1216_3: i. Pārikaṅkhīpyatra, pāramassatthīti pārī, brahmañāṇaṃ, taṃ kaṅkhatīti pārikaṅkhī.
anya-e0810n0:1217_0: 434. Dvayaṃ jitindriyagaṇe. Yesaṃ saṃyatā indriyānaṃ gaṇā, te yatino, vasino ca nāma.
anya-e0810n0:1217_1: Yataṃ indriyasaṃyamo niccametesamatthīti yatino, ī. Yatayopi, yata payatane, i. Vasa
anya-e0810n0:1218_0: Tikaṃ dhammasenāpatimhi. Sārī nāma brāhmaṇī, tassā putto sāriputto. Tussantyasmiṃ
anya-e0810n0:1218_1: atthasiddhitoti tisso, so, tussi ca. Pūjito tisso upatisso, atha vā “tisso”ti vā
anya-e0810n0:1218_2: “phusso”ti vā “upatisso”ti vā daharakāle mātāpitūhi yadicchāya gahitaṃ nāmaṃ, “sāriputto”ti
anya-e0810n0:1218_3: mātuvasena, “dhammasenāpatī”ti pana ariyabhāvappatte sammāsambuddhena gahitaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1218_4: Kusaladhammāvudhehi kāmādikā akusaladhammasenā jitā yesaṃ dhammasenā, anekakoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā
anya-e0810n0:1218_5: bhagavato sāvakasaṅghā, tesaṃ pati nāyakaṭṭhena dhammasenāpati.
anya-e0810n0:1219_0: 435. Dvayaṃ bhagavato vāmapassaṭṭhe mahāmoggallāne. Kule jāyatīti koliko, so eva
anya-e0810n0:1219_1: kolito. Moggallibrāhmaṇiyā apaccaṃ moggallāno, ṇāno. Dvayaṃ ariyasāmaññe. Kilesārayo
anya-e0810n0:1219_2: hanatīti araho, so eva ariyo, ara gamane vā, arati adhigacchati maggaphaladhammeti
anya-e0810n0:1220_0: Asekkhassa gahitattā “sotāpannādikā”ti etthādinā chaḷeva puggalā saṅgahitā, tena
anya-e0810n0:1220_1: sotāpattimaggaṭṭhādayo satta sekkhā, eko arahā asekkhāti siddhaṃ. Tīhi sikkhāhi yuttatāya
anya-e0810n0:1220_2: sekkhā, kakāralopena “sekhā, asekhā”tipyatthi. Dvayaṃ anadhigate. Ariyehi puthu visuṃbhūto
anya-e0810n0:1220_3: jano puthujjano, puthu vā nānākilese janetīti puthujjano.
anya-e0810n0:1221_0: 436. Dvayaṃ aggaphale. Paṭhamamaggādīhi diṭṭhamariyādamanatikkamitvā jānitthāti aññā,
anya-e0810n0:1221_1: rasso, rūparāgādīnaṃ vā pañcuddhambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ odhivasena māraṇato aññā,
anya-e0810n0:1221_2: mariyādattho cettha ākāro, ñā māraṇatosananisānesu, itthiyamati a. Arahato bhāvo
anya-e0810n0:1221_3: arahattaṃ, bhāve tto, bhāvotra abhidhānabuddhīnaṃ pavattiyā nimittaṃ, tañca duvidhaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1221_5: byuppatti, goādisaddasarūpaṃ, tassā nimittaṃ byuppattinimittaṃ, kriyāpakatipaccayādayo,
anya-e0810n0:1221_6: vividhaṃ vā goādisaddasarūpaṃ uppādetīti byuppatti, sā eva nimittaṃ, yathāvuttā kriyādayoyeva.
anya-e0810n0:1221_7: Pavattayati tattha tattha atthe payojayatīti pavatti, goādiko saddo, tassa nimittaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1221_9: kāraṇaṃ, pavattinimittaṃ pana saddappayojanassa kāraṇanti ayametesaṃ saṅkhepato lakkhaṇaviseso.
anya-e0810n0:1222_0: Dvayaṃ cetiye. Thu abhitthave, po, dīghādi. Cita pūjāyaṃ, cetitabbaṃ pūjetabbanti,
anya-e0810n0:1222_1: ṇyo, cetiyaṃ. Ettha ca thūpasaddo samukhepi, cetiyasaddo pana mukharahiteyeva vattati.
anya-e0810n0:1223_0: Dvayaṃ ānande. Dhammo pariyatti, sova bhaṇḍaṃ dhanaṃ sukhadāyakato, tassa agāraṃ
anya-e0810n0:1223_1: ṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ gehaṃ, tabbhāve tiṭṭhatīti dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko, iko. Nanda samiddhiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1224: 437. Dvayaṃ visākhāyaṃ seṭṭhidhītari. Vividhā bahukā puttanattapanattādikā sākhā yassā sā visākhā. Migārassa seṭṭhino mātuṭṭhāniyattā migāramātā.
anya-e0810n0:1225_0: Dvayaṃ anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhimhi. Sundaro attā yassa sudatto, sundaraṃ dattaṃ dānamassa
anya-e0810n0:1225_1: vā sudatto, idamassa daharakāle pavattaṃ nāmaṃ. Anāthānaṃ piṇḍaṃ dadātīti anāthapiṇḍiko,
anya-e0810n0:1226: 438-439. Bhikkhuādayo ete pañca sahadhammikā. Saha ekato dhammaṃ carantīti sahadhammikā.
anya-e0810n0:1227_0: Pattādayo aṭṭha parikkhārā ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttā, majjhimavasena pana kattaradaṇḍopi
anya-e0810n0:1227_1: telanāḷipīti dasa parikkhārā vattabbā, omakavasena chattampi upāhanāpīti dvādasa
anya-e0810n0:1228: 440. Dvayaṃ sāmaṇere. Samaṇassāpaccaṃ sāmaṇero. Samaṇaliṅgācārattā “samaṇoya”nti uddisitabboti samaṇuddeso. Disī uccāraṇe.
anya-e0810n0:1229_0: Tikaṃ acelake. Disā eva ambaraṃ vatthaṃ, na pakativatthametassa digambaro, sassa
anya-e0810n0:1229_1: go. Natthi celaṃ vatthametassa, samāsante ko. Catūhi ganthehi bandhanīyattā nigantho,
anya-e0810n0:1229_2: nisaddo bandhane. Dvayaṃ jaṭāvati. Jaṭaṃ yassatthi jaṭilo, ilo. Jaṭaṃ dhāretīti jaṭādharo.
anya-e0810n0:1230_0: 441. Kuṭisakādikā catuttiṃsa laddhiyo parasamayānamāgamato gahetabbā, tathā dvāsaṭṭhi
anya-e0810n0:1230_1: diṭṭhiyo brahmajālasuttantato. Itīti parisamāpanattho. Eteti nidassanattho. Ete channavutiladdhiyo
anya-e0810n0:1230_2: taṇhāpāsaṃ, diṭṭhipāsañca ḍenti pavattentīti pāsaṇḍāti sampakāsitā kathitā. “Iti
anya-e0810n0:1231: 442. Tikaṃ sucimhi. Pu pavane, to. Dvittādi. Yata payatane, to. Dīghādi. Dvayaṃ cammani. Caritaṃ tanti cammaṃ, caratimhā mana, camu adane vā, mana. Aja gamane, yu, ino vā.
anya-e0810n0:1232_0: Dvayaṃ dantakaṭṭhe. Dante punāti sodheti yenāti dantapono, yu. Dantapoṇopi. Dantasodhanatthaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1232_1: kaṭṭhaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ. Dvayaṃ rukkhattace. Vakka tace, alo. Tara taraṇe, ito, sakatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:1233: 443. Dvayaṃ bhājanasāmaññe. Patati yattha so patto, pata gatiyaṃ, to. Pā rakkhaṇe,ti.
anya-e0810n0:1234: Dvayaṃ kuṇḍikāyaṃ. Kassa jalassa maṇḍo pasannabhāvo kamaṇḍo, taṃ lātīti kamaṇḍalu, u. Kuḍi rakkhaṇe, sakatthe ko. Kattarassa jiṇṇassa ālambanayaṭṭhi.
anya-e0810n0:1235_1: taṃ dehasādhanāpekkhaṃ sarīreneva sādhanamapekkhate, na bāhirena sādhanaṃ, ayaṃ yamo nāma, yamu uparame.
anya-e0810n0:1237: Saṃyame yamarāje ca, yamake tu yamaṃ tisū”ti amara 17.38.
anya-e0810n0:1239_0: Yaṃ panāgantunā sukkapakkhādivasena aniccaṃ niyamitakālamupavāsādikaṃ kammaṃ, ayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1239_1: niyamo, kālādivasena niyamitabboti niyamo, yamu uparame. “Mantanāyaṃ paṭiññāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1241: 445. Dvayaṃ vesse. Visa pavesane, so. Iyānapaccaye vesiyāno. Ūrujo, ariyopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1242_0: Pañcakaṃ kasiādijīvikāyaṃ. Jīva pāṇadhāraṇe, yu. Sabbatra bhāve paccayo, karaṇetyeke.
anya-e0810n0:1242_1: Vata vattane,ti, assu, ṇvumhi jīvikā. Vuttīnaṃ sarūpappakāre dasseti. Dvayaṃ kasikamme.
anya-e0810n0:1242_2: Kasanaṃ kasi, sā eva kammaṃ kasikammaṃ. Kasa vilekhane, i, kasi.
anya-e0810n0:1243_0: 446. Dvayaṃ vāṇijje. Vaṇijānaṃ kammaṃ vāṇijjaṃ, vaṇijjā ca. Dvayaṃ pasuposane. Gunnaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1243_1: rakkhā gorakkhā. Pasūnaṃ gomahiṃsādikānaṃ pālanaṃ posanaṃ cikicchādi pasupālanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1243_2: vuttaṃ sarūpaṃ, vuttappakārā ca iti vessassa vuttiyo vuttikāraṇā tisso bhavanti kasikammādippakārena.
anya-e0810n0:1244: Tikaṃ gihimhi. Gahe gehe, pañcakāmaguṇe vā bhavavasena tiṭṭhatīti gahaṭṭho. Agāre gehe vasatīti agāriko, gahametassatthīti gihi, assi, rasso ca.
anya-e0810n0:1245_0: 447. Dvayaṃ kasibale. Khettenājīvati. Kasatīti kassako, ṇvu. Dvayaṃ khette. Bījāni
anya-e0810n0:1245_1: khipantyasminti khettaṃ, khipa peraṇe, to, khittaṃ tāyatītipi khettaṃ, khi nivāsagatīsu
anya-e0810n0:1245_2: vā, ta, traṇa, khettaṃ, khetraṃ. Kleda, klida allabhāve, lalopo, kledīyatīti kedāraṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1245_3: ke jale sati dāro vidāraṇamassāti vā kedāraṃ, saññāsaddattā sattamiyā na lopo, vāpopyatra,
anya-e0810n0:1246_0: Dvayaṃ mattikākhaṇḍe. Leḍḍa saṅghāte, u, leḍḍu. Pume utto kathito. “Leḍḍavo pume”tya
anya-e0810n0:1246_1: amara 19.12 marakose. Dvayaṃ khaṇittiyaṃ. Khaññate yāya, sā khaṇitti, khanu avadāraṇe,ti,
anya-e0810n0:1246_2: ṇattaṃ, ussi. Avadārīyate yena avadāraṇaṃ, dara vidāraṇe, yu.
anya-e0810n0:1247: 448. Tikaṃ dātte. Danti lunantyanenāti dāttaṃ, dā lavane, to. Dātrampi. Lū chedane, lavittaṃ, asu khepane. Asitaṃ, sabbatra karaṇe paccayo.
anya-e0810n0:1248: Tikaṃ pājanadaṇḍe. Tuda byathane, ṇo, patodo. Tapaccaye tuttaṃ. Aja khepane, gatimhi ca, karaṇe yu, pājanaṃ. Vaṇṇavikāre pācanaṃ. Todanaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1249: Tikaṃ rajjuyaṃ. Yuja yoge, to, yottaṃ. Rudha āvaraṇe, ju, ussattaṃ, pararūpattañca, rajju thiyaṃ. Rasa assādane, mi, ābandhopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1250_0: Dvayaṃ phāle. Phālayati pāṭayati bhūmi yena phālo, ṇo. Kasa vilekhane, ṇvu, kasako.
anya-e0810n0:1250_1: “Phālakasakā”ti byākhyāsudhā 2.9.13 ruddo. Nirīsaṃ, kūṭakaṃ, halampi. Īsāya niggataṃ
anya-e0810n0:1250_2: nirīsaṃ. Kuṭa chedane, sakatthe ko, kūṭakaṃ, dīghādi. Hala vilekhane.
anya-e0810n0:1251_0: 449. Tikaṃ naṅgale. Bhūmīnaṅga’manaṅgaṃ karonto lunātīti naṅgalaṃ. Sī bandhane, ro,
anya-e0810n0:1251_1: sīro. “Sīro tikkhakare hale”ti nānatthasaṅgahe. Godāraṇaṃpyatra. Naṅgalassa daṇḍake
anya-e0810n0:1251_2: īsā, īsa issariye, īsā nārī. “Pabhumhi saṅkare īso, thiyaṃ naṅgaladaṇḍake”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā
anya-e0810n0:1252_0: Yugakīlake sammāsaddo, samanti yāya sammā, samu samane. Halapaddhati naṅgalalekhā
anya-e0810n0:1252_1: sītā nāma. “Sītā naṅgalalekhā ca, divagaṅgā ca jānakī”ti tikaṇḍasesa 3.3.191 tikaṇḍasese.
anya-e0810n0:1253_0: 450-451. Muggādike dhaññavisese aparannasaddo, pubbannato aparabhāge pavattaṃ annaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1253_1: aparannaṃ, aparaṇṇañca. Sāliādike pubbannasaddo, aparannassa pubbe pavattaṃ annaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1253_2: pubbannaṃ, pubbaṇṇañca. Pubbāparattañca nesaṃ ādikappe sambhavāsambhavavasena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1254_0: Sālyādayo satta dhaññāni. Dhānaṃ posanaṃ, tatra sādhūni dhaññāni, yo, rasso. Kalamā
anya-e0810n0:1254_1: rattasāli mahāsālisaṭṭhikappabhutayo sūkadhaññavisesā sālayo nāma. Saṭṭhidināni paripākamassa
anya-e0810n0:1254_2: saṭṭhiko. Sāla silāghāyaṃ, i, sāli. Vahati, brūheti vā sattānaṃ jīvitanti vīhi, vaha
anya-e0810n0:1254_3: pāpuṇe, brūha vuḍḍhiyañca, i, assī, pakkhe ralopo, vīhi. Koraṃ rudhiraṃ dūsatīti
anya-e0810n0:1254_4: kudrūso, govaḍḍhano, a. Vaṇṇavipariyayo, ossu ca. Gudha parivedhane, umo. Godhumo.
anya-e0810n0:1254_5: “Godhūmasumano milakkha, bhojanaṃ pāvaṭo yavo”ti rabhaso. Vara varaṇasambhattīsu,
anya-e0810n0:1254_6: ṇvu, varako. Yu missane, a, yavo. Kaṅgu atisukhumasasse dhaññavisese, sobhanasīsattā
anya-e0810n0:1254_7: kamanīyabhāvaṃ gacchatīti kaṅgu, u. “Sāmā piyaṅgu kaṅgu dve”ti ruddo. Tabbhedā tesaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1254_8: dhaññānaṃ bhedā visesā nīvārādayo vuccante. Nīvārāni tiṇadhaññāni, ādinā sāmākādayo.
anya-e0810n0:1255_0: Dvayaṃ kaḷāye. Caṇa dāne, ṇvu, caṇako, harimanthakepi. Kaṃ vātaṃ lātīti kaḷāyo, ḷattaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1255_1: kalāyampi. Dvayaṃ sāsapasāmaññe. “Sāsapo tu sarisapo, kaṭusneho ca tantubho”ti tikaṇḍaseso
anya-e0810n0:1255_2: 2.8.3. “Pume suddhodanasute, siddhattho setasāsape”ti rabhaso. Siddhā atthā asminti
anya-e0810n0:1255_3: siddhattho. Sāsa anusiṭṭhiyaṃ, apo. Sāsapassāpi vīhibhedattā idha gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1256: 452. Dvayaṃ kaṅguyaṃ. Piyabhāvaṃ aṅgatīti piyaṅgu. Dvayaṃ atasiyaṃ. Ava rakkhaṇe, mo, avassu, dvittaṃ, ummā. Ata sātaccagamane, aso, nadādi. Khumāpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1257_0: Catukkaṃ sasse. Kiṭa gatiyaṃ, ṭho, kasito sambhūtaṃ vā kiṭṭhaṃ, kiṭṭhaṭṭhāne uppannasassañhi
anya-e0810n0:1257_1: “kiṭṭha”nti vuccati ṭhānūpacārena, ṭho, silopo, assi. Sasa gatihiṃsāpāpuṇanesu, so.
anya-e0810n0:1257_2: Thambo gumbo, taṃ karotīti thambakari, i. Dhaññaṃpyatra. “Dhaññaṃ vīhīsu dhaññake,
anya-e0810n0:1257_3: dhañño puññavatīrito. Dhaññā vātāmalakīsū”ti hi nānatthasaṅgahe.
anya-e0810n0:1258: 453. Dvayaṃ sassādīnaṃ kaṇḍamatte. Kaṇa sadde, ḍo. Nala ganthe, ṇo, nālaṃ. Nāḷipi. So eva sassādikaṇḍo nipphalo ce, palālamuccate. Pala lavanapavanesu, alo, palālopi.
anya-e0810n0:1259_0: Dvayaṃ asāre tucchadhaññe. Bhasa bhasmīkaraṇe, assu, bhusaṃ atisayepi. Thusampi.
anya-e0810n0:1259_1: Tusa ussagge. Kena vātena iṅgatīti kaliṅgaro, lāgamo, aro ca. Dhaññānameva tace vakkale
anya-e0810n0:1259_2: thuso, tusa tuṭṭhimhi, tassa tho, thuso pume. “Dhaññattace pumā thuso” amara 19.22 tyamarakose.
anya-e0810n0:1260_0: 454. Dvayaṃ sassaroge. Setavaṇṇakaraṇavasena aṭati hiṃsatīti setaṭṭikā, sā eva setaṭṭhikā.
anya-e0810n0:1260_1: Dvayaṃ taṇḍulakaṇe. Kaṇa nimīlane, kaṇa nimīlanasaddagatīsu vā, a, kaṇo. Kuṇḍa dāhe,
anya-e0810n0:1260_2: sakatthe ko. Dvayaṃ dhaññamaddanabhūmiyaṃ. Khala soceyye, dhaññāni karonti maddanti
anya-e0810n0:1260_3: asmiṃ dhaññakaraṇaṃ. Tiṇādīnaṃ, sassānañca thambo gumbo nāma, thamba vekalye, thamba
anya-e0810n0:1260_4: paṭibandhe vā. Guha saṃvaraṇe, bo, hassa mo.
anya-e0810n0:1261_0: 455. Dvayaṃ musale. Ayo aggekoṭiyaṃ yassāti ayoggaṃ. Musa khaṇḍane, alo. Dvayaṃ suppe.
anya-e0810n0:1261_1: Kucchitaṃ lunātyapanetīti kullo. Supa māne, a, saratyaneneti vā suppaṃ, po, assu. Papphoṭanaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1262_0: Dvayaṃ uddhane. Upari dhīyate thālyādikamasminti uddhanaṃ, uddhānampi, yu. Culla
anya-e0810n0:1262_1: hāvakaraṇe, i, īmhi cullī. Adhisayanī, antikāpyatra. Ati adi bandhane, antyate bhikkhādikamassanti
anya-e0810n0:1262_2: antikā, ṇvu. “Santike sannidhāne ca, uddhane cāpi antikā”tyajayo.
anya-e0810n0:1263_0: Kāsādiracito kaṭo yena marāvo bandhīyate. Marāvo ca vīhyagāraṃ, “kusūlo vīhyagārañca,
anya-e0810n0:1263_1: kantaro ca marāvako”ti rabhaso. Keci marāvameva kaṭamāhu, taṃ na, “kusūlo ca marāvo
anya-e0810n0:1263_2: ca, kilañjo ca kaṭo bhave”ti amaramālāyaṃ pādanāmapakaraṇe bhedena pāṭhā. Kila bandhane,
anya-e0810n0:1263_3: kilanaṃ kilo, tadatthaṃ jāyatīti kilañjo, niggahītāgamo. Kaṭa gatiyaṃ, a.
anya-e0810n0:1264_0: 456. Aṭṭhakaṃ thāliyaṃ. Kāmīyatīti kumbhī, kamu icchāyaṃ, bho, assu, ī ca, kuyā pathaviyā
anya-e0810n0:1264_1: bhavatīti vā kumbhī, kena agginā bhaṇatīti vā kumbhī, bhaṇa sadde, ṇalopo, kena jalena
anya-e0810n0:1264_2: umbhīyati pūrīyatīti vā kumbhī, ubha ubbha umbha pūraṇe, sabbatra nadādi. Piṭha hiṃsāsaṃkilesesu,
anya-e0810n0:1264_3: aro. Kuṇḍa dāhe. Khala soceyye, ḷattaṃ. Ukha gamane, alo, nadādi, rasso. Apaccaye
anya-e0810n0:1264_4: ukhā. Thala ṭhāne, i, thāli, īmhi thālī. Kena agginā lapatīti kolambo, assottaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1264_5: niggahītāgamo, battañca, ke aggimhi olambatīti vā kolambo. Labi avasaṃsane.
anya-e0810n0:1265: Tikaṃ maṇike. Mana ñāṇe, i, ṇattaṃ, maṇiyeva maṇikaṃ. Bhaṇa sadde, ṇvu, araṃ sīghaṃ jaro assa arañjaro.
anya-e0810n0:1266_0: 457. Dvipādaṃ ghaṭe. Ghaṭa calane, a, nadādimhi ghaṭī, kuṭa koṭilye. Kena jalena
anya-e0810n0:1266_1: lasati silissatīti kalaso, lisa silesane, a, issattaṃ, kalaso tīsu. Vara vāraṇasambhattīsu,
anya-e0810n0:1266_2: ṇvu. Kalasasahacaraṇato vārakopi tīsu. “Kalaso tu tīsū”tyamarakose amara 19.31.
anya-e0810n0:1267: Bhuñjitabbanti bhuñjanaṃ, annādi, tassa patto bhājanaṃ suvaṇṇarajatādinimmitampi kaṃso nāma.
anya-e0810n0:1269: Pānapatte ca kaṃsye ca, sobhikkhāsu ca kittisū”. –
anya-e0810n0:1270: Tyajayena vuttattā pānapattepi kaṃso. Kana dittigatikantīsu, so, kaṃso. Anitthī. Tikaṃ bhājanasāmaññe. Ama gatiyaṃ, atto, amattaṃ. Bhāja puthakammani, curādi, yu.
anya-e0810n0:1271_0: 458. Dvayaṃ bhājanādīnamādhāre. Antaṃ samīpamādheyyassa upagacchatīti aṇḍupakaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1271_1: ntassaṇḍo, gassa ca ko. Cumba vadanasaṃyoge, aṭo, assu, sakatthe ko. Dvayaṃ sarāve,
anya-e0810n0:1271_2: sarati vuḍḍhiṃ gacchatīti sarāvo, avo. Malla dhāraṇe. Ṇvu. Vaḍḍhamānakopyatra, vaḍḍhati
anya-e0810n0:1272_0: Dvayaṃ bhelabyañjanādighaṭṭanopayuttabhaṇḍe. Kaṭa gatiyaṃ, chu, dvittādi. Du gatiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1272_1: bo, nadādi, dabbī, rasse dabbi. Khajākāpi, khaja manthane, ako, khajākā thiyaṃ. Dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1272_2: dhaññādinilaye. Kusa silesane, ūlo. Kusa akkose, ṭho. Dvepi punnapuṃsake.
anya-e0810n0:1273_0: 459. Dvayaṃ māsādisākamatte, sā tanukaraṇe, ṇvu. Ḍaṃsa khādane, ṇvu. Salopo, siggu,
anya-e0810n0:1273_1: haritakampi. Haritā sakatthe ko. “Pulliṅgo sākamattasmiṃ, siggu sobhañjanepi ce”ti
anya-e0810n0:1273_2: cintāmaṇiṭīkā 19.34 rabhaso. Dvayaṃ addake. Āddāyaṃ jātaṃ addakaṃ, rasso. Siṅgamiva
anya-e0810n0:1274: Yadā sukkhaṃ, tadā mahosadhādhyaṃ, tikkharasattā mahantaṃ osadhaṃ. Suṇṭhī, nāgaraṃ, visaṃ, visabhesajjampi. Suṭhi sosane, i, suṇṭhi, īpaccaye suṇṭhī.
anya-e0810n0:1275: Dvayaṃ marīce. Mara pāṇacāge, co. Kula saṅkhyāne, ṇvu. “Marīcaṃ kolakaṃ kaṇhaṃ, usanaṃ dhammapattana”ntyamarasīho.
anya-e0810n0:1276_0: 460. Tipādaṃ kañjike. Suvīraraṭṭhe bhavaṃ sovīraṃ. Kena jalena añjiyamabhibyattaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1276_1: assa kañjiyaṃ. Ārānaṃ bhūmyakkajānaṃ vāresu gahitena nārena jalena jātaṃ āranāḷaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1276_2: “āro kkhiti sute’kkaje, nāro taṇḍulanīresū”ti hi vuttaṃ, rassa ḷo. Thusato jātamudakaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1276_3: thusodakaṃ, thusodakato vā jātaṃ thusodakaṃ. Dhaññato vīhito jātaṃ ambilaṃ dhaññambilaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1276_4: Vātaṃ laṅkati hīnaṃ karotīti bilaṅko, vātassa bi, visesena laṅkatīti vā bilaṅko.
anya-e0810n0:1276_5: Kummāso, abhisutaṃ, avantisomaṃ, kuñjalaṃ, kañjikaṃ, maṇḍo, jeṭṭhambu, khadikāpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1277: Dvayaṃ lavaṇamatte. Lū chedane, yu, ossā’navādese loṇaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1278_0: 461. Sāmuddādayo ete pañca lavaṇassa pabhedā visesā. Samuddabhūmiyamavaṭṭhitaṃ laddhaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1278_1: loṇodakaṃ sukkhasantanaṃ sitaṃ yaṃ bhavati, taṃ sāmuddalavaṇaṃ. Akkhivaṃ, vasirampi.
anya-e0810n0:1278_2: Vasu thambhe, iro. Sindhudese bhavo sindhavo, ṇo. Sitasivaṃ sītasivaṃ (sakkate),
anya-e0810n0:1278_3: māṇimanthaṃ, sindhujampi. Sitaṃ dhavalaṃ, sivaṃ kalyāṇaṃ, kammadhārayasamāso. Sitasivanti
anya-e0810n0:1278_4: vā bandhanaṃ. Maṇimantho pabbato, tatra bhavo, ṇo. Kāḷaloṇo nāma sovaccalavaṇānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1278_5: majjhe kāḷavaṇṇaṃ lavaṇaṃ tīṇi madhuralavaṇassalavaṇabhedassa (amarakosa, mahesvaraṭīkā),
anya-e0810n0:1278_6: “tilakaṃ tatra mecake”ti madaṃ sandate pisodarādi (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 19.43) madaṃ mudaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1278_7: vā sandate… visodarādi (byākhyāsudhāṭīkā) vuttattā tilakampi. Ubbhidaṃ nāma romakalavaṇaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1278_8: sambharidese kira rumā nāma lavaṇākaro. Tatra paviṭṭhaṃ kaṭṭhampi acirena vilīya
anya-e0810n0:1278_9: lavaṇaṃ bhavati, tabbhavaṃ romalavaṇaṃ. Vasukampi. Kaṭṭhādīnaṃ sayaṃ sabhāvavijahanakarattā
anya-e0810n0:1278_10: bhindituṃ sakkotīti ubbhidaṃ, sakyatthe usaddo. Bilālaṃ nāma samuddatīrāsannadesabhavaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1278_11: mattikaṃ pācayitvā nipphāditalavaṇaṃ. Samuddavelāsannadese jātaṃ bilālaṃ, essittaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1278_12: lo, atha vā ubbhidaṃ nāma yattha katthaci padese bhūmito uggataṃ lavaṇamattikaṃ pācayitvā
anya-e0810n0:1278_13: nipphāditalavaṇaṃ. Bilālaṃ nāma lavaṇabhūmiṃ vidārayitvā nipphāditalavaṇaṃ. Vipubbo
anya-e0810n0:1278_14: dala vidāraṇe. Dassa lo. Atha vā ubbhidaṃ nāma pākyaṃ lavaṇaṃ. Bilālaṃ nāma vaccagandhaṃ kāḷalavaṇaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1279_0: 462. Guḷādayo pañca ucchuno vikārā. Guḷa rakkhāyaṃ, guḷo pakkaraso. Phāṇa gatiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1279_1: to, phāṇitaṃ guḷato kiñci thaddhaṃ. Khaṇḍa manthe, khaṇḍo phāṇitatopi thaddho. Ucchuvisesassa
anya-e0810n0:1279_2: rasapāke khaṇḍayogyasārabhūte yā guḷikākārā jāyate, sā macchaṇḍī khaṇḍasālūkaṃ. “Macchaṇḍī
anya-e0810n0:1279_3: tu pupphaguḷā, thaddhapattantu phāṇita”nti rabhaso, khaṇḍakakkaṃ phāṇitamiccaññe.
anya-e0810n0:1279_4: Sara hiṃsāyaṃ, kharapaccayo, sakkharā, yā “sitā”tipi vuccati, sinoti bandhati taṇhaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1279_5: sitā. Sitasakkharetyatra tu sito dhavalattho, sakkharāpamāṇasaṇṭhānattā vā sakkharā.
anya-e0810n0:1279_6: Ime ca guḷādayo yathākkamaṃ thaddhatarā. Ettha ca macchaṇḍī phāṇitā khaṇḍavikārāpi.
anya-e0810n0:1279_7: Dvayaṃ guḷe. Rogādhikesu vināsakarattā visañca taṃ kaṇṭakañca.
anya-e0810n0:1280: 463. Dvayaṃ bhaṭṭhadhaññe. Lāja bhassane, bhassanaṃ bhajjanaṃ, a. Na khataṃ akkhataṃ. “Tatiyā pakati lājesvakkhataṃ tīsva’hiṃsite”ti ruddo.
anya-e0810n0:1281: Bhaṭṭhayave dhānāsaddo siyā, “bahumhi bhaṭṭhayave dhānā, thiyaṃ abhinavo’bbhide”ti rabhaso. Dhā dhāraṇe, yu.
anya-e0810n0:1282_0: Dvayaṃ yavādicuṇṇe. Saca samavāye, saca secane vā, tu. Mantha viloḷane. Tikaṃ samaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1282_1: Pūretīti pūpo, po. Akārayutte apūpo, yathā “lābu, alābū”ti. Taṇḍulādīnaṃ piṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1283_0: 464. Chakkaṃ sūde. Bhattaṃ, sūpañca karoti akāsi karissatīti bhattakāro, sūpakāro
anya-e0810n0:1283_1: ca. Su paggharaṇe. Savati rasaṃ paggharāpetīti sūdo, do, dīghādi. Sūda paggharaṇe
anya-e0810n0:1283_2: vā, a. Aḷāro nāma sūpādivikati, taṃ karotīti āḷāriko. Odanaṃ pacatīti odaniko. Rasaṃ karotīti rasako.
anya-e0810n0:1284: Dvayaṃ sūpe. Sukhatthāya pātabbattā sūpo, dīghādi. Visesato bhattaṃ añjati anto gacchati yena, taṃ byañjanaṃ, añja gatiyaṃ, yu.
anya-e0810n0:1285_0: 465. Pañcakaṃ tipādaṃ (ka.) bhatte. Udi savanakledanesu, yu. Vākāro odanasaddassa
anya-e0810n0:1285_1: napuṃsakattaṃ samuccinoti. Kura sadde, kara karaṇe vā, karoti balanti kuraṃ, assu,
anya-e0810n0:1285_2: kira vikkhipane vā, kirati bubhukkhanti kuraṃ, issu, kara hiṃsāyaṃ vā, ku sadde vā,
anya-e0810n0:1285_3: rapaccayo. Bhajati yena, bhuñjitabbanti vā bhattaṃ, bhaja sevāyaṃ, to. Bhakkhitabbāti
anya-e0810n0:1285_4: bhikkhā, bhakkha adane, assi, bhikkha yācane vā, bhikkhā nārī. Ada bhakkhane, to.
anya-e0810n0:1286_0: Catukkaṃ bhojane, asa bhakkhane, kamme yu. Hara haraṇe. Āharati balāyūnīti āhāro,
anya-e0810n0:1286_1: ṇo. Bhujadhātumhā yu, bhojanaṃ. Ghasa adane, ṇo. Andhopyatra, adadhātumhā tapaccayassa andhādeso nipātanā.
anya-e0810n0:1287_0: Dvayaṃ yāguyaṃ. Tara plavanataraṇesu. Tarati plavati byāpībhavatīti taraṇaṃ, yu.
anya-e0810n0:1287_1: Taralaṃ, taralāpi. Yā pāpuṇe, gu, yu missane vā, gu, ussā. Uṇhikā, sāṇā, vilepī ca
anya-e0810n0:1288_0: 466. Khajjādayo cattāro asanabhedā. Khāda bhakkhane, kamme to, bhujādi. Khajjaṃ maṃsādi.
anya-e0810n0:1288_1: Bhojjaṃ annādi. Liha assādane, ṇyo, hassa yo. Leyyaṃ madhvādi. Pātabbanti peyyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1288_2: pā pāne, ṇyo, āsse, peyyaṃ sūpādi.
anya-e0810n0:1289_0: Dvayaṃ bhattamaṇḍe. Su savane, visarujapadādito ṇa. Camu adane, āpubbattā pāne, kamme
anya-e0810n0:1289_1: ṇo. Māsaropyatra, masi parimāṇe, aro. Dvayaṃ ālope. Lupa chedane, āpubbo sampiṇḍane,
anya-e0810n0:1289_2: ku sadde. Kabi vaṇṇe vā, alo, ḷattaṃ, kena toyena balamassāti vā kabaḷo, pume, gāsopi.
anya-e0810n0:1290_0: 467. Rasānaṃ sabbarasānaṃ aggamhi rase maṇḍasaddo, maṇḍa bhūsāyaṃ, “sabbarasagge
anya-e0810n0:1290_1: maṇḍamanitthiya”ntyamarasīho amara 19.49. Dvayaṃ bhuttato sese. Virūpo, kucchito
anya-e0810n0:1290_2: vā ghāso vighāso. Bhuttato seso bhuttaseso, sova bhuttasesako, sakatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:1291: Dvayaṃ vighāsāde. Vighāsaṃ adatīti, a, damu damane, ṇvu. Dvayaṃ pipāsāyaṃ. Pātuṃ icchā pipāsā, pā pāne, so, dvittādi. Tasa pipāsāyaṃ, yu.
anya-e0810n0:1292_0: 468. Dvayaṃ bhuttumicchāyaṃ. Khuda bubhukkhāyaṃ, do. Ghasitumicchā jighacchā, ghasa
anya-e0810n0:1292_1: adane, icchatthe cho, dvittādi. Maṃsassa raso paṭicchādanīyamuccate. Chanda icchāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1292_2: Paṭicchādetīti paṭicchādanīyaṃ, anīyo, chada saṃvaraṇe vā, maṃsena paṭicchādetabbattā paṭicchādanīyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1293_0: Dvayaṃ uggāre, deki saddossāhesu, uddhaṃ dekati gantumussahatīti udreko, ekassa dakārassa
anya-e0810n0:1293_1: ro. Uddekopi. Gira niggiraṇe, issā, uggāro. Pādo tittiyaṃ. Suhito titto, tassa bhāvo
anya-e0810n0:1293_2: sohiccaṃ. Tipi pīṇane,ti, bhujādi. Yupaccaye, issatte ca tappanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1294_0: 469. Yathicchitantaṃ yathicchite. Kriyāvisesanatāya cete napuṃsake, kriyābyayānañhi
anya-e0810n0:1294_1: satipyekatte tabbisesanāni napuṃsake bhavanti ekattepi, tathā hi kriyānamabyayānañca
anya-e0810n0:1294_2: sattābhūtattā liṅgasaṅkhyāvisesopādānaṃ natthīti tabbisesanānampi sāmaññaliṅgā napuṃsakattaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1294_3: sāmaññasaṅkhyā cekattaṃ yuttanti, taṃ yathā – muduṃ pacanti, sāduṃ pacanti. Bahuvacanantepi
anya-e0810n0:1294_4: kriyāsadde tabbisesanassekattameva kriyāvisesanānaṃ kammani dutiyā, sabbo hi dhātvattho
anya-e0810n0:1294_5: karotyatthena byāpito, muduṃ pacanti muduṃ pacanaṃ kubbantītyattho, tena mudādīnañca
anya-e0810n0:1294_6: tabbisesanānaṃ kammattaṃ. Añño panāha “sabbe dhātvatthā bhavatyatthānugatā, bhavatikriyā
anya-e0810n0:1294_8: gacchati gamanaṃ bhavati, paṭhati pāṭho bhavatī”ti, tammatena paṭhamā, mudupacanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1294_9: yathā bhavati, tathā pacatītyattho. Ramaṇīyaṃ pāto, vimalaṃ pāto, idamupakumbhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1294_10: Kamu kantiyaṃ, kammani ṇo, kāmaṃ, nikāmañca. Isu icchāyaṃ, to, “sādisantapucche”tyādinā
anya-e0810n0:1294_11: antena saha tassa ṭṭho, iṭṭhaṃ. Paripubbo āpa pāpuṇane, to, bhujādi, rasso, yāgamo
anya-e0810n0:1294_12: ca. “Sattyaṃ nivāraṇe tittiyaṃ, pariyattaṃ yathicchite”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 19.57 rabhaso.
anya-e0810n0:1294_13: Icchitassa anatikkamo yathicchitaṃ, yathātthe abyayībhāvo. Pakāmaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1295_0: Dvipādaṃ vaṇijake. Kayavikkayehi jīvatīti, iko. Satthaṃ vāṇijjopajīvīnaṃ saṅghātaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1295_1: vahati desantaraṃ pāpayatīti, kammādimhi ṇo. Satthavāho vaṇijanāyako, taṃyogā satthavāho,
anya-e0810n0:1295_2: ṇo. Āpaṇo kayavikkayavohāro, taṃyogā āpaṇiko, ṇiko. Vaṇa sadde, ijo. Vedahako, negamo,
anya-e0810n0:1296_0: 470. Vikkayo nāma pubbameva attano dhanassa parassa dānaṃ. Kī dabbavinimaye, tatra
anya-e0810n0:1296_1: niyutto vikkayiko. Vikkiṇātīti vikketā, ritu. Kayo nāma parassa dhanaṃ gahetvā attano
anya-e0810n0:1296_2: dhanassa dānaṃ. Kayena jīvatīti kayiko. Kinātīti, ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:1297_0: Dvayaṃ dhanappayottari. Iṇe uttamo uttamaṇṇo, abhidhānā pubbanipāto, issattaṃ, dvittañca.
anya-e0810n0:1297_1: Dhanaṃ vuḍḍhatthaṃ payojetīti dhaniko. Dvayaṃ dhanagāhake. Iṇe adhamo adhamaṇṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1297_2: Iṇaṃ gaṇhātīti iṇāyiko, āyiko. Iṇaṃ āyati pavattetīti vā iṇāyako, ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:1298_0: 471-472. Dvayaṃ iṇe. Uddharīyate gayhateti uddhāro, upubbo dharati gahaṇe, ṇo. Eti
anya-e0810n0:1298_1: vuḍḍhiṃ gacchatīti iṇaṃ, yu, ṇattaṃ. Pariyudañcanampi, parito udañjhate gayhateti,
anya-e0810n0:1298_2: yu. Vuttanti kriyāpadaṃ. Yattakena dhanena lābho labbhate, tatra mūladhane mūlādidvayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1299_0: Dvayaṃ paṭipāde. “Avassamassidaṃ kayitabba”miti saccassākhyāpanaṃ, karaṇaṃ vā saccāpanaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1299_1: saccassa karañcittabharaṇamiccattho, saccasaddā dhāturūpā yu, majjhe apāgamo, saccassa
anya-e0810n0:1299_2: vā āpuṇanaṃ saccāpanaṃ, apadhātumhā yu. “Saccāpanā saccākati”riti tikaṇḍasese thīkaṇḍe
anya-e0810n0:1299_3: (?) vopālito. Saccaṃ karoti, saccassa vā karaṇaṃ saccakāro. Saccaṃkāropi. “Klive
anya-e0810n0:1299_4: saccāpanaṃ sacca-ṅkāro saccākatitthiya”ntyamarakose amara 19.82. Dvayaṃ vikkanīyadabbe.
anya-e0810n0:1299_5: Vikkinitabbanti vikkeyyaṃ, ṇyo. Paṇa byavahāre, ṇyo, dvepi tīsu.
anya-e0810n0:1300: Dvayaṃ nyāsassappane nyāsampanne (ka.). Nyāsassa appanaṃ sampannaṃ (ka.) paṭidānaṃ. Patipubbo dadāti nyāsasampannattho, tathā paripubbo vattati. Paridānaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1301: Dvayaṃ nyāse. Asu khepane. Nyassate nikkhipīyateti, ṇo. Upanidhiyyateti upanidhi, i, upanidhi pume. “Pume upanidhinyāso”ti amara 19.81 amarakose.
anya-e0810n0:1302_0: 473. Ekādayo aṭṭhārasapariyantā saṅkhyāsaddā saṅkhyeyye dabbe vattanti tīsu ca liṅgesu.
anya-e0810n0:1302_1: Saṅkhyeyyekatte ca “eko brāhmaṇo, aṭṭhārasa brāhmaṇā”ti samānādhikaraṇaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0810n0:1302_2: na tu bhinnādhikaraṇaṃ “brāhmaṇānaṃ ekādasa ce”ti. Tīsūtyanena “na kevalaṃ ekasaddova
anya-e0810n0:1302_3: saliṅgo, atha kho aṭṭhārasapariyantāpī”ti dasseti, tena katthaci tesaṃ aliṅgatāvacanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1302_4: liṅgavisesābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana sāmaññaliṅgābhāvanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā
anya-e0810n0:1302_5: nayena “atiliṅgaṃ dvivacanaṃ, tadākhyātanti vuccatī”tyādīsupi daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena “puriso
anya-e0810n0:1302_6: gacchati, itthī gacchati, cittaṃ gacchatī”tyādīsu gacchatisaddassa taṃtaṃliṅgavisesavacanatā,
anya-e0810n0:1302_7: “gacchatī”tyādīsu sāmaññaliṅgavacanatā ca daṭṭhabbā. Vīsatyādayo saṅkhyāsaddā saṅkhyāne,
anya-e0810n0:1302_8: saṅkhyeyye ca vattanti “vīsati gāvo, gavaṃ vīsatī”ti. Ekatteti yadā panetā saṅkhyeyye
anya-e0810n0:1302_9: ekattavisiṭṭhameva vaggattaṃ sabhāvato paṭipādayanti. Tadā bhinnasaṅkhyenāpi samānādhikaraṇe
anya-e0810n0:1302_10: ekavacaneyeva sabbakālaṃ vattate “vīsati gāvo”ti. Yadyekatte, kathaṃ? Dvevīsatiyo,
anya-e0810n0:1302_11: tisso vīsatiyo, pañcasatāniccādayo payogā iccāha “vaggabhede bahuttepī”ti. Vīsatyādīnaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1302_12: vaggānaṃ bhede vattumicchite sati bahuttepi bahuvacanepi bhavanti. Amarakose pana
anya-e0810n0:1302_14: amara 19.83-4 vuttaṃ, saṅkhyantaramiha vaggabhedo, tena dvinnampi vohāramattanānattaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1302_15: na atthanānattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ānavuti navutisaddamabhibyāpetvā tā vīsatyādayo bhinnaliṅgenāpi
anya-e0810n0:1302_16: samānādhikaraṇe nāriyaṃ itthiyaṃ, yathā vīsati kuṇḍāni. Vīsatyādayo vikatasamāhāradvandā.
anya-e0810n0:1302_17: Liṅgassa lokāsayattā dvandekattanti napuṃsakattanti vīsatyādayo abyuppannā paramatena,
anya-e0810n0:1303_0: 474-476. Satādīni asaṅkhyeyyapariyantāni catuvīsati ṭhānāni gaṇanabhedāni. Tattha
anya-e0810n0:1303_1: dasadasasaddehi nipphādito satasaddo, tathā satadasasaddehi sahassasaddo. Yuja yoge,
anya-e0810n0:1303_2: niyutaṃ, ayutampi. Yu missane vā, to. Lakkha dassanaṅkesu, lakkhaṃ, satasahassampi.
anya-e0810n0:1303_3: Kuṭa chedane, dasaguṇaṃ kuṭatīti koṭi. Upasaggena visesetvā eko gaṇanaviseso pakoṭīti
anya-e0810n0:1303_4: vuccati, dvepi missetvā eko koṭipakoṭīti. Naha bandhane, to. Āgamassu. Vida lābhe,
anya-e0810n0:1303_5: u, niggahītāgamo. Aba hiṃsāyaṃ, gatimhi ca, do, āgamassu. Ahi gatimhi, hapaccayo.
anya-e0810n0:1303_6: Ava rakkhaṇe, vo. Aṭa gamane, ṭo. Sogandhikanti kamalavisesanāmena eko gaṇanaviseso
anya-e0810n0:1303_7: vuccati, tathoppalādināmehi ekeko gaṇanaviseso. Katha vākyappabandhe, yu, saṅkhyātumasakkuṇeyyatāya asaṅkhyeyyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1304_0: Nanu saṅkhyātumasakkuṇeyyatte sati ekena bhavitabbaṃ, atha kathameko asaṅkhyeyyo,
anya-e0810n0:1304_1: dve asaṅkhyeyyāniccādīni bhedāni vuttānīti? Nāyaṃ doso, tesaṃ kāladesādivasena bhinnānampi
anya-e0810n0:1304_2: sambhavato. Etāsu saṅkhyāsu kamā kamena satādilakkhapariyantaṃ dasaguṇaṃ dasahi guṇitaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1304_3: bhavati. Koṭyādikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyapariyantaṃ satalakkhaguṇaṃ satalakkhehi guṇitaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0810n0:1304_4: tasmā ekā lekhā dvisuññasahitā sataṃ bhavati, tathā tisuññasahitā sahassaṃ, catusuññasahitā
anya-e0810n0:1304_5: niyutaṃ, pañcasuññasahitā ekā lekhā lakkhaṃ bhavati, ekā pana lekhā sattasuññasahitā
anya-e0810n0:1304_6: koṭi, tathā cuddasasuññasahitā pakoṭi, iminā nayena yāvāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ netabbaṃ, ayamekaccānamācariyānaṃ mati.
anya-e0810n0:1305_0: Atha vā satādayo asaṅkhyeyyapariyantā sabbepi dasaguṇitā kātabbā, ayaṃ kaccāyanassa
anya-e0810n0:1305_1: mati, tena hi “yāva taduttari dasaguṇitañce”ti suttamāha. Atha vā satādayo lakkhantā
anya-e0810n0:1305_2: dasadasaguṇitā, tena ekā lekhā dvibindusahitā sataṃ bhavati, tathā catupañcādibindusahitā
anya-e0810n0:1305_3: sahassādikaṃ bhavati, ekā lekhā pana dvādasabindusahitā koṭi, tathā ekūnavīsatibindusahitā
anya-e0810n0:1305_4: pakoṭīti yāva asaṅkhyeyyā ekekasmiṃ satta satta bindūni katvā gaṇanā kātabbā, tasmā
anya-e0810n0:1305_5: asaṅkhyeyyagaṇanavisese pañcacattālīsādhikāni satabindūni bhavanti, ayamamhākaṃ mati.
anya-e0810n0:1306_0: Amarakose amara 19.84 pana “pantyā satasahassādi, kamā dasaguṇottara”mityuttaṃ, tassattho
anya-e0810n0:1306_1: – dasasaṅkhyā pantītyuccate, tato ārabbha dasaguṇottaraṃ satasahassādikaṃ kamā viññeyyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1306_2: taṃ yathā – dasasaṅkhyāya dasaguṇottaraṃ sataṃ, satā dasaguṇottaraṃ sahassaṃ, sahassā
anya-e0810n0:1306_3: dasaguṇottaraṃ ayutaṃ, ayutā dasaguṇottaraṃ lakkhaṃ, lakkhā dasaguṇottaraṃ payutaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1306_4: payutā dasaguṇottaraṃ koṭi, evaṃ koṭiyā abbudaṃ, abbudā padumaṃ, padumā khabbo, khabbā
anya-e0810n0:1306_5: mahākatho, tatopi mahāpadumaṃ, tatopi saṅku, saṅkuto samuddo, tato antyaṃ, antyā
anya-e0810n0:1306_6: majjhaṃ, majjhā paraddhaṃ, paraddhā amataṃ, amatā dasaguṇottaraṃ saṅkhyaṃ, saṅkhyañca
anya-e0810n0:1306_7: vīsatimaṃ ṭhānaṃ, asaṅkhyeyyamito paranti. Sabbapārisadattā hi byākaraṇassa sabbesaṃpyatra vādā dassitā.
anya-e0810n0:1307_0: 477-478. Sādhikena dvepādena “aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo,
anya-e0810n0:1307_1: aḍḍhateyyo cā”ti imaṃ vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Aḍḍhūpapadena saha catutthādisaddānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1307_2: aḍḍhuḍḍhādyādeso. Sādhikapādena “aḍḍhena dutiyo diyaḍḍho, divaḍḍho cā”ti imaṃ vacanatthaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1307_3: dasseti. Antaritassāpi aḍḍhenasaddassa idhānuvattanatā adhippetā abhidhānantarābhāvā, sabbatrevaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1308_0: 479-480. Mīyate paricchindīyate yena, taṃ mānaṃ. Tañca tulāpatthaṅgulivasā tidhā
anya-e0810n0:1308_1: māniyadabbassa bhavati. Tula ummāne, curādi, tulā itthī. Pada gatiyaṃ, tho. Aṅga
anya-e0810n0:1309_0: Cattāro vīhayo sampiṇḍitā ekāva guñjā samagarukā, tathā dve guñjā ekova māsako samagarukoti
anya-e0810n0:1309_1: sabbatra nayo netabbo. Dve māsakā akkho nāma, vibhīṭakoti vutto, akkhaphalasamānagarukattā
anya-e0810n0:1309_2: vā akkho. Karisopyatra, kasa vilekhane, a, rimajjho, anitthī. Akkhānaṃ pañca dharaṇaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1309_3: nāma, dharatidhātuyā yu. Akkhānamaṭṭhakaṃ suvaṇṇo nāma. Pañcadharaṇaṃ nikkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0810n0:1309_4: Te nikkhā pañca pādo nāma. So pādo catutthe bhāge vattatītyekaccānaṃ mati. Yathāvuttāyeva
anya-e0810n0:1309_5: cattāro vīhayo guñjā nāma. Dve guñjā māsako nāma. Dve pañcamāsakā dasamāsakā akkho
anya-e0810n0:1309_6: nāma. Akkhānaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ dharaṇaṃ nāma. Pañcadharaṇaṃ suvaṇṇo nāma. Te pañcasuvaṇṇā
anya-e0810n0:1309_7: nikkhaṃ nāmātyamhākaṃ mati. Kana dittigatikantīsu, nipubbo, nassa kho, nikkho, suvaṇṇavikārepi.
anya-e0810n0:1309_8: Yassa kassaci vatthuno catutthe bhāge pādo. Dasa dharaṇāni palaṃ nāma, pala pathe ca gatimhi.
anya-e0810n0:1310: 481. Yassa kassaci vatthuno palasataṃ tulā. Tula ummāne, tulā nārī.
anya-e0810n0:1313: Tā tulā vīsati bhāro nāma. Bhara dhāraṇaposanesu, ṇo. “Bhāro tu dvisahassesu, palānamapi vivadhe”tyajayo byākhyāsudhāṭīkāyampi. Vivadho bhārabhedo.
anya-e0810n0:1314_0: Rūpiyassa karisena kato saṃvohārapadattho kahāpaṇo nāma. Karisappamāṇena rūpiyena
anya-e0810n0:1314_1: kato paṇo paṇiyo dabbabhedo kahāpaṇo. Risassa hādeso. Ahādese karisāpaṇo, ete dve
anya-e0810n0:1315_0: 482. Patthamānaṃ dassetumāha “kuḍuvo”ccādi. Eko pasato kuḍuvo nāma. Sara gatiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1315_1: to, ralopo, kaḍi bhede, vo, kaḍissa kuḍu, te kuḍuvā cattāro pattho. Catupatthā āḷhako,
anya-e0810n0:1315_2: aha pūjāyaṃ, ṇvu, ḷattādi dasaṅgulaṃ, dvādasaṅgulaṃ vāsabbato mānampi āḷhako. Caturo
anya-e0810n0:1315_3: āḷhakā doṇaṃ nāma, “caturāḷhaka”ntipi pāṭho, du gamane, ṇo, duṇa gatiyaṃ, hiṃsāyañca
anya-e0810n0:1316_0: 483. Caturo doṇā mānikā, māna pūjāyaṃ, sakatthe ko, assi. Catumānikaṃ catassannaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1316_1: mānikānaṃ samūho catumānikaṃ khārī nāma, khara vināse, ṇo, nadādi. Dasambaṇaṃ dasādhikasatadoṇamattaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1316_2: kumbhoti ghaṭanāmena eko patthamānaviseso dassito, “ambaṇa”ntipi pāṭho.
anya-e0810n0:1317_1: a. Dvayaṃ patthe. Patthasaddoyaṃ sāmaññabhedamānesu pavattati, idha pana visesamānavācako
anya-e0810n0:1318: Dvayaṃ vāhe. Vahatīti vāho, vaha pāpuṇane, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1319: Ambaṇamānaṃ, pariyāyaṃ vā dassetumāha “ekādasa doṇe”ccādi. Amba gamane, yu, amba sadde vā, iti patthamānaṃ vuttaṃ, aṅgulamānaṃ pana aṇvādyābhidhānāvasare bhūmivagge abhihitaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1320_0: 485. Catukkaṃ bhāge. Visa pavesane, dīghādi, koṭṭhaṃ vuccati sarīraṃ, tattha setīti
anya-e0810n0:1320_1: koṭṭhāso. Āttaṃ. Ana pāṇane, ama gamane vā, so. Bhajīyate sevīyateti bhāgo. Ṇo. Vaṇṭakopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1320_2: Vaṭi vibhājane, ṇvu, ṇantā vā sakatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:1321_0: Vibhavantaṃ dhane. Dhana dhaññe, a. Sassa attano ayaṃ so, sampi. Duiva dabbaṃ, sāramiccattho,
anya-e0810n0:1321_1: ivatthe vo, vida lābhe, to. Sassa dhanassa pati sapati, tasmiṃ sādhu sāpateyyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1321_2: ṇeyyo. Vasa nivāse, u. Ara gamane, tho. Rassa to. Vibhavanti pabhavantyanenāti vibhavo,
anya-e0810n0:1322_0: 486. Katākataṃ kañcanaṃ, rūpiyañca missitaṃ militaṃ (ka.), militaṃ paccekañca (amara
anya-e0810n0:1322_1: khīrasvādhīṭīkā) kosādidvayavāccaṃ, tatra piṇḍīkataṃ ābharaṇīkataṃ, kammībhāvamāpāditaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1322_2: vā kataṃ. Ākarotthaṃ ajātakammaṃ cuṇṇādirūpaṃ akataṃ, tadaññaṃ tehi kañcanarūpiyehi
anya-e0810n0:1322_3: aññaṃ tejasaṃ dabbaṃ tambaṃ. Ādinā kaṃsarītisīsakādi, yañcātejasaṃ rājapaṭṭadāruvisādika’masāraṃ
anya-e0810n0:1322_4: dabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ kuppaṃ, gupa rakkhaṇe, guppateti, po, kattañca gassa.
anya-e0810n0:1323: Dvayaṃ kañcanaṃ rūpiyañcāhatamuṭṭhāpitahayavarāhapurisādi rūpaṃ nigghātikāya tāḷitaṃ dīnārādikaṃ rūpiyākhyaṃ. Assādirūpamassāhatamatthīti rūpiyaṃ. Rūpa āhatapasaṃsāsu, iyo.
anya-e0810n0:1324_0: 487-488. Hiraññantaṃ suvaṇṇe. Sobhano vaṇṇo yassa suvaṇṇaṃ. Kana dittiyaṃ, ṇvu, jananaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1324_1: jātaṃ, pakaṭṭhaṃ jātaṃ jātarūpaṃ, pakaṭṭhatthe rūpapaccayo pasaṃsāyaṃ rūpapaccayo
anya-e0810n0:1324_2: iti subhū (cintāmaṇiṭīkā) pasaṃsāyaṃ rūpaṃ (pāṇini 5.3.66). Jātaṃ rūpamassāti vā
anya-e0810n0:1324_3: jātarūpaṃ. Iṇa gatiyaṃ, dittiyañca anekatthattā. Suṭṭhu dippate dittiyā yujjateti
anya-e0810n0:1324_4: soṇṇaṃ, usso, “vā paro asarūpā”ti ilopo, dvittaṃ. Kañca dittiyaṃ, yu. Satthu vaṇṇo
anya-e0810n0:1324_5: viya vaṇṇo yassa. Cittamattānaṃ haratīti hari. I, kamu icchāyaṃ, bu. Carati ettha
anya-e0810n0:1324_6: cittaṃ cāru, ṇu. Hi gatiyaṃ, mo. Haṭa dittiyaṃ, ṇvu. Tapanaṃ dāhamarahatīti tapaniyo,
anya-e0810n0:1324_7: iyo. Hara haraṇe, añño, assi. Hā cāge, hā gatiyaṃ vā, añño, hirādeso ca.
anya-e0810n0:1325_0: Cāmīkarādayo cattāro tabbhedā tassa suvaṇṇassa visesā. Cāmī nāma ekā pupphajāti,
anya-e0810n0:1325_1: taṃkarattā cāmīkaro, atha vā cāmī nāma aggi. Camu adane, ṇī, takkarattā cāmīkaro.
anya-e0810n0:1325_3: mahājambuyā patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne nadī jambunadī, tassaṃ patitehi mahāgajappamāṇānaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1325_4: kumbhappamāṇānaṃ vā phalānaṃ bījehi jātaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ jambunadaṃ, idaṃ pana suvaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1325_5: analappabhaṃ devālaṅkāramatulaṃ jāyate. Taṃ panānalamiti visesatthepi amarasīho suvaṇṇasāmaññeva
anya-e0810n0:1325_6: paṭhati. Siṅgī nāma ekā macchajāti, tabbaṇṇatāya. Khaṇiyaṃ vā taṃsaṇṭhānasilākhaṇḍehi
anya-e0810n0:1325_7: jātatāya siṅgī, amarakose pana cāmīkarādīnipi suvaṇṇasāmaññe paṭhati, siṅgī pana
anya-e0810n0:1325_8: visese. Vuttañhi tattha “alaṅkārasuvaṇṇaṃ yaṃ, siṅgīkanakamiccaya”nti amara 19.96.
anya-e0810n0:1326_0: 489. Pañcakaṃ rajate. Rūpayuttatāya rūpiyaṃ. Rañja rāge, ato. Sañja saṅge, jhu, ñalopo,
anya-e0810n0:1326_1: sajjhu. Rūpayuttatāya rūpī, sañja saṅge, jho, ñalopo, sajjhaṃ, “rūpiyajjha”ntipi
anya-e0810n0:1326_2: pāṭho. Tadā iyajjhapaccayena siddhaṃ. Dubbaṇṇaṃ, khajjūraṃ, setampi.
anya-e0810n0:1329: Setā ca bhatikāyaṃ tha, klivaṃ sajjhe site tisu.
anya-e0810n0:1330_0: Asmajātiyaṃ puppharāgādimhi, muttāvajirādimhi ca vasvādittayaṃ. Vasa nivāse, u. Ratiṃ
anya-e0810n0:1330_1: tanotīti ratanaṃ, kammādimhi ṇo, tilopo. “Ratnaṃ sajātiseṭṭhepī”tyamarakose amara
anya-e0810n0:1330_2: 23.126, tena gajaseṭṭho gajaratanaṃ, itthiseṭṭho itthiratananti. Manasaddato i, īpaccaye
anya-e0810n0:1330_3: maṇī ca. Puppharāgādayo vakkhamānā tabbhidā tassa maṇino visesā. Bhāsanto rañjetīti
anya-e0810n0:1331: 490. Suvaṇṇādayo ime satta ratanānyāhu. Maṇi rattamaṇi.
anya-e0810n0:1332_1: rattamaṇiyaṃ. Lohitavaṇṇena aṅgīyateti lohitaṅgo, lohitaṃ aṅgaṃ sarīrametassa vā
anya-e0810n0:1332_2: lohitaṅgo. Padumañcātra kokanadaṃ, tabbaṇṇasadiso maṇi padumarāgo. Soṇaratanaṃ, lohitakopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1333_0: Dvayaṃ veḷuriye. Vaṃso tacasāro, tabbaṇṇo maṇi vaṃsavaṇṇo. Veḷu viya dissatīti veḷuriyo,
anya-e0810n0:1333_1: ivatthe iyo, rāgamo ca. Dvayaṃ pavāḷe. Vala saṃvaraṇe, ṇo, ḷattaṃ, vākārena pavāḷopi.
anya-e0810n0:1333_2: Du gamane, du upatāpe vā, mo, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1334_0: 492. Dvayaṃ kabaramaṇimhi. Masāragirimhi jātaṃ masāragallaṃ, lo, rassa lo. Kabaro
anya-e0810n0:1334_1: sabalo maṇi. Dvayaṃ muttāyaṃ. Muca mocane, tho, muttā eva muttikaṃ, sakatthe iko.
anya-e0810n0:1334_2: Satthikā pakatito liṅgavacanānyativattanteti napuṃsakattaṃ. Ettha ca ratanapariyāyānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1334_3: uppaṭipāṭiyā kathanaṃ sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ uppattikkamapaṇītakkamādino abhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1335_0: Dvayaṃ pittale. Rī gamane, ri. Rītipi. “Rīti pacāre sande ca, lohakiṭṭārakūṭesū”ti
anya-e0810n0:1335_1: ruddo. Ārasseva kūṭo, yassa. Dabbasaddopyatra. Dvayaṃ abbhake. Ama gamane, alo. Abbhaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1335_2: ākāso, megho ca, taṃsaññakattā abbhakaṃ, saññāyaṃ ko. “Meghambarābhidhānañca, gori
anya-e0810n0:1335_3: bījañca abbhaka”nti hi vuttaṃ. Girijatu, silājatupyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1336_0: 493. Tikaṃ lohe. Lū chedane, ho. Aya gamane, manogaṇādi. Kāḷañca taṃ ayasañceti kāḷāyasaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1336_1: Satthakaṃ, tikkhaṇaṃ, piṇḍaṃ, ayasaṃ, asmasāropyatra. “Satthamāyudhalohesū”ti anekattho.
anya-e0810n0:1336_2: “Sāmuddalavaṇetikkhaṃ, visalohājimukkake”ti rabhaso. Paṇḍa gamane, a. Asmassa sāro.
anya-e0810n0:1337: Dvayaṃ capale. Pāra sāmatthiye, do, pārayati sakkoti sabbalohaṃ kañcanaṃ kātunti pārado. Rasa sadde, aggimhi pakkhitte rasatīti raso, madhurādīsu ca raso. Capalo, sūtopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1344_0: Tikaṃ nāge. Tipu pīḷane, u. Tipusaddassa setepi pavattanato kāḷasaddena visesetvā
anya-e0810n0:1344_1: kāḷatipūti vutto, tena tipusaddassadvinnampi vācakatādaṭṭhabbātyeke, taṃ “nāgo sīsakayogiṭṭha-vappāṇi
anya-e0810n0:1344_2: tipu piccaṭa”nti amara 19.105 amarakose, “tipu sīsakaraṅgesū”ti ca tikaṇḍasesa nānatthasaṅgahādīsu
anya-e0810n0:1344_3: vuttattā na gahetabbaṃ, tena kāḷo ca tipu cāti dveyevatthābhidhānāni. Kāḷavaṇṇatāya
anya-e0810n0:1344_4: kāḷo. Tipu yathāvuttatthova. Tapa santāpe vā, u, assittaṃ. Sī saye, si bandhane vā,
anya-e0810n0:1344_5: so. “Seṭṭhabhakaddujo nāgo, klivaṃ sīsakaraṅgesū”ti rabhaso. “Yogiṭṭha”mityekaṃ nāmaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1354_0: Dvayaṃ haritāle. Haritavaṇṇaṃ alaṃ haritālaṃ, byuppattimattametaṃ. Rūḷhīsaddo tvayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1354_1: Pītiṃ netīti pītanaṃ. “Piñjaraṃ pītanaṃ tāla-mālañca haritālake”tyamarasīho amara
anya-e0810n0:1354_2: 19.103. Piñja vaṇṇe, aro. Ala bhūsane, alantyaneneti, ṇo, “haritālamalaṃ tāla-vaṇṇakaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1354_3: naṭabhūsana”nti tu mādhavo. “Haritāle tu kappūraṃ, godanto naṭasaññako”ti tikaṇḍaseso tikaṇḍasesa 2.9.35.
anya-e0810n0:1355_0: 494. Dvayaṃ sindūre. Piṭṭhena nāgena jātaṃ piṭṭhaṃ. Cīnadesappavattaṃ piṭṭhaṃ cīnapiṭṭhanti
anya-e0810n0:1355_1: pubbapade uttarapadalopo. Sanda savane, ūro, assi. “Sindūraṃ nāgasambhava”ntyamarasīho
anya-e0810n0:1355_2: amara 19.105. Vasantassavo, rattacuṇṇaṃ, rattavālukaṃpyatra. Dvayaṃ tūle. Tula nikase,
anya-e0810n0:1355_3: a. Picu maddane, u. Picu tuloti samuditañcassa nāmaṃ. “Tūlo picu picutūlo, makkaṭisuttaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1356_0: Madhusaddena khuddajantu, khuddañcoccate. Khuddajantavo bhamarādayo. Tatra bhamarakataṃ
anya-e0810n0:1356_1: khuddaṃ bhāmaraṃ, makkhikākataṃ makkhikaṃ, saraghañcoccate. Varaṭā kataṃ vāraṭaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1356_2: Puttikā kataṃ puttikanti sabbatraññatthe ṇo. Madhu unde, u. Khu sadde, do, khuda pipāsāyaṃ vā, do.
anya-e0810n0:1357_0: Dvayaṃ sitthe. Madhūhi khuddajantūhi ucchiṭṭhaṃ sajjitanti madhucchiṭṭhaṃ. Sajja
anya-e0810n0:1357_1: visajjanāliṅgananimmānesu. Nimmānaṃ sampiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ, to, jatānaṃ ṭhādeso, sassa cho,
anya-e0810n0:1357_2: dvittaṃ, ittañca. Sica paggharaṇe, tho. Sitthameva sitthakaṃ. Madanopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:1358_0: 495. Tikaṃ gopāle. Gāvo pāleti, pāti cāti gopālo, gopo ca, kammani ṇo. Gāvo saṅkhyāyatīti
anya-e0810n0:1358_1: gosaṅkhyo, saṃpubbo khyā gaṇane. Goduho, ābhiro, vallavopyatra. Dvayaṃ gomike. Gāvo
anya-e0810n0:1358_2: assa santīti gomā, mantu. Ikapaccaye, māgame ca gomiko.
anya-e0810n0:1359: Dvipādaṃ balībadde. Usa dāhe, abho. Balaṃ vaddhayatīti balībaddo, nipātanā. Gacchatīti goṇo, yu, malopo, asso, ṇattaṃ. Gacchatīti go, gamu gamane, ro.
anya-e0810n0:1360: “Sagge kare ca vajire, balībadde ca go pumā;
anya-e0810n0:1362_0: Ruddo. Vasa nivāse, abho. Vassatīti vuso, vassa secane, ṇo, assu, saṃyogalopo ca.
anya-e0810n0:1362_1: Ukkho, bhaddo, anavāho, sorabheyyopyatra. Ukkha secane. Anaṃ sakaṭaṃ vahatīti anavāho,
anya-e0810n0:1362_2: ṇo. Surabhi go, tassāpaccaṃ sorabheyyo, ṇeyyo.
anya-e0810n0:1363_0: 496. So go vuddho jaraggavo nāma. Jaraṃ patto go jaraggavo, simhi ossa avo. Dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1363_2: vacchataro”ti nāmamālā. Damanāraho dammo, mo. Vasa nivāse, cho, vacchassāyeva gāviyā
anya-e0810n0:1363_3: tanutthe nipātanā taro pāṇini 5.3.91 suttaṃ passitabbaṃ. Samāti ete dve tulyatthā.
anya-e0810n0:1364: Dvayaṃ dhuravāhe. Dhuraṃ vahati sīlenāti dhuravāhī, ṇī. Dhuraṃ vahitumarahatīti dhorayho, ṇo, vassa yo.
anya-e0810n0:1365: Gavaṃ gunnaṃ adhikato jano govindo, gavaṃ indo govindo, gavaṃ vindatīti vā govindo.
anya-e0810n0:1366_0: 497. Vahatyanena vaho, a. Kuka ādāne, udo, ussattaṃ, dassa dho vā, kakudo, kakudho
anya-e0810n0:1366_1: ca. Dvayaṃ siṅge. Visa pavesane, yu. Sī saye, go, niggahītāgamo, rassattañca. Lohitavaṇṇatāya
anya-e0810n0:1367_0: 498. Tikaṃ gāvīsāmaññe. Pumepi gāvī, tadā yossa ī. Siṅgayuttatāya siṅginī, taddhitantā
