anya-e0810n0:1698_0: Tikaṃ biḷāre. Bila bhedane, aro, ḷattaṃ. Babba gatiyaṃ, u. Maja suddhiyaṃ, āro, niggahītāgamo.
anya-e0810n0:1698_1: Otu, ākhubhujopi. Dvayaṃ koke, ayaṃ kukkurappamāṇo kapilo hariṇo. Kuka, vaka ādāne.
anya-e0810n0:1698_2: Īhāmigopi, mige īhati kaṅkhatīti, kammani ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1699_0: 616. Dvayaṃ mahiṃse. Mahiyaṃ setīti mahiṃso, rasso, niggahītāgamo ca. Lala icchāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1699_1: udakaṃ lalatīti lulāyo, nipātanā, ayo, assu ca. Go viya vajati jāyatīti gavajo. Go
anya-e0810n0:1699_2: viya ayatīti gavayo, samā dve tulyatthā.
anya-e0810n0:1700_0: Dvayaṃ salle. Salla āsugatiyaṃ, a, sallo, sakatthe ko, sallako attano sarīrajātena
anya-e0810n0:1700_1: sallena sunakhaṃ salati hiṃsatīti vā sallo, sallako ca, ayaṃ sūkarasaṇṭhāno, salākāpāyo
anya-e0810n0:1700_2: ca. Assa sallassa lomamhi salalaṃ, salañca bhave. Pala, sala, patha gatiyaṃ, alo,
anya-e0810n0:1700_3: nadāditte salalī, thittābhāve salalaṃ, amhi salaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1701_0: 617. Pañcakaṃ mige, harantyanena hariṇo, hara haraṇe yu. Ṇattamittañca. Mara pāṇacāge,
anya-e0810n0:1701_1: a, rassa go, ittañca. Sena sunakhena raṅgati gacchati palāyatīti sāraṅgo. Dīghādi,
anya-e0810n0:1701_2: mago, migo ca ete dve migamattepi. Ajinassopayujjamānassa yoni, tena bhūtassājinassuppattikāraṇattā
anya-e0810n0:1701_3: vā ajinayoni. Ayampi migamattepi. Kuraṅgo, vātāyupi. Kuyaṃ pathaviyaṃ raṅgatīti kuraṅgo.
anya-e0810n0:1702: Dvayaṃ sūkare. Sundaraṃ phalaṃ karotīti sūkaro. Vuttañca dabbaguṇe –
anya-e0810n0:1704: Vārāhaṃ pisitaṃ bālyaṃ, rocanaṃ sedanaṃ garū”ti dabbaguṇasaṅgaha 2.11-2.
anya-e0810n0:1705_0: Sukhaṃ karotīti vā sūkaro. Sundaro karo yassa vā sūkaro. Vare āhantīti varāho, vare
anya-e0810n0:1705_1: sati āhantabboti vā varāho, kolo, thaddhalomo, bhūdāropi. Dvayaṃ sase. Pela gatiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1706_0: 618. Dvayaṃ eṇīmige. Eṇiyā migiyā, eṇassa vā apaccaṃ eṇeyyo, ayaṃ cammādīsupi “eṇassa,
anya-e0810n0:1706_1: eṇiyā vā cammādiko eṇeyyo”ti vacanatthaṃ katvā. Eṇiyā itthiyā putto migo eṇīmigo,
anya-e0810n0:1706_2: i gatiyaṃ, yu, nadādi, anadāditte eṇo, evametepyuppāditā. Dvayaṃ pampaṭake. Paṭa
anya-e0810n0:1706_3: gamane, ṇvu, upasaggante bindāgamo ca. Pabba gatiyaṃ, ṇvu, bindāgamo, balopo ca.
anya-e0810n0:1707: Dvayaṃ vātamige. Gamanena vātasamo migo vātamigo. Calatismā yu, nadādi. Tikaṃ mūsike. Musa theyye, ṇvu, ittañca. Āpubbo khanu avadāraṇe, u, nalopo. Unda pasavanakledanesu, ūro.
anya-e0810n0:1708_0: 619. Camarādayo, sarabhādayo ca migantarā migavisesā. Camaro uttarāpathe khyāto,
anya-e0810n0:1708_1: yassa pucchaṃ cāmaraṃ, camu adane, aro, camaro, thiyaṃ camarī. Pasado cittalomī,
anya-e0810n0:1708_2: pasa bandhane, ado. Kuyaṃ raṅgatīti kuruṅgo, assu, uttābhāve kuraṅgo. Sabbesampi
anya-e0810n0:1708_3: migānaṃ mātuṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti migamātukā, upamāne ko. Ru sadde, ru. Ruṇaṃ karotīti
anya-e0810n0:1708_4: raṅku, u, ṇassa lopo rakārassa, ussa ca. Attānaṃ nīcaṃ karotīti nīko. Saratismā abho,
anya-e0810n0:1708_5: sarabho. Aṭṭhāpado uddhaṃnayano sīhassāpi hantā, tassa ca pādacatukkaṃ uddhaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0810n0:1709_0: 620. Piyakādayo tayo, ādinā kandalīcīnasamūruādayo ca cammayonayo, tena bhūtassa
anya-e0810n0:1709_1: cammassa uppattikāraṇattā, ete ca citratanuruhādayo kambojādimhi, uttarāpathe ca
anya-e0810n0:1709_2: jāyanti, tatreva sanāmakhyātā. Yathā migasaddo vanyapasusāmaññe, visese ca kuraṅgākhye
anya-e0810n0:1709_3: vattati, yathā ca lohasaddo suvaṇṇādike tejasasāmaññe, visese ca, tathā cammayoniajinayonisaddāpi
anya-e0810n0:1710: Pī tappanakantīsu, ṇvu, iyādeso. Ūrumhi atisayacammayuttatāya camūru, ekassa massa lopo. Kadi avhāne, alo, ī, kadalī ca so migo ceti kadalīmigo.
anya-e0810n0:1711: Sīhādayo yathāvuttā, avuttā ca sabbe catuppadā sattā “migā, pasavo”ti coccante. Pasavantīti pasavo, su abhisave, pasa bandhane vā, u.
anya-e0810n0:1712_0: 621. Catukkaṃ lūtāyaṃ. Lū chedane, to, lūtā, sakatthe iko, lūtikā, dve nāriyaṃ. Uṇṇāpāyo
anya-e0810n0:1712_1: tantu uṇṇā, sā nābhiyaṃ assa uṇṇanābhi, rasso. Makkaṭo viya sākhāyaṃ attano tantumhi
anya-e0810n0:1713_0: Dvayaṃ gomayajavicchike. Viccha gamane, ṇvu, vicchiko, satapadiyampi, āḷaṃ vicchikanaṅgulaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1713_1: taṃyogā āḷi. Dvayaṃ gharagodhāyaṃ. Saratismā ū, avo canto. Gharaṃ nissitā godhā gharagoḷikā,
anya-e0810n0:1714: 622. Dvayaṃ godhāyaṃ. Gudha rose, a, godhā, nārī. Kuṇḍa dāhe, a, kuṇḍo. Dvayaṃ rattapāyaṃ. Kaṇṇassa jalūkā rattapā kaṇṇajalūkā. Sataṃ padā yassā satapadī, padasaddo pādattho.
anya-e0810n0:1715_0: Dvayaṃ kalandake. Kanda avhāne, rodane ca, kandatīti kalandako, lamajjho, ṇvu. Kāḷavaṇṇatāya
anya-e0810n0:1715_1: kāḷakā, nāriyaṃ. Dvayaṃ nakule, natthi kulaṃ etassa sappesu nakulo, arisappopi. Nakka
anya-e0810n0:1715_2: nāsane vā, ulo, kalopo, sappe nāsetīti nakulo. Maṅga gatyattho daṇḍako dhātu, uso.
anya-e0810n0:1716: 623. Dvayaṃ kakaṇṭake. Kucchito kaṇṭako assa, ussattaṃ. Sarati dhāvatīti saraṭo, aṭo.
anya-e0810n0:1717: Catukkaṃ kīṭe. Kīṭa bandhane, a, kīṭa gamane vā, dīghādi. Pula mahatthe, avo, ḷattaṃ. Kucchitaṃ amati gacchatīti kimi, i, assittaṃ. Pakārena anatīti pāṇako, ṇvu, ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1718: Dvayaṃ kaṇṭalomakīṭe. Uccaṃ ṭhānaṃ āliṅgatīti uccāliṅgo. Bahulomayutto pāṇako lomasapāṇako.
anya-e0810n0:1719_0: 624-625. Sāddhapajjena sakuṇassa nāmāni. Vihe ākāse gacchatīti vihaṅgo, vihaṅgamo
anya-e0810n0:1719_1: ca, ākāsapariyāyo cettha vihasaddo, vehāsassa vā vihādeso. Pakkhayuttatāya pakkhī.
anya-e0810n0:1719_2: Khena, khasmiṃ vā gacchatīti khago. Aṇḍato jāto. Sakkoti uddhaṃ gantunti sakuṇo,
anya-e0810n0:1719_3: sakunto, sakuṇī ca, saka sattiyaṃ, uṇo, unto, uṇī ca. Patanto ḍento, pattena vā gacchatīti
anya-e0810n0:1719_4: pataṅgo, aparatra talopo. Mātukucchito, aṇḍato cāti dvikkhattuṃ jāyatīti dvijo. Uḍḍanādīsu
anya-e0810n0:1719_5: vakkaṃ kuṭilaṃ aṅgaṃ gīvādikaṃ etassa, vakkena gamanena aṅgatīti vā vakkaṅgo. Pattena
anya-e0810n0:1719_6: yāti, taṃ vā yānaṃ etassa. Patati patanto viya ākāsato hotīti patanto. Nīḷe kulāvake jāyatīti nīḷajo.
anya-e0810n0:1720_0: Vaṭṭakādayo, pokkharasātakādayo ca tabbhedā tesaṃ sakuṇānaṃ visesā. Vaṭṭa vaṭṭane,
anya-e0810n0:1720_1: ṇvu, vaṭṭakā nārī. Mayūrappamāṇo tadākaticittapakkho jīvañjīvo dakkhiṇapathādīsu
anya-e0810n0:1720_2: jāyate, “jīvajīvā”ti saddaṃ karotīti jīvañjīvo. “Jīvajīvo”ti nirānunāsikāpi. Candikāyuttarattippiyo
anya-e0810n0:1720_3: pakkhī cakoro, caka paritakkane, uro, usso, caṅkoropi. Taratismā iro, dvittamittañca, tittiro.
anya-e0810n0:1721_0: 626. Sala gatiyaṃ, ṇiko, ḷattaṃ, sāḷikā, nārī. Kalaṃ ravatīti karavīko, īko, lalopo.
anya-e0810n0:1721_1: Karavīko, yassa saro bhagavato sarena upamīyate, so vuccati “karavīko”ti. Javena
anya-e0810n0:1721_2: ravinā sadiso haṃso ravihaṃso. Kusa sadde, thako, dvittaṃ, kusassa sassa to, kukutthako.
anya-e0810n0:1721_3: Karaṇḍa bhājanatthe, avo, karaṇḍavo, jalacaro pakkhī. Bilu patitthambhe, a, avādeso,
anya-e0810n0:1721_4: bilavo, “gaṇḍaplavo”ti khyāto rattapakkho mahāpakkhī pokkharasātako, pokkharassa
anya-e0810n0:1721_5: saññā yassa pokkharasātako, ññassa to, dīgho ca, samuditanāmameva vā tassa, tadā
anya-e0810n0:1721_6: sāda assādane, ṇvu, dassa to, pokkharasātako.
anya-e0810n0:1722_0: 627. Sattakaṃ pakkhe. Patanti anenāti patattaṃ, yadādinā to, dvittaṃ. Ukha gatiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1722_1: yu, usse, assu, pekhuṇaṃ, ṇattaṃ. Pata gamane, to, pātato tāyatīti vā pattaṃ. Pata
anya-e0810n0:1722_2: gamane, kho, tassa ko, pakkho. Patituṃ icchati yena piñchaṃ, nerutto, pata gamane
anya-e0810n0:1722_3: vā, cho, talopo, bindāgamo, assi. Chādyate anena chado. Gira niggiraṇe, u, issattaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1722_4: gamu gamane vā, u, massa ro.
anya-e0810n0:1723_0: Pakkhīnaṃ bīje “au”iti khyāte aṇḍaṃ, kacchapādīnaṃ bījepi, “aṇḍaṃ khagādikose cā”ti
anya-e0810n0:1723_1: nānatthasaṅgahe. Aḍi aṇḍatthe, ṇo, pesi, kosopi, pisa avayave, i, pesi, “pesiyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1723_2: pattabhede ca, koso pumeva icchito”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 15.37 ruddo. Dvayaṃ pakkhigehe.
anya-e0810n0:1723_3: Nīla vaṇṇe, a, ḷattaṃ, nī naye vā, ilo. Kucchitaṃ aṇḍavināsanādikaṃ lunātīti kulāvakaṃ, ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:1724_0: 628. Dvayaṃ garuḷānaṃ mātari. Vino pakkhino namanti yaṃ vinatā. Thīpumadvayaṃ itthipurisānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1724_1: dvayaṃ mithunaṃ nāma, saṅkhyānassa saṅkhyeyyanissitatāya itthipurisāyeva mithunaṃ, mitha saṅgame, uno.
anya-e0810n0:1725_0: Chakkaṃ yugaḷamatte. Yuja yoge, a, yugaṃ, alapaccaye yugaḷaṃ, ḷattaṃ, yugalampi.
anya-e0810n0:1725_1: Ubha pūraṇe, ṇo, dvandādeso ca, dvandaṃ, yamu uparame, ṇvu, alo ca, yamakaṃ, yamalañca, apaccaye yamaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1726_0: 629-631. Maṇḍalantaṃ samūhe. Sammā, visesena ca ūhate puñjībhūtattāti samūho, ṇo,
anya-e0810n0:1726_1: samaṃ saha avayavena ūhati tiṭṭhatīti vā samūho. Gaṇa saṅkhyāne, gaṇīyati avayavena
anya-e0810n0:1726_2: sahāti gaṇo. Saha avayavena gacchatīti saṅghāto, hana gamane, ṇo, saha avayavena
anya-e0810n0:1726_3: udayatīti samudāyo, dāgamo, majjhe dīgho. Sañcinoti avayavanti sañcayo, ci caye.
anya-e0810n0:1726_4: Saha avayavena duhayatīti sandoho, duha papūraṇe. Nissesato vahati avayavanti nivaho.
anya-e0810n0:1726_5: Avayavaṃ katvā byapiyati gacchatīti ogho ucyate ogho uca samavāye ghau nipātanā cassa
anya-e0810n0:1726_6: gho (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 15.39). Visanti avayavā yasminti visaro, aro. Avayavaṃ samīpe
anya-e0810n0:1726_7: karotīti nikaro. Ekekāpekkhāya appatthena kasaṅkhātā avayavā āyanti yasmiṃ kāyo,
anya-e0810n0:1726_8: atha vā kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo, so viya avayavānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ kāyoti
anya-e0810n0:1726_9: idha samūho vutto. Antatthena khaṃsaṅkhātaṃ avayavaṃ dhāretīti khandho, khādati avayaveti
anya-e0810n0:1726_10: vā khandho, amajjhadīghe samudayo. Ghaṭa ghaṭane. Ghaṭanaṃ rāsibhavanaṃ, ghaṭenti
anya-e0810n0:1726_11: assaṃ avayavāti ghaṭā. Saha avayavena etīti samiti,ti. Saha avayavena gacchatīti
anya-e0810n0:1726_12: saṃhati, hana gatiyaṃ,ti, nalopo. Rasa assādane, iṇa. Puñja kucchāyaṃ. Saha avayavena
anya-e0810n0:1726_13: byāpetvā ayatīti samavāyo. Pūgo tambūlepi. Janeti avayaveti jātaṃ, to. Kaṃ attānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1726_14: detīti kado, cakkhādiko sarīrāvayavo. Kado viya kado, avayavo, taṃ vakati ādadātīti
anya-e0810n0:1726_15: kadambakaṃ. Visesena ūhantyasmiṃ avayavā byūho. Vitanoti avayaveti vitānaṃ, ṇo. Gupa
anya-e0810n0:1726_16: rakkhaṇe, bo, passa mo, gumbo, gumbampi. Kalaṃ avayavabhāvaṃ pāti rakkhatīti kalāpo,
anya-e0810n0:1726_17: “kalā soḷasamo bhāgo”ti hi vuttattā kalāsaddo bhāgatthopyatthīti ñāyati. Jala dittiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1726_18: Jalati avayavenāti jālaṃ. Avayavena maṇḍatīti maṇḍalaṃ, maṇḍa vibhūsāyaṃ, alo.
anya-e0810n0:1727_0: 632. Sāddhapajjena gaṇabhedā vuccante. Tatra jātyādīhi samānānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ, apāṇīnañca
anya-e0810n0:1727_1: gaṇo vaggo nāma, yathā “bandhuvaggo, kavaggo”ccādayo, vajja vajjane, vajjeti asamānajātyādayoti
anya-e0810n0:1727_2: vaggo, ṇo, jjassa ggo. Jantūnaṃ samānajātiyānaṃ, vijātiyānañca gaṇo “saṅgho, sattho”ti
anya-e0810n0:1727_3: coccate, yathā “bhikkhusaṅgho, vāṇijasattho”ccādayo. Saṃhaññante nibbisesena ñāyante
anya-e0810n0:1727_4: avayavā tasminti saṅgho, ro. Saranti vattanti avayavā yasminti sattho, tho, rassa to.
anya-e0810n0:1728_0: Sajātikānaṃ samānajātikānaṃ jantūnameva gaṇo kulaṃ nāma, yathā “khattiyakulaṃ, gokula”miccādayo.
anya-e0810n0:1728_1: Kula saṅkhyāne, bandhumhi ca, a, kulaṃ. Sadhammīnaṃ samānadhammānameva jantūnaṃ gaṇo
anya-e0810n0:1728_2: nikāyo nāma, yathā “bhikkhunikāyo”ti. Ci caye, ṇo, nibbisesena cinoti avayaveti nikāyo.
anya-e0810n0:1729_1: migayūtha”miccādayo, yu missane, tho, dīghādi, yūtho, “gaṇo pasūnaṃ samajo, samājoññesa’muccate”ti
anya-e0810n0:1730_0: 633. Catukkaṃ garuḷe. Kanakarucirattā sobhano paṇṇo pakkho yassa supaṇṇo. Vinabhāya
anya-e0810n0:1730_1: nāma mātuyā apaccaṃ venateyyo, ṇeyyo. Garaṃ visadharaṃ hantīti garuḷo, ṇo, rantassu,
anya-e0810n0:1730_2: hassa ca ḷattaṃ, vaṇṇavikāro, garuḍo. Pakkhisīho, uḷūtīso, vajiratuṇḍo, sudhāharo,
anya-e0810n0:1731_0: Pikantaṃ kokile. Parena vijātiyena kākena positoti parapuṭṭho, pusa posane, to. Parena
anya-e0810n0:1731_1: bhato puṭṭho parabhato, bhara dhāraṇaposanesu, to. Kuṇa saddopakaraṇesu, alo. Kuka,
anya-e0810n0:1731_2: vaka ādāne, ilo, kokilo. Apihito kāyatīti piko, api antaradhāne, vaṇṇanāso, apissākāralopo.
anya-e0810n0:1732_0: 634. Aṭṭhakaṃ more. Mura saṃvaraṇe, ṇo. Maya gatiyaṃ, ūro, mahiyaṃ ravatīti vā mayūro,
anya-e0810n0:1732_1: dhātussa atthātisayena yogoti nerutto. Varahaṃ sikhaṇḍo, taṃyogā varahī. Nīlā gīvā
anya-e0810n0:1733: Dvayaṃ mayūramatthakasikhāyaṃ. Sikhā aggijālāyañca, pubbe vuttā.
anya-e0810n0:1734_0: 635-636. Catukkaṃ mayūrakalāpe. Sikhaṇḍino ayaṃ sikhaṇḍo, varaha pādhānye, paribhāsanahiṃsādānesu
anya-e0810n0:1734_1: ca, karaṇe a. Ko mayūro lasati yena kalāpo, ṇo, sassa po. Pī tappanakantīsu, cho,
anya-e0810n0:1734_2: niggahītāgamo, rasso ca. Dvayaṃ morassa piñchaṭṭhe akkhisaṇṭhāne. Cadi hilādane,
anya-e0810n0:1735: Aḷyantaṃ bhamare, cha padāni assa. Madhuṃ vatayati bhuñjate madhubbato, vata bhojane. Bhama anavaṭṭhāne, pupphamatthake bhamatīti bhamaro, aro. Ara gamane, i, ḷattaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1736_0: Catukkaṃ gehavanakapotesu. Pārena sabalena āpatatīti pārāpato, pāravatopi. Kapa acchādane,
anya-e0810n0:1736_1: kampa calane vā. Oto, parapakkhe malopo. Kuka ādāne, aṭo, ussattamassuttañca. Pakārena
anya-e0810n0:1736_2: ravatīti pārevaṭo, ru sadde, aṭo, upasaggassa dīgho, asse, pārevaṭo, parevaṭopi.
anya-e0810n0:1742_0: 637. Dvayaṃ gijjhe. Gidha abhikaṅkhāyaṃ, yo, jhassa jho, asarūpadvittaṃ, jhapaccayena
anya-e0810n0:1742_1: vā siddhaṃ, tathā dhassa jo. Gidhatismā a, niggahītāgamo, issattaṃ, gandho. Tikaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1742_2: senasāmaññe. Kukkuṭādīnaṃ kulaṃ lunāti chindatīti kulalo, kula santāne vā, alo. Se
anya-e0810n0:1742_3: gamane, no. Sattānaṃ hiṃsanato byaggho viya byagghi, satte nāsetīti nāso. Byagghi
anya-e0810n0:1743_0: Sakuṇagghādayo tayo tabbhedā tassa senassa visesā. Sakuṇaṃ hantīti sakuṇagghi, sina?.
anya-e0810n0:1743_1: Aṭa gamane, ṇo. Āṭo. Dabbisadisaṃ tuṇḍaṃ yassa dvijassa so dabbimukhadvijo. “Dabbimukhadvijo
anya-e0810n0:1743_2: āṭo nāmā”tipyeko attho, tadā dveyeva senabhedā.
anya-e0810n0:1744_0: 638. Catukkaṃ ulūke. “Uhu”nti saddaṃ karotīti uhuṅkāro. “Uddhaṃ kaṇṇā yassa uddhaṃkaṇṇo”ti
anya-e0810n0:1744_1: sampatte niruttinayena ulūko ulabhinettethi dahatyulūko, uddholokanā iti niruttama
anya-e0810n0:1744_2: (amarakosugghāṭanaṭīkā 15.15), ucati samaveti koṭaranti vā nipātanā. Kusa akkose,
anya-e0810n0:1744_3: yassa amanāpatāya saddena lokā kosanti, so kosiyo, kositabboti katvā, koṭare vasatīti
anya-e0810n0:1744_4: vā kosiyo, nerutto, vāyasānaṃ kākānaṃ ari sattu, sakkahvayo, divāndho vakkanāsiko,
anya-e0810n0:1745_0: Vāyasantaṃ kāke. “Kā”iti saddaṃ kāyatīti kāko. Riṭṭhaṃ maraṇalakkhaṇaṃ, tadassa natthi
anya-e0810n0:1745_1: ariṭṭho. Dhaṅka ghoravāsite, a. Balinā puṭṭho bhato. Vaya gamane, vayo eva vāyaso,
anya-e0810n0:1745_2: sakatthe so, sakiṃpajo, attaghoso, parabharo, balibhujo, guḷhamethunopi. Sakiṃ ekavāraṃpajā
anya-e0810n0:1745_3: pasūti yassa. “Kāka”iccattānaṃ ghosayati. Vijātiyaṃ kokilaṃ bharati.
anya-e0810n0:1746_0: 639. Kāko viya ulati gacchatīti kākoḷo, ḷattaṃ. Doṇakāko, daddhakākopi. Dvayaṃ “bī-lौṃ”iti
anya-e0810n0:1746_1: khyāte sakuṇe. Lū chedane, ṇo, vassa po, lāpo, lāvopi. Leḍḍu viya akatīti laṭukikā
anya-e0810n0:1747_0: Tikaṃ hatthiliṅgasakuṇe. Vāraṇasadisattā vāraṇo. Hatthino liṅgaṃ ñāpakaṃ soṇḍaṃ yasmiṃ
anya-e0810n0:1747_1: vijjatīti hatthiliṅgo. Hatthisoṇḍaṃ yasmiṃ vijjati, so hatthisoṇḍo ca vihaṅgamo ceti
anya-e0810n0:1748_0: 640. Dvayaṃ ukkuse. Uccaṃ kosatīti ukkuso, kusa sadde, a. Kura sadde, aro, thiyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1748_1: kurarī. Kolaṭṭhipakkhimhi “ubhuta”iti khyāte pakkhimhi kukkuho. Kolaṭṭhiajjhohārako
anya-e0810n0:1748_2: pakkhī kolaṭṭhipakkhī. “Kukku”iti saddāyatīti kukkuho, ho, kuka avhāne vā, uho.
anya-e0810n0:1749_0: Tikaṃ suve. Su savane. Manussasaddampi suṇātīti suvo, a, uvādeso. “Kī”iti saddaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1749_1: karotīti kīro. Karoti manussasaddanti vā kīro. A, assī. Suka gatiyaṃ, sundaraṃ, suṭṭhu
anya-e0810n0:1749_2: vā manussasaddaṃ kāyatīti suko. Dvayaṃ kukkuṭamatte. Tambā cūḷā yassa. Kukkuṭatīti
anya-e0810n0:1749_3: kukkuṭo, kuka, vaka ādāne vā, aṭo.
anya-e0810n0:1750_0: 641. Dvayaṃ nijjivhe. Natthi jivhā yassa nijjivho. Dvayaṃ koñcāsakuṇe. Itthiliṅgena
anya-e0810n0:1750_1: mithunānaṃ nāmāni. Koñca koṭilyappībhāvesu, a, koñcā. Kanta chedane, yu, nadādi,
anya-e0810n0:1751_0: Dvayaṃ cakkavāke. Cakkena cakkasaddena uccate cakkavāko, ṇo. Vaca viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1751_1: cakkamiccāvhā yassa, rathaṅgāvhayanāmakopi, rathaṅgaṃ cakkaṃ, tassa avhayo rathaṅgāvhayo,
anya-e0810n0:1751_2: so nāmaṃ assa rathaṅgāvhayanāmako, tena rathaṅganāmo rathacaraṇasamāno avhayo coccate.
anya-e0810n0:1752_0: Lakkhitalakkhaṇā cātra, lakkhaṇopacaritavuttiyā, goṇamukhyāya vā vuttiyā lakkhitena
anya-e0810n0:1752_1: atthena yatra atthantaraṃ lakkhyate, sā lakkhitalakkhaṇā. Yathā “rathāvayavāyudho”
anya-e0810n0:1752_2: iccatra rathāvayavasaddena cakkaṃ lakkhyate, na tadākati tannāmo cāyudhaviseso. “Pantiratho”iccatra
anya-e0810n0:1752_3: pantisaddena dasakkharaṃ chando lakkhyate, na dasasaddo, tehi tu āyudharathasaddasanniveso
anya-e0810n0:1752_4: “cakkāvayavāyudho, dasaratho” iti devaviseso, rājaviseso ca lakkhyate, tathātrāpi
anya-e0810n0:1752_6: tenāpi vākasaddo. Tehi ca aññamaññasanniveso cakkavākoti pakkhiviseso lakkhīyateti
anya-e0810n0:1753_0: Dvayaṃ cātake. Ayaṃ meghajalapāyī, sara hiṃsāyaṃ, saraṇaṃ sāro, taṃ gacchatīti sāraṅgo.
anya-e0810n0:1753_1: “Cātake hariṇe pume, sāraṅgo sabale tisū”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 23.23 rabhaso. Cata yācane,
anya-e0810n0:1753_2: ṇvu, thokakopi, thokaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ īhanīyaṭṭhena assatthi thokako.
anya-e0810n0:1754: 642. Dvayaṃ pakkhibiḷāle. Tula ummāne, iyo. Pakkhayutto biḷālo, “sū”.
anya-e0810n0:1755: Dvayaṃ rukkhakīṭakhādake. Sataṃ pattāni assa. Sarati kīṭeti sāraso, so, “khāva sā”.
anya-e0810n0:1756: Dvayaṃ kākehi saddhiṃ nīḷaṃ katvā vasanake sukkasakuṇe. Vaka ādāne, a. Setavaṇṇatāya sukko ca so kākehi saddhiṃ nivāsanato, kākasaṇṭhānattā vā kāko ceti sukkakāko.
anya-e0810n0:1757: Dvayaṃ visakaṇṭhikāyaṃ. Bala pāṇane, ṇvu, dīgho, āko vā. Visasadiso kāḷavaṇṇo kaṇṭho yassā sā visakaṇṭhikā, etissā pumo nāma na vijjati. Vuttañca apadāne –
anya-e0810n0:1759: Meghesu gajjamānesu, gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti tā tadā”ti apa. thera. 1.1.511.
anya-e0810n0:1760: 643. Dvayaṃ kaṅke. Lohasadiso piṭṭhi yassa lohapiṭṭho. Kaṅka lolye, a, kaṅko.
anya-e0810n0:1761: Dvayaṃ pattakaṇṭhe. Khañjo viya caratīti khañjarīṭo, īṭo. Passantānaṃ khaṃ sukhaṃ janetīti khañjano. Khañja gativekalye vā, yu.
anya-e0810n0:1762: Dvayaṃ gāmacāṭake, cāṭakamatte vā. Kalahaṃ ravatīti kalaviṅko, yadādi. Kaṃ sukhaṃ lunātīti vā kalaviṅko, iko, niggahītāgamo ca. Caṭa bhede, ṇvu, cāṭako.
anya-e0810n0:1763: Dvayaṃ veḷuriyacchavilome citrapakkhe “suvaṇṇacūḷe”ti khyāte. Dibha santhambhe, dvittaṃ, bindāgamo ca. “Ki”iti saddaṃ karotīti kikī, ṇī, cāso, divipi cāso kikīdivi (amara 15.16).
anya-e0810n0:1764: 644. Dvayaṃ meghasāme “ṭī-ṭौ”iti khyāte. Kadambayogā kādambo. Kāḷavaṇṇo haṃso kāḷahaṃso, kālahaṃsopi.
anya-e0810n0:1765_0: Dvayaṃ “ṅahe-ḍo”iti khyāte sakuṇe. Sakunto vutto, “sakunto pakkhibhedasmiṃ, bhāsapakkhīkhagesu
anya-e0810n0:1765_1: ce”ti nānatthasaṅgahe. Sundarākārena pakkhena yutto sakuṇo bhāsapakkhī, “bhāsanto
anya-e0810n0:1766: Dvayaṃ “nvā-mī-sve”iti khyāte nīlapakkhini. Dhūmyaṃ dhūmaṃ aṭati sahatīti dhūmyāṭo, ṇo. Kāḷavaṇṇatāya kucchitaṃ liṅgaṃ yassa. Bhiṅgopi.
anya-e0810n0:1767: Dvayaṃ jalakukkuṭe. Dā lavane,ti, dāti ūhati ussahatīti dātyūho, khaṇḍitaddhaniiccattho. Kāle sassamutumhi kaṇṭho kaṇḍaddhani yassa kāḷakaṇṭhako, samāsante ko.
anya-e0810n0:1768_1: ṇvu, makkhikā, tāsaṃ bhedo makkhikābhedo. Piṅgalamakkhikāyaṃ “mhaṇa”iti khyātāyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1768_2: dvayaṃ. Ḍaṃsa ḍaṃsane, ḍaṃso. Daṃsopi, ḍaṃsa khādane vā, piṅgalamakkhikātivaṇṇanāmaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1769: Makkhikāya aṇḍaṃ āsāṭikā nāma, saṭa avayave, ṇvu. Dvayaṃ “nhaṃ”iti khyāte. Paṭaṃ gacchatīti paṭaṅgo, pataṅgopi, sarati hiṃsatīti salabho, abho, lattaṃ, sala gamane vā.
anya-e0810n0:1770_0: 646. Dvayaṃ “cheṃ”iti khyāte, maka pāṇe, aso, makaso. Dvayaṃ nidāghe nuhādīsu varaṇakamakkhikāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1770_1: “Cīrī”ti saddāyatīti cīrī, ciri hiṃsāyaṃ vā, nadādi, dīghādi. Jhalla sadde, ṇvu, jhallikā.
anya-e0810n0:1771_0: Dvayaṃ tālapattādyantaresu nilīnāyaṃ cammapattāyaṃ. Jatu viya jatukā, upamāne ko,
anya-e0810n0:1771_1: “rāmaṭhe jatukaṃ camma-pattajatukaresu thī”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 19.40 hi rabhaso. Ajinaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1771_2: cammaṃ pattaṃ yassā ajinapattā. Dvayaṃ haṃsasāmaññe. Hanti addhānaṃ haṃso. Seto chado
anya-e0810n0:1771_3: pattaṃ yassa. Yathākathañci byuppattīti vuttattā asetacchadepi, cakkaṅgo, mānasokopi,
anya-e0810n0:1771_4: cakkassa cakkavākasseva aṅgāni yassa. Mānasaṃ saro oko yassa.
anya-e0810n0:1772: 647. Ye rattehi lohitehi pādatuṇḍehi caraṇacañcūhi visiṭṭhā sitā ca sarīre, te rājahaṃsā nāma, haṃsānaṃ rājāno rājahaṃsā.
anya-e0810n0:1773_0: Malīnehi pādatuṇḍehi visiṭṭhā ye te mallikākhyā, mala, malla dhāraṇe, i, saññāyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1773_1: ko, “malliko haṃsabhede ca, tiṇasūle ca mallike”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 15.24 ruddo. Ākhyāsaddena
anya-e0810n0:1773_2: bahubbīhi. Asitehi kaṇhehi pādatuṇḍehi visiṭṭhā ye, te dhataraṭṭhā, dhataraṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1774_0: 648. Tikaṃ tiracchāne. Tiriyaṃ añcayatīti tiraccho, tiriyassa tiro, añcatissa ccho.
anya-e0810n0:1774_1: Yumhi tiracchāno, tiracchānoyeva tiracchānagataṃ, tabbhāvaṃ vā gataṃ pattaṃ, tesu
anya-e0810n0:1774_2: vā gataṃ antogadhanti tiracchānagataṃ, siyāti pakatyānapekkhakriyāpadaṃ, bhavatyattho
anya-e0810n0:1774_3: vā hi karotyattho vā kadāci pakatyānapekkho bhavati, na pana vikatyānapekkho. Tathā
anya-e0810n0:1774_4: kadāci ubhayāpekkhopi bhavati, na panubhayānapekkhoti sabbatrevaṃ. Sīhādivaggo.
anya-e0810n0:1777: 649-650. Catukkaṃ pātāle. Adharaṃ bhuvanaṃ adhobhuvanaṃ. Patanti asmiṃ pātālaṃ, alo, majjhe dīgho. Nāgānaṃ loko. Rasāya talaṃ rasātalaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1778_0: Sobbhantaṃ chiddamatte. Raṇa sadde, dho, nattaṃ, yadādi. Vara dittiyaṃ. Vigato varo
anya-e0810n0:1778_1: vāraṇaṃ assa vivaraṃ, chidi dvidhākaraṇe, do. Kuha vimhayane, aro. Susa sosane, iro.
anya-e0810n0:1778_2: Bila bhedane, a. Susato i, susi. Chinditvā gacchatīti chiggalaṃ, yadādi. Suṭṭhu abbhaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1779: “Susira”nti chiddasāmaññe yaṃ napuṃsakavacanaṃ, taṃ sacchidde chiddavati dabbe tīsu, yathā “susiro rukkho, susirā ciñcā, susiraṃ kaṭṭha”nti.
anya-e0810n0:1780: Dvayaṃ bhūmichidde. Kāsa dittiyaṃ, u. Ava rakkhaṇe, aṭo, āvāṭo, avāṭopi. Dvayaṃ sappānaṃ rājini. Vasu ratanaṃ yassatthīti vāsukī.
anya-e0810n0:1781: 651. Dvayaṃ nāgānaṃ rājini. Devehipyassanto nopaladdhoti ananto, sesopi, sisa hiṃsāyaṃ, sisati kappanteti seso, a.
anya-e0810n0:1782: Dvayaṃ ajagare. Vahatismā aso, vāhaso. Ajaṃ chāgaṃ gilatīti ajagaro, a, issattaṃ, lassa rattañca. Sayīpi, sayanasīlo sayī.
anya-e0810n0:1783: Dvayaṃ gonasasappe “ṅā-cve”iti khyāte. Gavasseva nāsā assāti gonaso, saññāyaṃ nāsasaddassa naso kato pāṇini 5.4.119. Tilaṃ icchatīti tiliccho, tiriyaṃ añcatīti vā tiliccho, yadādi.
anya-e0810n0:1784: Dvayaṃ deḍḍubhe, yo “jalasappo”ti vuccati. Deḍḍunā rājiyā ubhatīti deḍḍubho. Piṭṭhe rājiyogā rājulo, ulo, badhirasappepyete.
anya-e0810n0:1785: 652. Kambalo ca assataro cāti ime dve nāgakulā merupāde vasanti.
anya-e0810n0:1786: Dvayaṃ vesmanivuṭṭhasappe. “Vammanī”tipi pāṭho. “Asuddo gharasappo”ti vuttattā nibbisatāya amāritattā sīlayuttaṃ attā mano yasmiṃ silutto, assu, rassādi.
anya-e0810n0:1787: Dvayaṃ rukkhaggādīsu nivuṭṭhasappe. Nīlo harito sappoti nīlasappo. “Nīlo kaṇhamhi harite”ti hi tārapālo. Paṭhamakāle silāyaṃ bhavatīti silābhu.
anya-e0810n0:1788_0: 653-654. Visadharantaṃ sappamatte. Āsiyaṃ visaṃ etassa āsīviso, āsī sappadāṭhā. Bhuja
anya-e0810n0:1788_1: koṭilye, kuṭilāyamāno gacchatīti bhujaṅgo, evaṃ bhujago, bhujaṅgamo ca. Ahi gamane,
anya-e0810n0:1788_2: i. Saranto sappati gacchatīti sarīsapo, assī, saṃyogalopo, aluttasamāsoyaṃ, bhujaṅgabhujaṅgamāpi,
anya-e0810n0:1788_3: sabbadharakate pana “bhusaṃ, punappunaṃ vā kuṭilaṃ sappatīti sarīsapo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1788_4: Phaṇayogā, ī, phaṇī. Sappatismā a, bhūmiphuṭṭhena gattena gati sappanaṃ. Araṃ sīghaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1788_5: gacchatīti alagaddo, massa do, rassa lattañca, alagaddo, jalasappepyayaṃ, “alagaddo
anya-e0810n0:1788_6: jalavāḷo”ti amara 8.5 hi amarasīho. Bhogo phaṇikāyo, taṃyogā bhogī. Pannaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0810n0:1788_7: pannago, pādehi vā na gacchatīti pannago. Dve jivhā assa. Urasā gacchatīti urago.
anya-e0810n0:1788_8: Visesena ālāti gaṇhāti āyunti vāḷo, lassa ḷattaṃ, vā gamane vā, alo. Dīghasarīratāya
anya-e0810n0:1788_9: dīgho. Dīghā piṭṭhi yassa, samāse ko. Udarameva pādo yassa. Visaṃ dharati. Cakkī,
anya-e0810n0:1788_10: kuṇḍalī, gūḷhapādo, cakkhussavo, kākodaro, dabbīkaro, bilesayo, jimhago, pavanāsanopi.
anya-e0810n0:1788_11: Sirasi cakkayogā cakkī. Kuṇḍalamiva vapu assatthīti taṃyogā kuṇḍalī. Cakkhunā suṇotīti
anya-e0810n0:1788_12: cakkhussavo. Kākodaramiva udaraṃ assa. Dabbigatikattā phaṇā dabbī, taṃ karoti bandhatīti
anya-e0810n0:1788_13: dabbīkaro. Sāmaññaniddesepi kaṇhasappādiyeva dabbīkaro. Jimhaṃ kuṭilaṃ gacchatīti.
anya-e0810n0:1789: Phaṇino sappassa tanu kāyo bhogo nāma. Bhujatīti bhogo, bhuja koṭilye, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1790_0: 655-656. Dvayaṃ sappassa dāṭhāyaṃ. Asati yena asaṃ, mukhaṃ, tasmiṃ bhavā āsī, sappassa
anya-e0810n0:1790_1: dāṭhā dantuttamā. Dvayaṃ sappassa jiṇṇatace, nimuccate yasmā sappoti, ṇo. Kañcukasadisattā
anya-e0810n0:1791: Dvayaṃ visamatte. Soṇipathagataṃ visati dehanti visaṃ, visa pavesane. Giratīti garaḷaṃ, aḷo.
anya-e0810n0:1792: Halāhalo, kāḷakūṭo, ādinā kākolādayo ca sattāti ime nava tabbhedā tassa visassa bhedā. Vuttañca –
anya-e0810n0:1795: Dārado vacchanābho ca, visabhedā ime navā”ti amara 8.10-11.
anya-e0810n0:1796_0: Tatra halāhalo pume, vākārena napuṃsakepi, “hālāhala”nti hi tikaṇḍasese tikaṇḍasesa
anya-e0810n0:1796_1: 1.8.5 dīghādipi. Tālapatrasaṇṭhāno nīlapatro gothanākatiphalo gaccho halāhalo. Assa
anya-e0810n0:1796_2: ca samīpe rukkhādayo ḍayhante. Himavati, kikkindāyaṃ, koṅkaṇesu, dakkhiṇasamudde
anya-e0810n0:1796_3: ca jāyate, hanatīti halo, a, nassa lo, halānampi halo halāhalo, majjhadīgho. Tiriyalekhāya
anya-e0810n0:1796_4: citaṃ dvijapadehi yuttaṃ, tathā gaṇṭhibhi byāpitaṃ bindubhideva yaṃ ghanatarehi,
anya-e0810n0:1796_5: taṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ. Idañca puthumālināmassāsurassa soṇitamhā eva asurasamaye devāsuraraṇe
anya-e0810n0:1796_7: coppajjate. Vaṇṇena kāḷañca taṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaharaṇato lohamuggarasadisatāya kūṭañceti kāḷakūṭaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1799_0: Darade bhavo dārado, suppabhanāmako taṃdesapasiddho ca. Vacchanābho sinduvārapattasadiso
anya-e0810n0:1799_1: ca taṃsamīpe rukkho na vaddhate, taṃsamphassavāyu ca jarayati, viñjhāyaṃ, kikkindāyañca
anya-e0810n0:1799_2: jāyate, evaṃ visantarānampi sarūpaṃ āgamato viññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1800: Dvayaṃ dhanatthaṃ sappaggāhe. Vāḷaṃ sappaṃ gaṇhanasīlatāya vāḷagāhī. Ahino tuṇḍena mukhena dibbatīti ahituṇḍiko, ṇiko, “vāḷaggāho’hituṇḍiko”ti amarakose 8.11-gāthāyampi amaramālā.
anya-e0810n0:1801: 657. Tikaṃ niraye. Ayo iṭṭhaphalaṃ, so niggato asmāti nirayo, nindito rayo gamanaṃ etthāti vā nirayo. Duṭṭhā gati duggati. Apuññe netīti narako, ṇvu, ranto ca, narako.
anya-e0810n0:1802_0: Tesu nirayesu yo “mahānirayo”ti vutto, so aṭṭhadhā hotīti taṃ dasseti “sañjīvo”ccādinā
anya-e0810n0:1802_1: silokena. Marantāpi kammaphalānubhavanatthaṃ punappunaṃ jīvanti asmiṃ sañjīvo. Yattha
anya-e0810n0:1802_2: niraye nerayikānaṃ sarīrāni vaḍḍhakīnaṃ kāḷasuttena saññāṇaṃ katvā vāsiyā tacchanti,
anya-e0810n0:1802_3: so kāḷasutto. Bhusaṃ, punappunaṃ vā dukkhitasaddena ravanti asmiṃ roruvo, mahanto
anya-e0810n0:1802_4: ca so roruvo cāti mahāroruvo. Puna “roruvo”ti cūḷaroruvo vutto. Bhusaṃ patanti asmiṃ
anya-e0810n0:1802_5: patāpano, “vīci taraṅge appe cā”ti ruddo, natthi sukhassa vīci lesopi atrāti avīci,
anya-e0810n0:1802_6: “vīci sukhataraṅgesū”ti tikaṇḍaseso tikaṇḍasesa 3.3.78, tasmā natthi vīci sukhaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1802_7: etthāti avīci. Samantato āgatehi pabbatehi haññanti atrāti saṅghāto. Tapanti atra
anya-e0810n0:1803: 658. Tattha nirayesu vetaraṇī ca lohakumbhī cāti ime dve nirayā jalāsayā jalādhārā, te ca thiyaṃ, taraṇī nāvā, sā natthi yassaṃ vetaraṇī. Lohamayā kumbhī lohakumbhī.
anya-e0810n0:1804: Dvayaṃ nirayapāle. Kāraṇā yātanā, sā ca tibbavedanā, taṃ karotīti kāraṇiko. Nirayagatasatte pātīti nirayapo.
anya-e0810n0:1805: Dvayaṃ nirayagatasatte. Nirayaṃ gacchatīti nerayiko. Narakaṃ gacchatīti nārako.
anya-e0810n0:1806_0: 659. Udadhi pariyantaṃ samuddassa nāmaṃ. Aṇṇo jalaṃ, so vāti gacchati yasmiṃ aṇṇavo,
anya-e0810n0:1806_1: aṇṇo yasmiṃ vijjatīti vā aṇṇavo, assatthyatthe vo. Sagarehi rājakumārehi khato sāgaro,
anya-e0810n0:1806_2: sānaṃ dhanānaṃ ākaroti vā sāgaro, kassa go, sāga saṃvaraṇe vā, aro. Sandateti sindhu,
anya-e0810n0:1806_3: sanda savane, yadādi. Udi kledane, sammā klidanti candodaye asmā āpānīti samuddo.
anya-e0810n0:1806_4: Jalāni, udakāni ca nidhīyante, dhīyante cātrāti jalanidhi, udadhi ca, udakassa udādeso.
anya-e0810n0:1807_0: Tassa samuddassa khīraṇṇavo, ādinā lavaṇodo, dadhyudo, ghatodo, ucchurasodo, madirodo,
anya-e0810n0:1807_1: sādudako cāti ime satta mahaṇṇavavisesā bhavanti byākhyāsudhā 1.10.2. Khīravaṇṇo aṇṇavo khīraṇṇavo.
anya-e0810n0:1808: 660. Assa samuddassa kūladeso tīradeso velā nāma, vigacchanti irā yassaṃ velā, lattaṃ. Cakkamiva salilānaṃ jalānaṃ bhamo bhamanaṃ āvaṭṭo nāma, āvaṭṭanti jalāni atrāti āvaṭṭo.
anya-e0810n0:1809: Tikaṃ bindumhi. Thu abhitthave, vo, usse. Vidi avayave, u, bindu. Phusa phusane, to, phusitaṃ. Pākāre, gehāditittiyañca jalaniggamo bhamo nāma, bhamu anavaṭṭhāne.
anya-e0810n0:1810_0: 661. Siloko udake. Āpa byāpane, appoti sabbatrāti āpo. Pātabbanti payo, pā pāne,
anya-e0810n0:1810_1: ṇyo. Rasso, payo. Jala dhaññe, a. Vārayati ninnonatanti vāri, vara nisedhe, ṇi, vārayati
anya-e0810n0:1810_2: pipāsanti vā vāri. Pīyateti pānīyaṃ, anīyo. Salatīti salilaṃ, sala gatiyaṃ, ilo.
anya-e0810n0:1810_3: Udi kledane, ṇvu, ulopo, dakaṃ pipāsacchedaṃ karotīti vā dakaṃ, “dā dānacchedadhātū”ti
anya-e0810n0:1810_4: ekakkharakosa 20 gāthā hi ekakkharakose, rasso. Ana sadde, a, dvittaṃ, ara gamane
anya-e0810n0:1810_5: vā, to, annādeso, ṇattaṃ. Nī naye, īro. Vana sambhattiyaṃ. Vanīyate pipāsehīti vanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1810_6: Vā gamane, alo. Tāyate pālayateti toyaṃ, tā pālane, curādi, yo, ākārassottaṃ. Amba
anya-e0810n0:1810_7: sadde, u, ambu. Udi pasavanakledanesu, ṇvu, udakaṃ. Kara karaṇe, kvi, kaṃ. Kamalaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1810_8: khīrampi, kamu icchākantīsu, alo. Khanu hiṃsāyaṃ, īro, nalopo, khī khaye vā, khīraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1811_0: 662. Catukkaṃ taraṅge. Taranto gacchati, tīraṃ vā gacchatīti taraṅgo, aluttasamāso,
anya-e0810n0:1811_1: paratra īssattaṃ. Sayameva bhijjateti bhaṅgo, a. Ūha vitakke, mi, halopo, ūmi, ara
anya-e0810n0:1811_2: gamane vā, mi, assū, ralopo. Vimhayaṃ vicittaṃ cinotīti vīci, i, upasaggassa dīgho,
anya-e0810n0:1812: Ullolo, kallolo cāti idaṃ dvayaṃ mahāvīcīsu kathyate, lola ummādane, ullolayatīti ullolo, ṇo, ula gamane vā, olo, dvittaṃ. Kalla sadde, olo, kallolo.
anya-e0810n0:1813_0: 663. Silokaddhaṃ kaddame. Jalaṃ balate jambālo, kammani ṇo, makāro vaṇṇavikāro. Kala
anya-e0810n0:1813_1: saṅkhyāne, alo. Paca vitthāravacane, kammani ṇo. Cikkha vacane, alo, dvittaṃ. Kada
anya-e0810n0:1814_0: Chakkaṃ vālukāyaṃ. Pula mahatthe, ino, ḷattaṃ. Vala saṃvaraṇe, ṇvu, assu, vālukā,
anya-e0810n0:1814_1: thī. Vaṇṇa sadde, vaṇṇo. Mara pāṇacāge, u, maru, devepi. Ara gamane, u, assu, uru,
anya-e0810n0:1814_2: mahantepi, vaṇṇo ca maru ca uru ca vaṇṇamarūru. Sica paggharaṇe, to, sikatā, thī.
anya-e0810n0:1815_0: 664. Jalamajjhagataṃ talaṃ kammabhūtaṃ “antarīpaṃ, dīpo”ti coccate. Dvidhāgatānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1815_1: āpānaṃ antaragataṃ antarīpaṃ, ākārassī. “Antarīya”nti vā pāṭho, tadā dvidhāgatānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1815_2: āpānaṃ antare bhavaṃ antarīyanti viggaho, akārassī. Dvidhāgatāni āpāni asmiṃ hetubhūteti
anya-e0810n0:1815_3: dīpo. Vakāraākārānaṃ lopo, issī ca, dīpo, vākārena dīpampi.
anya-e0810n0:1816: Pañcakaṃ tīrassa nāmaṃ. Pāra tīra kammasampattiyaṃ, curādi, a. Kūla āvaraṇe, ṇo. Rudha āvaraṇe, rodhaṃ. Aññapārādinivattanatthaṃ “patīra”nti vuttaṃ. Taṭa ussaye, a, thiyaṃ, taṭī.
anya-e0810n0:1817_0: 665. Paramhi tīrasmiṃ pārasaddo, so ca napuṃsake, pāra tīra kammasampattiyaṃ, pāra
anya-e0810n0:1817_1: sāmatthiye vā, pārayati taraṅgādayo vāretunti pāraṃ. Orantutīraṃ “apāra”ntyuccate,
anya-e0810n0:1817_2: avare tīradese bhavaṃ oraṃ, ṇo. Pārato aññaṃ tīraṃ apāraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1818_0: Pañcakaṃ uḷumpe. Uḷuto dakato pāti rakkhati uḷupo, soyeva niggahītāgamavasena uḷumpo.
anya-e0810n0:1818_1: Plavati, plavanti anenāti vā plavo, plava gamane, gamanaṃ atra jalagamanaṃ. Kula
anya-e0810n0:1818_2: santāne, a, ke ulati gacchatīti vā kullo, a, dvittaṃ. Taranti anena taro, tara plavataraṇesu.
anya-e0810n0:1818_3: Gamanāgamanavasena punappunaṃ jale aranti yāya, sā paccarī, a, nadādi.
anya-e0810n0:1819_0: 666. Tikaṃ nāvāyaṃ. Taranti yāya taraṇī, yu, nadādi, ipaccaye tari, īmhi tu tarī.
anya-e0810n0:1819_1: Nu thutiyaṃ, a, vuḍḍhāvādesā, nāvā. Dvayaṃ laṅkārathambhe. Kūpa gamane, ṇvu, kūpako,
anya-e0810n0:1819_2: apaccayo vā, tadā sakatthe ko. Kamu icchāyaṃ, bho, sakatthe ko, assu ca, kumbhakaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1820_0: Dvayaṃ “pe seṃ”iti khyāte. Tarassa pacchābhāge bandhitabboti pacchābandho. Ga’micchitadisaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1820_1: aṭati yena goṭaviso, iso, avanto ca assottañca, goṭaviso. Dvayaṃ “pe tamā”iti khyāte.
anya-e0810n0:1820_2: Nāvāya kaṇṇo viya kaṇṇo, mahanto kenipāto, tena pavahaṇapatisavanato, taṃ dharatīti,
anya-e0810n0:1821: 667. Dvayaṃ nāvāya gamanopāye. Arati yenāti arittaṃ, chadādīhi tatraṇa, ikārāgamo, dvittañca. Ke jale nipātiyate kenipāto, aluttasamāsoyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1822: Dvayaṃ niyāmake. Poto pavahanaṃ, taṃ vāhayatīti potavāho. Niyacchati potanti niyāmako, yamu uparame, nipubbo gamane, ṇvu, niyāmako, curādi. Niyāmakepi.
anya-e0810n0:1823_0: Ye vāṇijā nāvāya vāṇijakammaṃ ācaranti, te saṃyattikā nāma, saṃyānaṃ saṃyātrā, dīpantaragamanaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1823_1: traṇa, sā payojanametesaṃ saṃyattikā, ṇiko, ralopo, rasso ca. Tapaccayena vā siddhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1824_0: 668. Laṅkārādayo, phiyādayo ca nāvāya aṅgā avayavā. Lo indo, tassa kāraṇaṃ laṅkāro.
anya-e0810n0:1824_1: Vaṭo vuccati sivaṭo, tadākāratāya vaṭākāro. “Vaṭo kamadde nigrodhe”ti hi nānatthasaṅgaho.
anya-e0810n0:1825_0: Dvayaṃ “talaka”iti khyāte. Pū pavane, to, vuḍḍhi, pavahati niyāmaketi pavahanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1825_1: Vuttanti kriyāpadaṃ. Dvayaṃ kaṭṭhambuvāhiniyaṃ, duṇa gatihiṃsāsu, a, nadādi, vuḍḍhi,
anya-e0810n0:1825_2: doṇī. Ambuṃ neti yena ambaṇaṃ, ussattaṃ, ṇattañca, amba sadde vā, yu.
anya-e0810n0:1826_0: 669. Tikaṃ gambhīre. Gamu gamane, īro, bhonto ca malopo ca, gabhīro. Mālope tu gambhīro,
anya-e0810n0:1826_1: gacchantā bhāyanti asminti vā gabhīro, gambhīro ca. Nipubbo mana abhyāse, ṇo, massa
anya-e0810n0:1826_2: no. Tabbipakkhato gambhīraviparītato uttānaṃ nāma, uggataṃ tānaṃ pamāṇaṃ assa uttānaṃ, agambhīraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1827: Dvayaṃ agādhe. Gādha patiṭṭhākaṅkhāsu, ganthe ca, natthi gādhaṃ yatra agādhaṃ. Na heṭṭhimatalaṃ phusati yatra atalamphassaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1828: Tikaṃ appasanne. Natthi acchabhāvo atra anaccho. Kalusaṃ pāpepi vuttaṃ. Vila bhedane, ṇo, āvilo. Ava rakkhaṇe vā, ilo.
anya-e0810n0:1829_0: 670. Tikaṃ nimmale. Cho chedane, na chindati dassananti accho, ṇo, sacchopi, sara
anya-e0810n0:1829_1: visaraṇe, to, annādeso. Natthi malaṃ etasmiṃ vimalo. Gabhīrappabhutī gabhīrādayo
anya-e0810n0:1830_0: Pañcakaṃ kevaṭṭe. Dhā dhāraṇe, īvaro. Macche hantvā jīvatīti macchiko, iko. Macche
anya-e0810n0:1830_1: bandhati jālenāti macchabandho, macche vadhatīti vā macchabandho, niggahītāgamo,
anya-e0810n0:1830_2: kaṃ jalaṃ, tassa īlakkhī, tāya vaṭṭo vaṭṭanaṃ assatthīti kevaṭṭo. Kevattopi, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1830_3: Jāle niyutto, jālena hantīti vā jāliko, dāsopyatra, dāsa dāne, a, “dāso kevaṭṭabhaccesū”ti
anya-e0810n0:1831_0: 671-672. Jhasāntaṃ macche. Masa āmasane, cho, maradhātuvasena vā siddho, mara pāṇacāge,
anya-e0810n0:1831_1: ino, ralopo. Mukhappadese puthūni lomāni assa puthulomo. Pāṭhīnādīnaṃ macchattā visesato
anya-e0810n0:1831_2: alomakepyassa vutti. Jhasa hiṃsattho daṇḍako dhātu, a, jhaso. Aṇḍajo, visāro, sakalīpi,
anya-e0810n0:1831_3: vicitraṃ sarati anena visāro, ṇo. Rohitādīnaṃ vakkalappāyo battalappāyo (ka.) taco
anya-e0810n0:1832_0: Rohitādayo, makarādayo ca macchappabhedā. Ruha janane, to, rohito. Vipāke madhurasattā
anya-e0810n0:1832_1: magguro, vaṇṇavikāro, majjatīti vā magguro, ūro, majja suddhiyaṃ, jjassa ggattaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1832_2: rasso ca, magguro, “ṅā khū”. Siṅgayuttatāya siṅgī, ṇo, nadādi, saṅgupi, sarati vātanti
anya-e0810n0:1832_3: vā siṅgī, sara hiṃsāyaṃ, a, rassa go, assi, niggahītāgamo, nadādi, siṅgī, “ṅa cve”.
anya-e0810n0:1832_4: Bala saṃvaraṇe, alo, lassa jo, balajo,”ṅa pā”. Muñja saddattho, muñjo. Pū pavane,
anya-e0810n0:1833_0: Sattakkhattuṃ vaṅkatīti sattavaṅko, “ṅa se”. Saha vaṅkena, saṃvijjamāno vā vaṅko
anya-e0810n0:1833_1: yassa savaṅko, “ṅa mve”. Naḷasaṇṭhāno mīno naḷamīno, “ṅa phौ-yo”. Kaḍi sannicayavadanekadesesu,
anya-e0810n0:1833_2: ṇvu, gaṇḍako, “ṅa mā”. Sasu hiṃsāyaṃ, u, assu, susukā, sakattheko, “ṅa-pौ-ṭaye”.
anya-e0810n0:1833_3: Sayanato passena pharatīti sapharī, nadādi, phara pharaṇe, sapharī dvīsu, “ṅa khū-mā”.
anya-e0810n0:1834_0: 673. Timiādayo satta mahāmacchā nāma. Tima addabhāve, timatīti timi, i, timi macchamattepi.
anya-e0810n0:1834_1: Gira niggiraṇe, ṇo, lattaṃ, issattaṃ. Timino galo timiṅgalo, niggahītāgamo. Vaṇṇena
anya-e0810n0:1834_2: piṅgalatimirasadisatāya timirapiṅgalo. Ā bhuso nandatīti ānando, nanda samiddhiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1834_3: Timino macche nandayatīti timinando. “Timindo”tipi pāṭho, timīnaṃ macchānaṃ indo
anya-e0810n0:1834_4: timindo. Adhiko āroho yassa ajjhāroho. Mahanto timi maccho mahātimi.
anya-e0810n0:1835_0: 674. Dvayaṃ “ṅa phe”iti khyāte. Pāsāṇasadisasaṇṭhāno maccho pāsāṇamaccho. Paṭha viyattiyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1835_1: vācāyaṃ, ino, ubhayatra dīgho, pāṭhīno, “ṅa-pौ”ti ca vadanti. Dvayaṃ baḷise. Vaṅkatīti
anya-e0810n0:1835_2: vaṅko, vaṅka koṭilye. Bala saṃvaraṇe, iso, ḷattaṃ. Macchavedhanampi, vidha vidhāne,
anya-e0810n0:1836_0: Tikaṃ kumbhīle. “Suṃsumāro”ti samuditanāmaṃ, sasatīti susu. Susu eva suṃsu, māretīti
anya-e0810n0:1836_1: māro, suṃsu eva māro suṃsumāro. Kena ubhati pūretīti kumbho, jalāsayo, tatra ulati
anya-e0810n0:1836_2: gacchatīti kumbhīlo, kumbhī vā ghaṭo, taṃ lātīti kumbhīlo. Na kamatīti nakko, kvi,
anya-e0810n0:1836_3: saññāsaddattā nassa pakati, nakka nāsane vā, curādi.
anya-e0810n0:1837_0: Dvayaṃ kacchape. Kucchito ūmi vego assa kummo, “pakāse vegabhaṅgesu, taraṅge ūmi
anya-e0810n0:1837_1: puṃthiya”nti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 10.21 rabhaso, “vege bhaṅgappakāsesu, bilāyaṃ ūmi vīciya”nti
anya-e0810n0:1837_2: nānatthasaṅgaho. Kacchena pivatīti kacchapo, ṇo, kamaṭhopyatra, kamu icchāyaṃ, aṭho.
anya-e0810n0:1838_0: 675. Dvayaṃ kakkaṭe. Kakatīti kakkaṭako. Sakatthe ko, kuka ādāne vā, aṭo, ussattaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1838_1: Kula santāne, bandhumhi ca, īro, kuṃ vā pathaviṃ lunātīti kuḷīro, īro. Dvayaṃ rattape.
anya-e0810n0:1838_2: Jalassa ūkā kimiviseso jalūkā, jalaṃ okaṃ gehaṃ etissāti vā jalūkā, ossū, uca samavāye,
anya-e0810n0:1838_3: ṇo, okaṃ. Rattaṃ rudhiraṃ pivatīti rattapā.
anya-e0810n0:1839_0: Tikaṃ maṇḍūke. Maṇḍa bhūsane, uko, dīgho. Dada dāne, uro, dvittaṃ. Bhī bhaye, sappato
anya-e0810n0:1839_1: bhāyatīti bheko, iko, īsse. Vassābhū, sāluro, plavopi. Dvayaṃ “tī”iti khyāte. Gaṇḍaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1839_2: vaccasannicayaṃ uppādetīti gaṇḍuppādo. Mahiyā latā mahīlatā, kiñculukopi. Kiñca culatīti kiñculuko, uko.
anya-e0810n0:1840_0: 676. Dvayaṃ muttāphoṭe. Sappa gamane, i, assi, sippi, thī. Su abhisave, tti, sutti.
anya-e0810n0:1840_1: Dvayaṃ saṅkhe. Khanu avadāraṇe, kvi, saṅkho. Samu upasame vā, kho, saṅkho. Kaṃ vāti
anya-e0810n0:1841_0: Dvayaṃ khuddasaṅkhajātiyaṃ. Saṅkhassa nakho iva saṅkhanakho. Dvayaṃ “kharu”iti khyāte.
anya-e0810n0:1841_1: Jale savatīti jalasutti, su pasave, tti. Samatīti sambuko, uko, bonto ca, “sambuko
anya-e0810n0:1842: 677. Dvayaṃ jalāsaye. Jalānaṃ āsayo patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ jalāsayo. Tesu jalāsayesu majjhe yo gambhīro agādho, so rahadākhyo, hara haraṇe, bhūvādi, do, vaṇṇavipariyayo, rahado.
anya-e0810n0:1843_0: Dvayaṃ udapāne. Udakaṃ pivanti asmiṃ, yu, kalopo. Pivanti asmiṃ pāno, so eva kūpo
anya-e0810n0:1843_1: pānakūpo, ku sadde, po, dīghādi, kūpo, kena ubhatīti vā kūpo, bhassa po. Andhupi,
anya-e0810n0:1843_2: andha dassanupasaṅghāte, curādi, u. Dvayaṃ samacaturassapokkharaṇiyaṃ. Khanu avadāraṇe,
anya-e0810n0:1843_3: kamme to, nalopo, dīghādi. Pokkharaṃ jalaṃ, taṃyogā ano, nadādi, pokkharaṇī.
anya-e0810n0:1844_0: 678. Tipādena mahato sadā agādhajalassa padmaṭṭhānassa ca padmasuññassa ca yogyatāya
anya-e0810n0:1844_1: nāmaṃ amara 10.28 gāthāyaṃ passitabbaṃ. Taḷa āghāte, tala patiṭṭhāyaṃ vā, āko, aparapakkhe
anya-e0810n0:1844_2: ḷattaṃ. Sara gamane, a, saro. Vapa bījanikkhepe, vapanti yāya vāpī, āyatacaturassāyampi.
anya-e0810n0:1844_3: Saratismā aso, nadādi, sarasī. Daha bhasmīkaraṇe, a, dadha dhāraṇe vā, dhassa ho.
anya-e0810n0:1845: Khuddako saro “pallala”ntyuccate. Yatra vassāsu adhikaṃ jalaṃ, gimhesu jāṇumattaṃ, sukkhatyeva vā, palla rakkhaṇe, curādi, alo, pallalaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1846_0: 679-680. Anotattādayo ete satta mahāsarā nāma. Tatra sūriyaraṃsisamphuṭṭhābhāvena
anya-e0810n0:1846_1: na avatapati udakametthāti anotatto. Kaṇṇamuṇḍapabbatasamīpattā kaṇṇamuṇḍo. Rathaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1846_2: karotīti rathakārako, yathākathañci ayaṃ byuppatti nāma, saññā pana lokatoyevāvagantabbā.
anya-e0810n0:1846_3: Chabbaṇṇadantavantatāya chaddanto, nāgarājā, tassa nivāsanaṭṭhānasamīpattā chaddanto,
anya-e0810n0:1846_4: saro. Kuṇālasakuṇā bahavo yattha santi kuṇālo. Mandākinī ākāsagaṅgāyampi vuttā. Bahavo
anya-e0810n0:1847_0: Dvayaṃ jalappāye dese kūpanikaṭe pasupānatthaṃ patthārādiracite jalāsaye. Āhūyante
anya-e0810n0:1847_1: pasavo atra pānāyāti āhāvo, ṇo, vuḍḍhāvādeso. Nipivanti asmiṃ nipānaṃ, yu. Dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1847_2: surakhāte, aporise devanimmiteti bhāvo, soṇḍeiccaññe. “Akhāto devakhātako”ti amara
anya-e0810n0:1848_0: 681. Nadyantaṃ nadīyaṃ. Savatīti, anto, nadādi, savantī. Ninnaṭṭhānaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0810n0:1848_1: ninnagā, kvi. Sanda pasavane, u, assittaṃ, vaṇṇavikāro, sindhu. Sara gamane, to,
anya-e0810n0:1848_2: ikārāgamo, saritā. Āpānaṃ nivāso āpo, samuddo, ṇo, taṃ gacchatīti āpagā. Nada abyattasadde,
anya-e0810n0:1849_0: Dvayaṃ gaṅgāyaṃ. Bhagīrathena raññā nibbattitā bhāgīrathīti lokiyā, asmākantu matena
anya-e0810n0:1849_1: nāmamattamevetaṃ tassāti sanniṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ sabbatra. Gacchatīti gaṅgā, gamito go,
anya-e0810n0:1849_2: tipathagatāpi, tayo saggamaccapātālapathe gatā tipathagatā. Sindhūnaṃ nadīnaṃ saṅgamo
anya-e0810n0:1849_3: melako sambhedo. Sammā bhijjanti asmiṃ sambhedo, saṃpubbo bhidi melane, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1850_0: 682. Gaṅgādikā imā pañca nadiyo mahānadī nāma. Aciraṃ sīghagamanaṃ etissamatthīti
anya-e0810n0:1850_1: aciravatī. Yamu uparame, uno, yamassa bhaginī vā yamunā, bhaginyatthe uno. Sarāni
anya-e0810n0:1850_2: bhavanti yāya avadhibhūtāyāti sarabhū, sara gatihiṃsācintāsu vā, ū, abhonto ca, sarabhū.
anya-e0810n0:1851_0: Candabhāgādikā ninnagā pañca mahānadito aññāsaṃ nadīnaṃ bhedā. Candabhāgo nāma pabbato,
anya-e0810n0:1851_1: tato pabhavatīti candabhāgā. Sarayogā vantu, majjhe sakārāgamo, nadādi, sarasvatī. Vanturatrātisaye.
anya-e0810n0:1852_0: 683. Niddosaṃ jalaṃ assaṃ nerañjarā, yadādi, atha vā nerañjarā nāma tūriyaviseso,
anya-e0810n0:1852_1: taṃsamānasaddatāya ayaṃ nadī nerañjarā nāma. Nānāgāhākulībhūtatāya kucchitaṃ veraṃ
anya-e0810n0:1852_2: assā kāverī, nadādi. Nammaṃ sukhaṃ dadātīti nammadā, ṇo. Ādinā sarāvatī vettavatī
anya-e0810n0:1853: Dvayaṃ hammiyadevālayādīsu jalamagge. Vārino nikkhamanamaggo vārimaggo. Nala gandhe, a, nadādi, ḷattaṃ, panāḷi, ayaṃ itthiyaṃ, pume ca.
anya-e0810n0:1854: Tikaṃ gāmadvāramhi asucipūtipaṅkasampuṇṇāyaṃ kāsuyaṃ. Cittaṃ dunotīti candanikā, yadādi.
anya-e0810n0:1855_0: 684-685. Jamu adane, alo, nadādi, bonto ca, ḷattaṃ, jambāḷī. Avalagganti asmiṃ oḷigallo,
anya-e0810n0:1855_1: lagga saṅge, alo, ḷattaṃ, assi, galopo, dvittañca. Sāddhapajjena padumassa nāmaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1855_2: Sarasi ruhatīti saroruhaṃ, ro. Sataṃ pattāni assa, padmavisesatthepyassa padmattā
anya-e0810n0:1855_3: visesato abhedo. Araṃ vindatīti aravindaṃ. Pada gamane, umo. Padumaṃ, anitthī. Paṅke
anya-e0810n0:1855_4: kaddame ruhatīti paṅkeruhaṃ, aluttasamāsoyaṃ. Nala gandhe, ino, ḷattaṃ. Pusa vuḍḍhimhi,
anya-e0810n0:1855_5: kharo, vuḍḍhi, sassa ko, pokkhare jale jātanti vā pokkharaṃ. Muḷālatopi uggantvā
anya-e0810n0:1855_6: pupphati muḷālapupphaṃ. Kaṃ jalaṃ alayati bhūsayatīti kamalaṃ, ala bhūsane. Bhisatopi
anya-e0810n0:1855_7: uggantvā pupphatīti bhisapupphaṃ. Kuse jale seti tiṭṭhatīti kusesayaṃ, ro, aluttasamāso.
anya-e0810n0:1855_8: Tāmarasampi, tāmaraṃ jalaṃ, “tāmaraṃ ghatamaṇṇo ce”ti tantatantaraṃ, tatra seti tiṭṭhatīti tāmarasaṃ, ro.
anya-e0810n0:1856_0: 686. Sitaṃ setaṃ kamalaṃ “puṇḍarīka”ntyuccate, puḍi khaṇḍane, muḍirityeke, iko, arāgamo
anya-e0810n0:1856_1: ca, massa po, issīkāro ca, puṇḍarīkaṃ. Rattaṃ tu kamalaṃ “kokanadaṃ, kokāsako”ti
anya-e0810n0:1856_2: coccate. Koke nādayatīti kokanādaṃ, ṇo. Rattuppale ca, “kokanadaṃ, kokanuda”ntipi
anya-e0810n0:1856_3: pāṭho, ke kanati dibbatīti vā kokanadaṃ, bhūvādi, do, asso. Kana dittikantigatīsu,
anya-e0810n0:1856_4: ke kāsatīti kokāsako, ṇvu, kāsa dittiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1857_0: Dvayaṃ kesare, ke jāyatīti ki, kamalādi, tasmiṃ jāyati, jalatīti vā kiñjakkho, kho,
anya-e0810n0:1857_1: nassa, lassa vā ko, niggahītāgamo, ke saratīti, a, sattamiyā alopo, dvayamanitthī.
anya-e0810n0:1857_2: Dvayaṃ padmādidaṇḍe. Daṇḍasadisatāya daṇḍo. Nala gandhe, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1858_0: 687. Dvayaṃ muḷāle. Visa peraṇe, vassa bho, bhisaṃ, bhāsa dittiyaṃ vā, ākārassi.
anya-e0810n0:1858_1: Mūle jāyatīti muḷālo, aññatthe alo, rassādi, ḷattañca, mūla patiṭṭhāyaṃ vā, alo,
anya-e0810n0:1859_0: Dvayaṃ kaṇṇikāyaṃ. Bījassa koso ākaro bījakoso. Kaṇṇe karīyatīti kaṇṇikā, kaṇṇālaṅkāro,
anya-e0810n0:1859_1: taṃsadisasaṇṭhānatāya kaṇṇikā, padumādīnaṃ samūhe gahane vanetyattho. Saṇa dāne,
anya-e0810n0:1859_2: ḍo, saṇḍaṃ, “saṇḍaṃ paddhādisaṅghāte, gopatimhi pume bhave”ti nānatthasaṅgaho.
anya-e0810n0:1860_0: 688. Dvayaṃ padmakumudādisāmaññe, tathā hi padmaṃ mahoppalaṃ sitoppalamuccate, “kuvalayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1860_1: uppalañca, nīlamindīvaranti hi”iti byāḍi, “uppalañca kuvalayaṃ, nīlamindīvaraṃ mata”nti
anya-e0810n0:1860_2: bhāguri ca, “romo siti ca nīlo, kuvalayamindīvarañca nīlambuja”nti tu vararuci. “Kuvalayadalasāmopyaṅgadadhiti
anya-e0810n0:1860_3: paridhū sara”nti māladhi, mādhavo ca, tatra pubbakamatamiha nissīyate. Yadyevaṃ kathamuppalasaddena
anya-e0810n0:1860_4: nīluppalādīsveva buddhi, na pana mahoppalādimhīti? Vuccate – sāmaññepi dhaññatte
anya-e0810n0:1860_5: yathā dhaññasaddena kalamādīsveva buddhi, na pana muggādīsu, evamihāpi. Upubbo pā
anya-e0810n0:1860_6: pāne, alo, dvittaṃ, udake plavatīti vā uppalaṃ, yadādi. Kuyā pathaviyā valayaṃ iva
anya-e0810n0:1861: Dvayaṃ nīluppale. Nīlavaṇṇe, a, nīlaṃ, indatīti indī, nadādi, indī lakkhī, tassā varaṃ indīvaraṃ, inda paramissariye vā, īro.
anya-e0810n0:1862_0: Asmiṃ nīluppale sete kumudaṃ nāma. Kuyaṃ modate kumudaṃ, ṇo. Assa padumādino kando
anya-e0810n0:1862_1: sālūkamuccate. Kaṃ sukhaṃ dadātīti kando, kanda avhāne vā rodane ca. Sala gamanattho
anya-e0810n0:1863_0: 689. Tikaṃ rattārattasāmaññe. Kamalato aññatarasmiṃ jalakusume, na tu ratteyeva,
anya-e0810n0:1863_1: sugandhena yuttaṃ sogandhikaṃ. Kassa hāraṃ iva sobhākarattā kallahāraṃ, lāgamo, dvittañca.
anya-e0810n0:1864_0: Dvayaṃ sevāle. Udakaṃ sevatīti sevālo, alo, vakārāgamo, isse ca. Nīlatīti nīlikā,
anya-e0810n0:1864_1: nīla vaṇṇe, iko, nīlavaṇṇayogato vā nīlikā, sevalopi, dvayaṃ padmayutte dese, padmasamūhe
anya-e0810n0:1864_2: ca. Naḷinī ca paṅkajinī visinī ca sarojinī padminīti pariyāyā. “Padmasaṇḍaṃ tadākare”ti
anya-e0810n0:1864_3: hi pariyāyaṃ ratanamālāyaṃ mādhavo, visaṃ samaṃ, tabbantatāya visinī, ino, nadādi.
anya-e0810n0:1865_0: 690. Tilabījādayo sevālo nāma. Tatra tilabījappamāṇaṃ jalasaṇṭhitaṃ nīlādivaṇṇayuttaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1865_1: tilabījaṃ nāma. Saṅkho nāma sapatto appakaṇḍo ukhāpidhānādippamāṇo samūlo eko sevālaviseso.
anya-e0810n0:1865_2: Paṇako nāma bhamarasaṇṭhāno nīlavaṇṇo eko sevālaviseso, paṇa saṅkhāte, ṇvu, paṇako.
anya-e0810n0:1867: Iti sakalabyākaraṇamahāvanāsaṅgañāṇacārinā kavikuñjarakesarinā dhīmatā sirimahācaturaṅgabalena mahāmaccena viracitāyaṃ abhidhānappadīpikāvaṇṇanāyaṃ bhūkaṇḍavaṇṇanā samattā.
anya-e0810n0:1870_0: 691. Iha vakkhamāne sāmaññakaṇḍe sāṅgopāṅgehi aṅgaupāṅgadvayasahitehi visesyādhīnehi
anya-e0810n0:1870_1: visesyāyattehi visesanasaddehi sobhanādīhi saṃkiṇṇehi aññamaññavijātiyatthehi dabbakriyāguṇādīhi
anya-e0810n0:1870_2: anekatthehi samayavaṇṇādīhi abyayehi cirassamādīhi ca kamā kamato vaggā kathyante,
anya-e0810n0:1870_3: te ca pubbavaggasannissayā, tathā hi sobhanādayo devamanussādīsu visesanabhāvena
anya-e0810n0:1870_4: sambandhā, kriyādayo tu tadādhāratāya, samayādayo vācakatāya, cirassamādayo taṃkriyāvisesanabhāvena,
anya-e0810n0:1871_0: 692. Iha satthe bhiyyo rūpantarā liṅgavinicchayo, so atrāpi vagge bhiyyo rūpantarāyevāti
anya-e0810n0:1871_2: sabbe guṇasaddā, dabbasaddā, kriyāsaddā ca visesyādhīnabhāvena hetunāyeva, na bhiyyo
anya-e0810n0:1871_3: rūpantarāpi visesanasaddena samaliṅgino siyunti, yathā – sobhanā itthī, sobhano puriso, sobhanaṃ cittaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1872_0: 693-696. Subhantaṃ sobhane. Subha sobhane, yu. Ruca dittiyaṃ, iro. Sādha saṃsiddhiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1872_1: u. Manaṃ tosetīti manuññaṃ. Ñā parimāṇatosananisāmanesu, antassukāro, manaṃ ā bhuso
anya-e0810n0:1872_2: tosetīti vā manuññaṃ, tadā “mano añña”nti chedo, ālopo. Cara gatibhakkhanesu, ṇvu,
anya-e0810n0:1872_3: carati cittametthāti cāru. Suṭṭhu darīyate sundaraṃ, dara dāraṇe. Vagga gamane, u,
anya-e0810n0:1872_4: vaggu. Mano ramati asmiṃ. Kamu icchāyaṃ, to. Harati cittaṃ hārī, ṇī. Mana ñāṇe, ju,
anya-e0810n0:1872_5: mano javati yasmiṃ vā mañju, nalopo. Piyasīlayuttatāya pesalaṃ, piyassa pe, īssattaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1872_6: Bhadi kalyāṇe, do. Vā gatiyaṃ, mo. Kala saṅkhyāne, yāṇo. Manaṃ appeti vaḍḍhetīti
anya-e0810n0:1872_7: manāpaṃ, mano appoti yasminti vā manāpaṃ, āpa pāpuṇane, apādipubbo ca. Labhitabbanti
anya-e0810n0:1872_8: laddhaṃ, to, sakatthe ko. Subhatīti subhaṃ, sundarena sabhāvena bhavatīti vā subhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1873_0: Puṅgavantaṃ uttame, ubbhuto atyatthaṃ uttamo, ubhasaddato ubbhutatthato visesatthe
anya-e0810n0:1873_1: tamo, uggatatamattā vā uttamo. Vara patthanāyaṃ, pavaro. Iṭṭhapaccaye vuḍḍhassa jādeso,
anya-e0810n0:1873_2: jeṭṭho. Pakaṭṭhaṃ mukhaṃ ārambho assa pamukho. Natthi uttaro uttamo yasmā anuttaro.
anya-e0810n0:1873_3: Pamukho ca anuttaro cāti dvando. Apādipubbe varo. Mukhamiva mukhyo, ivatthe yo. Padadhātīti
anya-e0810n0:1873_4: padhānaṃ, yu. Pamukhabhāve tiṭṭhatīti pāmokkho, ubhayatrāpi vuḍḍhi. Pakaṭṭhaṃ rātīti
anya-e0810n0:1873_5: paraṃ, ṇo. “Agga”nti jānitabbanti aggaññaṃ, “agga”nti pamānitabbanti vā aggaññaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1873_6: Uttaro uttamasadiso. Padhānabhāvaṃ nītaṃ paṇītaṃ, nī naye, kammani ṇo. Paraṃ paccanīkaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1873_7: māretīti paramaṃ, pakaṭṭhabhāve ramatītivā paramaṃ, ṇo. Iyiṭṭhesu pasatthassa, vuḍḍhassa
anya-e0810n0:1873_8: ca so, seyyo, seṭṭho ca, “kvacāsavaṇṇaṃ lutte”ti isse. Gāmaṃ netīti gāmaṇi, “tassīlādīsu
anya-e0810n0:1873_9: ṇī tvāvī cā”ti ṇī, rasso, gāmaṇi. Santatamatāya sattamo, santato tamo, santassa ca
anya-e0810n0:1873_10: so. Visesīyateti visiṭṭho, sisa visesane, to. Ara gamane, ṇyo, ikārāgamo, ariyo.
anya-e0810n0:1873_11: Natthi aggo yasmā nāgo, dīghādi, galopo ca. I gatiyaṃ, ṇvu, isse, alopo ca, eko,
anya-e0810n0:1873_12: sadisarahitatāya vā ekībhāve tiṭṭhatīti eko, ko. Ussāpeti paccanīketi usabho, usa
anya-e0810n0:1873_13: dāhe, abho. Aja gamane, a, jassa go, dvittaṃ, aggo. Muca mocane, hīnamajjhimabhāvehi
anya-e0810n0:1873_14: muccatīti mokkho, to, tassa kho. Mokkha mocane vā, a. Padhānabhāvaṃ gacchatīti puṅgavo,
anya-e0810n0:1873_15: yadādi, pukkhalopyatra, pusa vuḍḍhimhi, alo, sassa kho, asarūpadvittaṃ. Ete cuttamādayo
anya-e0810n0:1873_16: samāsagāpi asamāsagāpi uttamatthavācakā. Amarakose pana nāgosabhapuṅgavānaṃ samāsagatteyeva
anya-e0810n0:1876_0: Tassattho – byagghādayo kammadhārayasamāse sati uttarapadībhūtā seṭṭhatthavisayā
anya-e0810n0:1876_1: pubbapadassa seṭṭhatthavācakā pulliṅgā ca bhavanti, yathā “purisabyaggho, munipuṅgavo”iccādi.
anya-e0810n0:1876_2: Sīhādayo, ādinā varāhapuṇḍarīkadhorayhasovīrādayo ca samāsagā kammadhārayasamāse
anya-e0810n0:1876_3: uttarapadabhūtā seṭṭhatthavācakā pumeva bhavanti, yathā “sakyasīho, kavikuñjaro,
anya-e0810n0:1877_0: 697. Cittassa, akkhino ca pītijanakaṃ vatthu abyāsekaṃ, asecanañca nāma, na byāsiñcanti
anya-e0810n0:1877_1: nakkharanti nayanamanāni yasmāti abyāsekaṃ, asecanañca, na byāsiñcanti ca yasmiṃ
anya-e0810n0:1877_2: āgantukabhūtāni aññarasānīti vā abyāsekaṃ, asecanañca. Ṇo, yu ca.
anya-e0810n0:1878_0: Chakkaṃ iṭṭhe vatthumhi. Icchitabbaṃ, esitabbanti vā iṭṭhaṃ, isu icchāyaṃ, isa gavesane
anya-e0810n0:1878_1: ca, to. Subhattaṃ gacchatīti subhagaṃ, kvi. Hadaye sādhu, hadayassa vā piyanti hajjaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1878_2: ṇo, dantassa lopo, dyassa jjo. Dayitabbaṃ ādātabbanti dayitaṃ, to. Valla saṃvaraṇe,
anya-e0810n0:1878_3: kammani abho. Piyāyitabbanti piyaṃ,pī tappanakantīsu, ṇyo, rassādi.
anya-e0810n0:1879_0: 698. Tikaṃ tucche. Tuca vināse, cho. Rica viyojanasambajjhanesu, sambajjhanaṃ missanaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1879_1: to, sakatthe ko. Sunassa hitaṃ suññaṃ, yo, nyassa ñño, suna gatiyaṃ vā, yo. Dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1879_2: asāre. Phala nipphattiyaṃ, u, gu vā. Pubbatra gonto, asse, pheggu.
anya-e0810n0:1880_0: Tikaṃ pavitte. Medha hiṃsāsaṅgamesu, medhīyate saṅgamīyate mejjhaṃ, ṇyo, jhassa jho,
anya-e0810n0:1880_1: asarūpadvittaṃ. Pu pavane, to, dīghādi. Vuḍḍhāvādeso, ikārāgamo ca. Dvayaṃ aviraddhe.
anya-e0810n0:1880_2: Na virajjhatīti aviraddho, radha hiṃsāparādhāpagamanesu, to. “Dhaḍhabhahehi dhaḍhā
anya-e0810n0:1880_3: ce”ti tassa dho. Paṇa byavahārathutīsu, ṇvu, viraddhavohārena na paṇāmetīti apaṇṇako.
anya-e0810n0:1881: 699-701. Dvayaṃ jātyācārādinā anindite. Upubbo, papubbo ca kasa vilekhane, hiṃsāyañca, to, “sādisantapucchabhanjahaṃsādīhi ṭṭho”ti sahādibyañjanena tassa ṭṭho.
anya-e0810n0:1882_0: Gārayhantaṃ jātyācārādinā nindite. Nihīyateti nihīno, hā cāge, ino, dīgho. Apādipubbe
anya-e0810n0:1882_1: hīno. Lama nindāyaṃ, ṇvu, lāmako. Kiṭa gatiyaṃ, pati nipubbo tu nindāyaṃ, ṭho, patikiṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1882_3: avaditabboti avajjo, tabbhāvattho cettha akāro. Vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, ṇyo, dyassa
anya-e0810n0:1882_4: jjo. Kucchā sañjātā assa kucchito. Adhobhāge jāto adhamo, ossattaṃ. Uma nindāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1882_5: kamme a, sakatthe ko, usso, omako. Garahitabboti gārayho, garaha nindāyaṃ, ṇyo, vaṇṇavipariyayo.
anya-e0810n0:1883: Dvayaṃ malayutte. Malayuttatāya malīno, ino, dīgho. Assatthyatthe ī, masapaccaye malīmaso, kaccaraṃ, maladūsitampi, kucchitaṃ caratīti kaccaraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1884_0: Tipādaṃ vipule. Braha vuddhiyaṃ, rājādi, brahā. Maha pūjāyaṃ, anto. Pula mahatte,
anya-e0810n0:1884_1: vipulaṃ. Sala gamane, visālaṃ, ṇo. Patha saṅkhyāne, ulo, assu, puthulaṃ, umhi puthu.
anya-e0810n0:1884_2: Gara secane, u, garu. Ara gamane, u, assu, uru. Tanu vitthāre, to, iṇṇādeso, tassa
anya-e0810n0:1885_0: Vaṭharantaṃ thūle. Pī tappanakantīsu, ino. Thūla paribrūhane, a. Pīdhātuto īvaro,
anya-e0810n0:1885_1: pīvaraṃ. Lapaccaye thullaṃ, rassādi. Vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vadatīti vaṭharaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1886: Dvayaṃ sannicite. Ānipubbo ci caye, kamme to, ācitaṃ, nicitañca.
anya-e0810n0:1887_0: 702. Siloko sabbasmiṃ. Saratīti sabbaṃ, vo, rassa ca vo. Saṃpubbo asu khepane, to,
anya-e0810n0:1887_1: samattaṃ, atha vā sama tima vekallabye, to, samattaṃ. Na khiyatīti akhilaṃ, lo, akhilaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1887_2: nikhilañca tathā. Saka sattiyaṃ, alo, kalābhi avayavehi saha vattateti vā sakalaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1887_3: Sesato avasiṭṭhato niggataṃ nissesaṃ. Kasa gamane, ino, ṇattaṃ, kasiṇaṃ. Na sesaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1887_4: avasiṭṭhaṃ asesaṃ. Aggena sikharena saṅgataṃ samaggaṃ. Kate samāse pubbanipāto abhidhānā.
anya-e0810n0:1887_5: Ūna parihāne, na ūnaṃ asmiṃ anūnakaṃ, ko.
anya-e0810n0:1888_0: 703. Bahulantaṃ bahutte, bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti bhūri, bhū sattāyaṃ, ri, bhūri, dīghādi,
anya-e0810n0:1888_1: rassanto, īmhi bhūrī, medhā. Pahu sattiyaṃ, to, ukārāgamo, papubbo hū sattāyaṃ vā,
anya-e0810n0:1888_2: rasso. Paci vitthāre, uro, pacuraṃ. Bhī bhaye, bhāyati yasmāti bhiyyo, dvittaṃ. Sampahotīti
anya-e0810n0:1888_3: sampahulaṃ, lo. Baha vuḍḍhiyaṃ, u, bahu. Yebhuyyasaddo bahulatthavācako pāṭipadiko.
anya-e0810n0:1889: Dvayaṃ bahigate. Bahi jātaṃ bāhiraṃ, iraṇa.
anya-e0810n0:1890_0: 704-706. Yesaṃ padatthānaṃ mattaṃ pamāṇaṃ satādito paraṃ adhikaṃ bhavati, te parosatādī.
anya-e0810n0:1890_1: Ādinā parosahassādi. Satato paro parosataṃ. Sahassato paro parosahassaṃ, parassa
anya-e0810n0:1890_2: pubbanipāto abhidhānā parasaddā okārāgamo. Pajjaṃ appe. Parito attaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ parittaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1890_3: Sukha takriyāyaṃ, takriyā sukhanaṃ, umo. Suca socane vā. Khuda pipāsāyaṃ, do, khuddaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1890_4: Thuca pasāde, ṇo. Ala bhūsanapariyattinivāraṇesu, po, lassa po, appaṃ. Kisa tanukaraṇe,
anya-e0810n0:1890_5: ṇo. Tanu vitthāre. Ci caye, ulo, dvittaṃ, cullaṃ, nīce pana cullo. Mā māne, chadādīhi
anya-e0810n0:1890_6: to. Rassādi, mattā, itthiyaṃ. Lisa appībhāve, a. Lū chedane, luyateti lavo, a. Aṇa
anya-e0810n0:1890_7: gatyattho, u. Kaṇa sadde, a, kaṇo. Lavādīhi saha kaṇo pume, vuttañca amarakose “pume
anya-e0810n0:1891_0: Ñattantaṃ samīpe. Saṅgatā āpo yasmiṃ samīpaṃ, āssī. Pādito yadādinā kaṭo, nikaṭo,
anya-e0810n0:1891_1: natthi kaṭo āvaraṇaṃ etassāti vā nikaṭo. Sadasmā to, āsanno. Kaṇṭhaṃ samīpaṃ upagataṃ
anya-e0810n0:1891_2: upakaṭṭho. “Kaṇṭho gale sanniṭṭhāne, sadde madanapādape”ti hi nānatthasaṅgaho, idha
anya-e0810n0:1891_3: pana kaṇṭhassa kaṭṭhādeso, ṇalopo vā. Abhyāsīdatīti abhyāso. “Abhyāso tu samīpamhi,
anya-e0810n0:1891_4: pumā abhyasanepi ce”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 21.67 rabhaso. Saha antena santikaṃ, sakatthe
anya-e0810n0:1891_5: iko. Vidūrapaṭipakkhattā avidūraṃ. Saṅgataṃ antaṃ sāmantaṃ, sasaddassa dīgho, niggahītassa
anya-e0810n0:1891_6: mo, saṃ nipubbopi kaṭṭhasaddo samīpatthoyevāti dassanatthaṃ udāhaṭaṃ, kasa vilekhane
anya-e0810n0:1891_7: vā, to, sannikaṭṭhaṃ. Antikabhāvaṃ upagataṃ upantikaṃ. Saha kāsena vattate sakāsaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1891_8: kāsa dittiyaṃ. Antayogā antikaṃ, iko. Ñāyateti ñattaṃ, to, sakāsasaddena saniḍasadesasavidhasamariyādasavesāpi
anya-e0810n0:1891_9: gayhanti. Saha niḍena, saha desena, saha vidhāya, saha mariyādāya, saha vesena vattateti
anya-e0810n0:1892: Dvayaṃ dūramatte. Dukkhena arati yaṃ dūraṃ. Vipapubbo kaṭṭhasaddo dūre, sakatthe ko, vippakaṭṭhakaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1893_0: 707. Tikaṃ ghane, natthi antaraṃ chiddaṃ yassa. Hanatismā a, hassa gho ca, ghanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1893_1: Samu upasame, do, sandaṃ. Pādo viraḷe. Viramatīti viraḷaṃ, a, vaṇṇavikāro. Piyo lavo
anya-e0810n0:1893_2: appo yasmiṃ pelavaṃ, piyassa pe, pili gamane vā, avo. Tanu appādīsupi.
anya-e0810n0:1894_0: Dvayaṃ dīghe. Yata āyatane, āyataṃ. I gamane vā, to, bhūvādi, isse, e aya, dīghādi.
anya-e0810n0:1894_1: Di khaye, gho, dīghādi. Tikaṃ vaṭṭale. Niggataṃ talaṃ asmāti nittalaṃ. Vaṭṭa vaṭṭane,
anya-e0810n0:1895_0: 708. Ucchitantaṃ unnate. Ci caye, uccinotīti ucco, a. Unnamatīti unnato. Tuja hiṃsāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1895_1: phalane ca, a, tuṅgo. Uggataṃ aggaṃ assa udaggo. Uddhaṃ sito ucchito, si sevāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1895_2: to, sassa cho, asarūpadvittaṃ, ucchito. Paṃsupi, pakaṭṭho aṃsu ditti yassa paṃsu.
anya-e0810n0:1896: Tikaṃ vāmane. Uddhaṃ na añcatīti nīco, añca gamane, ṇo, akārañakārānaṃ lopo, nisaddo atra nisedhe. Rasa sadde, so, rasso. Vā gamane, mano, vāmano.
anya-e0810n0:1897: Tikaṃ ujumhi. Na jimhaṃ kuṭilaṃ ajimhaṃ. Tasmiṃ avaṅkatāya pakaṭṭho guṇo yassa paguṇo. Aja gamane, u, assu, uju.
anya-e0810n0:1898_0: 709. Chakkaṃ vaṅke. Aladhātumhā aro, ḷattaṃ. Vela gamane, to, dvittādi, virūpena
anya-e0810n0:1898_1: ilayatīti vā vellitaṃ, to, ila gamane. Vaṅka koṭilye, a. Kuṭa chedane, ilo, kuṭa
anya-e0810n0:1898_2: koṭilye vā. Hā cāge, kattari mo, dvittaṃ, vaṇṇavipariyayādi, jimhaṃ. Kuñca koṭilye,
anya-e0810n0:1899_0: Pañcakaṃ dhuve. Dhu gatitheriyesu, a, uvādeso. Sassate nicce bhavo sassato. Nicco
anya-e0810n0:1899_1: vutto abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkā. Sadā kāle bhavo sadātano. Sanasaddo niccattho sattamyanto
anya-e0810n0:1899_2: nipāto, sanaṃsaddo vā abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkā, tatra bhavo sanantano, ubhayatrāpi
anya-e0810n0:1900_0: 710. Ekeneva bhāvādirūpena kālassa byāpako nibbānākāsādikūṭaṭṭhoti pakāsito. Māyāniccalayantādīsu
anya-e0810n0:1900_1: kūṭaṃ vakkhati abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkā. Niccalo tiṭṭhatīti kūṭaṭṭho, pabbato, kūṭaṭṭho
anya-e0810n0:1901_0: Dvayaṃ lahuke. Laṅgha gati sosanesu, u, ghassa hattaṃ, niggahītalopo, lahu, laghupi.
anya-e0810n0:1901_1: Saṃpubbe, satthikakapaccaye ca sallahukaṃ. Tikaṃ saṅkhyāte. Khyā kathane. Gaṇa saṅkhyāne.
anya-e0810n0:1902_0: 711. Tikaṃ tikhiṇe. Tija nisāne, ho, vaṇṇavikāro, tiṇhaṃ. Tija nisāne, ino, jassa
anya-e0810n0:1902_1: kho, ṇattaṃ, tikhiṇaṃ. Tijatoyeva vo, jassa vo, battaṃ, tibbaṃ. Tikaṃ caṇḍe. Caṇḍa
anya-e0810n0:1902_2: kope, caṇḍaṃ. Ujja balapālanesu, a, jjassa ggo, uggaṃ. Khara vināse, a, kharaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1903_0: Catukkaṃ jaṅgame. Gamu gamane, dvittādi, jaṅgamaṃ. Cara gamane, a, caraṃ. Tasati
anya-e0810n0:1903_1: calatīti tasaṃ, tasa ubbege, ubbego bhayaṃ, calanañca. Carabhismā caro, majjhe dīgho,
anya-e0810n0:1903_2: carācaraṃ, abbhāsante vā rāgamo, carācaraṃ, sabbatra apaccayo. Iṅgampi, iṅgatīti iṅgo, iṅga gamane.
anya-e0810n0:1904: 712-713. Dvayaṃ calanamatte. Kampa calane. Cala kampane, sabbatra kattari yu.
anya-e0810n0:1905: Dvayaṃ adhike. Atiriccatīti atiritto, rica viyojanasampaṭicchanagatīsu, to, bhujādi. Adhi eti gacchatīti adhiko, i gamane, ko.
anya-e0810n0:1906: Jaṅgamā pāṇito añño thāvaro nāma, tiṭṭhatīti thāvaro, ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ, varo, vaṇṇavikāro, thāvaro, ṭhāvaropītyeke.
anya-e0810n0:1907: Catukkaṃ lole. Lola ummādane. Cala kampane, dvittādi, cañcalaṃ. Tara plavanataraṇesu, taraṃ lātīti taralaṃ, ete calanamattepi.
anya-e0810n0:1908_0: Catukkaṃ purāṇe. Pure bhavo purāṇo, yadādinā napaccayo, ṇattaṃ. Purā bhavo purātano,
anya-e0810n0:1908_1: tanapaccayo. Sanaṃsaddo iha sattamyanto purāṇatthe nipāto. Tatra bhavo sanantano,
anya-e0810n0:1908_2: pubbe viya sanaṃsaddo vā, tatrāpi pubbe viya niggahītāgamo. Ciraṃsaddo nipāto sattamyanto
anya-e0810n0:1908_3: purāṇattho iha gayhate, tatra bhavo cirantano. Niggahītalopo cirakālādīsu.
anya-e0810n0:1909_0: Catukkaṃ abhinave. Patito aggo yassa paccaggho, gassa gho, bahuko vā aggho yassa
anya-e0810n0:1909_1: paccaggho, anekatthattā hi upasagganipātānaṃ bahukattho ettha patisaddo. Navasaddāsakatthe
anya-e0810n0:1909_2: tano, navassa nubhāvo ca. Navo eva abhinavo, nu thutiyaṃ, a, navo.
anya-e0810n0:1910_0: 714-715. Pañcakaṃ kakkhaḷe. Kantatīti kurūraṃ, ūro, kantassa ca kurādeso, kara hiṃsāyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1910_1: vā, ūro, assu. Kaṭha kicchajīvane, muddhajadutiyanto dhātu, ino, vaṇṇavipariyaye
anya-e0810n0:1910_2: kathinantipi. Dala vidāraṇe, ho, ḷattaṃ, baha vuddhimhi vā, bassa do, ḷanto ca, daḷhaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1910_3: daha bhasmīkaraṇe vā, a, ḷanto ca. Niṭṭhātīti niṭṭhuraṃ, ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ, uro.
anya-e0810n0:1910_4: Kakkha hasane, alo, ḷattaṃ. Kaṭhoraṃ, jaraṭhaṃ, muttimaṃ, muttampi, kaṭha kicchajīvane,
anya-e0810n0:1910_5: oro. Jara jīraṇe, bhūvādi, ṭho. Mutti kathinyaṃ, taṃyogā muttimaṃ. Apaccaye muttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1911_0: Sattakaṃ ante. Ama gamane, to, anto, anitthī. Paripubbo pariyanto. Papubbo panto.
anya-e0810n0:1911_1: Pacchā bhavo pacchimo. Ante bhavo antimo, imo. Jaghane sādhu jighaññaṃ, yo, assi.
anya-e0810n0:1911_2: Caratismā imo. Carimaṃ, carasaddā vā imo.
anya-e0810n0:1912_0: Catukkaṃ paṭhame. Pubba pūraṇe, a. Aggaṃ seṭṭhepi vuttaṃ. Paṭha viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1912_1: amo, patha saṅkhyāne vā, amo, vaṇṇavikāro, paṭhamaṃ, pathamantipi. Ādīyate paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1912_2: gaṇhīyateti ādi, i, pume, sosaddo ādissa pulliṅgattajotako, purimaṃ, puratthāpi, bhavatthe imatthā.
anya-e0810n0:1913: Dvayaṃ anucchavike. Paṭiggahito rūpo patirūpo. Chaviyā anurūpaṃ anucchavikaṃ, sakatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:1914: Dvayaṃ niratthake. Mūha vecitte, a, hassa gho. Natthi attho yassa, sakatthe ko.
anya-e0810n0:1915: 716. Dvayaṃ pākaṭe. Visiṭṭho attā yassa byattaṃ. Puṭa pakāsane, puṭa vikāsane vā.
anya-e0810n0:1916: Tikaṃ mudumhi. Muda modane, u, muda saṃsagge vā. Sobhanaṃ kumāraṃ kanti yassa. Ku sadde, alo, manto ca.
anya-e0810n0:1917_0: Dvayaṃ indriyaggayhe. Akkhaṃ indriyaṃ patigataṃ nissitaṃ, akkhena vā patigataṃ paccakkhaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1917_1: kate samāse patisaddassa pubbanipāto abhidhānato. Indriyaṃ cakkhādikaṃ, tena gayhaṃ indriyaggayhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1918: Dvayaṃ apaccakkhe. Paccakkhaviparītaṃ apaccakkhaṃ, paramāṇvādi. Indriyaṃ atikkantaṃ atindriyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1919_0: 717. Catukkaṃ aññatthe. Itarasaddo pāṭipadiko aññatthavācako, idaṃsaddā vā taro aññatthe,
anya-e0810n0:1919_1: daṃlopo ca. Aññasaddā sakatthe taro. Eko seṭṭhepi vutto. Aññasaddo pāṭipadiko bhinnattho,
anya-e0810n0:1920: Tikaṃ nānappakāre. Bahavo vidhā pakārā assa bahuvidho. Vicittā vidhā yassa vividho.
anya-e0810n0:1921: Dvayaṃ anivārite. Natthi bādho nisedho yassa abādhaṃ. Natthi aggaḷaṃ assa.
anya-e0810n0:1922: 718. Catukkaṃ asahāye. Asahāyatthe ekato ākī, cco, ko ca, ekākī, ekacco. Aññatthepi ekako vutto. Samā tulyatthā.
anya-e0810n0:1923: Anekasambandhini sādhāraṇādidvayaṃ. Saha ādhāraṇena vattatīti sādhāraṇaṃ, yadādi, thiyaṃ sādhāraṇī, sādhāraṇā ca. Samānameva sāmaññaṃ, yo, sāmaññā itthiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1924: Dvayaṃ appāvakāse. Sambādhate asmiṃ, ro. Saṃsaddā kaṭo, yadādi, saṅkaṭaṃ, saha āvaraṇena vattatīti vā saṅkaṭaṃ, sahattho saṃsaddo.
anya-e0810n0:1925: 719. Vāmaṃ kaḷevaraṃ vāmakāyo sabyaṃ nāma. “Sabyaṃ vāme ca dakkhiṇe”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 21.84 hi ajayo, sava gatiyaṃ, yo. Dakkhiṇaṃ kaḷevaraṃ apasabyaṃ, sabyato apagataṃ apasabyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1926: Dvayaṃ viparīte. Paṭikūlati āvaratīti paṭikūlaṃ, kūla āvaraṇe. Apasabyaṃ dakkhiṇepi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1927: Duradhigamanto pathaṃ gahanaṃ, yathā – gahanametaṃ satthaṃ, dubbivekamiccattho. Gacchantaṃ hantīti gahanaṃ, gahaṇampi, yadādi. Kala gamane, ilo, kaliṃ lātīti vā kalilaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1928: 720-721. Dvayaṃ bahuppakāre. Uccañca taṃ avacañceti uccāvacaṃ, kammadhārayo. Bahavo bhedā assa.
anya-e0810n0:1929: Tikaṃ janādinirantaragate. Saṅka saṅkāyaṃ, to. Kira pakkhepavikkhipanesu, to, iṇṇādeso. Saṅka saṅkāyaṃ, ulo, saṅkulaṃ, saṃpubbo kula santāne vā, ro.
anya-e0810n0:1930_0: Siloko cheke. Kato abhyāsito hattho padattho yena katahattho. Kusa silesane, alo.
anya-e0810n0:1930_1: Pakaṭṭhā vīṇā assa. Abhijānāti abhiñño. Sikkha vijjopādāne, to. Puṇa kammani subhe,
anya-e0810n0:1930_2: ro. Paṭa gamane, u. Chidi dvidhākaraṇe, kattari a, dassa ko. Cata yācane, uro. Dala
anya-e0810n0:1930_3: dittiyaṃ, kho, lassa ko, dakkha vuḍḍhiyaṃ vā, a, dakkha vuḍḍhihiṃsāgatisīghesu vā.
anya-e0810n0:1930_4: Pisa hiṃsābaladānaniketanesu, alo, pesalo. Katamukho, katīpi, katasaddo abhyāsitattho,
anya-e0810n0:1930_5: kataṃ abyāsitaṃ mukhaṃ upāyo anenāti katamukho. Kataṃ assatthīti katī.
anya-e0810n0:1931_0: Sattakaṃ bāle. Bala pāṇane, balatīti bālo, assāsitapassāsitamattena jīvati, na paññājīvitenātyattho.
anya-e0810n0:1931_1: Dā kucchāyaṃ gatiyaṃ vā, tu, dvittaṃ, rassādi. Jala dhaññe, a, ḷattaṃ. Mūha vecitte,
anya-e0810n0:1931_2: lo, vaṇṇavipariyayo, mūḷho. Manda jaḷatte. Bālyayogā bāliso, iso. Añño, yathājātopi,
anya-e0810n0:1931_3: na jānātīti añño. Yādiso jāto viveko yathājāto.
anya-e0810n0:1932_0: 722. Tikaṃ bhāgyasampanne. Puññaṃ, sukatañca yasmiṃ atthi puññavā, sukatī, vantu,
anya-e0810n0:1932_1: ī ca. Dhanaṃ gahaṇaṃ laddhoti dhañño, yo. Dvayaṃ mahāvīriye. Mahādhiti mahāvīriyo.
anya-e0810n0:1933: Dvayaṃ bahulahadaye, pasatthahadaye ca. Hadayaṃ bahulaṃ, pasatthañca yassa hadayī, hadayālu ca, tabbahule ī, ālu ca, suhadayopi.
anya-e0810n0:1934: 723. Dvayaṃ haṭṭhacitte. “Hāsamano vikubbāno, pamāno haṭṭhamānaso”ti amara 21.7 amarasīho. Dvayaṃ dummane. Duṭṭhaṃ, dukkhitaṃ vā mano yassa. Virūpaṃ mano yassa. Antamanopi.
anya-e0810n0:1935_0: Catukkaṃ bahuppade. Yācakānaṃ vadaṃ vacanaṃ jānātīti vadāniyo, vadaññū ca, iyo, rū
anya-e0810n0:1935_1: ca, pubbatraññassa nādeso, majjhadīgho ca. Dāne soṇḍo pasuto. Soṇḍasaddotra majjamadetyeke,
anya-e0810n0:1936_0: 724. Siloko pākaṭamatte. Khyā pakāsane, to. Patipubbo i gamane, to. Abhimukhaṃ etīti
anya-e0810n0:1936_1: patīto. Ñā avabodhane, to, paññāto, abhiññāto ca. Patha khyāne. Su gatibuddhīsu,
anya-e0810n0:1936_2: to, suto, vissuto ca, su savane vā, kamme to. Vida ñāṇe, vidito. Sidhu saṃrādhe,
anya-e0810n0:1936_3: to, sidha saṃsiddhiyaṃ vā. Kaṭa gatiyaṃ, dassanaṃ kaṭatīti pākaṭo, upasaggassa dīgho.
anya-e0810n0:1937_0: 725. Tipādaṃ issare. Īsa issariye, īsatīti issaro, aro, rassādi, dvittaṃ. Nī naye,
anya-e0810n0:1937_1: ṇvu, nāyako. Saṃ dhanaṃ assatthīti sāmī, dīghādi, rassante sāmipi. Pā rakkhaṇe,ti,
anya-e0810n0:1937_2: rassādi, pati. Adhipubbe adhipati. Īsa issariye, a, īso. Pabhavatīti pabhu, u, pabhūpi.
anya-e0810n0:1937_3: Aya gamane, yo, ayyo. Adhipātīti adhipo, ro. Adhibhavatīti adhibhū, kvi. Nī naye, ritu, netā.
anya-e0810n0:1938: Tikaṃ bahudhane. Ibhaṃ arahatīti ibbho, vo, vaṇṇavipariyayo. Jhe cintāyaṃ, a, ajjhāyati dhanaṃ aḍḍho, jhassa ḍho, asarūpadvittaṃ, rassādi ca. Dhanā atisaye ī, dhanī.
anya-e0810n0:1939: 726. Dvayaṃ dakkhiṇeyye. Dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ arahatīti dānāraho, dakkha vuddhiyaṃ, sīghatthe ca, dakkhanti bhogasampadādīhi yāya, sā dakkhiṇā, iṇo, taṃ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e0810n0:1940: Dvayaṃ snehavati. Siniha pītiyaṃ, dho, hassa do, siniddho, vaccho sineho yassatthi vacchalo, lo.
anya-e0810n0:1941: Pamāṇiko parikkhako, parikkhate avadhārayate pamāṇehi atthanti parikkhako, ikkha dassanaṅkesu, ṇvu. Kāraṇaṃ jānātīti kāraṇiko, iko.
anya-e0810n0:1942: Dvayaṃ āsatte. Sanja saṅge, to. Taṃ taṃ vatthu paraṃ padhānaṃ assa tapparo.
anya-e0810n0:1943: 727. Tikaṃ kāruṇike. Karuṇā sīlaṃ assa kāruṇiko. Dayā karuṇā yassatthi dayālu, ālu. Dukkhitesu suṭṭhu ramatīti sūrato, upasaggassa dīghatā.
anya-e0810n0:1944: Iṭṭhatthe abhimatappayojane uyyuto puggalo ussuko nāma, uṭṭhānaṃ suṭṭhu kāyatīti ussuko, hasādyanuṭṭheyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1945: Yo ālasyāvasādīhi anutiṭṭhati, so dīghasutto, dīghañca taṃ suttañca, tamiva caratīti dīghasuttaṃ, dīghasuttapariyantikaṃ kāriyaṃ karotīti dīghasutto. Cirena kriyānuṭṭhānaṃ assa.

anya-e0810n0:1946_2: kuṭumbadhāraṇe, a, paro tanto niyāmako yassa. Paro seṭṭho nāyako, attā ca atthīti

anya-e0810n0:1949: 729. Guṇadose anisamma anupaparikkhitvā yo karoti, so jammo, jama adane, mo.

anya-e0810n0:1951_0: Tikaṃ luddhe. Gidha abhikaṅkhāyaṃ, to. Lubha giddhiyaṃ, to. Lola ummādane, a, lolo.
anya-e0810n0:1951_1: Atha mahātaṇhātitaṇhagiddhānaṃ ko bhedo? Mahātaṇho nānārammaṇaṃ icchati, atitaṇho
anya-e0810n0:1951_2: ekasmimpi ārammaṇe anekavāraṃ, adhikañca tasati, giddho pana ubhayathāpīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0810n0:1952: Yo kriyāsu mando, so kuṇṭho, kuṇṭha paṭighāte, ālasye ca, a.
anya-e0810n0:1953_0: 730. Pañcakaṃ kāmake. Kamu icchāyaṃ, curādi, ritu, kāmayitā, kāritalope kamitā. Yumhi
anya-e0810n0:1953_1: kāmano, kamanopi. Ṇīpaccaye kāmī, ṇukapaccaye kāmuko, anuko, abhikopyatra, anukāmayate
anya-e0810n0:1953_2: anuko, kvi. Abhikāmayate abhiko, kvi. Atikopi.
anya-e0810n0:1954_0: Dvayaṃ matte. Suṇḍā surā, tatra kusalo soṇḍo, pānāgāraṃ vā suṇḍā, tatra bhavo, ṭhitaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1954_1: vā soṇḍo. Mada ummāde, to. Ukkaṭo, khivopi, madena uddhato ukkaṭo, yadādinā uto kaṭo
anya-e0810n0:1955_0: Tikaṃ vacanakārini. Pavattinivattīsu vidhātuṃ sakyo vidheyyo, iyyo. Ādesitaṃ, ādarena
anya-e0810n0:1955_1: vā suṇotīti assavo, rassādi, a. Sundaraṃ vaco ācariyādīnaṃ etasmiṃ hetubhūteti subbaco.

anya-e0810n0:1957: Tikaṃ bhīruke. Bhī bhayaṃ sīlo yassa bhīsīlo. Bhāyatīti bhīru, bhī bhaye, ru. Rukapaccaye bhīruko, sakatthe vā ko.
anya-e0810n0:1958: Dvayaṃ asūre. Na vīro sūro avīro. Kucchitatarattā kātaro, kussa kādeso.
anya-e0810n0:1959: Dvayaṃ hiṃsāsīle, hananasīlo hiṃsāsīlo, ghātuko, uko, hanassa ghāto. Sarāru, hiṃsopi.
anya-e0810n0:1960_0: 732. Tikaṃ kodhayutte. Kudha kope, kujjhanasīlo kodhano, yu. Dusa dose, dosano, paṭigho,
anya-e0810n0:1960_1: yu. Kupa kope, kupatīti kopī, ṇī. Amarisanopi, natthi marisanaṃ khamā assa amarisano, marisa asahane.
anya-e0810n0:1961: Dvayaṃ adhikakodhayutte. Caṇḍateti caṇḍo, a, caṇḍa kope. Atirekaṃ kujjhatīti accantakodhano. Accantakopanopi, tadā kupato yu.
anya-e0810n0:1962: Pañcakaṃ khantiyutte. Saha khamane, yu. Khamu sahane, yu. Tumhi khantā, satthādi. Titikkhā yassatthīti titikkhavā. Mantumhi khantimā, savibhattissa ntussa ā.
anya-e0810n0:1963_0: 733. Dvayaṃ saddhāyutte. Hi padapūraṇe. Saddhā yassatthīti saddhālu. Saddhā ratanattayādīsu
anya-e0810n0:1963_1: pasādo, taṇhā, ādaro ca. Dvayaṃ dhajayutte. Cihane ca paṭākāyaṃ, dhajo sophe ca soṇḍike, sopho pulliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1964_0: Dvayaṃ niddāsīle. Niddā eva sīlaṃ yassa so niddāsīlo. Dvayaṃ pabhāyutte. Bhā dittimhi,
anya-e0810n0:1964_1: sarapaccayo, rassādi, dvittañca, bhassaro, bhāsā rati yassāti vā bhassaro, rassādi
anya-e0810n0:1964_2: eva. Sassa dvittābhāve bhāsuro, assu, bhāsa dittiyaṃ vā, uro, atha vā dvayaṃ bahukathāyutte,
anya-e0810n0:1964_3: bhāsāsu sabbāsu bahūsu kathāsu ramatīti bhassaro, kvi, bhāsatīti vā bhassaro, aro,
anya-e0810n0:1964_4: rassādi, dvittañca, bhāsāsu ramatīti vā bhāsaro, kvi, majjharasso, bhāsatīti vā bhāsaro,
anya-e0810n0:1965_0: 734. Tikaṃ nagge. Na gacchatīti naggo, dvittaṃ, lagga saṅge vā, nattaṃ, naji laji
anya-e0810n0:1965_1: bile vā, ṇo, jassa go, dvittaṃ. Disā eva ambaraṃ vatthaṃ etassa, na pakativatthanti
anya-e0810n0:1965_2: digambaro. Sassa go. Natthi vatthaṃ etassa, atha vā digambarā vatthā, aññatitthiko
anya-e0810n0:1965_3: avattho cāti ete dve naggo nāma, naggā nāmāti vā, “te itthikhyā po, satta pakaraṇāni
anya-e0810n0:1965_4: abhidhammo nāmā”tyādīsu viya saññāsaññīsaddānaṃ vacanabhedassāpi sambhavato. Naggo
anya-e0810n0:1965_5: ca naggo ca naggā, purimasmiṃ pakkhe pana sāmaññatāya ekavacananiddeso.
anya-e0810n0:1966: Dvayaṃ bhakkhake. Ghasa adane, maro, ghasmaro. Bhakkha adane, ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:1967: Vattuṃ sotuñca akusalo, vacane savane ca akusalo eḷamūgo nāma, eḷo badhiro, mūgo avacano, kammadhārayo, saṭhepi eḷamūgo.
anya-e0810n0:1968: 735. Mukharādayo tayo appiyavādini. Vājhāvājhesu mukhaṃ assatthi, nindāyaṃ ro. Ninditaṃ mukhaṃ yassa dummukho. Abaddhaṃ anaggaḷaṃ mukhaṃ yassa abaddhamukho.
anya-e0810n0:1969: Bahu ca gārayhañca vaco yassa so vācālo nāma. Kucchitā vācā assa santīti vācālo, nindāyaṃ lo.
anya-e0810n0:1970: Dvayaṃ suvacane. Vadatīti vattā, pasaṃsāyaṃ tu. Vadatīti vado. So padapūraṇe.
anya-e0810n0:1971_0: 736. Tikaṃ attaniye. Netabboti niyo, niyo eva nijo, nī naye, ṇyo, yassa jo, samīpe
anya-e0810n0:1971_1: jāyatīti vā nijo. Sassa attano ayaṃ sako, idamatthe ko, so eva vā sako, sassāyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1971_2: sako, ṇo. Attani jāto attaniyo, aniyo.
anya-e0810n0:1972_0: Tikaṃ acchariye. Vipubbo maha pūjāyaṃ, bhūvādi, ṇyo, mantalopo, vimhayo. Āpubbo cara
anya-e0810n0:1972_1: gatibhakkhanesu, a, carassa cchariyo, rassādi ca, acchariyo. Na bhavitthāti abbhuto,

anya-e0810n0:1973: Sokādīhi itikattabbatāpaṭipattisuñño vihattho, byākulo ca. Vikkhitto hattho yassa vihattho. Kula saṅkhyāne viāpubbo.
anya-e0810n0:1974: Katasannāho vadhudyato hantumudyato uyyuto ātatāyī nāma. “Vadhuyyutto”tipi pāṭho. Āpubbo tā pālane, ṇī, dvittaṃ, ākārantānamāyo, ātatāyī.
anya-e0810n0:1975: 737. Sīsacchejjamhi sīsacchedārahe vajjho. Hantabboti vajjho, hana hiṃsāyaṃ, ṇyo, hanassa vadho, jhassa jho. Asarūpadvittaṃ, vajjho.
anya-e0810n0:1976: Tikaṃ vakkāsaye. Nikantatīti nikato, kanta chedane, a, nalopo. Saṭha ketave, a. Natthi ujutā yassa anuju.
anya-e0810n0:1977: Tikaṃ bhedakārake. Sūca pesuññe, ṇvu. Pisi sañcuṇṇane, pisi avayave vā, pisatīti pisuṇo, yadādinā uno, ṇattaṃ. Kaṇṇe japatīti, aluttasamāso, arucitabbarocakepi kaṇṇejapo.
anya-e0810n0:1978: Dvayaṃ paharaṇasīle. Dhubbī hiṃsāyaṃ, to, bhujādi. Vañcayate vippalapateti vañcako, vañca gamane.
anya-e0810n0:1979_0: 738. Ariyāsāmaññena ca bālapurisassa lakkhaṇamāha. Hi padapūraṇe. Yo puriso yo jano,
anya-e0810n0:1979_1: janapariyāyo cettha purisasaddo “dve mahāpurisā abhinikkhantā”tyādīsu viya, anisamma
anya-e0810n0:1979_2: anupaparikkhitvā vadhabandhanādikiccaṃ karoti, so khalu ekantato “capalo”ti viññeyyo,
anya-e0810n0:1979_3: kasmā? Avinicchitakārittā sammā avinicchitassa kāriyassa karaṇasīlattā. Capa kakkaraṇe,
anya-e0810n0:1980_0: 739. Catukkaṃ kadariye. Kucchitaṃ dadātīti khuddo, do, kassa kho, adānasīlatāya samparāyesu
anya-e0810n0:1980_1: khuddaṃ bubhukkhissāmīti vā khuddo, khuda bubhukkhāyaṃ, do anāgatatthe. Parānupabhogena
anya-e0810n0:1980_2: atthasañcayasīlattā kucchito ariyo atthapati kadariyo, adāyakattā kucchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1980_3: aratīti vā kadariyo, iyo. Dānādīsu namanābhāvena thaddhena maccherayuttacittena sahitatāya
anya-e0810n0:1980_4: thaddhamaccharī, ī. Kucchito paṇo yassa kapaṇo, kipacāno, mitappacopi. Kucchitaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1980_5: pacānoti dutiyāsamāso. Mitaṃ pacatīti mitappaco, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1981_0: Addhaṃ dalidde. Natthi kiñcanaṃ appamattakampi dhanaṃ yassa akiñcano. Dalidda duggatiyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1981_1: a, dala vidāraṇe vā, ido, dvittaṃ. Dīna duggatabhāve, dīno, di khaye vā, īno. Natthi
anya-e0810n0:1981_2: dhanaṃ assa. Ninditaṃ gamanaṃ assa duggato.
anya-e0810n0:1982_0: 740. Yaṃ kammaṃ “idamahaṃ uppādessāmī”ti asambhāvitaṃ acintitameva hutvā sampattaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1982_1: taṃ “kākatālīya”ntyuccate. Tālassa idaṃ phalaṃ tālaṃ, kāko ca tālañca kākatālāni,
anya-e0810n0:1982_2: tehi sadisaṃ kammaṃ kākatāliyaṃ, kākassa, tālaphalassa uḍḍanapatanasadisaṃ kammantyattho.
anya-e0810n0:1983_0: Catukkaṃ yācake. Yācanaṃ karotīti yācanako, yācatīti vā, yāca yācane, yu. Sakatthe
anya-e0810n0:1983_1: ko. Attha yācanāyaṃ, atthanaṃ attho, so assatthīti atthī. Ṇvu, yācako. “Mādisassa
anya-e0810n0:1983_2: dhanaṃ datvā rājā saggaṃ gamissatī”tyādinā dānaphalaṃ vaṇṇetvā vakati yācatīti vanibbako,
anya-e0810n0:1983_3: vaṇṇassa vani, vaka ādāne, ādānamettha yācanameva.
anya-e0810n0:1984_0: 741. Kiñcidūnakantaṃ patipādena nāmaṃ. Pakkhisappamacchādayo aṇḍato jātattā aṇḍajā.
anya-e0810n0:1984_1: Narādayo pana gabbhāsayasaṅkhātajalābuto, tatra vā jātattā jalābujā. Kimi ca ḍaṃsā

anya-e0810n0:1984_3: Devo ca ādinā brahmanerayikādayo ca opapātikā, upagantvā patatīti upapātī, ṇī, soḷasavassuddesikādiko
anya-e0810n0:1985_0: 742. Jaṇṇumatte jaṇṇuppamāṇayutte udakādimhi jaṇṇutaggho, jaṇṇuppamāṇo jaṇṇutaggho,
anya-e0810n0:1985_1: pamāṇatthe taggho, jaṇṇuppamāṇo jaṇṇumatto, pamāṇatthe matto moggallāne 4.47 sutte
anya-e0810n0:1986: Kiñcidūnake appamattakayutte kappo pāṇini 5.4.67, ūnassa appakatāya kappīyati ekādivasena paricchijjatīti kappo, kappa paricchedane.
anya-e0810n0:1987_0: Catukkaṃ pariyāpanne. Anto gacchatīti antaggataṃ, “lopañca tatrākāro”ti olope aāgamo,
anya-e0810n0:1987_1: dvittaṃ. Antogatampi. Paricchinditvā āpannaṃ gahitaṃ pariyāpannaṃ. Gādha patiṭṭhāyaṃ,

anya-e0810n0:1988: 743. Dvayaṃ sādhite. Rādha sādha siddhiyaṃ, kammani to.
anya-e0810n0:1989: Dvayaṃ kuthite. Paca pāke, atīte kattari to, tassa kko, calopo. Kutha nippakke, to.
anya-e0810n0:1990_0: Āpadaṃ byasanaṃ patto āpanno nāma, atipīḷanaṃ āpajjatīti āpanno, “ā tukodhamudāṭṭīsū”ti
anya-e0810n0:1990_1: hi ekakkharakoso ekakkharakosa 14 gāthā. Pada gamane, “āpanno ca vipattimhi, patte
anya-e0810n0:1991: Dvayaṃ paresamavasagate. Natthi vaso āyatto paresaṃ etasmiṃ serībhūteti vivaso, avaso ca.
anya-e0810n0:1992: 744. Chakkaṃ khitte. Nuda peraṇe, nuda khepe vā, to, tassa inno. Aninnādese bhujādi, nutto. Nutopi. Asu khepane, to, bhujādi, atto. Khipa peraṇe, to.
anya-e0810n0:1993: Īra gatiyaṃ, kampane ca, ito, īrito. Āpubbo vidha peraṇe, to, āviddho.
anya-e0810n0:1994: Catukkaṃ kampite. Kampa calane, dhū vidhunane, kampane ca. Dhūto, ādhūto, cala kampane, calito. Vellito, pekhitopi. Vella calanattho. Pekha gatyattho, pekhito.
anya-e0810n0:1995: Dvayaṃ nisite. Nisi nisāne. Tija nisāne, nisānaṃ tikkhakaraṇaṃ, ubhayatrāpi kammani to.
anya-e0810n0:1996: 745-746. Tikaṃ pattabbe. Pata gamane, tabbo. Gamu gatiyaṃ, ṇyo, myassa mmo vā, gammaṃ, gamyaṃ, dyassa jjo, āpajjaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1997: Dvayaṃ pariṇate. Pacino anekatthattā iha pariṇatattho. Namu namane, bhūvādi, kattari to, samā dve tulyatthā.
anya-e0810n0:1998_0: Pañcakaṃ veṭhite. Veṭha veṭhane. Valamiva valayaṃ, kuṇḍalākāraṃ valayaṃ kataṃ valayitaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1998_1: nāmadhātu, kāritantā to. Rudha āvaraṇe, ruddhaṃ. Saṃpubbo vu saṃvaraṇe, saṃvutaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1998_2: Samantato vutaṃ āvutaṃ, vu saṃvaraṇe, sabbatra kammani to.
anya-e0810n0:1999: Dvayaṃ parikhādinā parikkhitte. Pari samantato karīyateti parikkhittaṃ, parikkhatampi. Vu saṃvaraṇe, nivutaṃ.
