anya-e0810n0:2000: Tikaṃ vitthate. Sara gatiyaṃ, to, tassa ṭo, ralopo, visaṭaṃ. Tanu vitthāre, to, tassa to, nalopo, vitthataṃ, tataṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2001: Dvayaṃ lepanīye. Lipa lepane, diha upalepane, ubhayatrāpi kammani to.
anya-e0810n0:2002: Dvayaṃ guḷhe. Guha saṃvaraṇe, ḷo, guḷho. Gupa gopane, gutto.
anya-e0810n0:2003: Dvayaṃ posanīye. Pusa posane, to, satānaṃ ṭṭho, ṭṭhābhāve posito.
anya-e0810n0:2004: 747. Dvayaṃ salajje. Lajja pīḷe, pīḷo lajjāva. Hīḷa nindālajjāsu, hīḷito.
anya-e0810n0:2005: Dvayaṃ sadde. Sana dhana sadde, sanitaṃ, dhanitaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2006_0: Pañcakaṃ bandhanīye. Sandanaṃ bandhanaṃ, taṃyogā vantu. Sandānavantaṃ kataṃ sandānitaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2006_1: nāmadhātumhā to, vantulopo. Sandānaṃ sajjā, tamassāti vā, ito. Si bandhane, to. Bandha
anya-e0810n0:2006_2: bandhane, baddho. Kīla bandhane. Yamu uparame, saṃpubbo bandhane, sabbatra kammani
anya-e0810n0:2006_3: to. Mūtaṃ, udditaṃ, sadditampi. Mū bandhane. Dā avakhaṇḍane. U saṃpubbo bandhane.
anya-e0810n0:2007: 748. Tikaṃ siddhe. Sidha saṃsiddhimhi. Pada gamane, nipubbo siddhiyaṃ. Vatta vattane, vattanaṃpyatra sijjhanaṃ nipubbattā.
anya-e0810n0:2008: Tikaṃ vidārite. Dara bhida vidāraṇe, innādeso. Bhinnaṃ. Aninnādese tu bheditaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2009: Dvayaṃ tiṇādīhi chādanīye. Chada saṃvaraṇe, to, tassa sadhātvantassa annādeso.
anya-e0810n0:2010: Tikaṃ chindite. Vidha vedhane. Chidda kaṇṇabhede, curādi. Vidha vedhane, sabbatra kamme to, aparadvaye ca sañjātatthe ito.
anya-e0810n0:2011: 749. Tikaṃ ānīte. Hara haraṇe, bhara dhāraṇaposanesu, āpubbo nī naye.
anya-e0810n0:2012: Dvayaṃ damayutte. Damu damane, kattari to. Pakkamādīhi nto. Antādese damito. Kammasādhanopyayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2013: Dvayaṃ sante. Samu upasame, kattarito. Antādese samito, kammasādhanopyayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2014: Dvayaṃ puṇṇe. Pūra pūraṇe, tarādīhi iṇṇo, dvīsupi kattukammasādhanāni labbhanti.
anya-e0810n0:2015_0: 750. Tipādaṃ pūjite. Cāya pūjānisāmanesu. Maha pūjāyaṃ, pūja pūjane, araha pūjāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2015_1: arahito. Acca pūjāyaṃ. Māna pūjāyaṃ. Ci caye, apapubbo pūjane. Namassitopi, namassadhātu pūjāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2016: Dvayaṃ tacchite dāruādimhi. Taccha tanukaraṇe, tanukarīyateti tanūkato, dīgho.
anya-e0810n0:2017: 751. Dvayaṃ aggiādīhi tatte. Tapa dhūpa santāpe.
anya-e0810n0:2018: Dvayaṃ rājādīnaṃ santike bhajanādivasena upagate. Cara gatyattho, upacarito. Āsa upavesane, upāsito.
anya-e0810n0:2019: Addhaṃ cute. Bhasa adhopatane, to. Gaḷa secane, gaḷitaṃ. Pada gamane, pannaṃ. Cu cavane, cu gamane vā. Dhaṃsu avasaṃsane, gatiyañca. Kannampi, kanna gatisosanesu.
anya-e0810n0:2020: 752. Tuṭṭhantaṃ pamudite, pī tappanakantīsu. Muda hāse. Hasa haṃsane, hasa alike vā. Mada hāse, matto. Tusa pītiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2021: Catukkaṃ chinne. Kanta chedane. Chidi dvidhākaraṇe. Lū chedane, ṇo, yu vā. Dā lavane, tu, dā avakhaṇḍane vā. Chātampi. Cho chedane, ossākāro.
anya-e0810n0:2022: Tikaṃ pasatthe. Saṭha thutiyaṃ, to. Vaṇṇa vaṇṇakriyāvitthāraguṇavacanesu. Thu abhitthave. Īḍito, paṇitopi, īḍa thutimhi. Paṇa byavahāre, thutimhi ca, paṇito.
anya-e0810n0:2023_0: 753. Pañcakaṃ alle, tima addabhāve niccalepi, pakkamādīhi nto. Alla kledane, lo,
anya-e0810n0:2023_1: allaṃ. Adda gatimhi, yācane ca, āpubbo dā avakhaṇḍane vā, do, addaṃ. Kilida addabhāve,
anya-e0810n0:2023_2: innādeso. Unda kledane, inno, unno vā, sāddampi. Addaguṇayuttaṃ addaṃ, tena saha vattate sāddaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2024: Catukkaṃ gavesite. Magga anvesane, curādi. Esa gatiyaṃ, bhūvādi. Gavesa maggane, curādi.
anya-e0810n0:2025: Dvayaṃ laddhe. Labha pattiyaṃ. Papubbo āpa byāpane, to, bhujādi, ālopo, pattaṃ. Bhāvitaṃ, āsāditaṃ, vibhūtañca.
anya-e0810n0:2026: 754. Pālitantaṃ rakkhanīye, rakkha pālane. Gupa gopane, bhujādi. Tā pālane, tātaṃ. Āyāgame gopāyitaṃ. Ava rakkhaṇe, avitaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2027: Catukkaṃ catte. Saja vissagge. Caja hāniyaṃ. Hā cāge, ino, dīghādi, hīno. Ujha ussagge, samujjhitaṃ. Dhūtampi, dhū kampane.
anya-e0810n0:2028_0: 755. Pajjaṃ bhāsite. Bhāsa byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Lapa byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vaca bhāsane,
anya-e0810n0:2028_1: vuttaṃ. Abhipubbo dhā dhāraṇe, to, dhātissa hi, hi gamane vā, abhihitaṃ. Khyā kathane.
anya-e0810n0:2028_2: Jappa byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Īra khepagativacanakampanesu, udīritaṃ. Katha vākyapabandhe.
anya-e0810n0:2028_3: Gada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Bhaṇa bhaṇane. Vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, to, vassu, uditaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2029_0: 756. Catukkaṃ avamānite. Ñā avabodhane. Gaṇa saṅkhyāne. Bhū sattāyaṃ. Māna pūjāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2029_1: mana ñāṇe vā, avaparipubbā ete paribhūte. Heṭṭhā katvā ñāyati, gaṇīyati, maññatīti
anya-e0810n0:2029_2: avaññito, avagaṇito, avamānito ca. Paribhavīyati avamānaṃ karīyatīti paribhūto.
anya-e0810n0:2030_0: Catukkaṃ chāte. Ghasa adane, cho, dvittaṃ. Jighacchā sañjātā yassa jighacchito. Khuda
anya-e0810n0:2030_1: pipāsāyaṃ. Chāda bhakkhane. Bhuja pālanajjhohāresu, kho, dvittādi, bubhukkhā sañjātā yassa bubhukkhito.
anya-e0810n0:2031: 757. Chakkaṃ ñāte. Budha ñā avagamane. Pada gamane, to, tassa anno, paṭipannaṃ. Vida ñāṇe. Gati bujhattho. Avagataṃ. Mana ñāṇe, to, mataṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2032_0: Addhaṃ gilite. Gala adane, assi, gilito. Khāda bhakkhane. Bhuja pālanajjhohāresu.
anya-e0810n0:2032_1: Bhakkha adane. Adhiavapubbo hara haraṇe, to, tassa ṭo, ralopo, ajjhohaṭo. Asa bhakkhane,
anya-e0810n0:2032_2: asito. Jappito, gasitopi, jappa adane. Gasa adane.
anya-e0810n0:2035_0: 758. Pubbasmiṃ kaṇḍadvaye buddhādīni nāmāni samānatthāni pakaraṇena nibaddhāni, asmimpi
anya-e0810n0:2035_1: kaṇḍe sobhanādīni visesananāmāni, samayādīnyanekatthāni, cirassamādīni ca abyayāni
anya-e0810n0:2035_2: pakaraṇeneva nibaddhāni, idāni pana pubbavaggesu vitthārabhayā ye na nibaddhā, taṃsaṅgahatthaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2035_3: taṃsamayānupālanatthañca saṃkiṇṇamārabhate “ñe yya”miccādinā. Tassattho – ihāpi saṃkiṇṇavaggepi
anya-e0810n0:2035_4: kvāpi katthaci kriyādīsu paccayatthavasena āpaccayādīnaṃ itthiliṅgādibhāvajotakassa
anya-e0810n0:2035_5: sabhāvassa vasena liṅgaṃ itthiliṅgādikaṃ ñeyyanti. Cakārena bhiyyo rūpantarādipariggahopi.
anya-e0810n0:2035_6: Ihāti ca upalakkhaṇaṃ, vaggantaresupi paccayatthavasena liṅgādinicchayasambhavato.
anya-e0810n0:2036: Kattabbato kriyā, kara karaṇe, ṇyo, ikārāgamo, assi, vaṇṇavipariyaye kriyā, kriyampi, ririyapaccaye kiriyaṃ, kiriyāpi. Rammapaccaye kammaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2037: Tikaṃ cittopasame. Samu upasame,ti, santi. Thamhi samatho. Amhi samo.
anya-e0810n0:2038: Tikaṃ kāyopasame. Damu upasame. Thamhi damatho. Timhi danti. Cittopasamepyete.
anya-e0810n0:2039: Suddhakammani vattaṃ bhavati. Vatta vattane, vatta samādāne vā vattaṃ, asītimahāvattādi.
anya-e0810n0:2040_0: Āsaṅgavacanaṃ āsattavacanaṃ saddasarūpaṃ parāyaṇaṃ nāma vuttaṃ, tañca tīsu. Paraṃ
anya-e0810n0:2040_1: āyanaṃ āyatto tāṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ, kammāsatto iccattho, sākalyavacane tu pārāyaṇaṃ, pāraṃ
anya-e0810n0:2040_2: pariyantaṃ ayanti gacchanti kassaci anenāti pārāyaṇaṃ, yu, ṇattaṃ, yathā – nāmapārāyaṇaṃ, dhātupārāyaṇaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2041: 759. Tikaṃ dvidhābhāve. Bhidi dvidhākaraṇe, ṇo. Dara vidāraṇe. Phuṭa vikasane, phuṭa bhedane vā, yu.
anya-e0810n0:2042: Dvayaṃ tappane. Tapa pīṇane, yu. Pī tappane, yu, kiyādi, nassa ṇattaṃ. Avanampi, ava pālane, dittiyañca anekatthattā.
anya-e0810n0:2043: Dvayaṃ sāpe. Kusa avhāne, bhedane ca, yu. Sanja saṅge, abhisaṅgo.
anya-e0810n0:2044: Tikaṃ yācanāyaṃ. Bhikkha yācane, yu. Yāca yācane. Attha yācane. Addanopyatra, adda gatimhi, yācane ca.
anya-e0810n0:2045: 760. Nimittarahitaṃ yadicchā nāma, yā yā icchā adhippāyo yadicchā nāma. Seritāpi.
anya-e0810n0:2046_0: Tikaṃ āpucchane, āpucchanañca gamanāgamanādisamaye suhajja bandhavādīnamāliṅgana
anya-e0810n0:2046_2: āpucchanaṃ. Nanda samiddhiyaṃ, ānandanaṃ. Sabhāja pītidassanesu, sabhāja pītivacanesu
anya-e0810n0:2047: Dvayaṃ naye. Ñāyanti yenāti ñāyo, ākārantānamāyo. Nyāyopi, nissesato ayati yena nyāyo. Nī naye, ayādeso, nayo.
anya-e0810n0:2048: Dvayaṃ vuddhimhi. Phā vuddhimhi, phāya vuddhiyaṃ vā, yalopo,ti, phāti, nāriyaṃ. Vaddha vaddhane,ti, dalopo, dhaḍhabhahehi dhaḍhā ca, assu, vuddhi, vuḍḍhipi.
anya-e0810n0:2049: 761. Kilama hāsakkhaye, tho, kilamatho. Yumhi kilamanaṃ. Sū pāṇipasave, pasavanaṃ pasavo, timhi pasūti.
anya-e0810n0:2050_0: Kasa gatiyaṃ hiṃsāyañca, niggahītāgamo, ukkaṃso, kasa vilekhane vā. Atisayo vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2050_1: Bhusādayo pamāṇātisayavasena vuttā, ukkaṃso guṇātisayavasena vutto, atisayo pana
anya-e0810n0:2050_2: ubhayavasenāti ubhayatra niddiṭṭhānaṃ bhedo. Tikaṃ jayane. Jayanaṃ jayo, yu, jayanaṃ. Timhi jiti, nārī.
anya-e0810n0:2051_0: 762. Bandhanantāni dve dve nāmāni. Vasa kantiyaṃ. Kamu kantiyaṃ,ti. Vidha vedhane,
anya-e0810n0:2051_1: byathane ca anekatthattā, a, ikārassa yādeso, byadho, vedho. Gaha upādāne nibandhane
anya-e0810n0:2051_2: ca, gaho, gāho ca. Vara āvaraṇe, varo. Vu saṃvaraṇe,ti, vuti. Paca pāke, itthiyamatiyavo
anya-e0810n0:2052_0: Dvayaṃ āhvāne. Hu dānādanahabyappadānesu, ṇo, havo. Timhi huti. Dvayaṃ anubhavane.
anya-e0810n0:2052_1: Vida ñāṇe, ṇo, vedo. Vida vedanākhyānanivāsesu, curādi, yu, vedanaṃ, vākāro vedanāsaddassa napuṃsakattāpekkho.
anya-e0810n0:2053: 763. Dvayaṃ dhanādijāniyaṃ. Jara vayohānimhi, yu, jīraṇaṃ, assī. Hā cāge, yu, nadādi, rasso, hassa jo, jāni. Tā pālane, yu, ṇattaṃ. Dvayaṃ pamāṇe. Mā māne,ti, pamiti. Amhi pamā.
anya-e0810n0:2054_0: Dvayaṃ saṃyoge. Silisa āliṅgane. Saṃpubbo dhā dhāraṇe, i, sandhanaṃ sandhi. Dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2054_1: khaye. Khi khaye, ṇo, isse, e aya, khayo. Ci caye, apapubbo khaye. Dvayaṃ sadde.
anya-e0810n0:2054_2: Ru sadde, ṇo, vuddhyādeso. Raṇa sadde. A, raṇo.
anya-e0810n0:2055: 764. Gada byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, ṇo, a ca, nigādo, nigado ca. Dvayaṃ made. Mada ummāde, mādo, mado ca. Si bandhane,ti, siti.
anya-e0810n0:2056_0: Tikaṃ ākāre. Ākaraṇaṃ ākāro, anekatthattā mukhavaṅkādyaṅgavikāro vā, iṅgati jānātīti
anya-e0810n0:2056_1: vā yena ākāro. Iṅga gamanattho, to, a ca, iṅgitaṃ, iṅgo ca. Atthassa dhanassa apagamo
anya-e0810n0:2057_0: 765. Dvayaṃ antarāye. Cutipaṭisandhīnamantare ayatīti antarāyo. Paṭipakkhavasena
anya-e0810n0:2057_1: ūhati pavattatīti paccūho, atha vā kāriyasiddhi antaraṃ byavadhānaṃ ayati gamayatīti
anya-e0810n0:2058: Vikaraṇaṃ aññathā bhavananti vikāro, vikati ca, kara karaṇe, ṇo,ti ca.
anya-e0810n0:2059_0: Dvayaṃ sabhāvavigame. Silisa āliṅgane, pavipubbo taṃsabhāvavigame, vigato dhuro sadisabhāvo
anya-e0810n0:2059_1: yasmāti vidhuro, “vidhuraṃ pavisilese, klivañca vikale tisū”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 22.20
anya-e0810n0:2059_2: rabhaso. Vidha vidhāne vā, uro. Dvayaṃ āsane. Visa pavesane, upavesanaṃ. Āsa upavesane, āsanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2060_0: 766. Tipādaṃ adhippāye. Cittamadhyāgantvā sayatīti ajjhāsayo. Anamipubbe āsayo. Adhipayati
anya-e0810n0:2060_1: citteti adhippāyo, ṇo, paya gamane. Citte abhisandhāyatīti abhisandhi, dvīsu. Bhavati
anya-e0810n0:2060_2: citteti bhāvo, ṇo. Adhimuccanaṃ citte adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhimutti, nārī. Chando taṇhāyampi vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2061: Dvayaṃ ādīnave. Doso paṭighe vutto. Ā bhuso dīnaṃ vāyati gamayatīti ādīnavo, dīna duggatabhāve, vo, vī gamane ca.
anya-e0810n0:2062_0: 767. Dvayaṃ ānisaṃse. Saṃsa hiṃsāthutīsu, ānisaṃso amukhyaphale, mukhyaphale ca,
anya-e0810n0:2062_1: tathā guṇo. Guṇa pakāsane, pakāseti kāraṇanti guṇo, gaṇa saṅkhyāne vā, assu, guṇo.
anya-e0810n0:2062_2: Dvayaṃ majjhe. Maja suddhiyaṃ, jho. Vipubbe vemajjhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2063_0: Dvayaṃ taruṇasūriyaṭṭhāne. Ahassa majjho majjhaho, so eva majjhanhiko, hassa nho
anya-e0810n0:2063_1: moggallāna 3.110 suttaṃ passitabbaṃ. Ahassa majjho majjhanho, majjhantopi. Dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2063_2: nānattāyaṃ. Vigatā mattā sadisappamāṇaṃ etena hetubhūtena vemattaṃ. Nānameva nānatā,
anya-e0810n0:2064: 768. Dvayaṃ niddāpaṭikkhepe. Jāgara niddakkhaye, jāgarameva jāgariyo. Dvayaṃ jalādīnamavicchannāyaṃ santatiyaṃ. Vahatismā ṇo, pavāho. Vatu āvattane,ti, pavatti.
anya-e0810n0:2065: Tikaṃ vitthāre. Asu khepane, ṇo, byāso. Papubbo pañca vitthāre. Thara santharaṇe, pādipubbo ca vitthāre. Tikaṃ saṃyame. Yamu uparame, ṇo, yāmo. Itaresu a.
anya-e0810n0:2066_0: 769. Dvayaṃ gattānaṃ maddane. “Sambāhano’ṅgamaddako”ti vopālito, saṃpubbo vāha payatane,
anya-e0810n0:2066_1: maddane vā, yu. Madda maddane. Dvayaṃ nānārammaṇādīsu visappane. Sara gamane, ṇa.
anya-e0810n0:2067: Dvayaṃ paricaye. Thu abhitthave. Ci caye. Tikaṃ saṅgame. Mila silesane, ṇo, sakatthe ko, melako. Sanja saṅge, ṇo. Saṃpubbā gamito a.
anya-e0810n0:2068: 770. Sannikaṭṭhamhi samīpe sannidhisaddo, sannidhānaṃ sannidhi, pume, ṭhapanepyayaṃ. Nasa adassane, ṇo. Disa pekkhane, yu, dissādeso, issattaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2069: Tikaṃ dhaññādīnaṃ lavane. Lū chedane, a. Ṇamhi abhilāvo. Yumhi lavanaṃ. Dvayaṃ khaṇappattiyaṃ. Papubbo thu abhitthave. Sara gamane, avasaro. Samāti dve tulyatthā.
anya-e0810n0:2070: 771. Catukkaṃ pariyosāne. Sā tanukaraṇe, yu, osānaṃ. Paripubbo pariyosānaṃ. Ukkaṃsātisayā pakaṭṭhepyuttā.
anya-e0810n0:2071_0: Dvayaṃ saṇṭhāne. Visa pavesane, sanniveso. Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ, yu, saṇṭhānaṃ. Dvayaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2071_1: abbhantaravācakaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ. Atha vā abhi bandhane, aro, dhātvatthānuvattako abhi,
anya-e0810n0:2072_0: 772. Tikaṃ pāṭihāriye. Hi gatimhi, paṭito hissa heraṇa hīraṇa, pāṭiheraṃ, pāṭihīraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2072_1: Yadādinā hāriyañca, pāṭihāriyaṃ, atha vā paṭipakkhe haratīti pāṭihīraṃ, ṇo, assī.
anya-e0810n0:2072_2: Ekārādese pāṭiheraṃ. Ṇyamhi pāṭihāriyaṃ, vihatupakkilesena paccāharitabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
anya-e0810n0:2073: Dvayaṃ kattabbamatte. Karamhā ricca, kiccaṃ, avassaṃ kātabbepi. Anīyapaccaye karaṇīyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2074_0: Dvayaṃ pupphādinā udakādīnaṃ paribhāvane. Sundaraṃ karīyate yenāti saṅkhāro, ṇo,
anya-e0810n0:2074_1: kharādeso. Vasa nivāse, yu, vāsanā, kilesādīnaṃ sattivisesepi. Sā hi kusalāpi atthi
anya-e0810n0:2074_2: akusalāpi abyākatāpi, tathā pahātabbāpi atthi appahātabbāpi. Tattha yā kusalābyākatā,
anya-e0810n0:2074_3: na sā pahātabbā. Yā pana akusalā, sā sukhumataratāya bhagavatoyeva ariyamaggena pahātabbā,
anya-e0810n0:2074_4: nāññesaṃ. Evaṃ sante ariyānampi apāyūpapatti siyāti? Na siyā, sabbesameva ariyānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2074_5: apāyūpapattihetukāya vāsanāya pahīnattā. Duvidhā hi akusalā vāsanā kāyavacīpayogahetubhūtā
anya-e0810n0:2074_6: ca apāyūpapattihetubhūtā ca. Tattha purimā bhagavatoyeva ariyamaggena pahātabbā,
anya-e0810n0:2074_7: itarā sabbesampi ariyamaggenāti, tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ “buddhāva savāsane kilese pajahituṃ
anya-e0810n0:2074_8: sakkonti, nāññe”ti, taṃ kāyavacīpayogahetubhūtaṃ vāsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, netaranti
anya-e0810n0:2075: 773. Tikaṃ dhaññādīnaṃ pūtakaraṇe. Pū pavane, yu. Apaccaye pavo. Ṇamhi nippāvo. Dvayaṃ tasare. Tasa ubbege, aro. Suttena veṭhanaṃ suttaveṭhanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2076: Dvayaṃ duggasañcāre. Saṅkamyate yenāti saṅkamo. Sañcaranti anenāti sañcāro, duggassa sañcāro duggasañcāro. Dvayaṃ paṭhamārambhe. Paṭhamaṃ kamo pakkamo, upakkamo ca.
anya-e0810n0:2077_0: 774. Tikaṃ pāṭhe. Paṭha viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, ṇo, pāṭho. Nipubbe nipāṭho, amhi nipaṭho.
anya-e0810n0:2077_1: Dvayaṃ apaharitādino vatthuno anvesane. Ci caye, cayanamatra anvesanaṃ. Magga anvesane,
anya-e0810n0:2077_2: curādi, yu, ete dve apume, saṃvikkhanaṃpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:2078: Catukkaṃ āliṅgane. Liṅga gatyattho. Sanja saṅge. Silisa āliṅgane. Guha saṃvaraṇe, yu, parirambhopyatra. Rambha sadde.
anya-e0810n0:2079: 775. Catukkaṃ ālokane. Loka dassane. Jhe cintāyaṃ. Ikkha dassanaṅkesu. Disa pekkhane, sabbatra bhāve yu.
anya-e0810n0:2080: Catukkaṃ nirākaraṇe. Disa pekkhane. Asu khepane, nirasanaṃ. Pati āpubbo khākathane. Kara karaṇe, itthiyamatiyavo vā,ti.
anya-e0810n0:2081: 776. Pañcakaṃ vipariyaye. Viparipubbo asu khepane, ṇo, vipallāso. Aññena pakārena bhavanaṃ aññathābhāvo. Viparipubbo aya gamane, vipariyayo. Asu khepane, vipariyāso.
anya-e0810n0:2082: Tikaṃ atikkame. Atikkamanaṃ atikkamo. Atikkamma patanaṃ atipāto. Aya gamane, upaccayo.
anya-e0810n0:2085_0: 777. Idāni saṃkiṇṇavaggato anantaraṃ gāthāto, gāthāya addhato, pādato cāti imehi
anya-e0810n0:2085_1: tīhi pakārehi anekatthe nānatthe samayādike sadde kamā kamato pavakkhāmi. Ettha anekatthavagge
anya-e0810n0:2085_2: ekassa bhūtasaddādikassa yā punaruttatā, sā thīpunnapuṃsakasaṅkhātaliṅgavisesatthaṃ katā.
anya-e0810n0:2086_0: 778. Samavāyatthādivācake bahavo samayasadde jātiyā saṅgayha “samayo”ti ekavacananiddeso
anya-e0810n0:2086_1: kato. Tatra “kālañca samayañca upādāyā”tyādīsu dī. ni. 1.447 samavāye paccayasāmaggiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2086_2: “Mahāsamayo pavanasmiṃ, devakāyā samāgatā”tyādīsu samūhe. “Samayopi kho te bhaddāli
anya-e0810n0:2086_3: appaṭividdho”tyādīsu ma. ni. 2.135 kāraṇe. “Ekoyeva ca kho khaṇo ca samayo cā”tyādīsu
anya-e0810n0:2086_4: a. ni. 8.29 khaṇe okāse. “Abhisamayattho”tyādīsu paṭivedhe. “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā”tyādīsu
anya-e0810n0:2086_5: dī. ni. 1.1 kāle. “Sammā mānābhisamayā”tyādīsu ma. ni. 1.28 pahāne. “Atthābhisamayā
anya-e0810n0:2086_6: dhīro”tyādīsu lābhe saṃ. ni. 1.129. “Samayappavādake tindukācire”tyādīsu ma. ni. 2.208 diṭṭhiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2087_0: Tattha sahakārīkāraṇatāya sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo. Samaṃ, saha
anya-e0810n0:2087_1: vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho, yathā – samudāyoti avayavasahāvatthānameva
anya-e0810n0:2087_2: hi samūhoti. Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti
anya-e0810n0:2087_3: samayo, kāraṇaṃ, yathā “samudāyo”ti. Sametisamāgacchati ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2087_4: tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo. Abhimukhaṃ ñāṇena sammā etabbo avagantabboti
anya-e0810n0:2087_5: abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparīto sabhāvo. Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti
anya-e0810n0:2087_6: abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvāvabodho. Sameti ettha, etena vā saṅgacchati
anya-e0810n0:2087_7: satto, sabhāvadhammo vā sahajātādīhi, uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo, dhammappavattimattatāya
anya-e0810n0:2087_8: atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ viya, karaṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena
anya-e0810n0:2087_9: rūpena voharīyatīti. Samassa nirodhassa yānaṃ, sammā vā yānaṃ apagamoti samayo, pahānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2087_10: Samiti saṅgati samodhānanti samayo, paṭilābho, sameti sambandho eti attano visaye
anya-e0810n0:2087_11: pavattati, daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā sampayuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2087_12: etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena hi sattā ativiya bajjhantīti, evaṃ tasmiṃ
anya-e0810n0:2087_13: tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā. Samayasaddassa atthuddhāre abhisamayasaddassa
anya-e0810n0:2087_14: udāharaṇaṃ sopasaggo, anupasaggo ca samayasaddo samavāyādyatthavācako hotīti dassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2088: 779. Saṇṭhānaṃ dīgharassādi. Rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, jāti khattiyādikulaṃ. Chavi bahicammaṃ, pamāṇaṃ mariyādo. Akkharaṃ akārādi, yaso parivāro, kitti ca. Guṇo sīlādi, tapaniyepi vaṇṇo.
anya-e0810n0:2089_0: 780. Pātimokkhassa bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ vasena duvidhassa pātimokkhassa uddese “saṅgho
anya-e0810n0:2089_1: uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti mahāva. 134. Paṇṇattiyaṃ “uposatho nāma nāgarājā”ti dī. ni.
anya-e0810n0:2090_0: 781-782. Rathaṅgaṃ cakkadvayaṃ. Lakkhaṇaṃ cakkalakkhaṇaṃ. “Mayā pavattitaṃ cakka”ntyādīsu
anya-e0810n0:2090_1: su. ni. 562 dhammacakke. Uracakkaṃ nāma khuracakkaṃ “cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti jā.
anya-e0810n0:2090_3: bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ vattatī”tyādīsu
anya-e0810n0:2090_4: a. ni. 4.131 sampatticakke. “Pitarā pavattitaṃ cakkaṃ anuvattetī”tyādīsu a. ni. 5.132
anya-e0810n0:2090_5: cakkaratane. Maṇḍalaṃ “alātacakka”ntyādīsu “asanivicakka”nti dī. ni. 3.61; saṃ. ni.
anya-e0810n0:2090_6: 2.162 ca. Balaṃ thāmo. Kulālo kumbhakāro, tassa bhaṇḍe kulālacakkanti. Āṇāyaṃ “cakkaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2090_7: vattayati pāṇīna”nti jā. 1.7.149. Āyudhe cakkākāre āyudhe. Dānaṃ deyyadhammo. Rāsi
anya-e0810n0:2094: Gāthāicceva niddiṭṭhaṃ, munindavacane panā”ti vuttodaya 14-15 gāthā hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2104: Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2109_0: “Taṃ kho pana pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā”ti
anya-e0810n0:2109_1: dī. ni. 2.329 imasmiṃ mahāgovindasutte appamaññāsu. “Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva
anya-e0810n0:2109_2: phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāvadeva manussesu suppakāsita”nti dī.
anya-e0810n0:2109_3: ni. 3.174 pāsādikasutte sikkhattayasaṅgahe sakalasmiṃ sāsane. “Pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti,
anya-e0810n0:2109_4: mayamettha brahmacārino bhavissāmā”ti ma. ni. 1.83 imasmiṃ sallekhasutte methunā viratiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2111: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
anya-e0810n0:2112: Tena pāṇi kāmadado, tena pāṇi madhussavo;
anya-e0810n0:2113: Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti pe. va. 275. –
anya-e0810n0:2118: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na miyyare”ti jā. 1.10.97. –
anya-e0810n0:2120: “Evaṃ kho taṃ, bhikkhave, tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī”ti cūḷava. 311 imasmiṃ tittirajātake pañcasīle.
anya-e0810n0:2121: “Idaṃ kho pana pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya…pe… ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti dī. ni. 2.329 mahāgovindasutteyeva ariyamagge.
anya-e0810n0:2123: Majjhimena ca devattaṃ, uttamena visujjhatī”ti jā. 1.8.75. –
anya-e0810n0:2125: “Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritvā tapassi sudaṃ homī”ti ma. ni. 1.155 lomahaṃsasutte dhitisaṅkhāte vīriye.
anya-e0810n0:2126_0: 784. Sabhāvo aviparītattho. Pariyatti pariyāpuṇitabbā vinayābhidhammasuttantā. Ñāyo
anya-e0810n0:2126_2: pañcavidhe ñeyye. Nissattatā sattasabhāvassa abhāvatā. Āpattiyaṃ “pārājikaṃ dhamma”nti.
anya-e0810n0:2126_3: “Saha dhammena niggayhā”tyādīsu kāraṇe. Ādinā samayaññūpamāhiṃsādīsupi dhammo.
anya-e0810n0:2127: 785. Payojanaṃ phalaṃ. Saddābhidheyye saddatthe. Vuḍḍhiyaṃ vaḍḍhane. Vatthumhi dabbe. Nāse vināse. Pacchimapabbate atthagirimhi. Nivattivisayuppattisabhāvādīsupi.
anya-e0810n0:2128_0: 786. Yebhuyyatā bāhulyatā. Abyāmissaṃ asammissaṃ. Visaṃyoge vippayoge. Daḷhatthe
anya-e0810n0:2128_1: daḷhasaddassa atthe. Anatireke atirekābhāve. Anavasesamhi sabbasmiṃ, taṃ kevalavacanaṃ tīsu liṅgesu.
anya-e0810n0:2129_1: jahantī”ti saṃ. ni. 1.4 rāsimhi. “Sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti ma. ni. 3.379
anya-e0810n0:2129_2: ānisaṃse. Bandhanaṃ kāmaguṇaṃ. Appadhāne visesane. Jiyāya dhanuno.
anya-e0810n0:2130_0: 788-789. Rukkhādo dumādimhi. Vijjamāne bhūtaguṇe. Arahante “yo ca kālaghaso bhūto,
anya-e0810n0:2130_1: sabhūtapaciniṃ pacī”ti jā. 1.2.190. Khandhapañcake “bhūtamidaṃ, sāriputta, samanupassathā”ti
anya-e0810n0:2130_2: ma. ni. 1.401. Satte pāṇimhi. Mahābhūte pathavādike. Amanusso devarakkhasādi. Vijjamānatthavajjite
anya-e0810n0:2130_3: rukkhādo nāriyaṃ na bhavati, vijjamānatthe, pana atītādīsu ca vāccaliṅgo. Patte sampatte. Same tulyatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2132_1: pā. 3.dvattiṃsākāra. Deho ca avayavo cāti eke. Koṭṭhāse “ayameko anto”tyādīsu a.
anya-e0810n0:2133_0: 792. Nikāyo sadhammīnaṃ gaṇo. Sandhi paṭisandhi. Sāmaññe visesādhāre. Pasūti mātukucchito
anya-e0810n0:2133_1: nikkhamanaṃ, kulaṃ khattiyādikulaṃ. Bhavo bhavanakriyā. Visesyo upādhi, yassa vasena
anya-e0810n0:2133_2: bhinnesu sabalādīsu abhinnā dhīsaddā vattante. Sumanāyaṃ mālatiyaṃ. Saṅkhatalakkhaṇe
anya-e0810n0:2134_0: 793. Bhavabhedo kāmabhavādi. Patiṭṭhāyaṃ nissaye. Niṭṭhā nipphatti. Ajjhāsayo adhippāyo.
anya-e0810n0:2134_1: Buddhi ñāṇaṃ. Vāsaṭṭhānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. Visarattaṃ visaraṇabhāvo. “Visadatthe”tipi
anya-e0810n0:2135: 794. Phale sotāpattādike. Aniccādianupassanā vipassanā nāma. Magge sotāpattimaggādike.
anya-e0810n0:2136_0: 795. Kammāruddhanaṃ kammārānaṃ uddhanaṃ, kammārānaṃ yathā ukkāti. Aṅgārakapallaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2136_1: aṅgārānaṃ bhājanaṃ. Dīpikā nāma madhucchiṭṭhādimayā padīpakiccakārikā. Suvaṇṇakāramūsā
anya-e0810n0:2136_2: mattikamayā ekā bhājanavikati. Vāyuno vege ca ukkāsaddo, yo “devadudrabhī”ti vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2137: 796. Kesohāraṇaṃ kesānaṃ lavanaṃ. Jīvitavutti jīvitassa vattanaṃ. Vapanaṃ bījassa vapanaṃ. Vāpasamakaraṇaṃ vapitassa bījassa samakaraṇaṃ. Pavuttabhāvo bandhanā mutti.
anya-e0810n0:2138_0: 797-798. Suto vissute pākaṭe. Avadhārite upalakkhite. Upacite rāsīkate. Anuyogo pucchā.
anya-e0810n0:2138_1: Kilinne tinte. Sotaviññeyyaṃ saddāyatanaṃ. Satthaṃ saddasatthādi, sutanāmako vā eko
anya-e0810n0:2138_2: satthaviseso. Etesu dvīsu atthesu sutaṃ napuṃsakaṃ. Putte suto pulliṅgo, rājinipi suto.
anya-e0810n0:2139_0: 799. Yuge katādicatukke. Leso anumānañāṇavisayo. Paññattiyaṃ “kappatthero”ti. Paramāyumhi
anya-e0810n0:2139_1: “kappaṃ saggamhi modatī”ti. Aññatra kappādīsu pulliṅge. Sadise pana tīsu liṅgesu.
anya-e0810n0:2139_2: Samaṇavohāro vinayāgato samaṇānaṃ vohāro. Kappabindu cīvare katabindu. Samantatte
anya-e0810n0:2139_3: samantabhāve. Antarakappo mahākappassa asītimo bhāgo. Ādisaddena asaṅkhyeyyamahākappe
anya-e0810n0:2140: 800. Virati viratittayaṃ. Sapatho akkoso. Tacche tathabhāve. Ariyasaccamhi dukkhasaccādike. Diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi.
anya-e0810n0:2141_1: Ākaroti yattha suvaṇṇarajatādayo uppajjanti. Samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2142: 802. Vatthaṃ ambaraṃ. Añño yo sako na hoti. Odhi mariyādo. Bhedo viseso. Manasipi cittepi.
anya-e0810n0:2144_0: 804. Dravo madhvādi. Madhurādīsu chasu rasesu. Pārado sūto. Siṅgārādo nava nāṭyarase.
anya-e0810n0:2145: 805. Bodhisaddo ñāṇadvaye nāriyaṃ, bodhirājakumārādipaññattiyaṃ pume. Assattharukkhe pumitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2146: 806. Yena kattubhūtena yo kammabhūto niccasevito, tatthāpi kammabhūte. Visayo anaññathābhāvo. Janapade kuruādike. Gocare tabbahulācāre.
anya-e0810n0:2148: 808. Bandhave so pume. Attani saṃ napuṃsake. Dhanasmiṃ so saṃ anitthiyaṃ. Sunakhe sā pume vutto. Attaniye so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0810n0:2150: 810. Jāmātā dhītusāmiko. Mandappiye appapiye varaṃ abyayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2152: 812. Pitāmaho brahmā. Pitūsu mātāpitūsu. Tathā pakkhantare. Tapasi sīle.
anya-e0810n0:2153_0: 813-814. Majjhabandhe urobandhane. Pakoṭṭho kapparassādhobhāgo. Kacchabandhanaṃ adhombarassa
anya-e0810n0:2153_1: daḷhabandhanaṃ. Mekhalāyañcāti kacchā catūsvatthesu. Kaccho latādīsu. Kaccho bāhumūlamhi
anya-e0810n0:2155: 816. Dabbaṃ dhanaṃ. Attabhāvo pañcakkhandhasamūho. Pāṇo jīvitindriyaṃ. Dabbādīsu catūsu sattaṃ. Sattāyaṃ vijjamānatāyaṃ sattā. Jane satto. So sattasaddo, āsatte laggite tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0810n0:2156: 817. Semhādo tidose. Rasarattādi pubbevutto. Pabhādike rūpadhātumhi. Cakkhādike visayadhātumhi.
anya-e0810n0:2157: 818. Amaccādikā satta pakatiyo vuttā. Sattādisāmyavatthā sattarajatamabhūtānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ guṇānaṃ sāmyavatthā. Paccayā ṇapaccayādito paṭhame paṭhamasaṇṭhite karotyādidhātumhi.
anya-e0810n0:2158: 819. Parittāṇaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ. Vatthumhi okāse. Tallañchanaṃ pādassa ṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2159: 820. Lohamuggare lohamaye muggare. Tāḷādike sammatāḷakaṃsatāḷādike. Kaṭhine kakkhaḷe.
anya-e0810n0:2160: 821. Makkhikā nīlamakkhikādikā. Tāsaṃ bhedā savisā madhukatā piṅgalamakkhikā. Madhumhi khuddaṃ appakādīsu catūsvatthesu vattamānaṃ tīsu liṅgesu. Adhamo nihīno. Kapaṇo ekacārī.
anya-e0810n0:2161: 822. Takke gorasavisese. Maraṇaliṅge maraṇañāpakalakkhaṇe. Asubhe, subhe cāti catūsvatthesu ariṭṭhaṃ. Āsavo majjaviseso. Pheṇiladdumo “baḍī-yौ-kho”.
anya-e0810n0:2162: 823. Gehānaṃ dārubandhappayojanaṃ pīṭhikā nāma. Pakkhandadvayassa, kaṇṇikādīnañca nissayabhūtā pīṭhikā.
anya-e0810n0:2163: 824. Mittākāre amittassāpi mittasaṇṭhāne. Bale, rāsimhi, vipattiyañca, “balassa rāsī”tipi eke.
anya-e0810n0:2164: 825. Khandhe rūpakkhandhe. Bhave rūpabhave. Nimittamhi kāraṇe. Vapu sarīraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2165: 826. Vatthukilesakāmesūti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu. Madane māradevaputte. Rate methune. Nikāme icchārahite kāmaṃ napuṃsake. Anuññāyaṃ kāmamabyayaṃ bhave.
anya-e0810n0:2166: 827. Vajjabhaṇḍamukhe vīṇādoṇimukhe. Mātaṅgassa hatthino karakoṭi hatthaggaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2167: 828. Rambho saṭhyaṃ, ketavantyattho. Asaccaṃ musā. Ayoghanaṃ yena paharati. Girisiṅgamhi giragge. Sīraṅge phālaṅge. Yante kūṭayante.
anya-e0810n0:2168: 830. Paṭivākye paṭivacane. Uttarāsaṅge uparivatthe. Seṭṭhādīsu uttaro tīsu, parasmiṃ uparismiñca īrito.
anya-e0810n0:2170_0: 832. Saṅkhate paccayābhisaṅkhate dhamme. Puññābhisaṅkhāro, apuññābhisaṅkhāro, āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti
anya-e0810n0:2170_1: puññābhisaṅkhārādi. Payogo ussāho. Kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro, cittasaṅkhāroti kāyasaṅkhārādi.
anya-e0810n0:2172: 834. Patirūpe yutte. Chādite tiṇādīhi. Raho suññaṭṭhānaṃ. Paññattiyaṃ channo bhikkhu, paññattiyaṃyeva pume.
anya-e0810n0:2173: 835. Buddhacakkhu buddhānaṃ cakkhu. Samantacakkhu sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Dhammacakkhu heṭṭhāmaggattaye ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2175: 837. Vevacanaṃ abhinnattho saddo. Pakārasmiṃ bhede. Avasaro avakāso.
anya-e0810n0:2176_0: 838. Cittakammaṃ cittakārānaṃ kammaṃ. Vicitte nānāvidhe. Paññattiyaṃ citto dhanudharoyeva.
anya-e0810n0:2176_1: Cittamāso puṇṇenduyuttena cittena nakkhattena lakkhito māso. Tārantare cittanakkhatte. Thiyaṃ nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2177: 839. Sāmale nīle. Sayamatthe sayaṃsaddassa atthe. Sārivā upāsakā.
anya-e0810n0:2178_0: 840. “Pume”tyādinā pubbaddhena gurusaddassa atthā vuttā, aparaddhena garusaddassa,
anya-e0810n0:2178_2: kathitā. Mahante bahutte. Dujjare jīrāpetumasakkuṇeyye, dukkare vā.
anya-e0810n0:2179: 841. Accite pūjite. Khinne kilamathappatte. Samite upasamite.
anya-e0810n0:2181: 842. Visuddhidevo, sammutidevo, upapattidevo cāti visuddhidevādi. Nabhaṃ ākāso.
anya-e0810n0:2184: Paccanīko sattu. Aññe aññatthe. Pacchābhāge “dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā”ti.
anya-e0810n0:2185: 844. Yoni itthīnaṃ yonimaggo. Kāmo icchā. Sirī paññā, puñño ca. Issaraṃ pabhutā. Dhammo sīlādi. Uyyāmo vīriyaṃ. Yaso parivāro, kitti ca.
anya-e0810n0:2188: 848. Khandhakoṭṭhāso aṇḍajādicatukkaṃ. Passāvamaggo itthīnaṃ yoni. So pulliṅgo. Kūle tīre.
anya-e0810n0:2189: 849. Nāgotunāgasaddo tu. Urage sappe, hatthini ca.
anya-e0810n0:2191: 851. Bhe nakkhattavisese. Santike samīpe. Mūlamūle lobhādike. Pābhate mūladhane. Aṃso sarīrāvayavo. Pakaṇḍe rukkhādīnaṃ sarīre.
anya-e0810n0:2193: 853. Pacchātāpo vippaṭisāro. Anubandho punappunaṃ pavattanaṃ. Rāgādo sattake. Mātaṅgassa muddhani piṇḍadvaye kumbho.
anya-e0810n0:2194: 854. Khaggakose khaggapidhāne. Paṭicchade samantato chādane. Sārambhe kolāhale.
anya-e0810n0:2195: 855. Kālaviseso dasaccharakālo. Nibyāpāraṭṭhiti aciraṭṭhiti, aciraṭṭhitīti dasaccharatopi ūnaṭṭhiti.
anya-e0810n0:2198: 857. Saddhāya aparappaccaye. Cīvarādīsu catūsu. Ādhāro nissayo.
anya-e0810n0:2199: Dibbavihāro, ariyavihāro, brahmavihāro cāti dibbavihārādi. Sugatālaye bhikkhūnamāvāse.
anya-e0810n0:2202: 859. Sappaphaṇaṅgesūti sappassa phaṇe, aṅge ca sarīre. Koṭille kuṭilatāya. Bhuñjanaṃ bhojanakriyā.
anya-e0810n0:2203: Bhūmibhāge rājaṅgaṇādimhi. Kilese saṃkilese. Male rāgādike.
anya-e0810n0:2206: 861. So pulliṅgo. Paramattani diṭṭhīnaṃ gāhaladdhe attani. Thambhasmiṃ gehādīnaṃ thambhe. Balasajjanaṃ yuddhakāle balassa sajjanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2209: 863. Niyyāse silese. Sekhare sīse. Nāgadantake bhittiādīsu pavesite nāgadantākāre daṇḍe.
anya-e0810n0:2210: Sikhaṇḍo piñchaṃ. Tūṇīre usunidhimhi. Nikare samūhe.
anya-e0810n0:2212: Kambu jalajantuviseso. Nalāṭaṭṭhi nalāṭe jātaṭṭhi. Gopphake pādagaṇṭhimhi.
anya-e0810n0:2213: 865. Kāle pañcadasīdivasaparimāṇe. Sādhye pattasādhanīye. Sakhī sahāyo. Vājo pattaṃ. Paṅguḷo pīṭhasampī.
anya-e0810n0:2214: Dese desavisese. Aṇṇave samudde, ete pume. So sindhusaddo saritāyaṃ nadiyaṃ bhave.
anya-e0810n0:2215: 866. Kareṇusaddo gaje hatthimhi, purise pulliṅge vattati. Hatthiniyaṃ tu itthiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2216: Ratane ratanavisese. Maṇivedho nāma yaṃ loke “cina” iti vuccati. Indaheti indāvudho.
anya-e0810n0:2223: 868. Vaṇippathe vāṇijānaṃ vohārakammapathe. Vede vedavisese, vāṇijepi nigamo.
anya-e0810n0:2224: Vivādādo “vivādādhikaraṇa” pāci. 394 ntyādīsu. Ādhāro kārakaviseso, nissayo ca. Kāraṇe “yatvādhikaraṇamena”nti dha. sa. 1354.
anya-e0810n0:2225: 869. Pasumhi goṇe. Vasudhā pathavī. Vācā vacanaṃ. Ādinā saggaraṃsivajiracandajalādayo gahitā.
anya-e0810n0:2228: Kaṇṇapūro kaṇṇālaṅkāro. Sekhare agge. Ete dvinnampi atthā.
anya-e0810n0:2232: Nārī āsīsaddo sappadāṭhāyaṃ. Iṭṭhassa vatthuno āsīsanāyaṃ patthanāyampi itthī eva.
anya-e0810n0:2233: 873. Vilīnatele visaraṇatele. Vasagā vasaṃ gacchantī nārī. Vañcyagāvī anavacchā sorabheyī.
anya-e0810n0:2234: Abhilāse icchāyaṃ. Kiraṇe raṃsimhi. Abhisaṅge laggane.
anya-e0810n0:2235: 874. Aṃse koṭṭhāse. Sippe nāṭakasatthāgate. Candassa soḷasame bhāge ca kalā.
anya-e0810n0:2237: Āgāmikāle anāgatakāle. Pabhāvo daṇḍatejo. Saṃyamepi āyati bhave.
anya-e0810n0:2238: 876. Mesādilome eḷakādīnaṃ lome. Bhūmajjhe dvinnaṃ bhūnaṃ majjhe jātāyaṃ romadhātuyaṃ lome.
anya-e0810n0:2240: 877. Kriyacitte vīsatividhe kriyacitte. Karaṇe karaṇakriyāyaṃ, etesu dvīsu atthesu kriyaṃ. Kammani kattabbe kriyā nārī.
anya-e0810n0:2241: Suṇisāyaṃ puttassa bhariyāyaṃ. Kaññāyaṃ anibbiddhāyaṃ. Jāyāyaṃ bhariyāsāmaññe.
anya-e0810n0:2243: Pāvacane buddhavacane. Siddhe siddhante. Tante suttamaye. Supite niddāsīle.
anya-e0810n0:2244: 879. Rājaliṅgaṃ khaggādi. Usabhaṅgo usabhāvayavo. Rukkhe rukkhavisese. Nimittaṃ guyhaṅgaṃ. Cihane lakkhaṇe. Pade vibhatyante.
anya-e0810n0:2245: 880. Vohāre vāṇijakamme. Kīḷādo kīḷādimhi. Ādinā jutithutigatyādayo saṅgahitā.
anya-e0810n0:2247: 881. Sussūsāyaṃ sotumicchāyaṃ. Issātyāse sarābhyāse. Hiṃsanepi upāsanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2249: 882. Vīṇāguṇo vīṇāyajiyā. Tantaṃ tantasaddo. Mukhyaṃ padhānaṃ. Siddhantaṃ udāharaṇaṃ. Tantu suttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2251: 883. Itthipupphaṃ itthīnaṃ utu. Reṇu dhūlī. Pakatije guṇe tiṇṇaṃ guṇānaṃ dutiye guṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2252: Nyāsappaṇe ṭhapitassa dhanassa dāne. Dānamhi tadaññassa dāne.
anya-e0810n0:2253: 884. Guru ācariyādi. Upāyo hetu. Avatāro otaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Pūtambu pavittajalaṃ. Diṭṭhi buddhadassanā aññadassanaṃ. Āgamepi titthaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2254: Jotisaddo nakkhattaraṃsīsu paṇḍake napuṃsake. Aggimhi tu so pumā.
anya-e0810n0:2255: 885. “Iti sandhikappe paṭhamo kaṇḍo”tyādīsu vagge. Avasarepi, avasaro avakāso.
anya-e0810n0:2256: Atha bāhudvayassa uddhaṃ māne. Sūratte sūrabhāve.
anya-e0810n0:2257: 886. Porisaṃ purisakāro. Īhā vīriyaṃ. Nisinnādyuggamo nisinnādiko uggamo ṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2258_1: suññamahīkoṭṭhāse. “Irīṇaṃ ūsare suññe”ti medinīkosa 15.36 hi tikaṇḍaseso. Ūsare ūsavati ṭhāne.
anya-e0810n0:2259: 887. Sādhanatthādīsu ārādhanaṃ. Rādhanaṃpyatra. “Pattiyaṃ sādhane vuttaṃ, rādhanaṃ tosanepi ce”ti tikaṇḍaseso.
anya-e0810n0:2260: Sānumhi pabbatassa same bhūbhāge. Visāṇe mātaṅgadante, pasūnaṃ siṅge ca.
anya-e0810n0:2261: 888. Diṭṭhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ. Ādimaggo sotāpattimaggo. Ñāṇaṃ sāmaññaṃ. Akkhi cakkhu. Ikkhanaṃ olokanaṃ. Laddhi gāho.
anya-e0810n0:2262: Suvaṇṇo pañcadharaṇaṃ. Pañcasuvaṇṇo nikkho. Pasādhanaṃ alaṅkāraviseso.
anya-e0810n0:2263: 889. Tithibhede horasatthāgate aniṭṭhasammate tithimhi. Sākhādiphaḷumhi rukkhasākhādīnaṃ gaṇṭhimhi. Pūraṇepi pabbaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2264: Balavāmukho yatra plavādayo sīghasotena ākaḍḍhitvā pavesiyanti.
anya-e0810n0:2265: 890. Kāmaje taṇhāje surāpānādike. Dose aparādhe. Kopaje daṇḍapharusādike ca. Vipattiyaṃ vināse.
anya-e0810n0:2266: Upakaraṇaṃ kulālādīnaṃ daṇḍacakkādi. Siddhi nipphatti. Kārako kattādisattavidho.
anya-e0810n0:2267: 891. Dānasīle dānapakatike ca. Vagguvādini madhuravādini ca vadaññū bhave. Ito paṭṭhāya ussitapariyanto tīsu vutto. Abhisitte muddhābhisitte rājini.
anya-e0810n0:2268: 892. Bhāgyavihīne apuññe. Appake abahuke. Mūḷhe bāle. Apaṭu acheko. Khale, jagatiyañca mando. Vuddhiyutte vaḍḍhanayutte. Samunnaddhe anīce ussitaṃ tīsu bhave, “bhāsita”ntipi pāṭho.
anya-e0810n0:2269: 893. Rathaṅge rathāvayave. Suvaṇṇasmiṃ palassa catutthabhāge. Pāsake catuvīsatippamāṇe, tiṃsappamāṇe vā. Hatthidantādivikatiyaṃ tīsu akkho. Cakkhādindriye akkhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2270: Sassate nicce. Takke vitakke. Nicchite vinicchite.
anya-e0810n0:2271: 894. Hare mahissare sivo, bhadde kalyāṇe. Mokkhe nibbāne ca sivaṃ. Jambuke siṅgāle sivā.
anya-e0810n0:2273: 895. Saṅkhyābhedo uppalapuṇḍarīkānaṃ majjhe gaṇanā. Narakabhede “padumaniraye nibbatto”tyādīsu. Vārije kakkasanāḷe kamale.
anya-e0810n0:2279: Kathite devavisese. Ratane ratanasāmaññe, dhane ca, paṇḍakaṃ napuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2280: 896. Atthagamane vināsagamane. Apavagge sabbakilesānaṃ khayahetubhūte virāgadhamme.
anya-e0810n0:2281: Setambuje setakamale. Rukkhantare “puṇḍarīka”iti khyāte dumavisese, dvīsvatthesu pume.
anya-e0810n0:2285: 897. Upahāre pūjādyatthaṃ ābhate vatthumhi. Karasmiṃ khettādisambhave rājabhāge. Asurantare balināmake asure.
anya-e0810n0:2286_0: Sambhave itthipurisasambhave asucimhi sukkaṃ. Dhavale sete sukko, kusale puññe tīsu,
anya-e0810n0:2286_1: “puññaṃ dhammamanitthiya”nti ettha dhammasaddassa anitthibhāvassa vuttattā sukkasaddo tīsu vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2287: 898. Vibhattabbadhane vibhajitabbadhane. Pitūnaṃ dhane petānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ puttehi vibhajitabbadhane ca.
anya-e0810n0:2288: Pabhuno puggalassa bhāvo pabhuttaṃ, tathā āyattassa bhāvo āyattatā. Āyatto puggalo. Abhilāso icchā.
anya-e0810n0:2289: 899. Dhanimhi saddamatte. Yodhasīhanādamhi yodhānaṃ abhītanāde ca seḷanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2291: 901. Sādhakatame kattuto aññesaṃ kriyāsādhakatame karaṇakārake, kriyāyaṃ, gatte sarīre ca. Indriye cakkhādike.
anya-e0810n0:2295: 903. Pupphaṃvinā phalaggāhirukkhe assatthādo, rukkhamatte ca vanappatisaddo. Āhate upaṭṭhāpite varāhapurisādirūpe ca, rajatamatte ca rūpiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2296: 904. Kesasaddo pubbo yassa pāsasaddassa so kesapubbo. Caye samūhe vattati, yathā “kesapāso”ti, kesakalāpotyattho.
anya-e0810n0:2297: Akkhimajjhe yā “sūlā”ti vuttā. Nakkhatte sattavīsatividhe, tadaññesu ca tārā itthī. Uccatarassare uccatare sadde tāro.
anya-e0810n0:2298: 905. Patte bhājanasāmaññe, bhuñjanapatte ca. Lohabhedasmiṃ ayotambādimaye bhājanavisese. Dehamajjhaṃ udaraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2300: Sampatti dhanādisampatti tivaggasampatti ca. Lakkhiyā katapuññehi seviyati. Itthī itthiviseso. Devatā sirīnāmikā ekā devadhītā.
anya-e0810n0:2301: 907. Yuvarājā pitari devaṅgate rājabhāvāraho rājaputto. Khande harassa putte. Susu taruṇo.
anya-e0810n0:2302: Maṇibhede yo loke “santā”ti vuccati. Aṅkure rukkhādīnaṃ aṅkure.
anya-e0810n0:2303: 908. Vetanaṃ kammakārehi labhitabbadhanaṃ. Mūlaṃ mūladhanaṃ. Vohāre vāṇijakamme.
anya-e0810n0:2305: 909. Asubhe ca kamme subhe ca kamme dvayepi kamme cāti tīsvatthesu bhāgyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2311: 913. Mukhye padhāne. Upāye hetumhi. Vadane lapane. Ādismiṃ paṭhame.
anya-e0810n0:2312: Bhabbe vimuttārahe, bhavitabbe ca. Guṇādhāre guṇassa nissaye. Vitte dhane. Budhe paṇḍite. Dāru dārukkhandho.
anya-e0810n0:2313: 914. Patthādo pattho, tulā, aṅgulīti patthādi. Vidhāya unnatiyaṃ. Parissame khede.
anya-e0810n0:2314: 915. Saroruhe kamale. Khagantare rukkhakimikhādakasakuṇe. Tūriyantare vaṃsasaṅkhādike.
anya-e0810n0:2317: 918. Māse tatiyamāse. Ativuddhe ca atipasatthe ca.
anya-e0810n0:2319: Mattikābhedo nīlādivaṇṇayuttakittimamattikā. Sikkāyaṃ udakakumbhādivāhike. Nayanāmaye cakkhurogavisese.
anya-e0810n0:2320: 920. Maṇḍale parimaṇḍale. Bimbikā latājāti, tassā phale ca bimbaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2323: Cāpe dhanumhi issāsaṃ. Usuno sarassa khepakamhi perake issāso.
anya-e0810n0:2324: 923. Bālasaddo tīsu. Kutratthesu? Ādivayasā paṭhamavayena samaṅgini samannāgate ca. Apaṇḍite mūḷhe ca.
anya-e0810n0:2325: Soṇite lohite. Tambaṃ udumbaraṃ. Anuratto anurāgayutto puggalo. Rañjitaṃ raṅgarañjitaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2326: 924. Viraḷe nirantare. Kise athūle. Hime tuhine.
anya-e0810n0:2327: 925. Guḷabhedo yo loke “sakkharā”ti vuccati. Kaṭhale silākhaṇḍe.
anya-e0810n0:2328: 926. Tikhiṇe tikkhe. Byatte cheke. Rogamutte niroge.
anya-e0810n0:2329: Khattiye muddhābhisitte. Naranāthe tadaññasmiṃ. Pabhumhi issare.
anya-e0810n0:2330: 927. Dhaññakaraṇaṃ dhaññamaddanaṭṭhānaṃ. Kakke nahānacuṇṇe. Nīce adhame. Setepi khalo.
anya-e0810n0:2331: 928. Brahmacārī ca gahaṭṭho ca vānappattho ca bhikkhu cāti brahmacārīgahaṭṭhādi, tapodhane piyasīle.
anya-e0810n0:2333: 929. Kaniṭṭho ca kaniyo cāti ete tīsu. Kutratthesu? Atyappe, atiyuvepi.
anya-e0810n0:2334: Iṭṭhe, nissāre ca agarumhi cāti etesvatthesu tīsu.
anya-e0810n0:2335: 930. Adhobhāge ca hīne ca. Dantacchade dantāvaraṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2337: 931. Ratane dvividatthike. Gaṇe samūhe yathā “kesahattho”ti. Soṇḍāya karikare. Bhantaraṃ terasamanakkhattaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2338: Āvāṭe kāsuyaṃ. Udapānaṃ andhu, yatra jalaṃ ghaṭiyantena uddharitvā pivanti.
anya-e0810n0:2339: 932. Paṭhamaṃ pamukhañcāti idaṃ abhidhānadvayaṃ ādimhi padhāne vattati.
anya-e0810n0:2342: Khandhabhāro khandhena vahitabbo bhāro. Ādinā kaṭibhārādayo gahitā. Yasmā palasataṃ tulā, vīsatitulā bhāro, tasmā “dvisahassapale”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2343: 934. Mandire gehe. Rogabhede khayaroge. Apacayamhi viddhaṃsane, vināse ca.
anya-e0810n0:2344: Sāpade byagghādike duṭṭhamige. Sappe urage. Kurūre kakkhaḷe.
anya-e0810n0:2346: Sote kaṇṇe. Yajane pūjane. Sutiyaṃ savanakriyāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2347: 936. Peto ca paretocāti ime mate kālaṅkate ca petayonije petayonisambhave siyuṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2350: Pakkhe sakuṇādīnaṃ pakkhe. Dale rukkhādīnaṃ chade. Bhājane lohamayādike. “Sogate”ti idaṃ “bhājane”ti imassa visesanaṃ. Sogate sugatassa santake bhājanetyattho.
anya-e0810n0:2355: Añjase magge. Visikhā racchā. Pantiyaṃ pāḷiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2358: 942. Saṅghaṭṭane dvinnaṃ antarabhūte. Puna sandhīti padapūraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Atisante atisamite.
anya-e0810n0:2359: 943. Yāpanā yāpanakārako kabaḷīkārāhāraraso. Ditti jalanaṃ. Balaṃ thāmo.
anya-e0810n0:2361: Khaṇḍane chedane. Itivutte ca kammanīti “iti evaṃ mayā pubbe carita”nti vattabbe subhāsubhakamme. “Ativatte ca kammanī”tipi pāṭho, atītakāle pavattakammanītyattho.
anya-e0810n0:2362: 945. Cittake nalāṭe katakāḷādibindumhi rukkhabhede marīcappamāṇambilarukkhe, yassa phalena ambilasūpaṃ pacanti. Tilakāḷake taṃtaṃsarīrāvayave sañjātatilasaṇṭhāne kāḷake.
anya-e0810n0:2365: Vase āyattatāyaṃ. Vede catubbidhavede. Icchā ārammaṇicchā.
anya-e0810n0:2367: 948. Veṇvādisākhājālasminti veṇuādīnañca aññamaññasaṃsagge sākhāsamūhe. Laggakese tāpasādīnaṃ laggakese. Ālaye taṇhāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2368: Vadhe māraṇe. Rakkhitasmiṃ kammani, kattari ca.
anya-e0810n0:2369: 949. Thiyaṃ itthiyaṃ. Piye sāmike. Manuññe manaso tosanajanake. Gavakkhe sīhapañjare.
anya-e0810n0:2370: 950. Kiṃ saddo pucchanatthādīsu saliṅgo. Vikappatthādīsu tu abyayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2371: Sasaddhe saddhāya sahite. Nivāpe petādīnaṃ kattabbapūjādāne. Paccaye saddahane saddhā.
anya-e0810n0:2373: Pūye pakkavaṇasañjāte. Aggato purato. Disādo sūriyuggamanadisāyaṃ. Sā hi disānaṃ ādibhūtā, “disā”ti vā disāviseso. Ādinā pubbajādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2376: Uttaraviparīte aseṭṭhe, imasmiṃ atthe nakāro paṭisedhattho. Seṭṭhe uttame. Imasmiṃ atthe paṭisedhatthova nakāro. “Anu uttara”nti chedo ca viññeyyo.
anya-e0810n0:2377: 954. Sattisampattiyaṃ pabhāvādīhi sattīhi sampattiyaṃ. Kantimatte kamanīyamatte. Sūravīriyesupi vikkamo.
anya-e0810n0:2379: 955. Ghammo nidāgho cāti dve abhidhānāni. Sedajale kāyato mutte.
anya-e0810n0:2380: Kantane chedane. Vikappe vitakke. Sajjane hatthādīnaṃ sajjane.
anya-e0810n0:2381: 956. Deso desaviseso. Aṅgasaddo puṃbahutte. “Bahumhī”tipi pāṭho. Aṅgasaddo bahutte desetyattho. Vapumhi sarīre aṅgaṃ. Avayave hetumhi ca aṅgaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2386: 957. Sādhupurise sappurise. Kappane hatthādīnaṃ kappane. “Sajjane sajjanā kappanāya”nti nānatthasaṅgaho.
anya-e0810n0:2387: Supane niddāyaṃ. Sutte ajāgarite. Viññāṇe suttassa viññāṇe citte taṃ supinavacanaṃ. Dassane ca supinaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2388: 958. Paccakkhe sammukhe. Sannidhāne payoge, vidhāne ca. Bhiyyosaddo pahūtaratthe so pumā.
anya-e0810n0:2389: 959. Visalittasare visena lepitasare diddho pumā. Litte lepitabbasāmaññe.
anya-e0810n0:2390: Vāse vasane. Dhūmādisaṅkhāre gandhacuṇṇadhūmādinā abhisaṅkhāre. Sampaṭicchane paṭiggahaṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2392: Madhucchiṭṭhe madane, yena dīpampi jālenti. Odanasambhave bhuttodanato patite lāmakasammate odanabindumhi.
anya-e0810n0:2395: 962. Lūkhe samale, kakkhaḷe ca. Niṭṭhuravācāyaṃ akaṇṇasukhavacane.
anya-e0810n0:2397: 963. Tappare tappadhāne. Kavace uracchade. Vāravāṇe cammamaye yuddhālaṅkāre ca. Nimmoke sappānaṃ jiṇṇacammani.
anya-e0810n0:2399: 966. Lohe kāḷāyase satthaṃ. Sañcaye samūhe sattho. Yathā “sakaṭasattho”tyādi. Vattane pavattane.
anya-e0810n0:2401: 968. Kaṇḍe vāṇe. Vāpimhi dīghikādikāyaṃ. Dupphasse dukkhasamphasse. Kakace kharapatte.
anya-e0810n0:2402: 969. Surāya kādambariyaṃ, yāya pītāya mattā sattā anāgamanīyavatthūsupi gacchanti. Rathaṅge cakke. Kāmupadhiādīsu catūsu upadhīsu ca upadhi, anitthī.
anya-e0810n0:2403: 970. Dabbe dhanādike. Bhūbhedo vatthādi. Mahārāje catūsu mahārājesu ekasmiṃ mahārāje. Nare satte.
anya-e0810n0:2404: 971. Āpaṇe kayavikkayaṭṭhāne. Sambhāre upakaraṇe. “Ratho sīlaparikkhāro, jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”ti saṃ. ni. 5.4 ettha alaṅkāro “parikkhāro”ti vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2405: 972. Vohārasmiṃ rathasakaṭādivohāre. Upaṭṭhitagirā saddato atthato ca pākaṭagirā.
anya-e0810n0:2406_1: avayave. Mūle lobhādike. Kāraṇe lobhādito aññasmiṃ kāraṇe. Pācānalasmiṃ udaraṭṭhe
anya-e0810n0:2408: 975. Muddikassa rukkhassa rase ca. Pupphassa sabbassa pupphassa rase ca. Khudde makkhikākate ca madhu punnapuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2409: “Madhu khudde jale khīre, majje puppharase madhu;
anya-e0810n0:2410: Racche citte vasante ca, jīvasāke madhuddume”ti. –
anya-e0810n0:2412: Ulloceti seyyādīnaṃ uparibhāge rajopātanivāraṇatthaṃ ṭhapite dussamayādike.
anya-e0810n0:2416: Amato amatā sivā-gaḷo jhāmalakīsu ce”ti medinīkosa 16.77-8 gāthāyampi.
anya-e0810n0:2417: Nānatthasaṅgahe vuttaṃ. Mohe avijjāyaṃ. Timire andhakāre. Saṅkhyā gaṇanaviseso. Guṇe tatiye guṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2418: 977. Khare pharuse. Akāriye akattabbe. Purise pulliṅge. Sukate kusale dhamme puññaṃ paṇḍake napuṃsake. Pavane pūte.
anya-e0810n0:2420: 979. Lañchane paṭibimbe. Sīmā mariyādo. Pakāro tulyo.
anya-e0810n0:2421: 980. Mantane catukkaṇṇādike. Byasane bhogabyasanādike. Vipattiyaṃ anatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2422: 981. Raṃsibhedo pubbe udayato sūriyassa raṃsiviseso. Abyattarāge kiñciratte. Lohite ratte.
anya-e0810n0:2423: Pakatānivatte pakatito anivattane. “Pakatiyañca anivattane cā”tipi attho. Nassanakkhareti vināsanakkhare. Nassa adassane akkhare.
anya-e0810n0:2427: 982. Avataraṇe otaraṇe. Titthasmiṃ nadyādīnaṃ titthe. Vivare vivaraṇe. Iṅgite sīsacalanādike.
anya-e0810n0:2428: 983. Khattā khattiyato sañjāte sudditthitanaye sudditthiyā putte ca. Tibbamhi adhimatte ca. So uggo. Aggo seṭṭho. Dhiti vīriyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2429: 984. Pabhāte paccūse. Niroge rogamutte. Sajje saṅgate, ādhārepi ca. “Sajjutto sannaddhe saṅgatepi ce”ti nānatthasaṅgahe. Dakkho cheko. Yuttepi kallaṃ. Kūṭacariyāyaṃ saṭhacariyāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2430: 985. Pakkhibhedo pārāvatappamāṇo pakkhī. Yasmiṃ gehe palinā patite asubhanimittaṃ karonti. Pārāvate kalarave.
anya-e0810n0:2432: 986. Kaṭhine kakkhaḷe. Sāhaso balakkāro. Appiye amanāpe. Cīre nantake, vāke ca cīraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2433: 987. Migabhede kukkurappamāṇe mige. Paṭākāyaṃ dhaje. Mocaṃ pasiddhaṃ, kadalī īkāranto. Dakkhiṇā kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā dātabbaṃ dānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2437_0: 991. Bhājane vilīvamayādike. Pariyatti pariyāpuṇanaṃ sikkhanaṃ, pariyāpuṇitabbā vā
anya-e0810n0:2437_1: sikkhitabbā. Jarāsithilacammasmiṃ jarāya kāraṇabhūtāya sithilacammani. Udaraṅge udaracammarājiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2439: 993. Gāmasandohe gāmasamūhe. Paridhi pariveso sūriyādigehaṃ. Āgame buddhavacane. Lekhe vācitalekhe.
anya-e0810n0:2440: 994. Ayomayavijjhanakaṇṭako sūjhādivijjhanaṃ. Guṇukkaṃse guṇātisaye. Vibhave bhoge. Sampatti, sampadāti ca abhidhānadvayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2441_0: 995. Bhū pathavī. Yogyādīsu tīsvatthesu tīsu. Yogye anucchavike. Yutte saṅgate. Addho
anya-e0810n0:2441_1: addhasaddo bhāge samabhāge, asamabhāge ca. Tatra same addhaṃ. Itaratra addho addhampi,
anya-e0810n0:2441_2: pathe magge addhā pume. Kālepi addhā pume. Ekaṃse nicchaye. Caturambaṇe karīsaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2442: 996. Usabhe gavasatajeṭṭhake gave. Seṭṭhesu ca usabho. Vīsayaṭṭhiyaṃ usabhaṃ. Tanti buddhavacanaṃ. Panti āḷi.
anya-e0810n0:2443: 997. Itthinimitte itthiyā aṅgajāte. Kilañje vilīvamaye. So kaṭasaddo kate tīsu.
anya-e0810n0:2448: Vopālito. “Samaye ca kriyākāre, kilañje ca sare kaṭo”ti tikaṇḍaseso tikaṇḍasesa 3.3.93. Mandirālindavatthuni gehassa ālindabhāge vatthumhi.
anya-e0810n0:2449: 998. Mathite gorasavisese. Sūciphale ambilapattaphale. Duddasetare passituṃ adukkare.
anya-e0810n0:2450: 999. Antarīpaṃ jalamajjhathalaṃ. Pajjoto padīpo. Bandho sambandho. Mihite īsaṃhasite.
anya-e0810n0:2451: 1000. Thiyaṃ itthisāmaññe. Itthiliṅgeti vā attho. Dāre bhariyāyaṃ. Sure devatāyaṃ, devatāvisese vā. Vāsudeve nārāyane. Antake vasavattini. Asite kāḷavaṇṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2452: 1001. Upaṭṭhāne pāricariyāyaṃ, sevane ca. Aññaropane abhaṃsabhāvassa aññassa taṃsabhāvaropane. Sakko sakkasaddo. Inde devarāje sakko. Janapade sakkā. Sākiye ca khame tīsu.
anya-e0810n0:2453: 1002. Vajjanatthādīsu tīsu parihāro. Pañhavissajjanepi parihāro. Dvije brāhmaṇe. Vessepi ariyo.
anya-e0810n0:2454: 1003. Suṃsumāre nakke. Ulūpini caṇḍamacchavisese. Uddālapādape selurukkhe, yassa phalāni atipicchalāni.
anya-e0810n0:2455: 1004. Piyake pītasāle. Kaṇḍe sare. Khipane asanaṃ. Asu khepane. Yuge rathayugādo. Vikāro vikati. Antike samīpe.
anya-e0810n0:2457: 1006. Makacivatthe yaṃ loke “cakkū”ti vuccati, “sāṇavattha”ntipi eke. Ganthe saddasatthādike. Lepyādikammani cittakārādīhi katarūpe.
anya-e0810n0:2461: 1010. Kaserussa phale sakaṇṭakassa phale. Maggasamāgame caccare. Bahulāyaṃ “phālātī”iti khyāte. Dose tu eḷamīritaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2462_0: 1011. Adhikaraṇe adhikaraṇakārake. Pattādhāro bhājanassa ādhāro. Ālavālake tarusekatthaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2462_1: tarumūlavicite sobbhajalādhāre. Agabhedo rukkhabhedo, so ca mahāsattena temiyarājakumārakāle
anya-e0810n0:2462_2: bhuttarukkho. Tatra kārā itthī. Kāropi sakkāre, dvīsu. Bandhanālaye pana kārāyeva.
anya-e0810n0:2463: 1012. Meghapāsāṇe ghanopale. Kuṇḍikāyaṃ bhiṅgāre. Padātismiṃ catutthasenaṅge.
anya-e0810n0:2464: 1013. Chiddādīni tīṇi abhidhānāni susire ca dūsane aparādhe ca tīsu siyuṃ. Muccite muccitabbe.
anya-e0810n0:2466: 1015. Atthaṅgame vināse. Nigamubbhūte nigamesañjātavatthumhi. Āpaṇopajīvini āpaṇena jīvitavuttiyaṃ kattari.
anya-e0810n0:2468: 1017. Phalamhi rukkhādīnaṃ phalamatte. Taṃ pakkavacanaṃ. Nāsamukhe nāsābhimukhe ca pariṇate ca tīsu.
anya-e0810n0:2469: Ājīvane jīvitavuttiyaṃ. Piṇḍane rāsikaraṇe. Goḷake vaṭṭale.
anya-e0810n0:2470: 1018. Paribbaye vetane. Kammādike kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭakilesavaṭṭe. Vaṭṭale bubbuḷasaṇṭhāne. Paccāhāre paṭivacanāhāre.
anya-e0810n0:2472: 1020. Sabyamhi adakkhiṇe. Cāru manuññaṃ. Sarabye sarena vijjhitabbe phalakādo. Cihane lakkhaṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2473: 1021. Samasippīnaṃ samānasippīnaṃ gaṇe seṇī itthī. Āvaḷiyaṃ pantiyaṃ. Sudhāyaṃ lepe. Dhūliyaṃ rajasi. Vāsacuṇṇake vāsayoggacuṇṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2474: 1022. Atipasatthe pasatthassa jo, ativuḍḍhe vuḍḍhassa. Takke gorasavisese. Hotīti kriyāpadaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2477: 1025. Ikke bahulome kāḷamige. Baḷise macchavedhane. Selabhede vaṅkanāmake pabbate.
anya-e0810n0:2478: 1026. Kuṇapamhi matakāye. Addhamhi samaddhabhāge, tenāha “purise”ti, “purise”ti ca yebhuyyappavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tenāha “vā khaṇḍaṃ sakalaṃ pume”ti.
anya-e0810n0:2480: 1030. Devabhedo kumbhaṇḍo nāma yakkho. Vallijātiyaṃ yassā phalāni ukkhalippamāṇāni honti. Catutthaṃse catutthabhūte koṭṭhāse. Pade caraṇe. Paccantasele pabbatapāde.
anya-e0810n0:2481: 1031. Lohantare setalohe. Bahumhi bahuvacane. Kammārabhaṇḍabhede “tū”iti khyāte. Khaṭake kuñcikapāṇimhi.
anya-e0810n0:2482: 1032. Doṇiyaṃ kaṭṭhamaye dhaññamānike. Adhiṭṭhitiyaṃ upariṭṭhāne. Ṭhāne ṭhānamatte.
anya-e0810n0:2483_0: 1034. Koṭṭhāsabhedasmiṃ “vakkaṃ hadaya”ntyādīsu ma. ni. 1.110. Vaṅke kuṭilye. Dibbacakkhupubbenivāsānussatiāsavakkhayasaṅkhātā
anya-e0810n0:2483_1: tisso vijjā, ādinā aṭṭha vijjā gahitā. Buddhiyaṃ ñāṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2484: 1035. Anākule ākularahite. Siloke anuṭṭhubhādo. Addhe bhāge. Tīsu pajjo pajjasaddo.
anya-e0810n0:2485: 1036. Rukkhabhedasmiṃ udakappasādanaphale. Kittime karaṇena nipphatte. Vidheyye vacanaggāhini. Pubbamhi pūye.
anya-e0810n0:2486: 1037. Laddhattharakkhaṇe laddhassa dhanādikassa atthassa rakkhaṇe. Niyojane pesane. Kāriye phale.
anya-e0810n0:2487: 1038. Assāsappatte laddhassāse. Bodhidume amhākaṃ bhagavato bodhirukkhe. Kurūre kakkhaḷakārake. Nesādamhi migamacchādiludde.
anya-e0810n0:2488: 1039. Laggasmiṃ saṅge. Majjhamhi udare. Bhāge asamaddhabhāge. Dhanimhi mahaddhane.
anya-e0810n0:2489: 1040. Gahane saṅkare. Sasantāne attano niyakajjhattasantāne. Visayagocarānaṃ viseso vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2491: 1041. Bhuvane kāmabhavādike. Jane pāṇimhi. Yase kittiyaṃ. Pajje anuṭṭhubhādo. Rukkhe rukkhabhede.
anya-e0810n0:2492: 1042. Vaṭo vaṭarukkho. Vāyase kāke. Bake setapatte. Avasaro avakāso. Ahaṃ dinaṃ. Kuce nārithane. Abbhe meghe.
anya-e0810n0:2495: 1044. Sūraṃsūsu sūriye, kiraṇe ca. Dame damane. Mānaṃ mānaviseso. Sānu pabbatasānu.
anya-e0810n0:2496_0: 1045. Tāpo sūriyasantāpo. Sapace caṇḍāle, saṃ sunakhaṃ pacatīti sapaco. Pasu catuppado.
anya-e0810n0:2496_1: Kuruṅgo ajinayoni. Ulūko koṭarasakuṇo. Indo sakko. “Mahinde guggululūka-palaggāhesu
anya-e0810n0:2497: 1046. Māṇavo macco. Attā sarīrādhipatidevatā. Sire uttamaṅge. Tipumhi kāḷalohe.
anya-e0810n0:2498_0: 1047. Bali bhāgadeyyo. Hattho pāṇi. Aṃsu bhā. Dante rade. Vippe brāhmaṇe. Aṇḍaje
anya-e0810n0:2498_1: aṇḍasañjāte. Pajje anuṭṭhubhādo. Ānanaṃ mukhaṃ. Ācāro asītimahāvattādi. Dhaññaṅge
anya-e0810n0:2498_2: bhinnataṇḍule. Sukhume aṇumhi. “Lavalesakaṇāṇavo”ti hi amarasīhena sukhumapariyāyo kaṇo vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2499_0: 1048. Thūṇā gehādīnaṃ padhānadāru. Jaḷattaṃ mūḷhattaṃ. Kummāso māsavikati. Byañjanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2499_1: tadaññabyañjanaṃ. Phoṭo nāma yasmiṃ pūye viparīte dukkhavedanā natthi. Kapolo nāma
anya-e0810n0:2500_0: 1049. Bhāsapakkhī ca pakkhī ca bhāsapakkhino, tesu, “sakunto pakkhibhedepi, bhāsapakkhi
anya-e0810n0:2500_1: vihaṅgame”ti hi “bhāsantaṃ sundarākāre, bhāsanto bhāsapakkhinī”ti ca vopālito. “Sakunto
anya-e0810n0:2500_2: bhāsapakkhinī”tipi pāṭho. Bhāgye subhāsubhāvahe kammani. Vidhāne karaṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2501_0: 1050. Yo ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā puna otaritvā udakabbhantare macche gaṇhāti, so nīlasakuṇo
anya-e0810n0:2501_1: cātako nāma. Eṇe eṇīmigakhyāte. Saro kaṇḍo. Sede sedane, sida pāke. Pāko pacanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2502: 1051. Puñje piṇḍe. Meso usabho methunaṃ kakkaṭo sīho kaññā tulā vicchiko dhanu makaro kumbho mīnoti mesādi. Loṇe lavaṇuttame. Saṃvaṭṭe vināsakappe. Kamuke tambūlaphalarukkhe.
anya-e0810n0:2503_0: 1052. Amate devatābhojane. Lepe suddhasakkharacuṇṇādimaye. Satthe dīghadaṇḍe satthavisese.
anya-e0810n0:2503_1: Najjantareti gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahīti pañcasu mahānadīsu pañcamāya mahānadiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2503_2: Bhuvi pathaviyaṃ. Kriyā nārīsiṅgārabhāvajā kriyā. Vilāso pana tadaññajo. Atraje putte.
anya-e0810n0:2504_0: 1053. Kutho hatthipiṭṭhattharaṇaṃ. Veṇī nārīnaṃ kesakalāpo. “Paveṇī veṇī kuthayo”ti
anya-e0810n0:2504_1: hi vopālito. “Paveṇī kulaveṇīsū”tipi kvaci pāṭho. Vutti bhavanaṃ. Vuttā vuttanto.
anya-e0810n0:2504_2: Vetane kammena laddhabbe. Bharaṇe posane, dhāraṇe ca.
anya-e0810n0:2505: 1054. Mariyādasaddo dvīsu. Sattā vijjamānatā. Samiddhi sampatti. Soppe niddāyaṃ. Vutti jīvitavutti.
anya-e0810n0:2506: 1055. Kucchā garahā. Apavādo avaṇṇavādo, abhūtākkhānampi. Dhaññe dhaññavisese, yassa sīsaṃ aṅguṭṭhappamāṇaṃ dīghañca. Piyaṅgu gandhadabbaṃ. Mokkhe nibbāne. Sive kalyāṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2507: 1056. Rañjane kāsāyādirañjane. Sūrate methune. Vāse vasanakriyāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2508: 1057. Patthe mānatumbe. Nāḷe uppalādīnaṃ nāḷe. Pipāsāyaṃ pātumicchāyaṃ. Vutti bhavanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2511: Nābhi padhāne katthūri-maṃse ca kvaci kittito”ti. –
anya-e0810n0:2513: 1059. Antareti dvinnaṃ antare. “Vīci sukhataraṅgesū”ti vopālito. Thiratte thirabhāve. “Dhīratte”tipi pāṭho, soyevattho. Save savane.
anya-e0810n0:2515: 1061. Vitte dhane. Aṅko lakkhaṇaṃ. Buddhi ñāṇaṃ. Khe ākāse.
anya-e0810n0:2516: 1062. Vate titthiyasamācāre. Āgumhi aparādhe. Maṇi silāvikati, maṇisaṅkhāto vā ratanaviseso idha maṇi nāma. Hāyane saṃvacchare. Vuṭṭhi vassanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2517: 1063. Lipi akārādīnaṃ sannivesaviseso. Mokkho nibbānaṃ. Rate sūrate.
anya-e0810n0:2518: 1064. Pāpe ca asubhe ca riṭṭhaṃ. Ariṭṭhaṃpyatra, tabbhāve tatra akāro. Aparādho ādīnavo. Ketumhi paṭākāyaṃ. Cihane lakkhaṇe. “Dhajo soṇḍikalesesu, paṭākāyañca cihane”ti vopālito.
anya-e0810n0:2519: 1065. Dvāramattepi bahidvārepi. Ito paraṃ ye anekatthā vuccante, te vāccaliṅgā. Phuṭe pākaṭe.
anya-e0810n0:2520: 1066. Ajjhakkhe adhikate. Jaḷe aññāṇe. Lolupe atitaṇhe. Cale kampite.
anya-e0810n0:2521: 1067. Vikate virūpe. Komalaṃ akaṭhinaṃ. Atikhiṇo kuṇṭho.
anya-e0810n0:2522: 1068. Site sete. Sūcako pesuññakārako. Ahi sappo. Sakke khame. “Satte”ti pāṭhe pana sattiyuttetyattho. Sambandhe avippayoge. Akhile sakale.
anya-e0810n0:2523: 1069. Kevalaṃ asammissaṃ. Anto avasānaṃ. Adhamo nihīno. Paṇato buddhādīsu ninno. Ninno thalapaṭipakkho.
anya-e0810n0:2525: 1071. Byāpe byāpite. Bhāvini anāgate vatthumhi. There jiṇṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2526_0: 1072. Bahusaddo “ekasmiṃ, dvīsu ca na pavattatī”tyādīsuyeva pavattatīti maññamāno
anya-e0810n0:2526_1: “tyādo”ti vadati. “Ekavacanaṃ, bahuvacana”nti vuttattā pana dvīsupi bahusaddo vattateva.
anya-e0810n0:2526_2: Ācariyena vā parasamayavacanāni manasi katvā “tyādo”ti vuttaṃ. Tividhañhi tattha
anya-e0810n0:2526_3: vacanaṃ ekavacanaṃ dvivacanaṃ bahuvacananti. Sabbapārisadattā hi byākaraṇassa sabbesaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2527: Dhī vuccati paññā, sā yassa atthi, sa dhīro, budho. Dhānaṃ vā dhī, sā yassatthīti sa dhīro, dhitimanto. Dhute cale.
anya-e0810n0:2528: 1073. Yāne hatthādiyāne yoggaṃ. Khame pana yoggo.
anya-e0810n0:2529: 1074. Vuḍḍhe āyuvuḍḍhe. Kulaje kulīne. Vuddho āyuvuḍḍho. Uru pamāṇato mahanto.
anya-e0810n0:2530: 1075. Vutte vattabbe. Uggate uddhaṃgate. Āditte agyādīhi, gabbite sañjātamāne.
anya-e0810n0:2531: 1076. Vigate vigatarāge. Vāyane vīte paṭe. Bhajjite dhaññādike. Bhajja pāke.
anya-e0810n0:2532: 1077. Caye samūhe. Samo tulyo. Ari sattu. “Samādisū”tipi pāṭho. Vīre akātare sūre. Ravisūroti ravisūriyo “sūro”ti vutto. Kuddhe kodhasahite. Dūsite appiye.
anya-e0810n0:2533: 1078. Arimhi sattumhi diṭṭho. Ikkhitepi diṭṭho. Pote bālake. Vate ekantasādhane vatakamme.
anya-e0810n0:2534: 1079. Salākāyaṃ kusāvahāre. Dabbe varahisatiṇe. Khaye udayabbayānupassīti. Sakuṇepi vayo “visayuttannabhuttānaṃ, vayānaṃ maraṇaṃ bhave”tyādīsu. Gabbo abhimāno.
anya-e0810n0:2535: 1080. Biḷāle majjāre. Nakule ahisattumhi. Manthano khīramanthanadaṇḍo. Sattu taṇḍulavikatikhajjaviseso. Assādilome assādīnaṃ lome. Ghāto maraṇaṃ. Rāsi puñjo.
anya-e0810n0:2536: 1081. Gopagāme gopālānaṃ gāme. Rave sadde. Sārathi pājitā. Vandī thutipāṭhako.
anya-e0810n0:2539: Vopālito. Pupphe suttādinā asaṅkhate. Taddāme pupphadāme suttādinā saṅkhate. Sakaṭe ane. Haye asse.
anya-e0810n0:2540: 1082. Accane pūjāyaṃ. Bhe nakkhatte. Nettamajjhe “sūlā”ti khyāte. Odhi mariyādo.
anya-e0810n0:2541_0: 1083. Puṇṇatā paripuṇṇatā. Avajjaṃ doso. Manakkārepi ābhogo. Āḷisaddo itthī. Sakhī
anya-e0810n0:2541_1: vayasā. Setu jalavāraṇo, nadyādimaggo ca. Satte sattiyutte, thiretyattho. “Daḷho
anya-e0810n0:2541_2: thūle bhuse satte, pagāḷhepi daḷhe mato”ti vopālito.
anya-e0810n0:2542: 1084. Mokkhe nibbāne, arahattaphalepi. Sāmini patimhi. Dhāraketi dhāretīti dhārako, tattha. Posakepi bhattā.
anya-e0810n0:2543: 1085. Sikhā cūḷā. Piñchaṃ pucchaṃ. Attani “saṅghikaṃ puggalika”ntyādīsu. Khepe nindāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2545_0: 1087. Khaṇḍe sakale. Paṇṇe rukkhādīnaṃ paṇṇe. Kaṇḍe sare. Salākā vaṇopayuttā. Sucino
anya-e0810n0:2545_1: bhāvo sucittaṃ, tasmiṃ. Gate gamanakriyāyaṃ. “Dhāva gatisuddhiya”nti hi dhātupāṭho.
anya-e0810n0:2545_2: Hāvo itthīnaṃ siṅgārabhāvajakriyā. Avijjāya aññāṇe. Mucchane visaññibhāve.
anya-e0810n0:2546_0: 1088. Ghammajalaṃ kāye uṇhena sañjātajalaṃ. Pāke paccane. Goḷe “mu-yī”iti khyāte
anya-e0810n0:2546_1: mattikāguḷake. Ucchumaye ucchurasasañjāte. Mitte piyamitte, mittamatte vā. Sahāye
anya-e0810n0:2547_0: 1089. Kurūre kakkhaḷakammante. Parasmiṃ paraṭṭhāne, paraloke vā. Atra ṭhāne, loke
anya-e0810n0:2547_1: vā. Aṅko cihanaṃ. Aparādhe nāṭakaparicchedepi aṅko. Apavādo lokagarahā. Dese desavisese.
anya-e0810n0:2547_2: “Bhave janapado dese, jane janapadepi ce”ti vopālito.
anya-e0810n0:2548: 1090. Pajje siloke. Vacībhede byattavācāyaṃ. Anvaye santāne. Sarūpasmiṃ samānabhāve. Adhobhāge ca talaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2549: 1091. Vilagge kāyamajjhe. Vemajjhe majjhasāmaññe. Kusumaṃ pasavaṃ. Utu itthipupphaṃ. Subbate sundare vate.
anya-e0810n0:2550: 1092. Kose liṅgapasibbake. Gabbhare guhāyaṃ. Bile kipillikādīnaṃ āvāse. Gaṇḍake khaggavisāṇe. Kadambe “thina”iti khyāte. Dume rukkhe. Caye samūhe.
anya-e0810n0:2551: 1093. Bhe nakkhattabhede. Dhenuyaṃ siṅginiyaṃ. Yoniyaṃ itthīnaṃ aṅgajāte. Sire sīse.
anya-e0810n0:2552_0: 1094. Bhogīsaddo bhogavati puggale, urage ca. Sivo mahissaro. Bale thāme. Pabhāve
anya-e0810n0:2552_1: tejasi. “Vīriyaṃ sukke pabhāve, tejo sāmatthiyesvapī”ti vopālito. Tejasaddo pana
anya-e0810n0:2552_2: tesu ca yathāvuttesupi dvīsvatthesu, dittiyañca vattati.
anya-e0810n0:2553: 1095. Santati ādhāro. Khaggaṅge khaggassa tikhiṇāvayave. Sūte sārathimhi. Paṭihāre vacanahāre. “Vida lābhe”ti dhātvatthato vitti. Pīḷā vibādhā.
anya-e0810n0:2555: 1097. Rukkhe ambaṭṭharukkhe. Parasamaye pana bādhā. Adhikappeme atisayapeme.
anya-e0810n0:2556: 1098. Ketumhi dhaje. Lekhye likhitabbe lekhe. Rājiyaṃ tu lekhā.
anya-e0810n0:2557: 1099. Satthe āvudhabhede. Satte pāṇimhi. Caye samūhe.
anya-e0810n0:2559: 1101. Saṃsade sabhāye. Ayanasaddo gamane, pathe ca vattati.
anya-e0810n0:2560_0: 1102. Rukkhantare gaṇadume. Sūre sūriye. Koṇe vidisāyaṃ. Haye turaṅge ca asso. Khandhe
anya-e0810n0:2560_1: bhujasire. Accisaddo jālāyaṃ aggijālāyaṃ. Aṃsumhi tassa, aññesañca aṃsumhi vattati.
anya-e0810n0:2560_2: So ca no pume pulliṅge na vattati.
anya-e0810n0:2561: 1103. Abhāvasaddo nāse vijjamānassa nāse. Asattasaddo avijjamānatthe vattati. Bhutti bhuñjanakriyā. Pāṇe āyumhi jīvaṃ. Jane pāṇavati jīvo.
anya-e0810n0:2562: 1104. Chadane gahādīnaṃ chadane. Rāsi puñjo, sahadhammīnaṃ gaṇo ca.
anya-e0810n0:2565: Vopālito. Yajane devapūjāyaṃ. Accane pūjāmatte. Dikkha muṇḍiyopanayananiyamabbatādesesu.
anya-e0810n0:2566: 1105. Karaṇaṃ kāro, so eva kārikā, kriyā, sakatthe ṇiko. Pajjepi soyevattho. Cihane lakkhaṇe. Thīraje itthīnaṃ utumhi. Pupphe sumane. Vānare makkaṭe.
anya-e0810n0:2567: 1106. Adhare dantāvaraṇe. Kharabhe “ka-la-au”iti khyāte. Lobhapuggalepi luddho. Āvile anacche.
anya-e0810n0:2569: 1108. Hāso ca gandho ca hāsagandhā, tesu. Gandhotra dūragāmī. Kalyāṇepi cāru. Khala calane, sañcaye ca, to, khalito.
anya-e0810n0:2570: 1109. Vakkale rukkhattace. Adhirohe ārohanakriyāyaṃ. Vatthantaraṃ vicittarūpaṃ vatthaṃ, yaṃ cīnadese sañjātaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2571: 1110. Paṭihāre “ḍa-gā”iti khyāte. Mukhe bhattādīnaṃ pavesanaṭṭhāne. Pete paralokaṃ gate. Aparaṇṇaṃ muggādi. Kālo tiṃsarattidivaparicchinno.
anya-e0810n0:2572: 1111. Dose kodhe. Ghāte māraṇe. Migādo catuppade. Chagale aje. Arūpe phassādike. Avhaye saññāyaṃ. Darathe kāyacittasambhūte santāpe. Bhīti bhayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2573: 1112. Bhāre khandhabhārādike. Sujāsaddo dabbiyaṃ kaṭacchuyaṃ, indajāyāyaṃ sakkassa bhariyāyañca. Vihāyase ākāse.
anya-e0810n0:2574: 1113. Maṇike mahati udakabhājane. Ratane asmavikāre ratanasāmaññe. Selo candanapabbato. Ārāme pupphārāmādiārāme.
anya-e0810n0:2575: “Malayo dese selaṅgapabbatantare, malayātivutāyañcā”ti vopālito. Aṅko cihanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2576: 1114. Sappimhi ghate, tadaññe hotabbe ca havi.
anya-e0810n0:2577: “Rahasi ca vicāre ca, viveko jaladoṇiya”nti vopālito.
anya-e0810n0:2579: “Vego jave pavāhe ca, mahākālaphalepi ce”ti medinīkosa 3.24 vopālito. Khile aṇukhāṇumhi. Kaṇe appe.
anya-e0810n0:2581: “Apāṅgaṃ aṅgahīne ca, nettante tilakepi ce”ti medinīkosa 3.28 vopālito. Muttāguṇe suttabandhamuttāyaṃ. Gahaṇaṃ gāho, tasmiṃ. Makuḷe apupphite. Rase loṇarase.
anya-e0810n0:2582: 1117. Ago, nago cāti dve abhidhānāni selarukkhesu vattanti. Svappe suṭṭhu appe, appataretyattho. Avadhāraṇe “namanamatta”ntyādīsu. Accane pūjāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2583: 1118. Chidde dose. Otaraṇaṃ jalatitthādīsu avataraṇaṃ. Ayyake pitupitari.
anya-e0810n0:2584: 1119. Rukkhe khaggaphale. Sune sunakhe. Gandhe adhivāsanagandhe.
anya-e0810n0:2585: 1120. Koṇe asse. Savane sote. Pantiyaṃ vīthiyaṃ. Bhāgyaṃ puññaṃ. Ekadeso tatiyabhāgādi. Ajapālake pokkhare. “Kuṭṭhaṃ roge sugandhe cā”ti vopālito.
anya-e0810n0:2586_0: 1121. Senāsane vihārādike. Sene pīṭhādike. Cundabhaṇḍamhi cundānaṃ upakaraṇe. “Bhamo’mbuniggame
anya-e0810n0:2586_1: bhaṇḍi, cundākhye sippiyantake”ti nānatthasaṅgahe vopālito. Aṃsusaddo vatthādīnaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2586_2: lome, kare kiraṇamatte ca. Abyaye pakārādike.
anya-e0810n0:2587: 1122. Khajjantare sūkaravaccasaṇṭhāne dhaññavikāre. Dise ripumhi. Pati dhavo. Ariyo adhipati.
anya-e0810n0:2589_0: “Raṅgo dāne khale rāge, tacche raṅgaṃ tipumhi ce”ti vopālito. Peyye udakādike. Pītiyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2589_1: pivanakriyāyaṃ. “Rakkhaṇe pītiyaṃ pāna”nti vopālito. Iṇe, ukkhepane ca uddhāro. Ummāre
anya-e0810n0:2589_2: dvārummāre. Eḷakasaddassa ajassāpi vācakattā “eḷako aje”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2590: 1124. Paharaṇaṃ pahāro, pothanaṃ. Paharati etthāti pahāro, yāmo, hāyano saṃvaccharo. Kuṇḍikāyaṃ “kayā”iti khyātāyaṃ. Āḷhake catupatthappamāṇe. Bhusamhi taṇḍulattace.
anya-e0810n0:2591: 1125. Āvāṭe kūpe. Caye samūhe ca. Kāsu sā, kāraṇe, rahasi ca upanisā.
anya-e0810n0:2592: “Bhave upanisā dhamme, vedantepi rahasyampī”ti vopālito. Poṭagale “pho-khā”iti khyāte. Guṇetare avajje.
anya-e0810n0:2593_1: Aṭṭite “aṭṭassaraṃkarotī”tyādīsu. Aṭṭa abhiyoge, aṭṭa atikkamahiṃsāsūti dhātvattho.
anya-e0810n0:2593_2: Kānane vane. Uppattiyaṃ janane, vihāyasāgamane ca.
anya-e0810n0:2594: 1127. Lāmake nihīne. Khandhe rūpādike. Mūlaṃ mūladhanaṃ. Upadā paheṇakaṃ. Avatthāyaṃ, paṭassa ante ca dasā. Ghāto māraṇaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2595: 1128. Gabbe māne. Ghaṭanaṃ silesakaraṇaṃ. Rāsi puñjo, etesu ghaṭasaddo. Abhihāre pūjāyaṃ. Bandhane “pākāracayo”tyādīsu.
anya-e0810n0:2596: 1129. Thoke appake. Dāne, hāniyañca cāgo. Gīvā, galo cāti dve abhidhānāni iṇe siyuṃ. “Iṇe gīvā galepi cā”tipi pāṭho. Gale kaṇṭhe.
anya-e0810n0:2597: 1130. Daṇḍepi sāhasaṃ. Paṭe vatthavisese bhaṅgaṃ. Sāṇādike missitvā katañhi vatthaṃ “bhaṅga”nti vuttaṃ. Chavake kaḷevare.
anya-e0810n0:2599: “Madano māradhuttara-vasantadumasitthake”ti vopālito. Pamātari mātumātari. Veṭhe uṇhīse ca veṭhanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2600: 1132. Taṇḍuleyye tilaphalasāke. Ayye sāmini. Mutti muccanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2601_0: 1133. Aṅke lakkhaṇe. Ākāre sīsacalanādike. Vappe vappanīyabīje. Taṭe tīre ca vappo,
anya-e0810n0:2601_1: pākāramūle, nettajale, usume ca vappo. Anuññāyaṃ, vohāre ca sammutisaddo. Akkhatasaddo
anya-e0810n0:2602: 1134. Yāge devapūjāyaṃ, sadādāne ca satraṃ. Sasu hiṃsāyaṃ, traṇa, satraṃ. Osadhimhi, cande ca somo.
anya-e0810n0:2607: Vopālito. Yugagehaṅgeti pubbāparāyāmavasena thambhānaṃ upari ṭhapite yugabhūte gehāvayave. Dakkhiṇuttarāyāmavasena ṭhapite gehaṅge saṅghāṭo.
anya-e0810n0:2611: 1136-1137. Cirassādayo cattāro ciratthakā. Cirāya, cirā cātra. Sahādayopi cattāro sahatthā. Punappunamādayo pañca punappunatthā. Vinādayo pañca vajjanatthā.
anya-e0810n0:2612_0: 1138. Balavaṃ suṭṭhu atīva kimuta su ati ete cha atisayatthe. Pasaṃsāyañca suṭṭhu.
anya-e0810n0:2612_1: Pañhepi kimuta. Āho kiṃ kimu udāhu kimuta uda ete cha vikappe vitakke. Tatra āhosaddo
anya-e0810n0:2612_2: dīghādi. “Diṭṭho āho udāhu ca, vikappatthe vibhāvane”ti hi bhāguri. Khāṇurayamāho
anya-e0810n0:2612_3: puriso. Ruddo tu rassādimāha “issarepyadhikepi ca, vikappevimhayepyaho”ti. Kimusaddo
anya-e0810n0:2612_4: rassanto. Kimāyaṃ khāṇu, kimu puriso. Udasaddo rassādi. Dhūmoyamoda kāpotaṃ, samūhatthe
anya-e0810n0:2612_5: ṇo. Kiñcasaddopi vikappe. Kimutasaddo atisayeti vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2613: 1139. Bho are ambho hambho re je aṅga āvuso he hare ete dasa avhāne. Haṃ hosaddāpyatra. Kathaṃ kiṃsu nanu kacci nu kiṃ ete cha samā samānatthā.
anya-e0810n0:2614: 1140. Adhunā, etarahi, idāni, sampati cāti cattāro idānītyatthe. Aññadatthu taggha sasakkaṃ addhā kāmaṃ jātu ve have ete aṭṭha ekaṃse ekaṃsatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2615_0: 1141. Yāvatādayo satta paricchedavācakā. Tatra yāvatā, yāvāti dve aniyamaparicchedatthavācakā.
anya-e0810n0:2615_1: Tāvatā, tāva, ettāvatāti niyamaparicchedatthavācakā. Kittāvatā, kīveti paricchedapucchanatthavācakā.
anya-e0810n0:2616_0: 1142-1143. Yathā tathā yatheva evaṃ yathānāma yathāhi seyyathāpi evamevaṃ vā tatheva
anya-e0810n0:2616_1: yathāpi evampi seyyathāpi nāma yathariva yathā ca viya tathariva iccete sattarasa
anya-e0810n0:2617: 1144. Saṃ, sāmaṃ, sayañceti tayo sayamiccatthe. Āma sāhu lahu opāyikaṃ patirūpaṃ sādhu evaṃ ete satta sampaṭicchanatthe. Āmantāpyatra.
anya-e0810n0:2618_0: 1145. Yamādayo cha kāraṇatthesiyuṃ. Canasaddo, cisaddo cāti dve asākalye asakalatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2618_1: Kadācanaṃ, kadācītyādi payogo. Mudhāsaddo nipphale phalarahite, nippayojanetyattho. Amūlepi ca mudhā.
anya-e0810n0:2619: 1146. Jātusaddo ekaṃsepi. Sabbato, samantato, parito, samantā cāti cattāro tulyatthā.
anya-e0810n0:2620: 1147. Na a no mā alaṃ nahi iccete cha nisedhe. Ce, sace, yadīti tayo yadyatthe. Saddhaṃsaddo anukūlatthe. Nattaṃ doso ca rajanīyamiccatthe. Divāsaddo ahe ahanītyatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2621: 1148. Īsaṃ, kiñci, manaṃ iccete appatthe. Atakkite avitakkite. Balakkāre tu sāhasaṃ. Aggato, purato ca pureiccatthe. Pecca amutrasaddā bhavantare.
anya-e0810n0:2622: 1149. Aho ca hi cāti ete vimhaye. Vikappepi aho. Sammodepi hi. Tuṇhīsaddo mone abhāsane. Āvi, pātu ca pākaṭatthe. Sajju sapadisaddā taṅkhaṇetyatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2623: 1150. Sudaṃ kho assu yagghe ve hādayo hakārādayo ca padapūraṇe siyuṃ. Antarena, antarā, anto cāti ete abbhantareiccatthe. Avassaṃ, nūna ca nicchayatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2624: 1151. Saṃsaddo diṭṭhāsaddo ānandatthe. Samupajo, saṃpyatra. Kāmappavedane icchāya akkhāne kacci jīvati te mātā, mamedamabhimatamiccatthe. Usūyopagame usūyāpubbake upagame.
anya-e0810n0:2628_0: 1152-1153. Yathāttanti saccaṃ. Tathassa anatikkamo yathātathaṃ, yathātthe abyayībhāvo.
anya-e0810n0:2628_1: Tathasaddoyaṃ bhūtapariyāyo. Sadāsaddo, sanaṃsaddo cāti nicce. Sanasaddopyatra. Pāyo,
anya-e0810n0:2628_2: bāhulyañca samā. Pañcakaṃ bāhye. Saṇikaṃsaddo asīghe.
anya-e0810n0:2630: 1155. Sāyaṃ sāye sāyanhe. Atrāheti imasmiṃ ahani ajjasaddo.
anya-e0810n0:2633: 1158. Appevādayo tayo saṃsayatthamhi. Iti itthaṃ evaṃsaddā nidassane vattanti. Kathañcisaddo kicchatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2634: 1159. Khedo khinnatā. Paccakkhe sacchisaddo. Thire, avadhāraṇe ca dhuvaṃ. Tiro tiriyaṃsaddā samā. Duṭṭhukusaddā kucchāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2635: 1160. Āsiṭṭhatthamhi suvatthi. Dhisaddo nindāyaṃ. Kuhiñcanādayo satta ṭhānādipucchanatthā.
anya-e0810n0:2636: 1161. Iha idha atra ettha attha ete okāsatthādivācakā. Sabbasmiṃ kālādike sabbatrādidvayaṃ. Kismiṃ kāle kadā. Kasmiṃ kāle kudācanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2637_2: cireni”ccādi. Nāmapatirūpakaṃ yathā – “āma, sāhu, lahu, opāyika”miccādi. Sarapatirūpakaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2638_0: Sambhavo pabhavo. Udiṇṇe pavuddhe vaḍḍhane. Tisa pīṇane,ti, titti. Niyoge niyojane.
anya-e0810n0:2638_1: Agge uttame. Tappare tappadhāne. Saṅge laggane. Pakāre sadise, bhede vā. Antobhāve
anya-e0810n0:2638_2: pakkhitte. Viyoge pavāse. Avayave padese. Dhitiyaṃ vīriye padhāne. Ete catthā dhātusaṃyogatthā
anya-e0810n0:2638_3: vā nāmasaṃyogatthā vā bhavanti. Asaṃyogassa pana nāmapadassa attho “po siyā paramatthasmiṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2638_4: pātu vātesu pā bhave”ti ekakkharakose ekakkharakosa 73 gāthā vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2640_0: 1165-1167. Sanyāse nikkhitte. Mokkho nibbānaṃ. Rāsi nikaro. Gehe nilaye. Ādeso ācikkhanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2640_1: Upamāya sannibhe. Accayo atikkamo. Sāmīpye samīpabhāve. Uparati upasamo. Nīharaṇaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2641: 1168. Uddhakamme uyyāne. Viyoge uppāsite. Atthalābho uppatti. Pabalatte mahābahalatte. Dakkhaggatāsūti dakkhabhāve, aggabhāve ca. Sattiyaṃ, mokkhe nibbāne ca.
anya-e0810n0:2642: 1169. Du ca abhāve dussīlo, duppañño. Asamiddhiyaṃ dubbhikkhaṃ. Anandanaṃ amodanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2643: 1170. Samantattasamiddhīsūti samantabhāve, samiddhiyañca. Saṅgate sahite. Vidhāne karaṇe. Pabhavo sambhavo. Punappunakriyā punappunakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2644_0: 1171-1172. Atisayo atra adhimattaṃ. Bhusattho samantattho, tena samanta pariyāyopi
anya-e0810n0:2644_1: bhusasaddo atthīti veditabbo. Issariyo pabhūti. Accaye atikkame. Kalahe viggahe.
anya-e0810n0:2644_2: Bhāse kathane, “bhāsāyā”tipi pāṭho. Kucchane kucchāyaṃ. Anabhimukhatthe vimukho.
anya-e0810n0:2644_3: Moho vimati. Padhāne visiṭṭhe. Dakkhatā chekatā. Khede parissame.
anya-e0810n0:2645_0: 1173. Jānane avagate. Adhobhāge avaṃsire. Anicchaye aniṇṇaye. Paribhave avaññāte.
anya-e0810n0:2645_1: Deso ca byāpanañca hāni cāti dvando. Vacokriyāya vacanakriyāyaṃ. Theyye coriye. Aññāṇe ca pattiādike ca.
anya-e0810n0:2646_0: 1174. Pacchātthe anucaro. Bhusatthe anuggato. Sadise anurūpo. Anuvattiyaṃ anveti.
anya-e0810n0:2646_1: Hīne anu sāriputtaṃ paññavanto. Tatiyatthe nadimanvavasitā bārāṇasī. Dese, lakkhaṇe,
anya-e0810n0:2646_2: vicchāyaṃ, itthambhūte, bhāgādike ca anu. Lakkhaṇe rukkha’manu vijjotate cando. Vicchāyaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2646_3: rukkhaṃ rukkhamanu tiṭṭhati. Itthambhūte sādhu devadatto mātara’manu. Bhāge yadettha maṃ anu siyā.
anya-e0810n0:2647_0: 1175. Āliṅgane parissajati. Dosakkhāne paribhāsetvā. Nivāsane vatthaṃ paridahitvā.
anya-e0810n0:2647_1: Avañño paribhavo. Ādhāre bhojane soke byāpane. Tatve sabhāve. Lakkhaṇādo lakkhaṇavicchāitthambhūtabhāge.
anya-e0810n0:2648_0: 1176. Visiṭṭhe abhidhammo. Uddhakamme sāruppe vuddhiyaṃ pūjāyaṃ adhike. Kule abhijano.
anya-e0810n0:2648_1: Asacce lakkhaṇādimhi catubbidhe ‘abhirabhāge (pā.1.4.91)’ ti abhissa bhāgavajjitesu
anya-e0810n0:2649: 1177. Adhike issare pāṭhe uccāraṇe, adhiṭṭhāne pāpuṇane nicchaye uparibhāgādike bhaṭane bhattiyaṃ visesane ca adhi.
anya-e0810n0:2650_0: 1178-1179. Vāmādāne iti pāṭhe vāme paṭilome, ādāne gahaṇe. Vācādāne paccassosi. Paṭinidhimhi
anya-e0810n0:2650_1: mukhyasadise buddhasmā pati. Paṭibādhe nivattane. Paṭiccatthe “paṭiccā”ti padassa
anya-e0810n0:2651_0: 1180-1181. Samīpe ādikammani mariyāde uddhakammani icchāyaṃ bandhane abhividhimhi
anya-e0810n0:2651_1: ca ā. Kicche īsatthe nivattiyañca appasāde āsīsane saraṇe vākyasaraṇe ā evaṃ anussaraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2653: 1183. Sambhāvane api dibbesu kāmesu, ratiṃ so nādhigacchati dha. pa. 187. Sambhāvanamadhikatthavacanena aññatra sattiyā avighāto. Saṃvaraṇe apidhānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2654_0: 1184-1185. Apagato apeto. Upapattiyaṃ yuttiyaṃ upekkhā. Ādhikye upakhāriyaṃ doṇo.
anya-e0810n0:2654_1: Pubbakammani buddhopakkamaṃ kilesacchedo. Gayhākāre paccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Uparitte uparibhāve
anya-e0810n0:2655: 1186. Upadese evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te paṭikkamitabbaṃ. Vacanapaṭiggāhe evaṃ hotu. Idamatthe idaṃsaddassa atthe.
anya-e0810n0:2659_0: Samāhāre cakkhu ca sotañca cakkhusotaṃ. Anvācayo ekaṃ padhānabhāvena vatvā itarassa
anya-e0810n0:2659_1: appadhānabhāvena vacanaṃ, tasmiṃ. Sīlaṃ rakkhāhi, dānañca dehi. Itarītare samaṇo
anya-e0810n0:2659_2: ca brāhmaṇo ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā. Tatra kevalasamuccayo ca anvācayo ca samāse natthi,
anya-e0810n0:2660: 1188. Pakāro tulyo, bhedo ca. Padatthassa vipallāse goti ayamāheti. Samāpane icchitassa padassa pariniṭṭhāpane.
anya-e0810n0:2661_0: 1189. Pajjaṃ vāsaddassatthe. Vavatthitavibhāsāyaṃ vā paro asarūpā. Viavapubbo ṭhā
anya-e0810n0:2661_1: gatinivattiyaṃ, to, ṭhātissa tho, asarūpadvittañca. Vavatthitā niyamitā vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā.
anya-e0810n0:2662: 1190. Bhūsane alaṅkāre. Vāraṇe nivāraṇe. Pariyatti pariyāpuṇanatā, yuttatthepi alaṃ. Atho athasaddā anantarādīsu catūsu atthesu siyuṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2663: 1191. Pasaṃsādīsu tīsu. Svīkāre paṭiññāṇe. Ādinā pakāsatthasambhābyākodhādike catthe nāmasaddo. Avadhāraṇamevattho.
anya-e0810n0:2664: 1192. Anuññā anumati. Santānaṃ anunayo. Ālapanaṃ sambodhanaṃ. Vatasaddo ekaṃse dayāyaṃ karuṇāyaṃ hāse pahāse khede parissame ālapane vimhaye acchariye ca siyā.
anya-e0810n0:2665_0: 1193. Vākyārambhe “handa vadāmi te”ti. Visāde khede. Yāva tāva tūti yāvatāvasaddā
anya-e0810n0:2665_1: sākalye niravasese. Yāvadatthaṃ tāva gahitaṃ. Māne pamāṇe. “Yāva pamāṇamariyādā-vadhāraṇatthakaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2666_0: 1194. Puratthāsaddo pāciyaṃ disāyaṃ iccatthe, puratthe vakkhamāne, aggato samuddhe
anya-e0810n0:2666_1: iccatthe ca paṭhamepi ādimhi vattati. Pabandhe vākyaracanāyaṃ vākyapabandhe purāṇādike.
anya-e0810n0:2666_2: Cirantare atītabhūte. Nikaṭe sannihite. Āgāmike anāgate.
anya-e0810n0:2667_0: 1195. Khalusaddo nisedhe vākyālaṅkāre vākyabhūsāyaṃ avadhāraṇe evatthe, pasiddhiyañca
anya-e0810n0:2667_1: vattati. Abhitosaddo āsanne abhimukhe ubhayato iccatthe, ādinā sīghe, sākalye ca
anya-e0810n0:2667_2: atthe vattati. Āsanne abhitoyaṃ nadī. Abhimukhe abhitova tātā. Ubhayatoiccatthe abhito
anya-e0810n0:2667_3: maggassa. Sīghe abhito adhīyitvā. Sākalye abhito vanaṃ daḍḍhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2668: 1196. Yadyapisaddatthe anuggahaṇagarahatthe. Ekaṃsatthe avitathatthe. Atho panasaddo visesasmiṃ atthe, padapūraṇatthe ca siyā.
anya-e0810n0:2669: 1197. Hisaddo kāraṇādīsu catūsu atthesu vattati. Tusaddo pana tattha catūsu atthesu majjhe hetuvajje tike atthe vattati. Kusaddo pāpe īsatthe kucchane jigucchāyañca.
anya-e0810n0:2670_0: 1198. Nukāro saṃsaye, pañhe ca. Nānāsaddo anekatthe, vajjane ca. Kiṃsaddo pucchāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2670_1: jigucchāyañca, abyayo. Tiliṅgo ca, niyame tu tiliṅgova. Vārimhi udake. Muddhani sīse
anya-e0810n0:2672: Pāvake ca mayūre ca, sukhasīsajalesu ka”nti.
anya-e0810n0:2673_0: 1199. Amāsaddo sahatthe, samīpatthe ca, amāvāsī, amāgato ca. Punasaddo bhede visese.
anya-e0810n0:2673_1: Apaṭhame puna dadāti. Kirasaddo anussave anukkamena savane, aruciyañca. Udasaddo
anya-e0810n0:2673_2: apyatthe pañhe. Vikappane atthantarassa vikappane ca.
anya-e0810n0:2674_0: 1200. Pacchāsaddo patīciyaṃ disāyaṃ. Carime anāgate kāle. Sāmisaddo tu addhe bhāge,
anya-e0810n0:2674_1: jigucchane nindāyañca. Addhe bhāge sāmi vuttaṃ, jigucchanepi tadeva. Pātu pakāse
anya-e0810n0:2674_2: pakāsanīye, sambhave uppattiyañca. Mithosaddo aññoññeiccatthe, rahoiccatthe ca.
anya-e0810n0:2675_0: 1201. Hāsaddo khede, soke, dukkhe ca. Ahahasaddo khede, vimhaye abbhute ca. Dhisaddo
anya-e0810n0:2675_1: hiṃsāpane, nindāyañca. Tiriyaṃ tirosaddā pidhāne vattanti. Tiriyaṃ katvā kaṇḍaṅgato, tirokatvā vā.
anya-e0810n0:2676_1: pacurappayoge ekacce vā dassetvā tadaññepi saṅkhepanayena dassetumāha “tuni”ccādi.
anya-e0810n0:2676_2: Ettha ca tunādisaddehi jjupariyantehi tadantāva gahitā, na hi kevalānaṃ etesaṃ abyayabhāvo
anya-e0810n0:2676_3: sambhavati. Tassattho – tunapaccayanto ca tathā tvāna tave tvā tuṃ dhā so thā kkhattuṃ
anya-e0810n0:2676_4: to tha tra hiñcanaṃ hiṃ haṃ dhi ha yakārato hiṃdha dhunā rahi dāni, kiṃsmā vo dācanaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2676_5: dājjathaṃ thattaṃ jjhajjupaccayanto ca abyayībhāvasamāso ca tunādīnaṃ yādesanto ca
anya-e0810n0:2676_6: abyayaṃ nāma bhaveti. Payogo yathā – “kātuna, katvāna, kātave, katvā, kātuṃ, sabbadhā,
anya-e0810n0:2676_7: sabbaso, sabbathā, catukkhattuṃ, sabbato, sabbattha, sabbatra, kuhiñcanaṃ, kuhiṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2676_8: kuhaṃ, sabbadhi, iha, yahiṃ, idha, adhunā, etarahi, idāni, kva, kudācanaṃ, kadā,
anya-e0810n0:2676_9: ajja, kathaṃ, aññathattaṃ, ekajjhaṃ, sajju, upanagaraṃ, antopāsādaṃ, abhivandiya”iccādi.
anya-e0810n0:2678: Vacanesu ca sabbesu, yaṃ na byeti tadabyaya”nti.
anya-e0810n0:2680: Iti sakalabyākaraṇamahāvanāsaṅgañāṇacārinā kavikuñjarakesarinā dhīmatā sirimahācaturaṅgabalena mahāmaccena viracitāyaṃ abhidhānappadīpikāvaṇṇanāyaṃ sāmaññakaṇḍavaṇṇanā samattā.
anya-e0810n0:2682: 1. “Saggakaṇḍo cā”tyādinā abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ kapālatelavaṭṭisadisena kaṇḍattayena samaṅgitā dīpitā.
anya-e0810n0:2683_0: 2. “Tidive”tyādinā toṭakena tassā payojanaṃ kathitaṃ. Tassattho – yo naro kattubhūto
anya-e0810n0:2683_1: tidive devaloke, brahmaloke ca mahiyaṃ manussaloke, bhujagāvasathe nāgaloke cāti
anya-e0810n0:2683_2: etesu tīsu ṭhānesu sannihitānaṃ sakalatthānaṃ sabbesaṃ abhidheyyānaṃ samavhayassa
anya-e0810n0:2683_3: abhidhānassa dīpaniyaṃ pakāsaniyaṃ iha abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ savanadhāraṇādinā kusalo
anya-e0810n0:2683_4: cheko hoti, sa naro mahāmunino sammāsambuddhassa vacane suttābhidhammavinayasaṅkhāte
anya-e0810n0:2683_5: vacane paṭu cheko hoti, paṭuttāyeva matimā nāma hotīti.
anya-e0810n0:2684: 3-9. Idāni yassa rañño vihāre vasitvā ayaṃ gantho viracito, tassa nāmaguṇanivāsakaraṇappakāravihāraguṇanāmādīni dassetvā attano ca nāmaguṇe dassetuṃ satta gāthā vuttā.
anya-e0810n0:2685_0: Tatra dutiyā bhujaṅgappayātaṃ nāma. Tāsaṃ ayaṃ sambandhādhippāyā atthavaṇṇanā – yo
anya-e0810n0:2685_1: parakkamabhujo nāma bhūpālo rājā kāresi, rakkhesīti ca iminā sambandho. Kiṃguṇo so
anya-e0810n0:2685_2: rājā? Guṇabhūsano saddhādiguṇālaṅkāradharo. Tejassī tejoyutto. Jayī arijayena yutto.
anya-e0810n0:2685_3: Kesarivikkamo kesarasīho viya sūraguṇayutto, vīriyavā ca. Sa kattha nivāsī? So rājā
anya-e0810n0:2685_4: laṅkāyamāsi laṅkānāmake dīpe nivāsanasīlo. Ciraṃ cirakālaṃ vibhinnaṃ tidhā vibhinnaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2685_5: nikāyattayasmiṃ nikāyattayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sammā nayena hetunā samagge samaggaṃ
anya-e0810n0:2685_6: kāresi, kāritantoyaṃ karotīti kammiko, tathā sadehaṃva attano kāyaṃ iva niccādaro
anya-e0810n0:2685_7: hutvā dīghakālaṃ mahagghehi ca paccayehi taṃ nikāyattayaṃ rakkhesi.
anya-e0810n0:2686_0: Tathā yena raññā yathā kittiyā attano saddhādikittiyā karaṇabhūtāya laṅkā attano
anya-e0810n0:2686_1: nivāsanaṭṭhānabhūtā kammabhūtā sambādhīkatā saṅkaṭīkatā anokāsīkatā, tathā vihārehi
anya-e0810n0:2686_2: gāmehi ārāmehi khettehi vāpīhi ca laṅkā sambādhīkatā.
anya-e0810n0:2687_0: Tathā yassa rañño sabbakāmadadaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ anuggahaṃ patvā pāpuṇanahetu
anya-e0810n0:2687_1: ahaṃ vibudhagocaraṃ paṇḍitavisayaṃ ganthakārattaṃ patto, tena raññā kārite pāsādagopurādivibhūsite,
anya-e0810n0:2687_2: saggakaṇḍe devalokassa kaṇḍasadise, satoyāsayasmiṃ sādusalilāsayasamannāgate, paṭibimbite
anya-e0810n0:2687_5: mahājetavanākhyamhi vihāre vasatā nivāsaṃ kubbatā santavuttinā santacārinā saddhammaṭṭhitikāmena
anya-e0810n0:2687_7: āyasmato iddhimato mahāmoggallānassa nāmadheyyena therena esā abhidhānappadīpikā racitāti.
anya-e0810n0:2694: Guṇo ca doso ca sadā vivijjare;
